24b8: gi slob ma de'i/ / dam tshig lnga po byin nas ni// rab tu 'bad pas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig che// dkyil 'khor de nyid shes dkyil 'khor// sgrub bo rnams kyis ci 'dra der// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur bslad/ dam tshig
25a1: chan pa dkyil 'khang rdzogs s+ho/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdorjes sgrar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad na pa ca/
25a2: khams thams cad du spro ba'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de nam mkha'i khams thams
25a3: cad du sems kyis gang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mu dang / / gsung dang thugs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la rab tu rtsal te/ de na bcom ldan 'dadas nga mdzad chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa
25a4: thams cad kyi dam tshig bsgrub pa'i mchog ces bya ba rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gsungs pa/ / khru ni sum bcu'i khyon tsam du// kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'ong// 'od zer 'ab ba
25a5: de byung nas/ nam mkha' du ni 'di byab// bsam gtan sbyor bas bsam par bya/ 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du// 'o ma dang zhos kun du 'khrugs// shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad kyis ni// pad mas g.yogs par rnam bsgom
25a6: tho bo chen po gshin rdeb shed/ / drug tu rgod pa chen po sogs// rtag tu de yi dkyil 'khor gyi// de yi gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// khro chen lo gnyer rim par ldan/ 'bang ba'i phreng ba lakhrugs pa'i 'od// ji ltar rigs par
25a7: kun bskyed nas/ sgom par byed pa de dang bshad// the bo chen po dbyug pa so// 'jig rten gsub 'jig 'phrog byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// 'joms pa po ni rabatu gnas// jig gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum
25a8: gyis/ nam mkha'i khams ni kun du gag// / yi ge'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// bdag nyid snying khar rnam pas ma bya// snying kha'i gzugs ni der rnams su// lha yi rnam par sgom par byed/
25b1: sla ni sngags pas bsgrubar bya// de nyid la ni gzhug par bya// tshig shes pas bskal ba'i med// bsams nas pasam gtan yang dag bcam// zla 'od sa bur 'bang ba na// btsun ma rtag tu pa sgom par bya// !1
25b2: yang dag bskyed nas ni/ / de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya// rang gzugs snying khar bsams nas ni// de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya/ rang gzugs snying kharang bsams nas ni// ha yig tu ni rnam bsgom bya// 'dir
25b3: sngags rnams thams cad kyis/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// 'di ni dang po'i bsam gtan brjod// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// rtag tu rigs kyi bdag po yis// bskal par sreg par rnam
25b4: bsgoms nas/ sngags pas de yi rnam pa deng // bsam gtan brtson pas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi rab sbyor gyis/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rang gi gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// bsdu
25b5: khung pur 'di spro bya/ / ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun du bkang // 'od zer lnga yi rab sbyor gyis// rang lus su ni rab gzhug bya// rig ma'i rgyal mo sogs sbyor bas/ de
25b6: rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' khams ni// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya/ rang lus su ni rnam bsgoms nas// thams cad der ni rab gzhug bya// gnyis su med pa mnyam
25b7: pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po gsang sngags thams
25b8: cad kyi gsang chen rig ma'i tshul gyis las gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// dpag tshad kyi ni grangs kyi khyon// kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ gsal
26a1: bgasal bar mtshungs bsam nas/ / dbus su bdag nyid rnam pas maH// ba pas gnas ldarnams suni// rnam snang mdzad chen gzugs bsams nas// nyim dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/
26a2: rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya// snyi khar rdo rje sems dpa' ni// yang dag bskyed nas rnam pasgom u0f7f// chog shes pas nyin ma par// dam mkha'i khams ni gang bar byed// lhal sogs pa'i byor ba yi ska
26a3: de bag thag sa/ de nyid tshul ni dge ba 'di/ rigs kyi dbyebs rtogs par bya/ gzhan drags pa'i bas pa gtan ni// rnam par grangs pas 'grub mi 'gyur// gnyis sa med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
26a4: rgyal po chen por rig pa'i las kyi le'u ste bcwa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lta thams cad kyi de khon nyid kyi rdul bzlas pa'i chog ston par mdzad do// rnam mkhar 'brun ston par
26a5: ral/ gang du sems ni rab dgyes byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod bsgom pa// me tog bzang po de dbus su// de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rang gzugs phyag rgya chen po na/
26a6: bsgom bya gzhan du brtson mi bya// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// gsal ba 'od dkar 'bar la sogs// chu yi rnam par dgod par bya// de la sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig/ dang po gas
26a7: parnam bsgom bya/ / rtse mo lnga pa nam bsgoms nas// slar yang nga nyid la sbyar bya// blo dang ldan pas gnas lnga rtsa// gzugs brnyan yang ni yang dag bskyed// de nyid yi ge'i tshul 'thun pas// bsam gtan 'byung ba
26a8: bsgom par bya/ / chog shes pas yig rnams kyi// phreng ba bskyed nas bsgom par bya// nas kyi tshad 'di thams cad tra// bsam gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya// rab tu 'badapas 'og/ der ni// rtag tun ma mkha' gang
26b1: b.raH/ de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gang ba de la grags pa yin// yi ge gcig gi gsang sngags kyi// rang gzugs rnam par bsgom par bya// rigs kyi bdag po 'byung ba ni/ yi ge gsum gyi rtag shes bya/ yig
26b2: lnga la sogs gzung bas/ / ji srid yi ge 'byung ba'o// 'od dkar 'bar ba'i phreng ba sogs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od// rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams kyi// thog ma tha ma 'ang bya'o// u dpal sngon po'i mdab rnas par//
26b3: in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'od zer 'bar 'khrug gtso bo'i yum// yid kyis bsams pas 'grub par 'gyur// pad ma rA ga dbang mdog 'od// dmar po 'bar ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'jig rten khams ni kun nas
26b4: sra/ chog shes pas snang bar bya// ges ser po dang mtshungs pa// ser po 'od ser 'bar la sogs// sgom pa'i go 'phangs kyis bsgom bya// the tshom med par bsgrub par bya// de nyid 'byung ba gang gsungs pa// nga ga zam
26b5: yang dag bskyed nas ni/ / snying khar me tog bsams nas ni// dkyil 'khor de la bsgom par bya// chog shes pas de'i steng du// snying po phyag rgya rnam bsgom bya// ji lta'i go 'bangs kun bskyed nas// ye shes de nyid rnam bsgom bya/
26b6: gar a yig des phyung nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa la sogs bya// 'jig rten khams ni kun nas su// chog shes pas spro bar bya// thog ma bar dang tha mar ni// slar yang bsdu bar bsam par bya// zla 'od lta bur yang dag sbyor// rang
26b7: lus su yang bsgom par bya/ / 'di ni de nyid tshul dge ba// rigs gsum du yang rtogs par bya/ bya dang byed pa yang dag sbyor// sgom pa de ni 'grub par byed// sems kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyis// gal te chags la chags par 'gyur/
26b8: bsam gtan dus la rab gzhug nas// de la gzhug par bsgom par bya// 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa po// sgrub po rnams kyi de nyid 'di// dngos grub bsgrub la dam tshig mchog/ sangs rgyas
27a1: gzugs su nam bsgoms nas/ dal pa'i cod pan 'dzin bzhin pa// sangs rgyas skyob dpon yang dag bskyed// ste khar da ni dgod par bya// rang sngags mchog gi phyag d+ha ni// bsams nas de yi snying 'ang
27a2: dgod/ / 'thung dang za ba'i dus rnams su// nye bar longs spyod byed rnams su'ang // dri dang gzugs sogs bya ba rnams// 'di ni de kho na nyid brjod// lha sbyor sangs rgyas slob dpon gyi// rang gi bde ba rtag tu ni// cho ga shes pas
27a3: dbul bar bya/ / gzhan du 'grub par byed min nyid// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// ye shes can rnams kun gyi gsang// sngags kyi dngos grub byed de nyid// rang gzhan sems can thams cad
27a4: kyi/ chi ba de bzhin 'phrog par byed// de bzhin rang gzugs bsam la sogs// bsnyen dang yon rnams kun dang ldan// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes rab bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub pas// rdo rje ye
27a5: shes sprul pa'o/ / gnas bzhi rnams kyi kun sbyor gyi// lha yi sbyor ba mtshungs pa la// cho ga shes pas gzung bar bya// rig pa 'dzin par de brjod bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de nyid bya ba dri med bzang // de yi sngags kyi sku byed pa/ sdus/
27a6: pa yi ni bsgom par bya// thun pazhir bsam gtan 'di nyid ni// de nyid dam tshig gar mkhan no// thams cad du ni rigs dbye ba// bsdus pa yas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni nam bsgoms nas// 'khor lo de yi rnam bsgomaH//
27a7: rang lag tu ni yang dag bskyed// ji srid srog de btang mi bya// rdor sems la sogs sgom byed pa// bsdus pa yis ni rigs gsum du'ang // rdo rje sems dpas byin brlabs pas// sgrub pos rtag tu bsgrub par bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams
27a8: cad kyi/ / dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// sngags rnams kun gyi mnyes pa dang // dngos grub dam tshig ston pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig
27b1: rjegs thab ba na la snoms par byags nas de banan gshegs pa thams cad 'byung bar rda rjenas bya dkyil ba' san par mdad do/ / dab cig tul 'bor dugasum pa/ gang dbabs dad bya/ ga rung
27b2: gaphyag rgya yis/ / mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya// sgo dro la chog las// ngan chen 'byung ldan zi bar bya/ ga shes pas chub tu ni// dod pag med na mnyam par bri// chog shes pas kyang phyogs su// dan yod thub pa mnyam par // dbum sa/
27b3: rtag tu bsdus pa yis// sangs rgyas slob dpon kun du bri// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// rnam kun sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis// rab tu 'bad bas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya rnams ni thams cad du// ud
27b4: bal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / rtse mo bcu gcig chen po yi// rdo rje'i rnam par kun du bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// phyag rgya thams cad kun du bri// mkhas pas phyag rgya chen po ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bshad do// snying
27b5: po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ / pad ma dang ni ud pal bri// rin chen bzhi yi kha dog tu// de rnams dbus su mnyam par bri// 'dod pas lha rnams thams cad kyi// lha gzhan de ni yang dag 'byung // sgo ru bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang // 'thun
27b6: pa ru ni mnyam par bri/ / dkar po nag po de bzhin dmar// ser po ljang khu nyid dang yang // rtag tu bsam gtan gdan la gnas// de la dgod par bya ba yin// cho ga shes pas de re rer// 'joms byed bdag nyid can gyis gzhom// de la/
27b7: rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod// sgo bzhi ru ni rab tu brtsam// slob mas ma dang chung ma mchog/ sring mo dang ni bu mo bri// cho ga shes pas longs spyod bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal byed rgyal ba'i rigs de la// phyag rgya dgod par rab tu
27b8: grags/ / dzaMHrdo rje chen po'i rigs mchog la// dzA yi rnam pa rtag tu bya// dzaHphyag na pad ma'i rigs byung la// AHyi ge dag ni rtag tu bya// AH'dod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga las// ji ltar rigs pa'i AHyig go/ aHde bzhin
28a1: gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba dzi rje zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor can pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / da nas bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa dang ba'i brtsub brton par mad da// rkang bapa' ba gas macad pags// pa na ma
28a2: zung nas gang du sems/ / sems can mi ldan gnas par byed// de la dam tshig chen po / la 'byor brtsam par bya ba ste// de yi sangs rgyas sogs dngos thug// zla ba gcig gis de mthar byin// ye shes 'khor los brtul ba yis/
28a3: detshe ni 'grub par 'gyur// thog mar zla ba gsum du ni// dang po'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// phyag na do rje'i rigs 'byung la// 'dir ni sngags chen bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis
28a4: dngos grub kyi dam tshig rin po che 'ching bar byed pa gsungs pa/ rnam par sdang mdzad zhes gzugs su// de ra bdag nyid yang dag pa byed// rang sngags cakri zhes brjod na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rnam par snang mad zhes
28a5: bshad par/ / der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags khar+the zhes brjod na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags pad+me zhes brjod na// pad ma'i
28a6: rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ / rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags tri shU la~M zhes brjod// ce gsum rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad zhes bshad par// der ni bdag nyid yang /
28a7: dag bskyed// rang sngags badz+ra zhes brjod na// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags aM ku shaM byas na// lcags kyu zhes par mngon brjod 'gyur/ rang nyid rnam
28a8: par snang mdzad zhes/ / der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags pA shaM zhes brjod na// zhags pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// phyag rgya che sogs mtshan nyid kyis// rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de nyid yid bzhin nor bu mchog/
28b1: rigs gzhan dbyebs rtogs par bya/ 'di ni dam tshig bsgrub thabs te// sgrub pa pa yis bsgrub par bya// sgra ba 'dir ni grub par 'gyur// rang sngags ril bu'i tshul gyis na// rang nyid bdag pa rang nyid du// thug tsam du yang dag bskyed/
28b2: sa kyad mthang sa / gshes pas ga nams ci / nga byung bas gas pa // ga gas ci sa nam pags pa das/ byung du byu gzhan // ma
28b3: ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ nga sngags sad pal byas nas/ gas ga pa 'di pa gyu/ ba ngams rnam panoms da// rnam pa la nyid dri yang dag ca// ba rnaM yang ga na/ shas ga 'dzin
28b4: 'gyur/ zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// rdo rje rin chen nam bsgom bya// ji srid dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed// rdo rje pad ma lag par dgod// pad ma'i spyan ni
28b5: bsgom par bya/ / sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// sangs rgyas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje'i gzugs
28b6: sra nam bsgoms nas/ / sangs rgyas lnga ru nam bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga yis kun bkang nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mtshungs par 'gyur// bistA ra shaHnyi ma'i gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// las kyi rdo rje snying khar dgon/ 8
28b7: gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ / rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni nam bsgoms nas// badz+re ha~M zhes bsgom par bya// snying khar rtse mo lnga pa 'am// rdo rje'i mu dang mnyam par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su ra
28b8: bsgoms nas/ / rdo rje 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gzugs// sems dpa'i gzugs ni 'din par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed// 'khor lo 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa// rang gi gzugs
29a1: ni sangs rgyas gzugs/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// pad ma 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa// rang gi gzugs ni chos kyi gzugs// chos kyi gzugs ni 'dzin par/
29a2: 'gyur/ zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// dkar po 'ab rabs rnam brgyan pa// 'dod pa'i mchod pa rang gi gzugs// 'dod mchod gzugs ni 'din par 'gyur// dang por yi ge gcig pa sogs// rig pa'i rgyal po stobs po che//
29a3: rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yis// rang gi phyag rgya sogs bsgoms pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ru// mchog tu phra ba'i bdag can bya// de nyid dam tshig dbus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsgom pa'o// nyi ma'i gzugs ni rnam
29a4: bsgoms nas/ / mu dro he zhes bsgom pa ni// snying khar sngags yig byas nas ni// skyed de 'dir ni the tshom med// sngags pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can// bsams nas dbus su gzugs bsgom bya// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag
29a5: bskyed/ / bsam gtan 'byung bas bskyed par 'gyur// nyi grub cho ga byas nas naM// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig las// de yis 'jig rten gsum sgrub 'gyur// dang por rang gnas riganas su//
29a6: zla ba drug tu bzlas byas nas// sgrub pa po yis rtag tu bsgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par gnas// ji ltar klu mo lha'i bu mo// mi mo'am yang na lha min mo// ji ltar rigs par bkug nas ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa yang
29a7: dag brtsam/ / rnam par dben dang yid 'ong dang // nags dang dgon pa rnams su yang // de ru bkug nas nyer longs spyod// 'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyi// ye shes rdo rje rab bskul bas// dam tshig mnyan par bya ba yin/
29a8: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang // cho ga shes pas dgug par bya// rang gi phyag rgya de rnams gzugs// rang gi brjod pa de rnams sngags/ de nyid phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rang gi sngags 'di bzlas par bya/ mtshan mo byed du
29b1: de ltar bya/ nyi sa'i gung la'ang de bzhin brjod// lcags kyu'i snying po de nyid kyis// de rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// bkal ba sreg pa ltar bsams nas/ rdo rje mtshungs pas// snying pos lcags kyu ltar byas nas// bkug la//
29b2: dbang du bya ba yin// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// de bzhin nyid du ta mgrin dang // rdo rje'i dbyug dang bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por brjod// khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba// khro gnyer can yang gang zhig
29b3: 'gyur/ / khro bo chen po stobs po che/ khams gsum pa yang dbang du byed// bdu rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'o// rdo rje mi byed gsum gnas pa// sangs rgyas kyang ni srid par byed// rig mchen mo dri sogs ni/
29b4: bcas pa'i phyag rdor stobs kyis ni// rdo rje sebs dpa' rang nyid kyang // khams gsum pa yang 'bebs par byed// bo nya chen po rdor sen mo// rab gtum la sogs rdo rje can// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi// dug ni skad
29b5: cig las 'joms byed/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig thams cad rnam par smod par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje gshin rje gshed rje mthar byed ces/
29b6: bya ba'i rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo badz+ra dz+nyA nA ya/ sa ma ya satwA nAM/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ mA ma kA r+yaM b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarba big+h+nAM da ha da ha/ sarba bi nA ya kAM/ mAr+d+ha Ta ka dzI bi nA ka ra// ma hA bikri ta/ drA bi Ne/ ba dza ba da/
29b7: sarba duSh+TaM/ ma hA ga Na ba ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta/ Sha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarbi gra haM ShaSha ma?Sha ShaThan+tu rbi/ Shawa tsa ra NA/ ru tra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu ma na ya/ brah+ma d+h+waM sarba bA mA na ya/ ma bI lam+ba ma bi lasa?/ la hu la hu/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ bra be sha ya/ sa ma ya/
29b8: ma nu s+pha ra/ hUM hUM d+hu n+tu hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de nyid sna sogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur nas// nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul
30a1: phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par gyur to/ / rang gi gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du bkang nas/ ched du brjod pas chad
30a2: brjod pa mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyis ni// rdo rje ma byed bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gang// sa yi gong bur 'gyur bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rjen
30a3: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje sgyu mar brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di ston par mdzad do/ / oM badz+ra khur bi k+Shi tA nan hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam la// bcom ldan chos 'chad de nyid ni/ de bzhin
30a4: gshegs kun kun drug gi ched du 'ad de cir rjo dade/ e mtsho sngags rnams thams cad kyi// nam kun de nyid ston pa 'o// joms byed rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad gzhig par gyur// de nas bcom
30a5: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun du snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags chen po 'di ston par byed do// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma d+ha ba la
30a6: na da ta btsa bi d+h+waM sa ya uts+tshaSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo lang
30a7: gyis kun du bkang nas ched du brjod pas ched durjod par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyis ni// sngags kyi tshul gyi bdag nyid do// sangs rgyas kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid// zla ba drug gis thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
30a8: 'das slar yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gsal bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi gso ba zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ / namaHsa man ta badz+rA NAM a tsal kAn/
30b1: mamamam tagatas tas/ 99/ mA g+ha/ la man ma dun d+han/ na ta/ 'da'adra/ nAHra san+d+har/ sa nAg sa/ ga/ gas/ ma pa' sa sa ma h
30b2: U~Mnr-i trai ra li ta ra dAn takaHA hA A hA AM hAM/ a tsa la tsaT/ sAT ya sA TA ya hU~M ma/ sa man+ti ka DAT/ ma hA ba la/ sA ta ya/ dzA dzA mAM shud+ha hu lo ko s+'u Sh+ya s+ya/ bad+hin ma rgan Da pra ti ta ta ba le b+hA dz+wA la ya trAH/ a sa te/ na maHswA hA/ de nas
30b3: mngag gzhug gi khro bo 'di gsungs pa tsam la/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs sa tshogs 'char chen po de nyid thams cad yang dag par babyed napa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du ched du brjod pa 'di cid rjod
30b4: par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyis ni// de nyid 'byung ba bstan pa de// rdo rje mi byed rang bzhin gyi// ye shes tog gis byed par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du skrag par byed
30b5: pa'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rdo rje chen po khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo b+ha ga t+yai b+h+ri kun+d+ra yai oM b+hi ku Ti ti ra dA bir+d+ham+b+hi ta badz+ra ma hA ba la hUM phaT/ de
30b6: n as 'di gsungs btsam la 'dod chags chen po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi chos kyis kun du snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gnas pa ched du brjod pa 'di cid du rjed par
30b7: mdzad do/ / e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyis ni// chos kyi 'dod chags kun bsdus pa// rdo rje ye shes lta bu nye// sngags kyi dngos grub zhes bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das sma nga kun nas spro ba'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
30b8: la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje stobs po che zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ / o badra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ta btsa bi dz+nyi sa ya u ts+tshaT kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs btsam la/ bcom ldan 'das gas ba chen po 'dzin pa de
31a1: nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs pa gang yin pa ched du brjod pa 'di cid du rjod par mdzad do/ / e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje'i rtse/
31a2: bablan med/ de nyid dam tshig kun du dag/ rdo rje yid bzhin nor bur bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das skur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi byed pa'i nga bo nyid kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs rba
31a3: rdo rje bdud rtsizi bskyor du brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so/ / oM kha kha khA ti ShA hi ti/ Sh+Tha ti// ban+d+ha bat+ta/ gr-id+d+ha griH/ tan tan/ gardza garba/ bi s+pho Ta la bi s+pho Ta ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pradz+wa la pra dz+wA la/ gra sa gras/ sarba bi ban+da
31a4: k+She/ bid+yA d+ha re/ ki lI ki la dz+wa li ta hu ta ba ha shi ra ma hA/ b+hai be ni D+hoSha/ sats+tshin+d+ra ts+tshin+da/ ma hA badz+ra tA ra / tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ bar+d+ha bat+ta/ bdag cheg mo'i bi nI ya ka rbid yAM/ s+pho Ta ya/ gar+b+haH/ hrid yaM/ proT ya/ nA ga hrid wa~M/ s+pho Ta ya/ yak+Shahrid yA smo sa/
31a5: pram+ba ra/ 5/ hr-id ma wo Ta ya/ sarbagra te thaMd tsA s+pho Ta ya/ samadz+ra ra hrid ya~M/ s+pho Ta ya/ sarba tsA t+yad+ha ka thaMd ma so Ta ya/ drA kA re pa Ta phaT/ tan tan/ da ha da ta/ bcab ma/ bi kyim ba kyis/ swa bi sha A bi sham hA badz+ra d+hA R+sha k+Shadz+nyAb
31a6: swA hA/ / de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du dgyes pa ched du rjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do// e mtho sngags rnams kun gyi ni// de nyid rdo rje blan med/ dam
31a7: tshig thams cad yang dag 'byung / / de nyid mi phyed kun bsdus pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje gAn+d+ha ri chen mo 'di gsungs so// oM e t+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti ma hA
31a8: badz+ra gAn+d+ha ri tra yA nAM rad na nAM/ sa t+yen/ a kaHa kaT+Ta/ ba la te baM/ ma te shwa raM/ ga rba DaM/ bi/ ku mA raM/ brad+d+ha Ni san+daHn+da/ A di t+yaM/ ya maM/ ba r+ra kaM/ ku be re/ NI ta dASh+Ta/ bi dri Ta ki bi d+hi pAk+Sha/ sha tra karti/ dzikar+NaM/ trikat+ta/ gokad+ha/ la
31b1: kar+N+Na/ ma hA kat+taM/ nan+ti/ ke shwa ra/ b+h+r-i ki dITaM/ nA ya kaM/ bi nA ya ka/ pAny+dzi kaM/ lo ta kaM ShaSh+TI de ny+dzi/ koT gi ri/ o kA ri/ dA naM/ kA d+hA yi NAM/ tsaN+DaM kA t+ya ya NI/ ma hA kA t+yA ya Ni/ ai shA nI/ ni ridz+ya/ kA li/ ma bAk+Sha li/ bad+da kA li/
31b2: shr-i nAM/ sa kA li/ b+ha ta kA li/ ag+ne yaM/ ba ya b+haM/ ha li kA/ bi ti/ shak+ti/ sha tA k+Shi/ in+maNe/ prad+b+ha Ni/ ko bi bI mA te shwa dI/ baiSh+Ta thI/ suSh+ka gA tsa muNaT+Te/ r-irbi/ bA rA tI/ kau bi rI/ yain+dan+ye/ ma ma ye na/ tiSh+Than+ti/ dwen+na ba ta/ yiSh+Ta mi
31b3: shI g+h+raM/ grih+Na grih+Na/ hu lu hu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ rang+ga rang+ga/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ A bi Sha A bi Sha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA badz+ra gAn+d+ha ri sid+d+ha Sh+Ta Na Da/ badz+ra pA Ne/ rA dzA ba ya ti/ hIHhaHhaHhaHtaHhUM phaT swA hA// 'di
31b4: gsungs pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis bskor bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig ma de sgrogs par byed pa 'di ched du brjod pas ched du brjod par mdzad do//
31b5: e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi ni// kun gzhi 'bad par byed pa bdag/ rdo rje rtse can gang 'di dran/ sangs rgyas la sogs 'bebs par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang zhi ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
31b6: snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sen mo zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo chen mo 'di gsungs so// oM e h+ye ti badz+ra na khi/ badz+ra mu khi ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ rang+ga rang+ga/ alpa alpa/ A bi Sha A bi Sha/ ha ya grI ba/ pa ya ti swA hA/
31b7: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam pa la ji srid du dug chen po de rnams thams cad de rab tu bsgoms pas bcom pa bzhin du gyur to// de nas rig ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rab tu btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched
31b8: du rjod par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ dug rnams thams cad sel ba bdag/ pho nya'i mchog gang de brten nas// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sbyangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rdo rje
32a1: gsum mi byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM dza na ri Ti Ti hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs
32a2: btsam la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'di sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i nor gyis nye bar bkang nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ / e ma sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ bskyed pa
32a3: yang dag 'byung ba dag/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub don// skal pa'i rgya mtshor bdag gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang chos kyi dbyings su spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
32a4: rdorje ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba'i rig ma'i rgyal po mchog 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi d+hi ga Ne b+h+yaHoM e h+ye ti b+ha ga wa ti/ yak+Shi NI ye/ mA po Ti in+d+ra paT dzo s+pha ra pra ma tha ni e ka dza Ti ni pa/ sa
32a5: ta re bi ma bi te Sha ya ni/ ri bi taM ri ka ri/ ta yI ri/ ka pA la ts+tshi tra/ pri ye ma hA ka pA li/ ma hA ba le/ ma hA tsa pa le/ sa~M d+hi sarba ar+tha/ sA d+ha ya/ sarba satwa bik+ShI pra sha ma ni swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan
32a6: 'das pad ma 'chang pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad rnam par spros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan du gnas nas ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod par mdzad do// e ma'o sngags rnams kun bya
32a7: ni/ / sngags kyi bdag nyid can 'byung ba// rgyal ba kun gyi zhing gang ste/ rnam par bsgoms pas mchod par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo thams cad kun du skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
32a8: nas/ rdo rje chen po khro gnyer can 'di gsungs so// oM b+ha ya nA sha ni DA sa ya hA sa ya Sh+Ti kri Ta ta Ti bai ta Ti shwe te dza Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das zhib 'chang ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams
32b1: cad yang dag par mchod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// Ti gang sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung / chos kyi yum ni rab bsgrub don/ 'di ni bskyed par gsungs pa yin// /
32b2: de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang ye shes 'du bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM A ro li ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can
32b3: thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs kyi yum 'di gsungs so// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba a rA sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rang
32b4: gi sku rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM shang+ka re shAn+ti kra re g+hu Ta g+hu Ti/ g+hu Ti ni g+ha Ti ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ g+ha Ti ni hU~M phaT swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
32b5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi sngags 'di gsungs so// oM swa te bAN+Da ra bA si ni dza TA ma ku Ta d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
32b6: sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so// oM d+huHde nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i rgyal po bka' stsal pa/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ grin
32b7: grid+d+ha b+h+rUM/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga waM/ bid+hi rA dza hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so// oM a
32b8: mr-i tod+b+ha bo d+d+ha pa ya swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyon mongs pa za ba'i sngags 'di gsungs pa// oM kle shA sa ni bi dzi ye swA hA/ de nas
33a1: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ / oM ts+tshan+da ts+tshin+da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dI p+ta tsakra hU~MHde
33a2: nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzi brjid phung po 'di gsungs so/ / oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha kad+ha ka/ da rad ra/ bi dar
33a3: ba ra/ / tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so// oM
33a4: yoSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ban+da ban+da/ da ma dam/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha/ ha na hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dkar po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// gtsug tor gdugs dkar po 'di gsungs
33a5: so/ / oM ma ma ma ma hA ni/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rig ma chen mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so// oM tA re tud tA re tu
33a6: re swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// khro bo gzegs ma'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so// oM ka
33a7: d+hu ni hUM phaT/ / 'jig rten gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags shin tu ma rungs pa'i las te ji srid du gdon gzhan 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms pas/ las rnam pa gsum byed do//
33a8: mi g.yo zhes bya'i khro bo che// gshin rje mthar byed gsum 'byung ba// kun nas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// khams gsum pa yang des 'joms byed// khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / khro gnyer rim par ldan gang gyur//
33b1: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang // khro bo 'di yis 'joms par byed// stobs chen bdud rtsi zhes grags dag/ mi shes 'jig cing 'phrog byed pa// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa yang // the tshom med par 'joms par byed/ 'bum
33b2: du bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / kun du son par byed pa yin// blo ldan sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'ang // 'gugs par byed par the tshom med// khro gnyer tse ko Ta rig ma/ 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// lha men chen po sogs sbyor bas/
33b3: g.yul du rgyal bar byed pa yin// khro bo gzigs ma'i mchog cer skyes// sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya// khro bo'i sems kyis sbyar byas nas// ngas par sangs rgyas kyang 'jig byed// lag par de ni yang dag babyed// mis+sa der sod/
33b4: bsam pa yin// pha rol dpung ni rings par byed// brgya byin gyi'ang the tshom med// gzi brjid phung po bzlas nas ni// 'bum phrag gsum du legs bskor na// brgya byin sde yang rengs par byed// 'ga' zhig min par 'joms par bstan// sgrol marlom
33b5: len yang dag 'byung / / 'bar ba'i ye shes dge 'byung ba// 'og gi sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje'i sde yang rengs par byed// de yi snying po mchog skyes gang // rigs dang rigs dbang rig par byed// de dang yang na 'di nyid du// sbyor bar bsams nas/
33b6: bsam gtan gyis// ting 'dzin bsgom pas ser po'am// gzhan du dmar por nges sbyar bya// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces gsungs so// sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bcwa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// /
33b7: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u gsungs so// zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las la// rang gzugs rnam pa bsgom pa yis// thugs khar ye shes yang dga' byung // cod pan ye shes chos
33b8: dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// rin chen sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'ong // rnal 'byor pas bsdus gong bur bya// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// khro bo rnams kyi ston pa 'di// rdo rje 'byung ba sgom byed pa/ de yi ba
34a1: rnam bsgoms pas/ rigs dang rigs su 'di bstan no// rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas// kha dog lnga pa legs mdzes par// sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgom bya// slar yang rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags/ 'di nyid
34a2: bsgom par bya ba ste/ gtsug tor yang ni rnam bsgom bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dgyes dang mgu bar byed par bshad// dngos grub thams cad byed par 'dod// rdo rje ye shes sogs rdzogs byed// rig ma la sogs thams
34a3: cad kyi'ang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i rnam 'joms byed// pho nya mos kyang thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa// 'dod gyur sngags rnams thams cad kyi// rang gzugs rnam pa sgom pas so/ 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/
34a4: sngags kyi dam tshig 'byung ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi phan 'dod pas// rdo rje dpa' bo'i mchog gis gsungs// sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
34a5: gshegs pa thams cad skrong par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so/ / smod pa la sogs bya ba la// sangs rgyas de nyid ye shes can// khro bo gsum po bsdus pa yi// rdo rje 'byung bas grags pa nyid/ gshin rje gshed ni ye shes rigs/
34a6: bsdus pa'i don la mchog rtser skyes// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// chos kyi ye shes rigs su bshad// stong phrag gam ni brgya yang rung // ther 'bum gcig tu bzlas nas ni// rang nyid sangs rgyas zhes pa yang // cho ga shes pas
34a7: skrod par byed/ thod pa gsum la kun gzhag nas// lho yi phyogs kyi dur khrod du// 'dod pa 'di ni yang dag brtsam// rdo dang shing gi sbyor ba yis// dngos po med pas yang dag brtsam/ rdo dang phub ma yang dag ldan/ bza'
34a8: dang gsal byed rnam par spangs/ / khrag dang pabs su yang dag ldan// nim pa'i mdab mas bza' bya ba// ta la'i mdab mar la zi bya// sngags pas 'khrul 'khor smad par bya// tsher ma can gyis bris nas ni// nim pa'i
34b1: mdab mkhar bcu gnas/ sbyor ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// lha chen po yi dog tu ni// dri ma med pa kun gzung bya// chog shes pas lan bdun du// mngon par bsngags te yang dag brtsam// dgra yi sgo 'am yang na thong / khrong
34b2: khyer rab ni kun 'byung ba'i/ / gnas 'di rnams su phung po ni// kun nas smod par byed pa yin// snying po de la mdor bsdus pas// bya ba tsog pu'i stan la 'dug/ dri ma med pa'i gzugs byas nas// khro bo khro bar mchog 'byung
34b3: ba/ yon tan stong phrag kyang bskyed nas// rtag tu sangs rgyas kyang thob byed// nyi ma bdun nam so sor byas// gal te 'ga' zhig mi 'gro na// mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// mi byed rdo rje rang gis gsungs// de bzhin
34b4: gshegs pa thams cad skrod pa'i le'u rdzogs s+ho/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas slob dpon mdab bzang nyid/
34b5: rje'i dkyil dkrung du gnas te// bya dka' nye bar longs spyod kyis// gang de 'tshe zhing gnas par byed// brjod pa'i lhag ma bstan par bshad/ 'gro ba dang ni gar nyid dang // de bzhin 'brel gtam du mi 'gyur/ mthon po min nyid
34b6: slob ma yis/ chos kyi dus su'ang sdig pa sogs// gnas bya gal te rmongs pa de// mnar med gnas su 'chad par 'gyur// sngags tsam gal te tshangs pa la// lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag brtsams/ ji srid nam mkha'
34b7: yang dag 'byung / mnar med gnas su 'tshed par 'gyur// bud med gsang min brjod bya min// gang zhig la la slob dpon tshad// bde dang lus sems sdug bsngal ba// sbyor ba ji srid 'tsho yi bar// gal te slob dpon rnams
34b8: kyi bka'/ dga' ba'i sems kyis byas gyur na// de tshe bdag la sangs rgyas sogs// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ de la ji srid 'tshe yi bar/ brda yis kun du gnas par bya// dku ru rten pa'i lag pa sogs/ ji srid 'tsho
35a1: bar mi bya'o/ / dngos grub 'bras bu don gnyer 'am// slob dpon ming nas spos mi bya// ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung // mnar med dmyal bar 'tsheng bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
35a2: bya'o zhes so/ / bza' ba la yang rang slob shes// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// de yi ming gi yi ge gang // ji srid 'tshe bar brjod mi bya// sangs rgyas grangs med bsod byed na/ sdig pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags/ ga
35a3: tshe kha cig yon tan 'dis/ / bstod na bsod nams yang dag 'byung // de tshe slob dpon rtog med pas// gzhan du gal te rmongs pa bdag/ de tshe ngu 'bod du 'tshed 'gyur// gang tshed me ba yAti/ gus pas nyan sogs bsnyen pa gang / de tshe slob ma sngags
35a4: zhu dang / ji ltar kha cig slob dpon rnams// bde ba dngos su mthong bar 'gyur// gang zhig la la slob dpon rnams/ bdag nyid thig nag 'tshod cing 'tshed// de dag du 'bod du 'tshed 'gyur// slob dpon gang zhig tshol byed pa// de ni de la
35a5: dbul bar bya/ / gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// slob ma'i mi brtag slob dpon gyi// chung ma'i don du bsgrub par bya// yang na sring mo de byin nas// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni ji tshem med// slob dpon gang zhig slob ma'i phyir// phyag 'tshal ba ni bsgrub/
35a6: par bya// bskal pa drug bcur de dmyal ba'i// sdug bsngal myong bar 'tsheng bar 'gyur// de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags kyizla badrug gis rab gsal bya// gal te gzhan du bdag rmongs na// mnar med lta bur 'tshed par 'gyur// gang nyid slob
35a7: dpon tshol byed pa/ / de nyid so sor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje ye shes rab bskul bas// dngos grub yangs par der 'gro 'gyur// yon tan 'di rnams gang gis 'ga'// bsod nams 'byung bar shes par bya// slob dpon 'di yi rgyud la sogs/ de lta bu'o/
35a8: gas kyi min / bdag nyid dag pa thob// chos kyi de nyid tshogs gnas// de yis slob dpon rab gsal bya// myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// sangs rgyas gnas la gnas pa yis// gang de mgunas rdor sems mchog/ myur du 'grub
35b1: byed gzhan du yi/ / sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid thob pa// de mgu byed pa mchog 'byung 'gyur// de yis 'jig rten gsum 'grub ste// sangs rgyas ye shes rang nyid kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed
35b2: pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sngags thams cad kyi le'u gsungs so// bskyed mos tshal dang rnam par dben// chu klung rab tu 'bab pa dang // ri dang rnam par bkrab
35b3: rwa/ / sgrub pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya// zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// gal te min na de 'grub min// dben dang gzhan pa'i yul rnams su// sems ni gang du rab dgyes byed// gsang sngags 'bar bas byin brlabs pa// de la
35b4: sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/ / rgya mtsho dang ni chu klung che// ri bo chen po'i rtse rnams su// yan lag tha dad min sngags bzlas// nges par zla bas 'grub par byed// ske tshe dug dang yang dang ldan// tig ta'i shing gi sbyin sreg gis// bsnyen bso
35b5: ni de bskyed nas/ / gsang sngags sgrub pa kun sbyar bya// de la sdom pa gzung nas ni// nges par 'grub byed gzhan du min// gsang sngags chog kun thob nas// sngags pas bsnyen pa 'grub par byed// de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi//
35b6: sdom pa so sor bsgrub par bya// gang nyid sdom par yang dag brjod// de nyid btul zhugs can gyis bsrung // gzhan du nam mkha' ji srid par// mnar med dmyal bar kun du 'byung // ji srid 'tsho bar cho ga bzhin// slob dpon sdom pa
35b7: srung ba la/ / de yis sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// sna tshogs 'dzin pa kun gzhi yi// mnyam med gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub// zla ba cig gis 'jig rten gsum// de yi 'grub 'gyur the tshom med//
35b8: nam shes las kyang byung ba'i sngags// 'bum phrag drug tu bzlas nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpar phyag byas nas// zla ba nyal de 'grub 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rab dbye bas// nges par sangs rgyas kyang thob byed// phyag rgya'i dbye ba rab
36a1: byaH/ / dgod pa/ nges par lha rnams sman drangs med// dag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa// de nyid rtag tu 'bangs bya'o// mkhas pas rab mchog sangs rgyas la/ sogs pa'i phyag chub cing byas nas// de rnams sngags ni bzlas nas
36a2: ni/ rtag tu nges par sbyin par bya/ sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang // gal te sangs rgyas bu mo'ang rung / bzung nas nye bar longs spyod bya// ji srid yid ni tshim par 'gyur// dug dang skye tshe yang dag ldan// yungs dkar til mar bsres pa dang /
36a3: pa rdo por yang dag ldan/ de dag phye ma byas nas ni/ shang dang gci bar ba bcug nas/ brtul zhugs can gyi khyad par gyis// zur gsum mgrin pa'i mel bsreg/ nges par mAr du 'grub par byed// lha sbyin zhes ni byas pa ni/ gang gis 'i
36a4: ni rab gsal byed/ / gal te 'dir ni sangs rgyas rung // gang de thal bar byed par 'gyur// mkhas pas mtshan mo phyed la'ang // nyi ma gung la sbyin sreg bya// bskal pa gcig gi bar gyi yang // sbyin byed gzhan du nam yang min// gal
36a5: te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig/ rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'das na ni// mgo bo tshol ba bdun du 'gas// byang chub sems ni rang gis gsungs// rengs dang 'bebs pa dang por grags// gnyis pas zhes bya bar brjod/ gsum pa
36a6: lha yi mchog yin no/ / bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang / phyag na rdo rjer grags pa yin// snying po kun gyi sbyor ba yis// bya ba myur du 'grub par byed// reg pa sna tshogs sogs dang gnas// skyed mos tshal dang dga' ston che dkyil
36a7: 'khor de la bya ba ni/ / bdug pa byin nas yang dag brtsam// gal te brgya byin namatshangs pa// sangs rgyas sam yang blo gros che// chog shes pas zhag bdun gyis// 'joms 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// chog shes pas khrag gis
36a8: thugs/ ra tsa sa bya/ khrel gtsug par gyur nas ni// masdug mchog gcags lags par byed// dra khrod kyim du yang dag myer/ rags de sa mang byeg/ zag ga ci kya sanas ni/ sa pa
36b1: na byed gshes pas / ma na da/ / mas pa / sasaH nas par sa// lags yan ldan la// ya na pa sa nga/
36b2: cho gshes pas can bdun ce// khams gsum pa yang joms par byed/ com ldan lasarnam par dang ma sngags thams cad bas na sa gnas pa// sa dang pasngags so// den
36b3: bamaldan 'das rnam par dang ma da chen pas skal pa po thams ca rnam pa'i mim sam to/ / ga ga ye ba / sems na nas sbyin/ rnal 'a da te/ gas pa
36b4: go/ rma dgralas ni yang dag zang // 'ag shig tu ni bzla bar bya// de rje 'dzin pa kun u0f7fla// kun mchogs yi dbang phyug go// dod chags bza' bar bya ba ni/ phan dang bde ba thams cad sbyin// de ni rdo rje 'chang rgyal lo// na
36b5: mchogs yi dbang phrag go/ / zhe sdang bza' bar bya ba ni// rdo rje ye shes rabatogs byed// de nyid rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mtshogs yi bang phyug go// gti mug bza' bar bya ba ni// ye shes thams cad rtogs pa 'i// de nyid zhi ba 'dzin
36b6: rgyal po/ / sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga'i// bde sdug bza' bar bya ba ni// slob dpon ji srid 'tshe yi bar// de nyid zhib 'dzin rgyal po// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar// chos dang chos
36b7: min bza' bar bya/ / de nyid rdo rje 'chang thal po// nyan mchog de nyid ston pa po// ji srid 'tsho bar 'ga' zhig tu// sems can khams ni bza' bar bya// de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchogs yi dbang phrag go// ji srid 'tsho bar
36b8: smang ba yi/ bya ba thams cad mi bya'o// de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchogs yi dbang phyug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas
37a1: nge mtshar thob nas rdo rje 'chang thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di na ngo mtshar te gang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na gzhan lta ci smos zhes/
37a2: so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs pang gnas nas 'dis de ces gsung / bcom ldan pas de bzhin gsheg satham yad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i la'u bstan par/
37a3: bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs
37a4: pa thams cad kyi gnas lngar yid bzhin gyi ner bu'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ / byin brlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis// de nyid sna tshogs rnam bsgom pa// cho ga shes pas de steng du// yi ge bzhi ni rnam bsgom pa// bdag
37a5: nyid dbus su son byas nas/ / rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshon pa// rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung // chog shes pas kun dgang bya// de yis sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// sgom pa 'di nyid rab sgrub byed// zla ba'i dkyis
37a6: 'khor dbus gnas par/ / shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bzhi lnga'i yi ge rnam bsgoms nas// yi ge lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par// oM yig ser po
37a7: dang mtshungs pa/ / 'od zer lnga po kun tu 'khrugs// der son bdag nyid sngags pas bsgom// dbus su hUM yig yang dag sbyor// rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya// 'dzam bunA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzugs brnyan tshul gyis
37a8: bskyed nas ni/ / mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan de rnams su// 'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis// nam mkha'i khams
37b1: na pa ba sa pa ma chog shes ya / ng+yas napa la nga ma/ tshang sa mngan pa yi/ satam ma dag da de/ ga la ba das pal zhig/ na ldan la na pag/ ga
37b2: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam paskams nas/ / dkyil 'khor du gzhug bsapas nas ni// de yi sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su// rdo rje sems dpar rnam bsgoms pas// gtsug tor de mi bzlas pa bya//
37b3: gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang / rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang // bskyed pa'i tshicho gar 'gyur ba yin/ rdo rje gsum kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes
37b4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gsungs so/ / chog shes pas de thams cad// oM yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i// hUM yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas// dbus su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i
37b5: 'od/ zhi ba ral ba'i cod pan 'chang// phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas// 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// bsams nas de yi thugs kha ru// zla bar sngags kyi yi ge bskom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sem
37b6: dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan 'das spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas// dbus su te yig bsgom pa ni// ngos su rang gi
37b7: gzugs ltar bya/ rdo rje ngamar po nam bsgom bya/ dbus su chos 'char bsams nas ni// pad ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa// phyag na pad ma mdab brgyad pa// de ying bus su rnam bsgom pa// thugs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas
37b8: sngags ni rnam bsgom pa/ / bcom ldan 'das ches kyang nga phyug gting nge 'dzin gyi tshigardzogs s+ho// cog shes pas gzugs byas nas// ngas su ha yig yang dag byang/ dbus sung ngag nas pa bzhos/ 'das than ma tshungs pa'i 'o
38a1: 'dod mchod gzugs ni bskyed par bya/ / lag tu mdud rtse gsum bsgoms nas// de yi snying la dkyil 'khor dgod// chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgobs nas// byinas byab yang dag bcas// rmod pa 'byung ba zhes bya
38a2: bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs s+ho/ / // yang na bcul zhugs can gyis ni// bsrubs sangs rgyas gzugs bskom bya// gtsug tor sngags dang khro ba dang // dege pa'i rgyal po rig bcas pas// las dmas
38a3: thams cad pa yi sngags/ / go rim bzhin du de bzlas bya// dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni// ngos su lha rnams dgod par bya// snying po sbyor ba de rnams su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge mchod bsgoms nas// de yis
38a4: rnam pa dam bsgoms pa/ / thams cad kyi ni lag par ni// rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma bsgom// mdung dang yid bzhin nor bu yang // bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed// sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yin/
38a5: ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor// dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni// rang gi lus la dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas// 'di ni rings par byed pa'i mchog/ dus rnams kun du rnam
38a6: bsgoms nas/ / nges par bskal bar de gnas 'gyur// cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod bya// rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// thog ma tha mar bsam gtan
38a7: 'di/ / bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya// de yi sangs rgyas nyid sgrub na// yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur/ de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po// cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya// myur du 'grub byed gzhan du mid//
38a8: phyag rgya chen po rab bsgoms nas// dam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni// dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i// dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya// sngags pas dkyil 'khor las ngos su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bdag po'i
38b1: gzu sa yang dag myed/ / de mes po gos nga / na she dang sa// ce ma se da rgod/ gas kyi mi gdus rgosas dang/ kham pa sa ky-i rjeg d+ha/ la shing
38b2: de/ bas su ga pag she pa// bang ba 'tho ba 'a sa pa de// kud nas rnam par 'thob byed// laganas pas na mig nags/ ma pa di cig gsu 'gyums// sog shes ba ton gyig/ tsu te dus
38b3: ni bskom par bya/ bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// kun nas sor po bcu gnyis pa'i// ud pal chen po mdab brgyad pa// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa pa/ de nyid kyis dazigapa/
38b4: par bshad// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje rje// u dpal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// A liHbcu drug yang dag ldan// rtag tu bsgom bya 'grub par 'gyur// sngags pas sor po nyi shu ba'i// rtse gsub ser po dang mtshungs pa// cho ga nyid kyis
38b5: bsgom byas nas/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di the tshom med// pad ma las kyi rdo rje dang // yid bzhin nor bu gsum pa can// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// myur du sgrub byed gzhan du med// 'khor lo de bzhi dbang rdo rje khasams nas rdo rje
38b6: cho ga las/ / sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya// gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rdo rje chen po mdung sogs bcas// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi// brjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas
38b7: ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i sems/ / 'gro zhing 'thibs pa kun du 'khrug/ khrugang tsam du yang dag bskyed// khro bar byed pas khyad par bya// bo nya ma dag gzhug sogs sngags rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o// me
38b8: dkyil 'khor basbyor ba las/ / sgom pas mchog tu mthong bar 'gyur// dbyug pa thob dgra sta dang // zhags pa baN+Di sa bsgom pas// tshogs bsgom pa byas nas ni// rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed// 'di de sngags rnams
39a1: thams cad kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi bsgom pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gyis gsang // ye shes dngos grub can du brjod// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// gang zhig dngos grub mchog
39a2: 'dodan/ chog shes pas sbyin sreg bya// de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin sreg brtsam// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las// rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed// oM yig sngags kya dbye ba yis/ sgom
39a3: pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / zhi ba can la dkyil 'khor zlum// rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog/ dbang bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o// zhil me yi dbus son par// bdud rtsi lta bur bsgom par bya//
39a4: de nyid lan lha yi gzugs// rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya// bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung // kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas// me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// sngags pas lce
39a5: dbus son par/ / hUM yig da yis bsams par bya// bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// chog shes pas 'o ma sbar// mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad// mar khu chen po'i bye brag las// ye shes rdo rje'i rigs
39a6: su brjod/ / zhil rdo rje slob dpon gyi// snying kha'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya// yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas// 'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan che// pad ma'i yon tan 'byung ba las// gzugs
39a7: ni 'dod chags rigs mchog gi/ / gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rnga can// las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las// sngags kyi yig dag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i phyin sreg rdo rje 'char chen pos de gad ces gsungs so// gnyis
39a8: su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyags
39b1: rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po// 'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po// sngags rnams thams cad yang dag
39b2: dmigs/ / de yi bsam gtan rab bskul bya// dam tshig ye shes sangs rgyas kun// rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od// oM yig ye shes dbye ba yis// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan
39b3: pa'o/ / ral pa'i cod pan longs spyod pa// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs pa// me stags thibs pas kun du 'khrugs// rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs// brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// cod
39b4: pan du ni rdo rje sems/ / mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go// sku yi rdo rje'i sogs sbyor gyis// mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las// rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes
39b5: pas/ / thod pa can gyi gtso bor brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes// rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
39b6: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya// nag po shin du rnam 'gyur khros// ma rungs
39b7: zhal ni rnam par gdangs/ / me stag 'thibs po 'bar ba ste// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas// dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor las// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul brtan pa'o// rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag zug/ rab tu
39b8: gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ / 'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul las// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// / rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig
40a1: g as na sa na
40a2: 'bar/ tshogs rgyan gyis brtsan pa yi// phyag bzhi pa la yid 'ong bar// dbang po gnyis kyir basbyor bas// de mi tshogs bskos pa ni/ 'di ni 'dod chags tshul bstan pa'o// gsung ging rjegatso dngos thug// rdo rje rje ma rab byor sogs kyis//
40a3: snyi rje'i bdag nyid can gyis stug/ zhom pa yang ni myur 'brub byed/ chos 'chang ba'i dim tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam cig ga nga rje rigs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
40a4: la snyoms par zhugs te/ / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dmatshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya// ldab bdag ni ba ser po'i mdo// spyan gsum dul
40a5: zhugs can gyis bsgom/ / kun du dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs// me stag tshogs kun du 'khrugs// phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis// bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed// rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub// rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'di de sngag/
40a6: rnams thams cad kyi// thar pa'i ting 'dzin snying po can// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgom pa ni// rdo rje sems dpas sprul ba yin// rdo rngo ma drung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba// del lha nyid rab tu zags/ sa pa
40a7: yang 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ / skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas desad daces gsungs so// rang gi sngags yig dbyibs sam// yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis// rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis sam// rtul
40a8: zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos/ / thams cad las can sngags kyis dang / gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya// 'di sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs/
40b1: so// de ba las kyi ba dbyebs/ rigs kyi sngags su ba tugrags// rgyas pa can la rigs kyi thugs// sa pas nges par 'grub bar byad/ bang dubyab tshigs// dag pa rgyal bas paskam pa // mas cadamapan
40b2: sngags kyis ma/ / mngon stod rnam par rlom par byed / smo par byed pa'i chogs/ gtsug tor bani rnam bgos na/ rdzag shes pas ni bra ga sogs// ponya po nyi mo bas pa rgya/ bcom ldan das kyag rjes ded ces gsung
40b3: so/ / dper lnga ma nul zas na// tog pas de la bsgom par bya// gzhan da dngos grub med pa nyid// sgom pa rnams su shes par bya// rigs kyilas kyi ba dbye bas// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bskol pa'o// sngags kyi yig rang
40b4: dbyebs/ bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur// snying la di bus son phra man// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa// sngags kyi yi ga'i da byebs// bsgoms pas dngos grubathob par 'gyur// rnyeng ba'i dbus son tha mo da kyil
40b5: 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa/ / steng du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis/ 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go// dkar nag dmar po'i sbyor ba las// bsam gtan thams cad du btag bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sngags rnams kun/
40b6: du bzlas par bya// hUM yig yo yig dbye ba yis// swA hA hUM yig gzhan gyi gzugs// skyed pa'i chog byas nas ni// bsnyen pa gang zhig des bsgrub bya// rigs gsum la yang chu yig dang / o yig ye shes rigs mchog yin// sngags
40b7: rgya ma ga la sogs rnams/ pral bar bkod na pa rnams pa rnam pa// bcom ldan 'das rdorje chang gis de/ ces gsus so// blan pa ni byur bas sogs // rdo dza ca 'i bdud rtsi'i gzu sa// blo ba dang ni da ya ga
40b8: klubacul bstan pa'o/ / sgra par shis mi zus / rje can la lud ci'i gzugs/ nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la// 'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go// bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la// bdag po'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// bsnyen pa'i dus su rab
41a1: bsrub pa/ / gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan// me stag 'bebs pas 'khrugs pa yi// rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// rdorje phra rab bye ba yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o// grags par
41a2: ldar pa'i dngas grub kyan/ 'di nyid kyis ni byang grub pog/ da la ma chog tu bsgrub par bya/ dngos grub can po yon tan 'thung // bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rnga 'chang chen pos dgad ces gsungs so// gnyis pa med pa sa nyam
41a3: banyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por sngags thams cad kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thar yang
41a4: 'dus par gyur nas/ / phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ gsung gi de rje chos kyi gsung gi lam nges par bskyed pa'i rnga rje'i rdul 'di ston par
41a5: mdzad do/ / gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa med// ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi// kun nas ye shes bdag med pa// gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan// mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che// kun nas 'dod
41a6: ba yang dga' byung / rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gtso ba'i ye shes ji ltar gnas// rdo rje mi byed gsum gnas pa// rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob// byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog
41a7: sangs rgyas byang chub rab gzhug mdzad/ / rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog/ sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos sku thar pa chen po ste// yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che// sems can kun dgyes byed pa po// dag pa'i spyod
41a8: la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / de nas yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong /
41b1: bi'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sor 'dong par bya ba gang ci ltar lags// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// the tsham med par mnyam/
41b2: par shes/ sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya// the tshem med par 'du shes pa// chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya// tshom med par 'du shes pa// 'dus byas thams cad 'dod par bya// 'dis sa/ rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba kyang
41b3: chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyis la rab tu gnas pa ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul
41b4: pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
41b5: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i byang
41b6: chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la dad par ci ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi rgo chen po'i 'jig rten gyil dra sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
41b7: rnams su yang dag par byang chub nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
41b8: rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa/ ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa'i bzhi'o
42a1: sems can rnams mngon par dogs par bangs tu bar 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du malan 'das de bzhin gshegs bams cad byagan dngo tshum 'ad bas par byas/ da napa nga d+ha sams da' mapa //
42a2: mtshan thob cing dga' shing rab tu mgu ba thob nas// de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ye shes ye shes te// de rje chen por rab tu mthong / rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi// ye shes mig ni nam sbyangs pa'o// de nas
42a3: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs sa thag
42a4: t u bcom ldan 'das kyi ge gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phyung nas shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang mngon par brjed du med pa'i ga gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
42a5: sangs rgyas kyi zhi ga rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyis gang bar mdzad do/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byang chub rang bzhin yang dag thob// byang chub sems
42a6: dpas snying po byin/ nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i// rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la// spros pa dag ni yod ma yin// rdo rje'i rang bzhin ye shes kyis// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med ces so// de nas
42a7: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to// sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong ngam// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na dede skyes
42a8: bu chen po de yi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sbom bu nges par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do/ / de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de
42b1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang gi su dang gsung dang thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ska dang gsung dang bugs yongs su dag pa'i ji bo nyid//
42b2: rjezhes kya ba me nyig gnyis pa dogs s+ho// 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyam po chen pa rdzogs s+ho// ma na ba po drwa ba'i b+hag pe'i gas na na
42b3: yang lnga zung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ / phyis nyed stong sngon gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i byin gzhan gsum gyis tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thom
42b4: pa'i tha ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyan chen po legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda spyod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ / bu ston gyi
42b5: bsgyur ba'i/ yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no// // rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yi// chos min sun dbyung bya phyir dang // dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir// ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags// 'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel
42b6: pa dang / / rgya dpe'i dpe yang ma rnyed cing // don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la// sam+b+ha ta la ma byang bas// sgra don ji bzhin ma 'byor pa'i// nongs te mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing // phyis 'byung sa gnyis sgra rnams kyis// ma dag shes na bcos
42b7: par wa/ / rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las// dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa// de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ 'di la dbu nas shog lho gcig ma tshang bas rnyed na bskur bar bya'o//
42b8: 'di dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba gcig tu 'dod pa yang 'khrul bar snang ngo // 'dis 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho chen po myur du skems par gyur cig/
43a1: rgyag skad du/ shrI sarba ta thA ga ta guh+ya tan tra yo ga ma hA rA dza a dra ya sa mahA bidzi ya nA ma badz+ra shrI ba ram hAkal/ A ri/ bodakang du/ dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigs brnal 'byor chen po rnam par
43a2: rgyal ba zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje nga la mchog chen po brtag pa dang po'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyed dpa la rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
43a3: thos pa yi/ dus gcig tshen bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdorje// rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi ni// b+ha ga la ni snyoms par zhugs// gsang ba las kyang ches gas dag gsang ba chen
43a4: po 'di lta ste/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ gsang ba pa rnams ma lus pa'i// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje// byang chub sems kyi snying po che// chos kun mnyam pa nyid dgongs pa'i// mnyam nyid
43a5: gnyis su med pa'i gnas/ / spyod pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nyid ngang la gnas pa yis// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med la// gzigs shing mi byed rdo rje las// ma ga tse sa lha me lhang
43a6: der gnas/ / mi 'gyur gsang ba 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// tshogs 'khor rnams 'dus pa ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs rnams las// byang chub sems dpa' sems
43a7: dpa' che/ / kun du bzang pos gsol ba btab// rang gi stan las langs nas ni// bla gos phrag par gzar gyur pas// pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni// thal mo sbyar te spyis btud nas// gsang ba zhes ni gang la bya// ches gsang
43a8: ban dzig bu/ / gsang ba chen po ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'khor nams kun la rjes brtse bas// rdo rje gsang ba kun bdag nyid// rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/
43b1: e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos kyi dbyings ni snang ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal yongs su dag/ dam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje li// d+hu dang mi rgyu'i dngos bdag nyid/ dkyil 'khor/
43b2: bsdus dang spros pa'i tshul// bkyed dang gnas dang sdud par mdzad// nyan thos rang rgyal la sogs las// gsang ba bya ba spyod pa ste// pha rol phyin pa'i mdo sde las// gsang ba rnal 'byor chung du grags// byi rang gsang ba'i rim
43b3: shes pas/ / gsang chen rnal 'byor bla bad rgyud// thabs dang shas rab gnyis med pa// stong pa snying rje dbyer med phyir// bde chen byang chub sems mchog gas // de nyid dpal ldan 'dus pa ste// zab dang rgya che'i snying po nyid//
43b4: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gnyis med mnyam pa ro gcig pas// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'di ni// thun mong ma yin rgyal po che// dam tshig spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// kun du
43b5: bzang po legs par nyon/ / rlud rnams kun du ma bshad cing // khyad par dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// rim pa bla na med pa'i chos// snying po khyod la bstan par bya// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyigs // de bzhin gshegs pa
43b6: thams ca pa/ byang chubasams mchog zan med/ rang byung migs bdeb mchog/ 'dod chags can gyi skyes bu rnams// rabatu gdul ba'i din cad cu// gas pa rjod papa zhig ceg// gzung cur rtogs par thar
43b7: don/ / dus pa can po rdo rje'i tshig/ rtogs dka' sangs rgyas spyod yul bas// sdom pa gsang brgyas gangab phyir// dri mang ye shes 'byung gnas gter// lhan cig skyes pa nga bo nyid// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi
43b8: bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i yul// thabs las ma lus sangs rgyas 'byung // 'di nyid gsang ba'i chos nyid can// sku yi gsang ba ma skyes pa// sems can lus dang snang ba khyab// gsung gi bsang ba ma 'gags
44a1: pathams sa dang sa nA/ / rmugs kyigs m+b+ha / / nag la/ na saso// /
44a2: rnams / rnams khebs pa'i nga bzhin gyis// theb lngamags dag zhal // gsang pa'i ge don ma mdza // 3gaH/ sa ldan// pab N+Dag/ yangs la// aH/ dzan la
44a3: kha ga mtha' na d+ha'i mtha'/ / da d+ha'i mtha' dang ma mthar bcas// daden pa'i yig gsum// thog mtha' gas pa la dang ba// dus gsum rdo rje'i yi ga'i gnas// 'byung dang 'byung las kyur slar bcas / 'dus pa 'di ni sbas pa'o//
44a4: rnal 'byor rgyud rdulas tshogs rnams// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa yis// dum nyid du dbang bsgyur bas// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa yi// ye shes 'bang ba'i phreng po yin// thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi// khyad par
44a5: rim pa gang gis ni/ / mdo don mngon par bsdus pa yin// ma yA/ i AM/ u A/ ra~M r-I la'o// a e/ ma mam // a ni skye ba med pa'i tshul// shes rab pa rol byin byor ba// dbyangs kyi yig tha ma per// stod nyid nam
44a6: mkha'i chos rnams kyis/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mchog/ snying po'i yan lag dag tu bshad// thub pa chen pas chos phung po// brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa las// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i snod yin te// de bas 'dzin
44a7: klad kyiH/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdo rje sogs// rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa ni// snying po kun las 'di bsdus yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang / gsung dang thugs sa rnam
44a8: gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas phyogs bcu 'di bzhin
44b1: gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par lus te bcom pa 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams da kyi bdag nyid byung chub byas pas ngal 'as kyis gsul mo nas 'byung bang thug pa ga nams kyi / sa pang
44b2: bgrod pa'i lam kur pa/ / rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal don// bsgrub bya sgrub byed don bshad gsol ces gsol ba btab pas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos ji lta bar mkhyen cing thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
44b3: chos thams cad kyi sgo la 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to/ / rang bzhin dag cing bdag med
44b4: pa'i/ / chos kyi dbyings ni spros dang bral// sna tshogs rgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni// rang 'byung dag par 'char ba yin// nal 'byor rnams la dngos grub kyi// 'bras bu nyams snang sna tshogs pa'o// khams gsum sems can thams
44b5: cang la/ / las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// phrin las dag pa'i stobs su 'chang // de nyid gzhan du mi rnyed
44b6: de/ / zhes rgyud gcig gis bslus pa'i phyir// 'brel ba can du brjod par bya// khyad par chos ni btag dka' ba'o// stong gsum zhing 'di sprul pa yi// dkyil 'khor rgya che 'jig rten khams// gsal ba tshim med pa ste// dag parang
44b7: 'byung ngo bo nyid / lnga tshogs chos nyid gcig pa 'as// kun du grub pa dga' ba'i gzugs// rang bzhin sangs rgyas do rje'i gri// sngo bcu'i sprin gyis kun khyab// phyogs ba rgyad kyi phreng ba yi// snga bas rgyas pa 'gro zhing 'khrugs/
44b8: gsal dang gsal min gnyis ldan pa'i// rin chen pad ma'i phreng ldan pas// phyogs rnams kun du dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yu che// rigs lngar 'byung ba rnams dang ni// phyogs kyi dbye bas gnas pa yi/
45a1: lha rnams thams cad 'byung ba ni// yang dag ting 'dzin dbye ba yis// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang / yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gyur pa 'di dag gis// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pas//
45a2: dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// dag dang ma dag gyur pa rnams// 'dir ni rigs la gnas pa ste// rigs dang phra ba'i cha brten pas// lus sems chos ni rab tu dbye// lus ni nam mkha' lta bu ste// sems ni sgyu ma'i
45a3: rnam par 'byung / / dag ni brag cha lta bu ste// dbyer med rdo rje lhan cig skyes// rten dang rten pa dbyer med pas// thams cad chos nyid sems la gnas// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su btags// snod bcud snang ba'i yul rnams dang //
45a4: brtan g.yo khams gsum rang rig pa// srid gsum ma lus chos nyid de'i// snang ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// dri dang ro dang reg bya dang // thams cad chos nyid bag chags 'byung // rgyu las 'bras bu bskyed pa'i phyir// gcig las
45a5: du ma'i chos kun shar/ / du ma nyid du dmigs med de// thams cad stong phyir ma skyes pa'o// de skad ces gsungs pa dang // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po
45a6: la sogs pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing yid rang ste/ / bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa thob nas lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs rdo rje la rab tu gnas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o// rang lus sgyu mar
45a7: grub pa dag/ nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med// dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa nyid// stong pa nyid ni rdo rje'i su// lus ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pas// dag pa chen po ye shes lus// ngag ni brag cha'i sgra dang mtshungs// brjod pa'i dus na stod pa
45a8: ste/ / bi wang sgra bzhin rten 'brel gyis// rang grag brjod pa tha snyad tsam// sems ni rang 'byung dag pa la/ ye shes chen po rang gnas nyid// rgyu rkyen tshegs pa bral ba las// snang ba tsam du'ang mi gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
45b1: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos chos thams cad la zab pa'i tshul la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mu gsung thugs rdo rje bla na med pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ / ma skyes mi 'gag rol bar gang 'byung ba/ byang
45b2: chub sems ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / / thabs dang shes rab gnyis med ston pa'i su// sgra 'drul rgyal po bang chen 'di nyid de// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin 'ad gsal ba// mtshan ma med cing mi 'gyur 'ja' tshon ltar// gnyis med gnyis
45b3: su med min mnyam pa'i klu/ / shin du dri med nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i kad+d+h+r-i dzin dzaka/ tA rad+da na d+h+r-ika/ hrIHa ro la ka/ kha pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ la dwe Sha ra ti/ ma mo ha ra ti/ pe rA ga ra ti/ ta badz+ra ra ti/ ya ya rA na ta kri ta/ ma pra dz+nyA na takr-ita/ ta ba
45b4: mAn ta krita/ ka bik+ShAn ta kri ta/ rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // 'khor la bsnams pa'i 'od 'phro ba// dkyil 'khor rdzogs tshul lha rnams kun// yab yum bde ba nyid du bzhugs// dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
45b5: par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rdo rje gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje
45b6: dang / / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston par mdzad pa'i phyir gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis chos thams cad las rnam par rtogs pa med ci rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor
45b7: 'dus pa rnams la yang dag pa'i snang ba ston par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// tha ma nyid du ston par
45b8: mdzad/ / sngags kyi spyod pa spyod mchog gis// gsang ba'i tshul 'di spyad pa na// gang spyod de yis ye shes 'thob// tshul 'di shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// mkha' dang mtshungs pa mnyam 'gyur bas// rnam par mi tog ngo bo nyid/ tshes rnam
46a1: rang bzhin dag pa las/ yang dag su ni rab tu 'brung // seMs thA bA shwadad+he/ aHd+haHsab+hA ba shu d+haH/ a lag zhung d+haHsarbarbA thA/ la ga shad d+haH/ oMTaN+Data dun pa d+has thA ba swAH/ shA
46a2: sngags kyis sgra rnams dang / / sngags dang rlung du sbyar ba nyid// rang bzhin dag pa'i ye shes lnga// chos rnams yi ge stong par brjod// rdo rje mi bsgong rgyal mchog ni// zhe sdang can gyi gdul byal// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis//
46a3: gtum zhing gdug pa thams cad 'dul// dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen gyis// nga rgyal can gyi gdul bya rnams// rin chen rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// ser snas 'jungs pa thams cad gtul// tshe dpag med kyis 'od byed kyis/
46a4: 'dod chags kyis ni bcings pa rnams// pad ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// sred pa can gyi gdug pa btul// thogs med grub pa'i rgyal chen gyis// shin tu phrag dog che rnams la// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// sems
46a5: can ma rungs las can btul/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor yangs pas ni// mongs dang ma rungs mche ba can// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ gti mug mun par tshud rnams btul// dkyil 'khor lnga yi sbyor ba bri/ de nyi
46a6: rigs ni lnga bshad/ shin du bsdus pa'i sbyor bas ni// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes mchog/ khruni bcu gnyis tshad mnyam pa// ngos bzhi dgal mnyam pa yis// bcu gnyis sa ni mngon rdzogs pas// bcu gsum pa la
46a7: gnam pa yin/ / gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla med// blon nyi shu mnyam pa te// ngos rel yang lnga lnga brjod// rlung bcu sngags bcur gnas pa ni// bloms ldan pas shes byaste// de brjod pas ni mchog tu brjod// bral
46a8: dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug/ ngos reng bzhi bzhir ldan pa las// bden pa bcu drug rtogs pa yis// ye shes skad cig de snyed do// mi bskyod rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / tshe dpag med pa'i gang bdang / rdo rje rtag pa chen po / sdub
46b1: bsku gsung thugs rdo rje/ / lus ngag yid ni rnam dag phyir// yang dag don du snang ba'o// gcig nas gsum dang rigs lnga ste// dgu dang bcu gsum nyi shu wa// sum cu rtsa gcig par dag tu// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu
46b2: 'gyur/ / rigs lnga dag las 'byung ba ni// re re nyi shur dbye ba yis// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid las/ nyi shu rtsa lngar yang dag pas// dam pa'i rigs ni brgya ru 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs tshogs mtha' yas pas// 'dus
46b3: pa chen po 'dir brjod byas/ / rnal 'byor pa rnams shes par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa
46b4: mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla na med par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad chos ni stor ba'o// gsang ba chen po rnam par rgyal// chung 'di
46b5: yang dag ston par mdzad/ / rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog/ sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu rgya mtshor gyur// phung po lnga rnams sangs rgyas sku// de bzhin
46b6: gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can/ srab sa'i khams yin te// zhu ba chu'i khams su 'dod// dro ba me'i khams yin te// rgyu ba rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mi shigs pa ni thig ler gsungs// bde ba nam mkha'i khams yin no//
46b7: gzugs ni thogs par btsas pa ste// tshor ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// 'du shes dmigs par bcas pa ste// 'du byed lus ngag yid sbyor ba// rnam shes snum mdon sgrub byed// reg pa las ni sa yin te// lha mo spyan
