46b8: du shes par bya/ / dro ba me ru rab tu grags// gos dkar mor ni shes par bya// sdud par byed pa chu yin pas// mA ma kI yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'gro ba'i bya ba bskyod pa rlung // sgrol ma'i ngo bor brjod par bya// thig le snang byed ba
47a1: du da gas/ ga can lags na// sagasas rnarnams kyang bas// bral du ma nas kyad yan// bag nags sus 'arnams pag/ de sa nga ma me lag
47a2: bkag sa rnam par mirtog pas/ / bzhal pa stong phrag du ma yang // gnas nas ye shes sto bar byed// de yang cung zad goms byas pas// gong nas gong sa khyad par 'gro zhes gsungs pa dang / 'khor rnas pa
47a3: dag thams cad la rang bzhin gyis gyi kyi sa pas yang dag pa'i ye shes 'a bar du gyur pa blan med pa las mngon du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ched
47a4: brjod pa'ang med du brjod do/ / gang dang gang gis 'tshang ba rnams/ dad shes pas grol 'gyur te// 'dil nges par 'khor ba yi/ rgya mtsho nang nas dri med 'thog/ sems can rnams kyi se shes kyis// rgyud ni sa pa gro
47a5: 'gyur ba/ / khyad par las na rtogs pas na// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas gnas su 'gro// gang du yang dag tha ma yi// drin gyi ye shes yan lag bdun// phra ba'i yon tan mngon du byed// sku gsum dbyer med la phyag 'tshal//
47a6: 'di ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa// tshe 'dir 'bras bu thob pas na// me tog ting 'dzin la gnas pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// ring na bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te/ don kun sgrub par byed pa'o// dga'
47a7: dang dga' bral dag gi dbus/ / mtshan nyid dmigs pa brtan par gyis// thun nam zla phyed zla ba 'o// bskal par ye shes che la sbyor// mi tog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// sgrib pa rang dag lhun
47a8: gyi grub/ / bde ba chen po mngon byos pas// stobs sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// de las byung ba'i thabs bstan pas// bde ba'i khyad par
47b1: 'byung bar 'gyur/ / rgyu yi yan lag bdun 'byung ba// bla mas brten pa'i rten 'brel gyis// ye shes dbab pas sbas pa'i tshul// ye shes mthong ba lus dang dag/ rtags 'char sgrib pa rang dag ste// byin gyis brlabs
47b2: las 'char ba yin/ / tha ma slob ma'i khyad par dag/ ye shes dbang dang cung zad kyis// ye shes mthong ba'i spyod yul yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshan dben// thol gsal bar rang lus la// mtshan dang dpe byad
47b3: ldan par bzhugs/ / basbyar e baM rnam pa gnyis// thabs dang shes rab ca yi gnas// bde ba chen po thig le yis// 'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes can// snying rje chen po tshad med bdud ci'os// rgyun mi 'chad par
47b4: ba'i byang sems 'bab/ / phrin las stobs ni gzhan don thogs pa med// de dag don du yang dag rang bzhin med// stong nyid rtogs pas dngos la chags mi 'gyur// 'di ni rgyu yi rus zhes bya ba ste// lam gyi dus na
47b5: dbang gi ye shes te/ / mtshan ldan rig ma yongs su dag pa la// sa phyogs gtsang zhing rab tu dben pa 'am// rgyal nyid skyes gzhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// bshar gci tshu la sogs pa byug pa 'am// rgyal ba
47b6: mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya/ / nu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yabar// cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar// lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya// rab tu dge ba'i chos
47b7: ni dri ma med/ / rnam par ma rtog ye shes mtshungs med pa// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba 'di yis ni// bde chen mchog tu dag pa 'dir thob byed// 'bras bu'i yan lag bdun ni tha mar brjod// rang byin brlab pa'i lam
47b8: gyis gang thob pa/ / mtshungs med 'dren pa bla med ngo bo nyid// nus pa brtan dang rdzogs pa mngon gyur pa'o// rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang // gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom pa dug sngags kyi mtshan gyis
48a1: gan grus pa/ ga/ sa ba da bya// rlab pa'i 'bras bu nus pa brtan pa yis// 'dir gang cig gtsig gis rdzogs kyang chug// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pra dang gzang dang thugs kyi
48a2: pogs ba gsang ba 'dus pa bal nal 'byong chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhipa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
48a3: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par
48a4: snang ba'i ye shes rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gsang ba 'di lta bu gsungs so/ / 'khor ba dag la mi gnas pa'i// ye shes rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ dngos po dngos min dang bral ba// dngos po gnyis ka/ sdong
48a5: ba ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos zhes bya// dag dang mngag srang byar med// gzugs dang stong pa'i bar du yang // dbus su mnyam par gnas pa yi// gtsang dang mi gtsang dbus su ni// ma 'dres pa de mnyam par sbyor// rten dang rten can dbus
48a6: su ni/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyal ba 'byung // lus ni mnyam par gnas pa dang // ga nga sems kyang mnyam gyur pas// mnyam par lta ba mthong ba rnams// ye shes mnyam par rnam par rgyal ba zhes gsungs so// kun du bzang po sems dpa'
48a7: ches/ ji ltar mnyam par lta ba dang // gnyis su med pa'i chos dag ni// bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes rang bzhin gnyis med chos// du ma ma yin gcig min te/ gsang ba'i rim pa
48a8: bla na med/ dang po las kyi rnal 'byor gyis// lam gyi rim pa rab sbyor bas// cig car 'jug pa phyag rgya che// zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa nyid// bde ba chen por rtogs par bya// chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ni// byang chub phyogs chos sum
48b1: bcu bdun/ / ting 'dzin ro mnyam rdo rje yis// gsang chen gnyis med rgyal ba 'dir// gnas bcu dang g.yo bachung // mi shigs thig le'i ngo bo nyid// rang lus rdo rje'i rang bzhin la// bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis// sa lam rdzogs tshul
48b2: lugs 'byung dang / / lugs las bzlog pa rim min pas// chud du sbas pa rnams gsal ba// de nyid nges par bstan pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la mngon sangs rgyas// ces gsungs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor deng ga shin du rmang tu byung ba'i
48b3: tshul zab mo la ngo mtshar skyes te slar gsol pa/ ye shes thob pa'i lus can dag/ tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas pa/ 'di nyid rnal 'byor ji lta bu// mi gtsang lus las ji ltar 'gyur// nam rtog ngan pa'i bag chags kyis// dri mas bslad
48b4: pas 'di ma mchis/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang gis der bstan pa// dri ma bag chags bzlog bya'i phyir// lam gnyis rang gi gsang ba'i chos// 'dir ni rtog pa ngan pa'i tshigs// rags pa dang ni phra ba'i chos// nam rtog pag/
48b5: chags nyes pa yis// 'gro ba gsum po rnam rmongs la// blo dang ldan pas legs bltas te// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbyang bar bya// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// slob ma yongs su smin byas shing // ye shes rgyud la bskyed pa yis//
48b6: gcig char lam gyi stobs kyis ni// 'dir ni yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// goms pa chung ba'i stobs kyis ni// yon tan 'thun snang ma gyur te// dri nga'i lus ni rgyal ba'i sku// sems ni dri med pad ma ltar// skyon gyi 'dam pas ma
48b7: gos so/ / ji ltar 'dam pa'i lus dag las// ye shes lus ni rang dgar 'byung // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor lam// rdzogs pas gnas lugs mngon byas te// ye shes spyod pas rnam sbyangs pas// shin du dri med dag par 'gyur//
48b8: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// thabs kyi myu gu dag gis ni// ban d+hA ka ni rgyas pa bzhin// sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te// yon tan dri med de nyid kyi// me tog rgyas pa'i chu skyes pa'o// rdo rje theg par sbas pa yirnal 'byor
49a1: mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ bden gnyis zung 'jug rtogs pa las// spros bral mtha' dang bral ba'i chos// sgom pa'i lam zhes sa rnams bskyod// skad cig ye shes 'char tshul lo// go ma goms pa'i lam gyur
49a2: pas/ sku bzhi 'go 'phang mngon byed/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / spyan ras gzigs
49a3: dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po la sogs pa rnams bde ba dang yid bde ba dang dad pa khyad par can thob nas stan las langs te/ phyag dang bskor ba du ma byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
49a4: brjod do/ / e ma'o rang 'byung rgyal ba'i gzhi// rdo rje theg pa gsang ba las// phyi ma'i dus na gang byung ba'i// rnal 'byor pa rnams de bzhin gshegs// shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la// snyigs ma lnga ldan dus dag tu// rdo rje'i theg pa gang 'di
49a5: pa/ de dag sangs rgyas sras nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sku gsung thugs la nges gnas pas// byang chub sems mchog rnams la rtag mchog byed// ces gsungs te/ me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
49a6: la mngon par gtor to/ / rab tu gtor to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las
49a7: phyag rgya chen po nges par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba 'dzin pa thams cad la// mchog ni ston phyir yang dag bzhugs// e ma 'ogs
49a8: ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ e ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa// e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba// e ma'o rdo rje rnam par rgyal// ston ka'i nam mkha'i sprin med pa// zla ba'i 'od zer kun gsal ltar// gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes ni/
49b1: bdag gzhan bcas par snang ba'o// ston dus sprin med nam mkha' la// nyi ma gsal bar shar ba bzhin// thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa ni// don dang sems bcas snang bar byed// sprin med mkha' dang mun lta bu// snang byed
49b2: ye shes goms byed pas/ / rang rig rtsal las grub pa yi// sgyu ma'i lus ni len par byed// de yang yid kyi lus ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yis khams gsum du// bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas// mthar ni rang gnas
49b3: bde bar 'gro/ / sgyu ma'i lus tsam la brtan la// ril por 'dzin dang rjes zhig gis// dngos po thams cad bcom nas ni// de nas dag pa'i rang du gnas// thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// snang ba thams cad nub byas nas// rang
49b4: 'od rig ma dbyings kyi dang / / sdang ba'i ye shes khyab par 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa yi// rnam rtog dra ba bsal nas ni// bdag med dmigs pa med pa ru// mnyam nyid ye shes khyab par byed// snang ba med pa'i ting
49b5: nge 'dzin/ / snang ba tsam yang 'dzin med par// yang dang yang du don dam pa'i// bden pa mngon du byed pa can// 'ja' tshon lus kyis 'bad med pa'i// 'dod pa thams cad nam mkha' las// 'bad med par ni rtsol 'gyur
49b6: te/ / bdag dang gzhan rnams bde bar 'tsho// rdo rje 'od kyi lus bzung nas// bdag dang gzhan don sgrub 'gyur la// dmigs pa thams cad zad byed pas// bskyod med gnas su bde bar 'gyur// rang 'od ye shes ldan pa'i sku//
49b7: 'ja' tshen bzhin du mtha' mi dmigs// stong pa gsum la 'das pa po// thogs med snying rje 'byung bar 'gyur// dang pos ni tshu la thim// chu yang me la thim 'gyur te// me ni rlung la thim gyur nas// rlung yang rnam par
49b8: zhes la thim/ / rnam shes bzung ba de nyid ni// 'od gsal bar yang 'jug par 'gyur// dang po sgyu ma lta bu la// dang po smig rgyu de nyid kyang // 'od zer lnga dang ldan par mthong // gnyis par zla ba lta bu dang // gsum par nyi
50a1: pa lta bu dang / ba'i bar mun pa lta bu la// lnga pa sprin med nas mkha' las// me tog mtha' bras med par 'char// stobs dang mi 'jigs la sogs pa'i// ra ba'i yon tan nams brgyad pa// bden gtas
50a2: sbyor bzang 'jugs/ / bde ba chen po des thob 'tha/ mkha' phru sa su stong pa las// tog me migs mkha' 'drag// tshogs dang blon la ma thobs dag gis// 'bang dang bral bar stan gyis thug
50a3: b+hod thogs pa'i skulas na/ / 'bad pa med par sprul pa'i ma// mtha' med dral bral ji bzhin pas// sems can don kun sgrub par mdzad// gang dag gang gis 'dul gyur pa// de de bzhin du sa ser snang // mos pa 'dabang
50a4: gas tha dad par/ / sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur// lhun grub bde ba chen po'i su// rang snang rig mas nyer brgyan pa'i// 'og min gnas su dus rtag tu// mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar bas bzhugs// yid bzhin
50a5: nor bu'i rgyal po ltar/ 'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi don// che ba'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// bde ba che las de 'byung 'gyur// rim pa thams cad kun rdzogs pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du gnas sems kyis// khams gsum pa
50a6: rnams 'jig byed pa/ / thams cad nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa
50a7: mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje che// dbyer med bde ba ston pa pos
50a8: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ / mnyam nyid ye shes stong pa yis// bdag nyid gzugs ni sbyang bar bya// mnyam nyid gnas pas thams cad du// ye shes can gyis sgom gyur pa// 'jigs pa kun las thar
50b1: bar 'gyur/ / gsang ba'i yi ge bder gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen ni// sems can kun gyi lus la gnas// de nyid ye shes snang ba bo// ko tak+Sha/ ko ta wa/ ko tak+Sha la d+ha/ ko ta ba sha/ ku ti
50b2: d+ha re/ ko la k+Sha/ ko la wa/ ko la lo wa/ ko la wa shu/ ko la tASh+Ta// gnas bcu sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// thabs dang lam gyi khyad par sku gsung thugs// lha bsgrub pa spyod tshul bla na med// 'bras pa
50b3: byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas/ / stobs bcu rdzogs pa gang yin rnal 'byor che// snying po 'di ni rgyud rnams kun du sbas// dngos por 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams// dngos po'i rnal 'byor 'jig 'gyur
50b4: pa'i/ / zla bi'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad ma'i gdan dag bsam par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor can// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag/ rgyal po rol pas
50b5: bsam par bya/ / lus dang ngag dang yid rnams la// ye shes chen po'i dngos grub gsol// 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis// shes rab 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur// 'od zer 'bar ba ma bu ru// dngos pos dngos po
50b6: bsgom par bya/ / mchod pa'i mtshan nyid yongs ldan par// stong pa nyid du mnyam gnas pas// gnyis su med pa rnam rgyal ba// lhag pa'i lha ni bskyed bya ste// 'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya// mnyam par bzhag nas
50b7: bsgoms pa yis/ / 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// mnyam med sngags ni bzlas nas su// sgrub po bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub// zla ba gcig grangs sngags kyis ni// khams gsum 'grub par the tsom
50b8: med/ / rnam shes las ni sngags 'byung ba// mtshan nyid drug ldan bzlas nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas// zla ba nyal de 'grub 'gyur// de la rdul zhugs spyad pa med// sngags med bgrang phre 'jan
51a1: bamed/ gzung dang byung bdu tshogs dag// ga gnas byu ga tu sreg 'gyur te/ sa mngon gyis gang yang dru // dngos thab 'dod pas thab// dam sogs pa gsum pa nyid// ram sa /
51a2: don la 'jug pa// me dang rlung dang bang chen dang // rmugs pa dkyil 'khor// blan na byed byed dus sa te// las ni gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur// bcod la bdon pas mchod par 'jum/ zlas
51a3: bas rnam par dag/ se la sbyin bsreg brtson pas 'byor// bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa thog/ sngags pas de ltar shes nas ni// byis pa'i tshul bzhin spyod par u0f7f// spyod pa'i tshul ni/ me dpas// yang dag
51a4: shes rgya mtsho 'thob/ / chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni// rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo med// dngos po'i rang bzhin gang med de// byang chub rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang // ye shes ldan pas zhus
51a5: pa'i don/ / dam tshig de nyid ston pa po// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs// sku gsum mi byed dkyil 'khor du// yid 'od phreng ba kun bsdus pa// rdo rje'i bzlas pa ye shes che// bla na med pa'i thabs mchog las// rdo rje
51a6: u0f88u0f90 li bzlas pa yis/ / sangs rgyas skur ni byin gyis rjog// mnyam med ye shes thob pas na// rdo rje gsung gis ngag byin rdzog// nam mkha'i dang las rang thung ba'i// thugs kyi rdo rje sems nyid kyi// gnyis med ye shes rtogs thar
51a7: pas/ / zab dang rgya che'i tshul gnas pa'o// 'dir ni rtog pa rnam spangs te// brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid// de bzhin khyi dang ba glang dang / srog song mi ste ba glang chen po'i sha// sna tshogs sha yi sbyor ba dang / khu ba dang ni rag tar bcas/ mi
51a8: bskyod pa dang sdang mdzad dang / / go ro can snying kha nas// gang byung g+hi haM stobs ldan pa// sgo dgu las ni gang zung dang // srog chags yan lag lus las byung // rje kha sbyar rdzas bcu dang // rdo rje can gyis myos byed ldan// rim par gyur ba kye/
51b1: bdun sha/ gang las rnyed pa stobs mchog las// ril bu tsan ka yi tshad// sbyar te zos par gyur na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// thugs//
51b2: rjes dgongs te gzigs 'gyur te// gtso bo gzi can mdangs ldan pa// 'dzam bu'i chu babo 'od 'drar 'gyur// mi sdang ba dang bcud kyis len// rkang mgyogs mig slanas 'og dang // ral gri ro langs bram pa dag/ sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub
51b3: par gsungs/ / dngos grub kun gsol dam pa yi// ye shes rgya mcho ngas 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa
51b4: nyid rnam par rgyal ba las dngos grub mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes chos thams cad zhi ba 'dam tshig gi
51b5: mchog blan med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen 'byung gnas dang / de bzhin gshegs
51b6: pa 'ad dpag tu med pa rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba grub pa la sogs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nyid/ ye shes/
51b7: snying po nam mkha'i dbyings// chos rnams kun gyi snang ba po// zab pa dang ni rgya che ba'i// dkyil 'khor chen po brtan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis ye shes kyi snang ba'i tshul las byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
51b8: gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor ye shes las grub pa kun du snang bar byed pa mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od kyis khyab pa/ bkod pa tshad med pa'i phrin las yon tan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'i gnas rin po ches
52a1: tshogs 'dus pa las rang byung ba/ grwa ba'i sgo bzhi pa/ ta babs rim pa du mas mdzes pa/ rdul med cing rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ sgo phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ pho brang nang du ni dri ma med pa'i ye
52a2: shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i ka bas bteg pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i gdung gis bcad pa/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga rab tu gnas pa/ khyams phyi ma'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor drug dang / bar chad srung bar byed pa 'byung po kun 'dul dang
52a3: ye shes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / mtshams bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ste bar bar du ni sangs rgyas stong mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul bla na med pa 'thob pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i dri
52a4: ba dang dra ba byed pa 'phyang ba/ ye shes lnga'i rtsig pas 'khor yug tu kun du 'khor ba/ sgo bzhi blo 'bur du snang ba/ phyi nang med par gsal ba/ so so'i bye brag gi dkyil 'khor ni rgyas shing yangs la rnga ma dang mnga' yab dag gis
52a5: mdzes pa/ 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni bkra shis pa'i mchod pa dang rol mo sna tshogs kyis khyab par byed par kun rgyu zhing gar byed pas mchod pa'o// ri dgas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dag bsgreng bas mtshon pa/
52a6: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba ston par mdzad do// 'og mini bde ba can gyi pho brang dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa de nyid du dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam
52a7: panyid gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i bo brang rang byung bar gyur to/ / de dag gi ni spyi dang bye brag tu/ dkyil 'khor sum bcu cu drug rab tu 'byed// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang // rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'od 'brod pa
52a8: 'od dpag med pa gdon ma za ba rnams/ / phyogs bzhi dbus dang rnam pa lngar bzhugs so// mA ma kI dang spyan ma gos dkar dang / sgrol ma rnams ni mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro// byams pas yi snying po shar du ste// lhor ni lag na
52b1: rjem pa' shing po/ rab 'dam dbyangs 'phags pa stan rapa gzigs// byang du sgrib pa rnams la kun tu bdang / mtshams kyi par ni gzugs sna dra ra ba'o// phyogs kyis stong mo rgyal can mog// sa marnams can //
52b2: g.yo mgon po dang // 'dod pa'i rgyal po stobs chen dbyug sngon can// steng phyogs gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang // 'og phyogs gnod mdzes rgyal po ste// lhor ni gsang ba'i bdag po dang // byang du tshangs pa chen po'o// mtshams su
52b3: 'jig rten skyong rnams ni/ / shar lhor yul 'khor skyong ba la// lha chen brgyad kyis bskor ba dang // lho nub 'phags skyes po la yang // gza' chen brgyad bcas gnas pa'o// mig mi bzang ni nub byang du// klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba'o//
52b4: byang shar rgyal chen rnam thos sras// gnod sbyin chen po brgyad bcas pa'o// lha srin sde brgyad yongs kyis ni// tshangs pa'i rgyal po yongs su bskor// gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la// lag na rdo rje drag po'i tshogs// brgyad bcas
52b5: 'jig rten gsum 'dul te/ / 'di dag rnam par bshad pa'o// sangs rgyas stong phrag gcig ni khyams su bkod pa dag/ shar phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang // mngon dga' zhing khams shel gyi 'od du 'bar// lho phyogs nyis brgya
52b6: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang / / rdul dang bral ba bai dUr+ya yi 'od/ nub phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga po// bde ba can zhes pad ma ra ga'i 'od// byang phyogs rnga sgra sgrogs pa gser gyi mdog/ nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lngar yod pa dag/ nyi shu dag
52b7: ni rnam pa mtshon phyir gnas/ / rim pas phyogs su gnas pa dag/ rgyas pa'i dbye bas 'di bzhugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor dam pa bla med gzhal yas khang // rten dang rten pa mnyam med chos kyi dbyings// dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa/
52b8: rnam gsal ba zhi rtsa ba'i lha tshegs rnams dang spros pa dag/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i sangs rgyas stong bzhugs shing // 'jig rten mgon po lag na rdo rje dang // tshangs pa mi mjed bdag po la sogs te// rgyud 'di la ni smin par byed pa'i dbang /
53a1: dkyil 'bar chen po ldan brgyad cupar// ngas shang nam shur mnyam par brjod/ ba dkyil lakhor sa tshogs sum cug cag/ de dag re ram yang de nyid kyis// rim bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba
53a2: 'khor la/ / thub pa'i dbang pos 'dir ni gsal bar bstan// lag na rdo rje'i 'khor dang rdo rje le// drug po'i rnam pa khro bo brgyad pa'o// de rje gtsug tor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje drag po rdo rje slobs nyid de// rdo rje rnon po rdo rje tsa
53a3: rdorje ma che ba/ / rdo rje 'jigs byed tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// ngas pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor du bstan pa ni// lha yis dbang po brgya byin do can// gnod byin rgyal por tan ku ber// ston pa rta mgo gtsug na na chen bcag thags
53a4: ris dang mkha' lding rgyal po dang / / srin po'i rgyal po dri zar bcas pa'o// 'di dag gsal bar nges par mtshan pa ste/ snying po bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid de// cho ga phra mo rim pa ji bzhin du// mdo rgyud rtogs pa rnams las
53a5: rnam par rgyal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po gsang bar
53a6: ston pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga la sogs pa de dag thams cad rang gi ba spu'i bu gar thim par mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
53a7: cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
53a8: 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang gi gzugs rnams bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas de nyid kyi ba spu'i bu ga rnams la 'thon par gyur to/ / de'i phyir btsun mo thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che
53b1: mchong ba thams cad bkod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par mchod pa ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar byaste/ slar sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje rnams la gnas par gyur te/
53b2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i lha mo de dag bde ba chen po'i kun du spyod pas yang dag par mchod pa byed par gyur pa ni lal ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu sa'i bdag mo'o// la la ni mA ma kI ltar chu'i
53b3: bdag mo nyid do/ / la la ni gos dkar mo ltar me'i rnam pa'o// la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma ste rlung gi khams la kun du spyod do// de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rdo rje lta bu ste/ dus dang rnam pa thams
53b4: cad du yang dag par mchod pa'i rgyun gyis mchod par byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la
53b5: gnas pa 'di thams cad kyi sngags dang / bla na med pa'ang nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM AHbadz+ra d+hakahU~M swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi sngags so// oM AHbadz+ra s+phar she dz+dza swA hAHrig mthan med pa'i
53b6: sngags so/ / oM AHdzi rjeg nA mAn+ta mo lda da d+ha b+hu thAH/ oM A A raH/ nu b+h+yaH/ sa m+b+ha za d+ha r+k+ka m+b+has/ gas byed shin gagags pa'i sngags so// oM AHdwe Sha ra N+Di n+da sAn+ta/ oM AHma ha raHhU~M swAk+Sha/ oM AH
53b7: rA ga ra tin+d+ra swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ri ti n+du swA hA/ lha mo spyan lasags pa bzhi'i sngags so// oM AHbadz+ra rU be hUM swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra sha pa ta hUM swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra gan d+he hU swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra rA sa hU~M swA hA/ gzugs
53b8: rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o/ / oM AHbadz+ra me trin thA shI yai hUM swA hA/ oM AHk+Shi ti gar+b+ha ya hU swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra pA Ni ya hUM swAt+ma/ oM AHA kA sha ga d+hA ya hU~M swA hA/ oM AHA r+yA ba lo ki ti shwa ra ye hUM nA hA/ oM A mnya dz+ra shAm+b+ha
54a1: Sha hU~M swA hA/ oM AHsarba ni ba ra Na b+hini bi ni hUM swA hAHoM AHsa mun ta d+ha drA ye hUM swA hA/ sems dpa' chen po rnams so// oM AHya mAn takr-iti hUM phaT/ oM AHpra dz+nyA na takrita hUM phaT/ oM AH
54a2: mAn ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM AHbig+h+nAn ta krita hUM phaT/ oM AHAr+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM AHTak+ki rA dza hUM phaT/ oM AHnI l-i daN Da hUM phaT/ oM AHma hA ba la hUM phaT/ oM AHurl-i Sha tsakra ba ti hU~M phaT/ oM AHsuM b+hA rAH
54a3: hU~M phaT ces khro bo'i rgyal po bcu'i sngags rab tu gsungs so/ / sngags 'di rnams kyi nus pa ni// thogs pa med pa nyid yin te// 'byin dang sdud par byed pas na/ gsang ba'i sngags 'di legs par sbas shes gsungs so//
54a4: oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko ha~M/ gsal ba sems can kun gyi sems// zhi ba nyid ni 'od gsal ba// dngos po du mas ma gos pa// de nyid zhes bya bde ba sgom// sangs rgyas sku yi cho ga shes// de bzhin nyid tu nye bar spyad//
54a5: gzhan du sngags la sogs pa kun dge ba 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thub pa chen po longs
54a6: spyod rdzogs/ / gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu gsol// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// thams cad chos ni ston pa po// mchog tu dga' ba bdag med pa// rgyal bas sngon dus bstan pa ni// sems can mos pa'i don du bshad/ bya ba
54a7: spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog/ rtog pa'i rnal 'byor gsang mtha' ru// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbye ba yis// ngas ni rim pa gsum du bshad// dman pa mchog dang 'bring rnams te/ tha ma mos spyod tshul dag tu// theg pa chen po'i tshul
54a8: bstan pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas de bzhin gzhag pa thad kyi tshul rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad bsdus pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba 'di gsungangoso//
54b1: thams cad lus la gnas pa rdo rje'i sku// mi chod mi shigs rang byung pra bi'i gnas/ rtog pa'i rlung tshogs 'byung ba'i ngang du dag/ rang rig sems ni gar yang g.yo mi 'gyur// rtsa yi 'khor lo bcu la gnas 'gyur gang //
54b2: rlung bcu 'od kyi snang ba khyab byed cing // mi shigs thig la rab tu dang ba yi// bdud rtsi rab rgyas snang ba khyab byed pa'o// yi ge sgra yi rnam pa gar yod par// dran pa skyed byed srog gin bar 'gyur// kun la khyab byed
54b3: snying po ye shes rlung / / rten dang rten pa mnyam gnas rin chen sems// gser dang gser 'od rab 'bar mtha' yas bzhin// ji ltar rgya mtshor ba dngos rgya che la// zla zer 'od kyis khyab cing sdang ba dang / nyi shar mdangs kyis
54b4: snga phyi med par 'byung / / rtog pa med cing mun pa rang sar dag/ blo yis snang ba rab tu rgyas par 'gyur// gang du lus can rnams kyis ni// 'byung dang byung las gyur pa yi// dngos po'i snang ba bcings pas na// yid kyis lus
54b5: ni brtag dka' bas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni// de nyid shes pa'i dkyil 'khor te// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid yin// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu spyad// rnam shes sgyu ma'i ye shes lus// yongs su rdzogs parang
54b6: byung ba/ de nyid mi shes byis pa rnams// slar yang 'khor ba'i gnas pa'o// ji srid 'od gsal gnas kyi nus// 'byung ba thim 'gyur rtog pas stong // de srid sgyu ma phra ba'i lus// rlung dang rnam shes ldan pas ni// 'byung dang 'jug
54b7: dang gnas par byed/ / gzugs ni dngos por ma grub pas// thogs med rgyu ning mtshungs par ldan// 'on kyang byin rlabs nus pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// btsun mo'i b+ha ga der mi 'jug/ chos dang chos min ldan par
54b8: 'gro/ rang las lus b+hang ye shes ma thams cad kun nas 'bar ba ni/ me 'od 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od// ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// 'og nas steng du blo yis ni/ rab tu dmigs pas kha ba'abab// thams cad du ni tshig par bsam
55a1: byi nang gsang ba'i ye shes 'od/ / nyon mongs thams cad rab bsreg pa// sangs rgyas nyid du 'bras bu smin// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed pa ni// bdag nyid nam mkha'i ngo bor 'gyur// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis//
55a2: thabs dang thabs ldan byang chub sems// du ma nyid du mi dmigs shing // rnal 'byor dngos po ldog par 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhes bya rdzogs ldan dus// rjes su rnal 'byor gsum ldan te// shin du rnal 'byor gnyis ldan nyid/ cod
55a3: ldan dus ni rnal 'byor che/ / yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa dang // rdzus te skyes pa dang po'i mi// 'od kyi lus tsam gnas pa dag/ lha yi bdud rtsi spyod pa'o// de dag lus da spangs nas ni// shin du phra ba'i khams zhugs shing // sgyu ma'i lus su
55a4: gnas gyur pas/ / srid pa mngon par len par 'dod// bag chags dri mas kun bslang ba'i// 'dod pa log pa mthong ba yis// chags pa'i yid kyis lus la 'jug/ tshor ba rnam gsum myong ba yin// sa zhag ro dang zas gzhan gyis//
55a5: lus nyid rags pa nyer thob pas// dang po'i dngos po log gyur te// bug dgu ldan dri nga'i lus/ nyon mongs kyis ni dkrugs gyur te// bsod nams stobs nyams dman sar lhung // rdzus te skyes dang drod gshar dang / sgo las byung mngal
55a6: las skyes/ / 'di dag rim pa rnal 'byor can// snyigs ma'i dus su rab tu 'byung // ji srid bar ma'i sems can gyi// lus ni shin du phra ba ste// rnam shes las byung sgyu mar gnas// rigs dang ldan pas dus gsum shes// stobs ldan
55a7: de la rtog pa yod/ / rang nyid sgyu mar ma shes pas// dngos 'dzin bdud kyis glags rnyed 'gyur// 'di dag rgyun las bzlog pa na// srid pa nye bar len mi byed// skad cig gsum gyis ye shes thob// 'chi med bde ba'i gnas thob ste/
55a8: dag pa'i sus ni 'gro don 'byung zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ban
55b1: klud pas mchod pa dang gsang grags mngon par 'byung ba rdon 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dbupa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan dngas de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyisems dan 'ang
55b2: pachen po'i gsang ba chen po'i ye shes bla na med pa'i dang las rab tu dgyes par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snang dgasu dang byugs rdo rjo bzhi na gshegs pa de bzhini gshegs
55b3: pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po med pas sgom pa med// bsgom par bya ba bsgom bya min// de lta da po
55b4: dngos med pas/ skom pa dmigs pa med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
55b5: mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mched dang /
55b6: gzungs dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pa// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas
55b7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po 'di dgas skyes
55b8: pas/ chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
56a1: rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad dngos med cig / cho
56a2: mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ / bdag med chos las kun tu byung// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
56a3: dpag tu med pa 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de skom pa'ang med// nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis
56a4: de ltar dngos por rab tu grags/ / shes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs
56a5: pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdong nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing
56a6: mngon rtogs med/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za bas gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo spyan mas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad mnyes
56a7: par byed pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srid med mya ngan 'das med pa// 'di ni rdo rje bde chen po// sgom pa med cing bsgom pa'ang med// dgos pa mchog tu bsgrubs pas bde// zhes gsungs so//
56a8: rdo rje btsun mo mA ma kIs sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ stong zhing snang med gnas kyi mchog/ rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can/ sems kyi
56b1: rang bzhin sgom pa'o/ / ji byed tu yang med pa la nas gsas so// rdordo btsun mogos da/ dmas sangs rgyas thams cad rdzas su chags par byed pa po rje zhes byab ting la ni ma nyams par thugs te/ kya ma dang cin
56b2: nam bral te/ / de ni sems dang thig le min// 'di ni dam pa'i bad chen te/ bri zhing bsnan pa yod ma yin zhes gsungs so// rdo rje btsun mo sgos mas sangs rgyas thams cad su gsung thugs mi sra ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
56b3: la stobs par zhugs te/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// de bzhin bsgom bya'i dngos gang yang // stong zhing sdang med gnas mchog ste// de tshe sdig dang bsod nams dag/ ces gsungs so// de nas lha mo
56b4: gzugs rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis mchod pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dper na chu dang zla ba ni// bden min brdzun pa'ang ma yin pa// de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di// dang zhing
56b5: gsal ba'i rang bzhin no/ / zhes gsungs so// lha mo sgra rdo rje nam mkha'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rjes tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ stong zhing snar med gnas gyur pa// rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang
56b6: bzhin te/ / sems kyi ngo bo sgom pa ste// ji srid yang dag bdag med pa'o// rje gsungs so// lha mo dri rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen pos 'gro khyab pa//
56b7: bde ba spangs na rig pa med// bde ba 'bar bas srid pa 'ching // bde ba sus kyang bzlog mi nus// zhes gsungs so// lha mo ro rdo rje dam tshig chen pos mchod pa kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos/
56b8: rnams bden pa ma yin zhing // brdzun pa'ang ma yin pa yi don// blang dang dor bar byar med pa// de nyid ye shes mchog tu bstan// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i rdo rje spro ba'i
57a1: smin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsam gtan med cing dngos po med// sngags med lha yang med pa nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' dang byung ba/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
57a2: gsungs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// ye shes lnga yi rab sbyor bas// bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang
57a3: med/ / byang chub sems 'di bstan pa nyid// du ma nyid du mi dmigs so// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dren la
57a4: snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags med bzlas pa'ang med pa ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba gsum kun yod pa ste// sgom pa med cing mngon rtogs med ces gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sem
57a5: dpa' chen po rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje mchig la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / kun rdzob tu ni 'jig rten yod// dpyad pas 'jig rten gang na'ang med// rtag tu
57a6: 'jig rten ldan par 'jug/ dag pa dang ni gnas dag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje ye shes mchog rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
57a7: skyeb med cing migs pa med/ byeng nam mkha' 'byung gnas te// thab cing rtsa'i rang ba'i durgyan/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// sa gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje ma
57a8: cad kyi tshul gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don dam kun rdzob rten 'brel tsam// yang dag tu ni gnas pa med// chos rnams dag pa ye shes che// gnas med dmigs pa med pa'o//
57b1: zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dag pa'i chos// 'gro zhing ldog pa'i khyad par gyis/
57b2: rtog pa yang dag mi dmigs pas/ spros med gos pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings thams cad mnyam pa rdo rje mi phyed pa sgyu mar rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
57b3: snyoms par zhugs te/ / chos dbyings ye shes khyab pa'i sku// rtog pa med cing dri ma med// kun du 'byung zhing dus gsum du// phra zhing bdag med tshul mchog go// zhes gsung so// de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed// rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin thams
57b4: cad chos nyid dag pa las/ / me rtog nam mkha' dri ma med// snang ba sna tshogs rang grol ba// sems kyi mtshan nyid rtag tu med// ces gsungs so// gzhan gyis mi thu rdo rje yis// mngon par byang chub la zhugs te/ sgyu mar snang ba mi
57b5: lam tshul/ / rtog dang nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan// 'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes mchog/ phyag rgya chen po yang dag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// khro bo pad ma'i dam tshig mchog/ rin chen 'byung gnas la brten te//
57b6: chags pa med pa'i tshul mchog gos// skye med rten 'brel rang dag pa// chu rlabs g.yo ba rang bzhin med// gnas pa med de ston pa'o// zhes gsungs so// khro bo bdud ci 'khyil pa des// byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rgyal/
57b7: 'gro mas bya chu ba sems dang zhin// 'das rnams stobs sa gyur pa dag / dag pa bde ba'i 'byu gas te/ shes brten pa las 'byung zhes gsum po khri rnam tham gso mgong / ma la byas
57b8: ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ / rtog pa thams cad dag pa'i dbyings// chos rnams thams cad rkyen la brten// rang byung ye shes thob byed pa// gnas pa med pa nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// khro boTo ki rA dza rgyal// bsam gtan
58a1: rdo rjes rten pa nyid/ / yang dag ye shes dga' bas brgyan// lus dang lus med brtan pa med// ye shes lus mi drim med// rtog pa med cing 'gag pa med/ ces gsungs so// khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin 'jim
58a2: par mdzad pa khros pa'i sgra/ / snying rje chen pos gdug pa 'dul/ ye shes chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu// byams pa'i thugs kyis khyab pa po// sems can mgon po dag pa'o zhes gsungs so// gtsug tor dum tshig khro ba ni/
58a3: rig pa'i stobs mchog la gnas pas// bka' yi 'khor lo rgyas pa po// bstan pa'i don ni thob pa ste// nyon mongs zad byed ye shes mchog/ gnas pa med pas ston par mdzad// ces gsungs so// rdo rje gnod
58a4: mdzed khro ba che/ / rab tu 'byung gnas la brten nas// yang dag stobs ni dag pa che// chos kyi 'byung gnas 'gag pa med// rol pa'i sgyu ma ston par byed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje tshe
58a5: stobs po che/ / sku gsum mi byed la gnas pas// rtog pas mi shigs bdud nams 'joms// kun du spyod pa kun du sbyad/ log rtog thams cad gnas su dag/ ye shes 'byung gnas chen po'o// zhes gsungs so//
58a6: byang chub kyi sems rab tu brtan pa ye shes kyi rol pa sna tshogs su ston pa rang 'byung ba'i rgyud rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gas
58a7: ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'byung ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas de bzhin gshegs
58a8: pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha mo rnams dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / khro bo'i tshigs thams cad la yang dag par bstod pa/ mi bskyod ba ni ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings
58b1: ni mkha' cher po/ / rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa ni// rdo rjezhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi su// rtag pa'i rdo rje phyag
58b2: 'tshal lo/ / rin chen rgyal po rab tu zag/ rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// mnyam med dag pa mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje srul phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob// ye shes dgapas
58b3: yang dag 'byung / / rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don grub rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// gos pa med pa'i ye shes can// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// mo ha ra ti'i sngags
58b4: las skyes/ / sa yi khams ni rnam dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum gyur pa// lha mo spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// dwe ShA ra ti'i sngags las skyes// chu yi khams ni rnam dag pa// rdo rje rigs kyi yum gyur cing // mA ma kI la
58b5: phyag 'tshal lo/ / rA ga ra ti'i sngags las byung // me yi khams ni rnam dag cing // pad ma'i rigs kyi yum gyur pa// gos dkar lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra ra ti'i sngags las skyes// rlung gi khams ni rnam dag pa/ la kyi
58b6: rigs kyi yum gyur pa/ sna tshogs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// rtsa rgyus khams ni dag pa'i sku// nyon mongs rnam dag byams pa ni// rgyal ba'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
58b7: sems chen po/ / mig gi skye mched spyod mdzad cing // sa yi snying po de bzhin gshegs// sku yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni// rna ba'i skye mched rnam dag pa// phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs can// thugs kyi rdo rje
58b8: phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni// sna yi skye mched spyod gyur pa'i// nam mkha'i snying po'i mchog gyur pa// ting 'dzin rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ khre yi skye mched dag byed pa// 'jig
59a1: rten dbang phyug bla na med/ / gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba che// yid kyi skye mched rnam dag cing // dag pa'i sems mchog 'jam dbyangs su// nam mkha'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo//
59a2: byang chub sems dpa' theg pa che// lus kyi skye mched dag pa'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel mdzad// dam tshig rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal dbang po// 'gro ba'i sems rgyad stong mdza dag kun du bzang po
59a3: ye shes ro'ol/ / chos dbyings rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yid du 'ong // snang stong kun du rol pa yis// chos rnams sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ston// gzugs kyi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i sgra ni yid du'ong// sgra dang gA min
59a4: las grol ba/ / stong nyid rang sgra 'byung ba po// sgra yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i dri ni yid 'ong mchog/ sangs rgyas thugs mchod bde ba che// lag pa sang bar byed pa po// dri yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ro ni dga' ba'i sku// dri med bdud
59a5: ci'i thob byed cing / / dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod byed pa// ro yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// ya mAn ta krid sngags las skyes// sku yi gsang ba khro bo che// dbang po mnan cing shar phyogs bzhugs// gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo//
59a6: pradz+nyAn ta kri sngags las skyes// thugs las skyes pa'i khro rgyal ni// gshin rje mnan cing lho phyogs bzhugs// rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// pad mAn ta kring sngags las skyes// gsung mchog pad ma rang 'byung ba// chu bdag/
59a7: mnan cing nub phyogs bzhugs// gsung mchog rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// big+h+nAn ta krita sngags las skyes// phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po// gnod sbyin mnan cing byung phyogs bzhugs// bdud ci 'khyil la phyag 'tshal
59a8: bstod/ / rnam par rtog pas me g.yo zhing // ye shes gsang ba'i don ldan pa'i// khro bo byin za'i steng bzhugs pa// mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// btul zhugs chen po mi zad pas// log 'dren dpung rnams 'joms mdzad pa
59b1: khro rtsal bden bral steng na bzhugs/ / 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// gtum po srid gsum 'joms mdzad cing // snying rje stobs dang ldan pa'i su// rlung bdag steng gnas khro bo na// dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo//
59b2: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ ye shes mchog gis dbang bskur ba// khro rgyal dbang ldan steng bzhugs pa// stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo// gagasum ga gtsan lnga tshogs sgyu mar gar mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i ster/
59b3: bzhugs lha yi ga tso// 'khor los sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin su// spros med de bzhin nyid las byung // kA la kro d+ha gnon mdzad pa// bro rgyal gnod mdzes phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems las rang
59b4: byung ba/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma dag la spros med su// 'od gsal bde ba'i bsam gtan nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// rlung sngags las byung rang dag cing //
59b5: thams cad chos ni yongs rdzogs par// snang ba ye shes rang bzhin tshogs// spro dang bsdu ba nyid gyur pa// zung 'jug ting 'dzin la 'jug gang // dbye bas ye shes dag pa'i gnas// mchod pas yang dag thob par 'gyur// de nyid tha ma'i sku
59b6: nyid de/ / zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po
59b7: rab tu rgyas pa'i mchod cing bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / rdo rje mi 'gyur ba zhes bya pa'i tag kyi po dang po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdorje
59b8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las kyi bkod pa du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ting nge
60a1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs mthag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa du mi'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba bla na med pa'i rdo rje mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshul mi zad pa rdo rje 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don du sems
60a2: can nam mkha'i mthas klas par gyur pa'i khams brjod du med pa'i gnas kyi chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid du rab tu ston pa/ / rab byams chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po tshad dang rgya yongs su chad pa med
60a3: pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas kyi zhing khams/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas/ 'gyur ba med par gsang ba'i 'brug sgra sgrogs pa'i spyod yul// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu/
60a4: mngon par bsngags pa dang / rnal 'byor ma bskul byed ma dang / 'od zer can dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / ri khrod lo ma can dang / ku ru kul+le dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / dri ma med pa'i rnam par rgyal mi'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mi
60a5: zad pa bsngags pa rdo rje dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje la sogs pa ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu/ gsang ba'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba ye shes bde ba chen
60a6: po'i rol pa la yongs su spyod de/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu bde ba'i ros khyab par byed cing rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po mchod par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa gang
60a7: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'dus pa dpal mchog chen po snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rtogs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs
60a8: kha nas 'od zer gyi rtse mo du ma las phyung ste gsang ba chen po'i chos gnas kyi don mngon par brjod pa rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa ston par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dang sel gyis de bzhin
60b1: gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad dmigs med par/ spu ma lta bur bstan pa gang / gsang /
60b2: ba'i ye shes rang 'byung ba/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis rnam par thar pa'i rdo rje bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyos
60b3: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ bcings pa med cing grol ba med// thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbyings// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
60b4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyis rdo rje mi zad pa byams pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rmi lam mtshungs pa las// nam
60b5: mkha'i lta bur bdag med pas/ / dmigs pa rnams las yongs grol ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas snu ma lta bu dmigs pa med pa'i/
60b6: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag/ srid gsum mig 'phrul mtshungs med par// stong pa nyid ni dag pa'i dngos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan/
60b7: pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
60b8: gang du chos dang chos nyid med// thams cad rnam par mi rtog pas// brjod pa kun las 'das pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ges ye shes sdong
61a1: bos brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / // 'di la rtog par gyur pa med/ chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ dngos po nyid du rnam
61a2: par grol/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal gyis// dri ma med pa'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sarba
61a3: 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba byang chub sems kyi gsang // chos kun snying po rdo rje'i sku// lhun gyis grub pa ye shes dbyings// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
61a4: me tog kun nas gsal ba'i snying pos ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med/ dag pa'i ngo bor
61a5: mnyam pa/ / phung po lnga ldan nyid kyi dang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gnyis pa kun du snang ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer
61a6: bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rang gi sems rtogs bya// de nyid chos kun rtsa ba ste// snying po 'di nyid sbas par gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// /
61a7: zhes gsungs so// nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs snang bas yang dag par ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gsang ba gang 'gyur dbyings nyid
61a8: la/ / ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// dam pa 'di ni 'dus par gsungs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i ded dpon rgyal pos 'gro ba sems can
61b1: thams cad yang dag par sgrol ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ji ltar pa da po chu klung las/ rab tu skye bzal 'brob/ de ny-id sdong bu 'dir rtogs bya/ byang chub cul
61b2: 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lag chen rgyal pos 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba'i ting de 'dzin ma zad pa'i tshul zhes byab la snyoms par shugs kyang
61b3: sems 'di gsungs so/ / mnyam med nam mkha' yangs pa ni// kun la gnas shing mi 'gyur ba// dri ma med cing 'bar ba'i 'od// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
61b4: stobs mi zad pa'i dpal gyis ri rab brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du mi byed rdo rje ni// stong nyid byang chub sems rdo rje// snying rje'i snying po dran par
61b5: brjod/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal pos dran pa'i snying po rin po che'i snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
61b6: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni chos rnams stong pa nyid// chu dang zla ba mtshungs pa ste// sgyu ma nyid du 'gag med 'char// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
61b7: gshegs pa rtsi sman mi zad pa'i ye shes stobs kyi rgyal pos phun sum tshogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du snang la rang bzhin med// stong pa
61b8: mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ / rol pa rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstar pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i tog chen pos 'od mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas 'byung
62a1: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang nyid rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas te// rtog pa'i dra ba rnam gcod pa// rang las 'char gyi gzhan las min// byang chub tshul/
62a2: 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po mi zad pa'i dpal gyis zla ba kun tu ston par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems
62a3: 'di gsungs so/ / 'gro kun brtan dang g.yo ba yi// dngos po mnyam nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// gcig dang du mar dmigs su med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
62a4: pa rnam par grol ba'i phung pos ye shes kyi sprin rnam par bkod pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mnyam pa nyid la kun rtog brang/ dus gsum mkhyen pa
62a5: ngas mi dmigs/ / yang dag nyid tu kun grol ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po mi zad pa'i snang bas chos thams cad yang dag par khyab pa mi
62a6: 'byur ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sdang ba nam bral mun pa med// gang du tog las nam grol zhing // grol ba'i rgyu bden pas stong// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
62a7: pa'o 'as gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos kun du khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i rtse mo zhes b+ha ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'digs
62a8: so/ / 'byung dang 'byung la gyur pa gang // de nyid srog chags srog gyur pa// sems can byang chub snying po can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od 'phro ba
62b1: rgyal mtshan gyis snying po kun du rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du bdud kyi tshogs kun yang // rang gi sems las byung bas na// phyi rol nye bar dmigs
62b2: su med/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sku'i bral 'di lta ste/ sa tha'i lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / gzhan
62b3: 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / gzugs ni spyod pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i bar gyi me tog gi rnam pa la 'di lta ste/ pad ma dang / ku ta pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun d+ha ri ka dang / pad ma ge sar dang / dzam ba ka dang / na ti ge sa
62b4: dang / mnya 'dzu sha ka dang / mnya 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po la sogs pa ste/ 'dab ma lnga pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / bcu pa nas 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i bar du me tog gis mngon par gtor/
62b5: rab du gtor// mngon par rab tu gtor cing lha'i bu dang bu mo rnams mngon par rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su mchod par byed do// kun du mchod par byed do// legs par rab tu mchod cing sgra'i dbyangs kyis legs so zhes brjod/
62b6: par byed do// de nas lha ma srini sde brgyad kyis mchod pa la 'di lta ste lha'i rgyal po mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po stobs bzangs ldan dang / srin po'i rgyal po lang mgrin bcu dang /
62b7: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa rta mgo can gyi bu mo yid 'phrog ma dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal por ta na ku be ra dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser lus stobs ldan
62b8: dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang rgyal papo ri po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas so so nas mchod cing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la mgo bos phyag byas shing lan brgya stong du
63a1: mar bskor ba byas shing nam mkha' las song ste mi sdang bar gyur nas/ / skad cig tsam gyis so sor gzhal yas khang du sman la gnas par gyur to/ nas sa gsum du khyab pa'i 'od kyi snang ba chen po mazad pa byung ste/
63a2: sems can thams cad bde ba dang reg par gnas pas khyab par byas te slar log nas bdag nyid kyi sku lus kyi ba spu'i bu gar mngon par zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
63a3: bgasang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las 'dus pa chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa thog mar bstan pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das
63a4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'khor lo'i rdo rje kun du khyab par bskor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnyis med ye
63a5: shes rang bzhin can/ / ye shes snang ba mi zad pa'i// 'od gsal brjod tu med po yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs
63a6: pa thams cad kyi pad mo rin po che 'byung ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thams cad byang chub dam pa'i gzhi// lugs 'byung chos kyi rang bzhin dbyings// lugs ldog
63a7: gsang ba nyer bstan pa/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po ye shes kyi 'byung gnas shes
63a8: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snang ba med cing dpe med pa// mtshon pa tsam gyis togs dka' ba// 'dzub kyis zla mtshon bzhin du snang// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs//
63b1: das ba ma ldan 'das bzhan gagags par cal zla bar 'ang byab dbazhin gshegs pa thams ca grod pa ra bshes thas kyang nga na la gams par pa byung na thasams 'dag sus ga/ mang du
63b2: bskyed pa yi/ sa bon 'das ni kan khyab pa/ chos dbying ba mngon par byang chub bapa/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phreng ba 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
63b3: thams cad kyi don la rab tu sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snang ba 'di ni rigs pa'i lam// mchod pa 'din phra ba ste// thob pa mchog tu khur pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di
63b4: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thas yang kyi mi shes kyi 'ong zerab tu sprul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
63b5: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stong pa dngos po yul gyis bral// lus kyis stong pa rten 'brel 'byung / shin du stong pa phyi nang med/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
63b6: don yod par gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i sprul pa du mar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chu 'thun gang yin pa ste/ 'bras bu dbang
63b7: sbyar nam par sdom/ dri ma med pa lhan cig skyes// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me snang ba'i 'od mig yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o
63b8: zer gyi sprin 'phro ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyu rkyen nye bar len pa dang // lhan cig byed pa'i spyod pa can// mtshan nyid med pa'i ngo bo yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
64a1: zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpung yang dag ldan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul bston pa zhes byaba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par thugs nga /
64a2: chub kyi sems 'digs so// kun du brtags pa'i rnam pa can// de yi dri ma rnam sbyangs te// 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa yis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i
64a3: rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kun du snang ba dam pa'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khams 'di gzhan gyi dbang du brjod// spyi dang khyad par dbye
64a4: ba med/ / skye ba med phyir brjod par bya// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bdes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi snying po glog gi 'od zer gyi ting
64a5: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos nyid yongs su grub pa las// ngo bo bden par 'gyur ba med// pha rol phyin pa'i tshul mchog ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
64a6: b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu rab tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
64a7: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten pas ni kun du ston/ 'das pa'i ye shes dag pa'i lam// mi 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya che byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan
64a8: ldan dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljon shang rgyas pa'i bsil grib ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dod khams sgra dang dngos pos stong// gzugs kyi
64b1: khams ni lus kyis stong / / gzugs med khams ni yid kyis te/ byang chub tshul 'di bsnun pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
64b2: byams pa chen po'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam pa kun du 'byung ba dag/ ye shes rig la rnam dbye bas// dman pa mchog dang bar ma ste// rigs ni chos
64b3: kyi dbyings la gnas/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' ba bos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gru ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
64b4: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thams cad chos nyid gcig pa'i phyir// 'di ni theg mchog yangs pa'i lam// grub pa kun du spyod pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// /
64b5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal mtshan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba chen po yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos
64b6: skang bzhin nyid yin te/ / longs spyod rdzogs sku bde chen brjod// sprul sku sna tshogs 'gro don byed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can ye shes kyi snying pos de
64b7: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btang snyoms tshad med pa rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sku gsum gcig tu bsdus pa ni// tha dad rtog pa spang ba'i phyir/
64b8: snying po ye shes gyur pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
65a1: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba tha med khyad par ga/ zung 'jug 'bras bur rabagyur bas// rim gnyis gcig tu sbyor ba nyid/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs /
65a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi khang bzangs bkod pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
65a3: snying po kun du bskul ba ni/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul pas// myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'i lam// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshig bstan gyis de bzhin gshes/
65a4: pa thams cad kyi dran pa yang dag par skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi yi ge gsum// spro dang bsdu ba mi byed pas// bskul ba phrin las spyad pa min//
65a5: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni// de nyid shes pa'i gnas yin te// 'di ni sgrub pa'i de nyid yin// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
65a6: dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun du spyod pa'i snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / /
65a7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'gying ba dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glang po'i stobs mchog snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa/
65a8: brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// srog ni rlung la brtan pa yin// khyab cing snying por ldan pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dran pa mi 'khrug pas de bzhin gshegs
65b1: pa thams cad kyi zhing khams rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig ma lha mo khro tshogs bcas// thugs kha/
65b2: nas ni bsku ba shis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun chen 'bar ba'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi phung
65b3: po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam grol snying po du ma'i phung po dag/ bcings pa med cing rnam par 'thor med pa// tshul 'di thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung // byang chub tshul
65b4: 'di nges par bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying po rab tu 'joms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzang po yongs su
65b5: rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes sku// bkra shis dge ba'i mtshan gyis spras// de nyid kun gyi rnam par stong/ byang chub tshul 'di
65b6: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sdom pa rab ldan dgyes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe byad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
65b7: 'di gsungs so/ / sdom pa thams cad snying po ni// 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab nyid/ gnyis med de bzhin gshegs pa yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnyems
65b8: pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// srid gsum brtan dang g.yo ba yi// dngos po mi dmigs snang ba med// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid bur
66a1: phyir/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa rin chen dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
66a2: sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// de nyid ro mnyam gcig pa'i bdag/ rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan pa yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
66a3: cad kyi pad ma'i spyan rgyas pa zhes bya bas sangs rgyas du ma'i rjes su 'gro ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / spyan lnga ye shes spyod yul du// gnyis sdang thams cad nub nas ni zung
66a4: 'jug ye shes mi gnas pa/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi sdes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
66a5: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skye ba med cing gnas med pa// rang 'byung rang bzhin rang gnas pa// gnyug ma rgyun chad med pa'i dang / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
66a6: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'bar ba'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer gyis// snying gi pad mosad
66a7: mdzad pa/ de nyid mi 'gyur bde ba thob// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes dgyes par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par rgyas pa zhes bya
66a8: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khams gsum ma lus sangs rgyas zhing / dbyer med ye shes rgyas pa'i thugs// 'gro ba'i mtshan ma dmigs su med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsu
66b1: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// tshogs drug rang
66b2: sdang rtog pa med/ / rnam shes brtags pa rnam bral ba// gzung 'dzin kun las rnam grol ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa snang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
66b3: yul la 'jug pa kun nas sgo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / don dam rnam par mi dmigs pa// yod med mtha' las 'das pa ste// gzigs byar med cing rtag tu stong // byang chub tshul 'di
66b4: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mi zad pas bde bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// snang la rang bzhin ma grub pas/
66b5: mi rtag g.yo ba dngos la ni/ bden pa dmigs su med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i sbyin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying rjes bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
66b6: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems ni dri mar bcas pa dag/ bag chags rtog pas rab dkrugs pa// sa ler gzhag pas rang dngas 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
66b7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs pas 'gro ba'i blo rang chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang 'byung ye shes nam mkha'
66b8: ni/ tha snyad rnams las yongs grol ba/ 'char ba med cing nub pa med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod mthong bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu rgyas
67a1: pa'i nyo ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / da dang ldan pa'i skye bo ni// shes rab snang bar rab bskul ni// mun pa la ni snang babazhin/ byang chub tshum 'di
67a2: bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus sbyin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri rab bcigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
67a3: gsungs so/ / rnam tog dri ma spangs zhing gsal ba yi// kun nas kun du 'jug pa'i yid dag kyang // rgyun las bzlog na rang bzhin med par 'gro// nges par gsang ba byang chub bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
67a4: de bzhin gshegs pa bzang skyong gis 'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par mi dmigs mtshan ma med/ bsam
67a5: gtan ting 'dzin gnas med par/ / mnyam rjes mi de migs grol ba'i mtha'// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab mo stod
67a6: yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor ba'i gnas ni sgyu ma ste// sgyu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas pa// ye shes mngon par 'byung bas na// ngo bo nyid kyi
67a7: tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// dus gsul sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa dag/ phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings bcas pa// ga drug pa da gas sa skye
67a8: shin tu gtum pa dang / / chags dang ser snas 'jungs pa dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las brtson rnams// rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las// sgrol mdzad dkyil 'khor chen po lnga// thun ma'i chad par don spyod cing / swa
67b1: tshogs thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa/ de dang de yi skur bstan nas// ris 'thun lam du ston mdzad de// thams cad dbyer med dag par 'gyur// 'di nyid bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi ste// rdo rje phreng bar gyur pa dang // dgongs pa lung
67b2: ston gsang ba'i rgyud/ / ye shes rdo rjes bsdus pa ni// khyad par ston pa 'phags pa'i chos// bzhis bsdus lha mo'i gsang chen dang // thun mong ma yin ston pa yi// gsang ba bla med rgyud 'dir nges// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
67b3: dkyil 'khor bstan pa mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang pa 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
67b4: par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba bstan pa mi phyed pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med bdud rtsi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
67b5: cad kyi sku bdud rtsi 'bar ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// rang gi sems las gzhan med de/ snang zhing gsal bar
67b6: gyur pa nyid/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rnam par spro ba/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
67b7: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni rang rig nyams myong ltar// gal te sems nyid ma yin no// 'brel ba med phyir snang med 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom
67b8: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos nyid dang ni sems nyid dag/ gang du rtog
68a1: pas dpung gyur kyang / / gcig dang du mar mi dmigs pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pachas kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyim khyen
68a2: pa mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / spyod yul shin tu zab pas na// rang sems byang chub snying po can// gdod nas dag pa de nyid de/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
68a3: gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya sna tshogs kyi yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
68a4: so/ / za ba dang rgya chen dbyer med pas// snang stong tha dad med par 'dres// sangs rgyas zhes ni de la gsungs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i kha lo
68a5: skur bas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dri bcas rang rig ltos med phyir// rang 'byung ye shes de nyid de// rig pa'i
68a6: phyir na gsal ba nyid/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zab pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
68a7: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang rig yin phyir mi rtog pa// rkyen skyes gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir// mi rtog rtog pa byed med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom
68a8: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i lhas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems nyid rnam par mi rtog pas// gsal la rtog med ye shes
68b1: nyid/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul can/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud kyi ba dan rnam par gnon
68b2: pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang rig 'od gsal nam mkha' 'di// gdong nas ma bcos par rtogs gang // sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal mi dgos/ byang chub
68b3: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi lag pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
68b4: sems 'di gsungs so/ / blo bur dri ma byung gyur kyang // rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la// gos dang ma gos med par gsal// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
68b5: mkhyen pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yod med gnyi ka las 'das pas// phan tshun ltos pa ma grub phyir// tshu rol
68b6: ma grub pha rol bzhin/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// bde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba tog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
68b7: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yod med tha dad ma grub ste// gnyis tsam du'ang med pa'i phyir// rnam par brjod med dmigs pa bral// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
