68b8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i seng ges srid gsum thams cad lhung nger gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / e me ho sems nyid dri med kyi rnam
69a1: 'phrul gzugs skus bsdus pa yi/ / ning khams rnam par dag par snang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzangs kyis chos thams
69a2: cad sgra brnyan / bur snang ba'i tong nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa// ngo mtshar pa yi rnam 'phrul dag/ nam mkha' mthas klas khyab par 'gyur/
69a3: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
69a4: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang zhig sgrub pa gang bsgrub pa// de sgrub pa la gnas med pa// bsgrub par bya ba sgrub ma yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
69a5: zla ba'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba mi zad mos kyi dbyings// ye shes rdo rje rol par bstan//
69a6: tha med gnas ni tshul thob pa/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen gyis pad ma'i snying po kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang //
69a7: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'khor ba'i 'dam las skyes pa yi// rang sems pad ma'i sdong bu ni// zil par ldan pa dri ma med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
69a8: gtsug na nor bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rab tu spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun nas kun du sangs rgyas kyi// ning 'di'i snying po dang pa ste/ mos dang
69b1: brtson 'grus stobs de bzhin/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul can zhes bya bzab pa'i snying po gnas med lang rnam pa du mar ston pa zhes bya ba nga/
69b2: re 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sa 'di kun gyi brten pa bzhin// byang chub sems la kun brten kyang // gnas pa med cing 'gro 'di med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// sa gsungs so/
69b3: nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// namakha'
69b4: kun du gnas med pa/ de bzhin rtog bral dri mi sems/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// shes bzhin smon lam dbang gis ni/ mngal 'byung rim pa gang yin dang / zhing dang shing du so songs /
69b5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'dir ni yang dag bal thugs 'dzin// gzhan nu'i ril pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gci gnas yang dag stan/
69b6: thams cad rdo rje'i reng bzhin las// rnal 'byor bas na rtag tu smos// 'dir ni sdon chad ma byung med// sngon gnas pa ni slar me bya// de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad pa ni// thams cad rje rje'i dngas gzhil// dus gsum lam gyi mthar/
69b7: pas thams cad 'di bzhin blta bar bya// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi gas pagasang pa 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par bya sa
69b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par ros pastan pa'i le skye bcu lnga pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ldan pa drim med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skabs bcu mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya
70a1: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par ma rtog mi dmigs pa// rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa yis/ snying po sgyu ma'i sdang ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
70a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po kun du bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yang dag kun rdzob dag pa/
70a3: la// brtan g.yor bcas pa'i snang ba ni// rang bzhin med pa nyid du snang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rnam par brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
70a4: snying po yang dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems nyid rgyu ma'i rnam pa dngos// de nyid kun rdzob stong nyid do// byang chub tshul
70a5: 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sgyu mar ston pa'i rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi yas
70a6: 'di gsungs so/ / sna tshogs sgyu ma 'khor 'das dag/ sems nyid dag dang ma dag pa'i// snang ba bag chags khyad par nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tho
70a7: gros rgya mtshos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yid bzhin nor bu rang las rnyed// de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi gsapa// bla ma
70a8: sangs rgyas drin gyis rnyed/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag skyes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes
70b1: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la// yod med mtha' las 'das pa ste/ mi rtog ye shes kun rdzob nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs/
70b2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho sku
70b3: gsum 'dul ba'i zhing / / ma lus lus pa med pa rnams// thams cad byang chub sems kyi rgyan// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pas bkra shis dga'
70b4: bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / e ma ho stong gsum ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' sku la rdzogs// thams cad baspu'i tshogs las kyang // spros
70b5: nas byang chub kyi se 'di gsungs so/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes pa chen pos yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
70b6: sems 'di gsungs so/ / e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang ba bde chen byang chub sems// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul mchog ste// snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
70b7: bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi tshul 'di gsungs so/ / e ma ho sangs
70b8: rgyas kun gyi gsapa/ / skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid na'ang skye ba med// gsang ba'i tshul chen bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan pa sangs
71a1: rgyas thabs 'thob ma mas pa'i dbyings la ya dag pa dang bas pa'i rjel zhe byab ting 'dzin pa snyoms par thubs te byung chu kyisems 'digasas so/ / mnyos sa rgyas can gyigasangs
71a2: gnas pa med las gnas pa 'chos/ / gnas tsam nyid na gnas pa med// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis 'byung bas sangs rgyas thams cad kya
71a3: nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma he rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs tsam nyid na
71a4: dmigs pa med/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa'i chu klung skems pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
71a5: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / e ma he ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 'gro 'od med las 'gro dang 'od// 'gro nyid na'ang 'gro ba med// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
71a6: ba pad ma'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / e ma he rtog pa rang 'byung ba// rtog tsam nyid na'ang rtog
71a7: mi gnas/ / tha dad med pa'i tshul mchog gis// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bus rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rol
71a8: pa lding ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bcings pa med cing grol du'ang med// lhan cig skyes pa na ma rol pa// ye shes brjod pa dang bral ba/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan
71b1: bu'o/ / sa gsungs so// nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyis nor dun chu mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms par thugs te byang chub
71b2: byas papa 'di gsungs so/ / chos kun yod med / sa bzab pa'i gnas nyid la/ brjod pam nyid na brjod du med/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'byung gnams pas
71b3: rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'khor los sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / don dam rtog pa'i yul min phyir// chos su ye shes ngo bo nyid// rang rig ye shes smra ma'i/
71b4: dngos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan bde spros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rnga sgra kun du sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
71b5: sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal po dpung bcas yan lag ldan// pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa bzhin// ye shes rgyal po stobs chen ldan// dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pas byin
71b6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi gaN Di phyogs bcur sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / theg pa sna tshogs drang ba'i phyir// lam 'di rim par bstan pa yi na gas
71b7: ba'i theg pa gcig pa nyid/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dung 'bu dang rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting
71b8: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / e ma ho rmad tu byung ba'i chos// gsar chen theg pa mchog gcig pu// ma lus dus gsum rgyal ba'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje'i rgyan
72a1: gzigs pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas dang / spyod yul dang / zab pa dang / rgya che ba'i de kho na nyid chos
72a2: nyid nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dang las ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos zag
72a3: pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la smras pa/ gang du dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa'i
72a4: chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos yin te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa'o// rten 'brel las skyes pa'i chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dmigs su med
72a5: pa ste/ gnas pa med cing rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid de de yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis su dbyer med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems
72a6: dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi rtog pa yongs su chod nas legs so legs so zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
72a7: ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i me tog de bzhin gshegs
72a8: pa thams cad kyi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yongs su dag par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ rang sems dri
72b1: ma bkra bar bya/ dag pa'i thugs ni ye shes che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das don legs sems pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul dag pa'i gsang ba
72b2: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / pha rol phyin nam dag pa'i gnas// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i thun mong yul// snying po dgyes pa'i rtsa ba ste// byang chub tshul 'di
72b3: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sprini sprob rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
72b4: gsungs so/ / gsang ba chos nyid dag pa nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul mchog gis// 'gro ba'i blo yis mun sel ba// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das blo grags pa'i dpal de bzhin
72b5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / phyi dang nang du dngos po'i chos// du ma nyid tu mi rtog ste// thams cad brten pa'i tshul
72b6: 'byung ba/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das spobs pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
72b7: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang bzhin rtog pa'i tshogs 'byung ba// rnam par brtags pa rang byung gang / sems gsum snang ba'i dang du dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
72b8: rdo rje rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa yi// rnal 'byor pa ni byang chub mchog/
73a1: smos bcas spros med na ba dag gis// gas ba spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phan par bzhed pa rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po khyab pa'i ye shes kun du 'phrul
73a2: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni gang du rnam shes dang // ye shes gnyis su med pa ste// kun gzhi rtog pa med par gas la// byang chub rten 'brel tshul bstan/
73a3: ba'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rol par ldan pa'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
73a4: ji srid nam mkha' stong pa min// rang sems stong nyid nam mkha' las// rtogs pa'i ye shes stong nyid de// kun ston tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang bral ba'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams
73a5: cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i drabs yongs su 'grel pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po med cing rang stong pa// bde chen phyi nang dmigs med pa// ro gcig ye shes snum
73a6: rmagazhen med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi snying po dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
73a7: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang zag dang ni chos dag la// bdag med rtogs phyi sems dpa' che// sa la gnas dang rigs kyi dang / logs spyong dul di bstan pa'o/ nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe sbyin dpa las
73a8: rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa bzang po'i brgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du chos don snying po ni// rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung ba yi/ zab mo gter
73b1: 'dra rang la dang / gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das na bu'i 'a byung gnas rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che rkyen du mang ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//
73b2: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor dbang phyug du ma yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa'i tshul kun la// rang gzhan khyad par den 'byung bas// spyod pa'i tshul mchog ldan pa ste// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas
73b3: bcom ldan 'das skye dbang mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang 'byung ba snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rab rib med pa'i tshul can gyis// drang srong skyob pa'i spyod
73b4: gnas te/ / thub pa mngon par nges 'byung ba'i// yon tan tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das stobs kyis gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par 'byung ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
73b5: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thog ma med cing tha ma med// dbus su 'byung ba yang dag spangs// ye shes nye bar brgyan pa gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das thog nas
73b6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa kun du bzang po ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ri bo sna tshogs 'dus pa la// ri rgyal brtan par 'gyur ba gang / rtog
73b7: med ldan po'i gnasas so/ / nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'i ni ga gsungs so// denas bcom ldan 'das gdugs mdzes pa rdo nga sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par
73b8: dugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings// kun du rtog med lham mer gnas// de nyid rab tu mi gnas pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
74a1: gtso bo mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang phyug spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// shing dbang drung ni rdo rje can// mi 'gyur ye shes e dang baM// pad ma d+ha
74a2: ga'i dbyings can te/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//
74a3: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yul gyur pa// chos kun bdag med mnyam pa nyid// zab mo'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
74a4: dpal sang ge'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du bdag gzhan tha dad med/
74a5: byams pa chen po'i snang ba yis// mi byed chos ni don grub rgyu// sems kyi spyod tshul 'di bstan no// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ldan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du mar me tog rgyas pa cher
74a6: ba'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yang dag ye shes bzang po nyid// rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i blo yi nor// bdud rtsi'i snying po rang las rnyed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
74a7: gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas ye shes snyun grub pas// 'di nyid rtog med rab gsal ba// bsam pa'i dngos po 'jug mi 'gyur// sems kyi kun tog rab zhi ba'o// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
74a8: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las rab tu mi gnas pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i 'od de bzhin
74b1: gshegs pa thams cad kyis gdug pa can ma lus pa 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / shin tu rgyal ba dri ma med// sems kyi glang po bcing mi bya// rang grol gsal
74b2: bdag pa'i lam/ / rgyal bas tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa bskyed pa snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
74b3: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste// chos kyi phung po de snyed las// rtog pa'i ye shes gyur pa na// tshul 'di gcig pu bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog gi rib
74b4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thog ma bar dang tha mar yang // byang chub mchog tu gnas pa
74b5: nyid/ / nges pa bskyed pa 'byung ba yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das klu dga' ye shes 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
74b6: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bde gshegs ye shes gdung rgyud ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'dzin// 'byung po du ma lam la 'dzud// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu
74b7: grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khru mchog rlabs po che'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang sems rgyal po rang 'byung gnas// shar nub med pa'i nyim
74b8: las/ / teg med cing yang gsal ba nyid// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das stobs kyi lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
75a1: la snyoms par zhugs te thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bskung ba// thob pa'i khyad bapar sems las byung // 'di ni dus gsum kun du byung byang chub zab
75a2: nga'i tshul bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das zeng ldan yon tan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dpal rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi
75a3: sems 'di gsungs so/ / dkyil 'khor du ma gsal ba yi// yon tan rin chen tshogs spo ba// phyi dang nang du rnam bye bas// ye shes zab pa'i tshul brjod pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ku'i lagasangs
75a4: rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni sdang ba blang med pa// rgyun du rang sems chos kyi klongad// rgyun mi 'chad pachos
75a5: kyi phra/ snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa zhis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan brgyad pa'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dag pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
75a6: 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog pa// gsal ba brjod bral thams cad mkhyen// 'od gsal snying po ye shes su/ spros pa med pa'i tshul bstan pa'i zhes gsungs sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par spangs
75a7: ba'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so sor ma 'dres pa dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khyab dang rdordo'i sku nyid dang / mi 'gyur dus ni thams cad du/ btan
75a8: pa med par rang 'byung gnas/ / zla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das zil gnon rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge
75b1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa// spyod yul thabs la mkhas pa yis// rnam par grol ba'i 'bras thob pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de
75b2: nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes la rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba ro gcig rdorje 'chang// gsang ba
75b3: gsum ni bu gsung thugs/ / de nyid sngar ni rab bklags pa// dam pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par dben pa'i rdo rje zhes
75b4: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / lus dang ngag dang yid rnams ni// rdo rje gsum du rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
75b5: zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bden par gsung pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'od kyi dra bar 'char ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs
75b6: rdzas kyu ni kun khyab pas/ / de nyid su la rab snang ba// zhing khams rdul bran grur 'dus pa// mi zad tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dag pa yongs
75b7: su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas gsung ni kun sgrogs pa// de ni gsung du rab brjod pa/ sna tshogs sgra ni gsung gyur pa// de ni gsung
75b8: gcig tshul bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gnas pa med pa'i ye shes 'thung ba rdo jo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
76a1: 6/ par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas thugs ni bsam mi khyab// ye shes mkhyen pa gcig pa'i thugs// dri med mnyam pa nyid gang yin// rtog med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs//
76a2: so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes rdo rje mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mnyam nyid
76a3: gnas pas blang dor med/ / dus gsum tha dad gzigs pa med// skad cig ye shes bde ba'i dngos// chos nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od mi zad pas sangs rgyas thams cad
76a4: kyis phas kyi rgol ba zlog par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpa' bo seng ge'i lta stangs kyis// mu stegs bdud tshogs las rgyal ba'i// tshad med
76a5: snying rjes bskul bar bya/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen rtog gis chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
76a6: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rdo rje 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba// ye shes zla ba la gnas pa// byang chub sems ni 'dzin pa yis// dri med chu rgyun tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas sangs rgyas the tsom rnam par spangs pas sangs
76a7: rgyas thams cad kyi me tog gi snye ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gcig tu mchog gnas mi 'gyur ba// tshig don dbye ba dam pa'i chos// bstan pa'i snying po bla med
76a8: lam/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus la// rab 'byams mchod pa'i sprin gyis ni// kun du khyab cing ston pa po// 'di ni ye shes kun gyi gter// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
76b1: kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las 'byung 'jug gnas par dag pa kun du ye shes ston pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o/ /
76b2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
76b3: mtshan rnams rdzogs pa ye shes su// dngos po med cing snang ba'i dngos// rtog pa med pa mi gnas pa// khyad par tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rnam par mthong bsangs rgyas
76b4: thams cad kyi skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par grol ba zhi ba'i lam// bcing med ye shes bkod ma'i chu// dam tshig gsang ba sdom
76b5: ba las/ / gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs par mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
76b6: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rtog med 'bras bu dag pa'i dang // chos rnams stong nyid snying rjer gcig/ tha dad spangs pa lam gyi mchog/ zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom
76b7: ldan 'das me tog rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bla ma'i byin brlabs bdud rtsi las// 'thung
76b8: ba ye shes bcud kyis rgyas/ / tshe 'dir grub pa mchog ster ba// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri dbang gi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ston pa'i
77a1: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dam tshig 'di ni mang po che/ dus gsum 'byung ba rtag pa gang / thams cad bdag nyid bde bar gshegs/ snying po'i tshul 'di bstan
77a2: pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa spyod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
77a3: 'di gsungs so/ / rnam pa kun du sdom pa gang // rigs kyi gnas su gang gyur pa// sku gsung thugs ni ye shes can// dra ba ma lus tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad
77a4: gzigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams ma lus pa la byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thams cad ye shes gcig par sdom// de nyid 'gyur med zag
77a5: pa bral/ / snying po rol pa rang byung gi sangs rgyas tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa grags pa mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi mi long zhes
77a6: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dri med ye shes sgyu ma'i nga // phung po la sogs rtog bral ba// 'di ni kun rdzob rnam thar so// rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom
77a7: ldan 'das sgra gcan lhas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun nas ye shes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / las dang las kyi 'bras bu ni// kun nas bkres pa sna
77a8: tshogs pa/ / stong nyid ye shes mes bsregs pa// rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'khor ba sna tshogs pa'i mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
77b1: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par grol ba bde ba yi// 'jig rten lha las 'das nas ni// snang ba med pa'i dbyings su 'gro// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom/
77b2: ldan 'das rin chen snying pos srid pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'gro ba'i mtshan ma'i dngos po rnams// srid gsum rang bzhin med mthong
77b3: pas/ / ye shes 'od gsal mi byed pa'i// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du mthong gshegs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid gcig pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
77b4: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snang ba dang nano mun pa dag// rtog pa'i chos nyid gzigs med byer// tha dad snang ba nub pa'i dngos// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gang sasoso/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snar
77b5: rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos kyi lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di ni sgrib pa med pa'i lam// sdug pa rabazhi brtse ba can// byang chub sems kyi snying po nyid/
77b6: dri med tshul 'di bstan pa pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug rings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po mgo 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thams
77b7: cad ye shes snang ba'i dngos/ / sems can rtog pa yul med phyir// gnyis sdang ma lus bcom nas ni// gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pal// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes
77b8: dbyings su gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snod bcud ma lus rin chen gzhi// lha ma'i snang ba ston pa che// thub pa 'gro ba'i don spyod pa'i ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsus
78a1: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'phro ba med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lus la 'pho ba'i ye shes
78a2: gang / rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brten nas// gcig pu mi 'gyur dngos med sems// rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bko pa zhes bya ba'i ting
78a3: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dang po'i lus ni lha yi dngos// lus dben snang ba rten 'brel te/ sems nyid ye shes stong nyid de// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
78a4: skar mkhan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje snang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di ni kun rtog ye shes che// bde ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las// zug rngu thal ba byang chub
78a5: sems/ / rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs mi zad pa'i ye shes chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
78a6: 'di gsungs so/ / gang du gnyis med mnyam pa'i dngos// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// mi zad phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi// dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen rgyal pos sangs
78a7: rgyas thams sa kyi can tu mcho par sa dpa zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdag gzhan dbyer med byang chub sems// bde ba chen po sems la rnyed// ngal so riganas ni bla na med//
78a8: dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis// su gsung thugs ni gcig sbyor ba// byang chub sems dpa chen rnams kyis// rjes su bsngags pa brjod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
78b1: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/ /
78b2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du srog dang snying po med/
78b3: gnas pa med cing kun 'byung ba// bar mdo yi rnam shes ltar// 'byung ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das srid mtha' gzigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
78b4: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dbang po yul la rnam spro ba// de nyid bzlo ga te sems gnas pa// lam du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom
78b5: ldan 'das glog gi 'ong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba ye shes 'od kyis ni// rtog pa'i drim nam sel ba// de nyid nam grol
78b6: bstan pa gang / gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od chos ma lus pa rnam par 'byor pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs
78b7: tebyang rgya ces mas 'dig kyangs so/ / de meng kun grub legs rang 'thung ba/ 'o gas la tses dkyi sa snying po blan med// chos nyid chos nanA byer med pa de bache/ mnyas ci gnas pa tshul 'di ba stan pa'o zhes gas sa so/
78b8: bcom ldan 'dab de bzhin gshegs pas sing gas byin pasangs mas kyi kun su mtshogs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyisems 'dig sungs so// mnyas nyid pa
79a1: pa'i ngo bo nyid/ / dag pa'i sa yi dbang phyug gang // rdzogs pa'i gtsug tor dam tshig che// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// sa gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan sangs
79a2: rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi rang bzhin thugs// dus gsum sangs rgyas skye med
79a3: ngo bor mnyam/ / rnal 'byor rang sems gcig pur gnyis su med// khyad par med pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas sangs rgyas mchog dga' grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang ba
79a4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snying po sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// chos nyid yongs su dag pa gag/ sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// 'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes
79a5: gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la spyod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
79a6: sangs rgyas gsang ba gnyis po ni// phyogs bcul zhing khams rang la gnas// nga nyid tog med ye shes smra// 'di na byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ sa gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grags pa rdzogs pas sangs rgyas thams
79a7: da kyi gdum bya'i steng ba dris par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / lus me dbang po phrag gnas shing/ ring du 'gro zhing gcig bur d+ha// gdul par dka' ba'i
79a8: sems 'dul byed/ / 'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsnyems pa dang bral bas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i tong nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so
79b1: ldan sa gsum 'grub pa'i gzhi/ / yon tan 'byung gnas rin chen sems// bsam pa'i dgos 'dod skong byed la// khyad par tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mchod 'os lhas sangs rgyas tham
79b2: cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khyab bdag dpal ldan rdo rje'i sgra// 'di nyid lus ni dri ma med// chos can mgrub rang sar dag/ byang chub tshul 'di
79b3: bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po zhes bya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi g.yo ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
79b4: so/ / phung po la sogs dngos med pa// gang zag bdag med stong pa nyid// ches la dmigs pa rtog pa bral// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od sangs
79b5: rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ril por 'dzin pa bsdu ba dang // rjes su gzhig pa spro ba nyid// gnyis med bsam gtan la
79b6: gnas pa/ / gcig po byed pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das spos dri zhim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid bde ba chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
79b7: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes bde ba chen po'i dang // rtag tu bzhugs pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang 'byung 'gyur med snying po che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mchog 'dzin
79b8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dri med sgyu ma'i chos nyid ni// yod med tha dad las 'das pa// snang la rang bzhin med pa
80a1: nyid/ / 'gag med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang rnam par bral bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi blo'i mun pa sel ba ye shes kyi rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
80a2: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di nyid rang bzhin mi dmigs pas// yongs su dag par shes par bya// zung 'jug de bzhin nyid las ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
80a3: 'das seng ge'i 'gram pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa tog med dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mnyam pa nyid las gang 'byung ba'i//
80a4: bde chen rang 'byung rang nyid ni// mi zad rgyal gyi 'khor lo ste// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis med mnyam pa rang byung rdo rje zhes
80a5: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba rang 'byung brtan g.yo bcas// thams cad rang nyid dkyil 'khor dang // bde chen zab pa'i tshul rdo rje byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
80a6: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das skyon rab zhi pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtag tu dmigs par bcas pa yi// phyag rgya chen po dngos/
80a7: med de// dngos meng ngo bo nyid tu dag/ rin chen tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'chang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig 'phrul ston po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
80a8: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// kur
80b1: du bzang pos slar gsol pa/ / dri med mnyam pa ye shes sku// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de// gnas dang ston pa rang byung ba// che ba'i bdag nyid slar gnas pa// dpal mchog gsang ba 'di nyid tu// skal ldan rgyal ba
80b2: bla na med ces gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rang 'byung du bstan pa'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor chen po gnyis
80b3: bu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las le'u nyi shu pa'o/ / // de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs cas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bcas dpag med dang // rnal 'byor dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'
80b4: tshogs/ / rig dang lha mor bcas pa dpag med dang // khro bo'i rgyal po du mar bcas pa dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus byas nas// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gno// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i bdag
80b5: po la/ / tshogs pa 'dus pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis dpag med ldan// mchod pa'i rim pa phyi nang gsang ba dang // de kho na nyid rnam pa mtha' yas pas// ye shes rgyal ba mi zad dam tshig gi/
80b6: rin chen sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de// mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol// phyogs bcu dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// ma lus 'dus pa kun gyi gsang ba'i don// thog ma dbus mthar
80b7: gnas pa ye shes so/ / gsang ba rdo rje snying po lhan cig skyes// brjod bya bla med gyur pas 'dus pa'i chos// snying po'i 'bras bu kun gyi rtsa ba gang // thabs dang bstan pa de yi khyad par med// bcom ldan dri med gsang ba bshad tu
80b8: gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ dpal ldan byang chub sems rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams la// gsang ba byang chub bka' stsal to// phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ rab tu gzigs nas
81a1: dgyes gyur pas/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gnas 'di zhus pa shin tu legs// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// zab cing rgya che mchog gi yul// 'on kyang 'dir ni bde gshegs kyang / the tsom 'jug pa'i
81a2: gnas yin na/ / de las gzhan par gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshogs// de las spyod yul lta ci smos// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad// mchog don ngo mtshar spyod pa dang // thun mong gnas la smad gyur pa// zab pa dang ni n+ya che
81a3: la/ / the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor sa yi bdag po la// 'di skad ces ni zhus par gyur// gnas dang dus dang phyag rgya dang // 'dus pa khyad par gyur pa la'ang // gsang ba dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// tshad med ye shes zhing khams kyi//
81a4: snang ba rab tu rgyas pa la// rgyu thabs khyad par gyur pa yi// gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi gsang // de nyid 'dus pa 'di mchog tu// ston pa 'gro bar ma gyur pa// de srid du ni kun mkhyen gyis// lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dus pa las// lus ngag
81a5: yid ni byin brlab cing / / khyad par mchog dbang bskur mdzad de// phyi nang gsang ba'i rim bye bas// bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes de bzhin du// rab tu bskur bas smin byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba
81a6: byang chub sems rdo rje/ / rtogs dka' mi byed dam tshig gis// gang phyir dgongs te bshad pa dang / dgongs min drang ba'i den gyur dang // des don ji bzhin pa dang ni// ji bzhin ma yin nam bye bas// yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don// sras pa gsum
81a7: dang mthar thug gnyis/ / dang po gcig dang tshul gnyis ldan// dpag med rdo rje'i tshig gi rgya// des phyir rab tu ston pa nyid// 'jug pa de dag lus ngag yid / rim pa gnyis kyis bde ba dang // yid bde rab tu myong bgyid pa// thabs zab rgya che cur
81a8: ba'i lam/ / yan lag dam tshig ldan pa yi// thob bya thob byed khyad par ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mkhyen pa'i ye shes tha med pa// mngon par byang chub gnas gyur pa'i// 'bras bu yang dag thob gyur nas// gsang ba'i rgyud
81b1: san ma / des gal ba ga zu sa// de sa pa ma sa// gags rnyan zha ga/ gas nga na pa / ga/ sa pa ba dpas/ nang/
81b2: dpag med zil gnon rdo rje zhes// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po de// 'od gsal dri med dbyings nyid la// ye shes 'jug pa'i ngo bo y-is// dbyer med gnas par gyur ma thag/ rdo rje'i lus kyi rtsa gnas
81b3: ni/ / stong phrag bdun bcu la sogs pa// rtsa yi bug khong stong dag/ thig le zhu ba'i gzugs kyis ni// byang chub rdo rje'i rnam par ni// zhu zhing yang dag gnas par gyur// de nyid chos bu'i nga bo nyid// bde dang stong bar dbyer med pa// snying rje tshad
81b4: med rnam pa las/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje// rnam par dben don nyid du gnas// sgyu ma sbyong ba'i dam tshig dang // mngon par byang chub 'od gsal ba'i// stong nyid rdo rje
81b5: rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ rig pa thabs dang shes rab dag/ dbyer med bde ba chen po'i sku// skyes bu'i rnam par gyur pa dag/ gnas pa'i dang las ldang ba ste// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // yul dang dngos po
81b6: rnam dag pa'i/ / sku gsung thugs ni byin brlabs pa// ye shes chen po'i dang gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba// sprin dkar dag pa'i tshul can nyid// de ma
81b7: thag tu snang bar mdzad/ / byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes zhugs pa// mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang // rang 'byung ye shes lhag pa'i lha// thams cad bdag po rdo rje 'dzin// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// sna tshogs rin chen gyi
81b8: brgyan cing / / in dra ni la 'bar ba dang // dang po mgon po rnam par sprul// dung dang kun d+ha ltar dkar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rnam pa gsal ba nyid tu gzigs/ de
82a1: nas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/ / rnam par snad badzang chen po nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// 'dod chags kyis 'dul 'gro gzigs nas// 'dod chags gas pa'i tshul zhes pa'i/ ting nge 'dzinas
82a2: snyoms zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// bkod pa rab tu mi bzad pa// de dag thams cad bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi sku la thim par mdzad// de nas 'dus pa'i lha tshogs kyis// dbyer med gnas pa'angang las ni//
82a3: rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag/ yongs su mnyes pa'i don du ni// nyid kyi sku las spros pa yi// ba spu'i bu ga'i 'od zer gyis// rtse mo rnams las spros gyur pa// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyan dang mAm rminas/
82a4: pa/ ra mo dang sgrol ma dang / gzugs dang bla dang dri dang ro// / reg bya rdo rjer gyur pa yis// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // tshad med yul dang spyod pa yis// chags pa chen pos rjes chags nas// bde ba'i rol ba ston par mdzad// rnam par
82a5: snang mdzad ye shes che/ / de nyid me long sogs bdag nyid// gsang ba 'dzin pa thub pa'i rgyal// rdo rje mi bskyod rgyal po nyid// gsang ba 'dzin pa ma lus pa'i// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyal// snying po rdo rje ye shes so// de nyid rdo rje btsun mo
82a6: rnams/ / gcig tu gyur pa'i mkha' dbyings ni// dam tshig chen po'i mkha' dbyings te/ rnyog pa med cing rdul med pa'i// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byin brlabs pa// phyogs mtshams mnyam par ldan pa la// grub pa'i gnas brgyad yongs
82a7: bskor ba/ / zhing khams yongs su dag pa yi// 'dzam gling pad ma'i lte ba la// sna tshogs mi shigs e dang baM// gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du rgyas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab// 'od zer 'phro
82a8: bamang po 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa po// dkyil 'khor nyi shuH lnga ga/ sum bcu gsum par ldan pa yis//
82b1: pho brang yangs pa'i gzhal yas der// de bzhin gshegs pa stong dang ni// gnyis dang byang chub sems dpar bcas// phyi rol 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dbus su yang dag bzhugs
82b2: gyur pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// mi bskyod pa dang dkon mchog dpal// tshe dpag med dang gdon miza// dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad stsogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i rgyal// de nyid sku gsung
82b3: thugs ye shes/ / phrin las ldan par bzhugs pa'o// de nas rang bzhin dag pa yi// chos kyi dbyings na gnas 'gyur ba/ dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i// sems can khams kyi snod bcud dang // yul dang dbang po thams
82b4: tsadakun/ / rdo rje sems dpas byin brlabs shing // dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyis ni dbang bsgyur bas// de dag thob pa'i khyab par ni// tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams la/ bde ba dang ni yid bde bas// gsang
82b5: ba ye shes spyod yul thob/ / de las sprul pa'i sku byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid thugs kha nas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag med pa// bye ba grangs med dkye nas ni// gdul bya gdul phyir dbang bskur zhing // spyi dang khyad par
82b6: gyis 'dul 'gyur/ / de nas sangs rgyas tshogs dag gis// bskul bas ched du brjod pa gsungs// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// byang chub sems ni rang byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu rtog med/
82b7: mi gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sgra bzhi ye shes ro gcig pas/ mdzad pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// rab 'byam tsho 'phrul ston pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nges par sprul pas rgyud nges par
82b8: bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / phyi rol yul snang rdzas su 'dod// g.yag rnga ne'u sing lta bu la// bar du snang mun shod pa tsam// sems las tha dad par gnas pa// skad cig mi rtag par 'dod pas// yul sems tha dad bye
83a1: brag swa/ / phyi rol yul dag phra ba rnams// 'dus nas rigs pa 'byung ba ltar// yul dus rnam par nges pa las// rigs pa 'dra ba'i rnam par bzhag/ yul 'gag pa yi tha ma dang // shes pa skye ba'i thog mar zad
83a2: bar 'dod pa grub pa'i mtha'/ / mdo sde pa yi dgongs pa smra// chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems// rnam par rig tsam skad cig ma// rang gsal rgyun gnas spros bral 'dod// rang rig skad cig gsal ba dang / mi
83a3: gsal sna tshogs tog bral du/ / rnam med rnal 'byor spyod pa smra// dngos rnams stong pa sgyu ma bzhin// snang yang bdag las rang stong pa// sems kyi rtog pa rnam bzlog ste// mkha' dbyings dri med rtog rgyun 'chang//
83a4: 'di ltar srid pa zhi ba las// rnam grol stong nyid snying rje dang / dbyer med byang chub sems kyi mchog/ zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa// dpal ldan 'dus 'dir grub mtha' kun// blo yi rim pas 'dir 'dus te// de bas
83a5: 'dir ni chos kun gyi/ / snying po 'dus pa'i rtsa bar gsungs// gsang ba bla na med pa'i don// ye shes rnam gsum rim 'jug cing // sgron me 'od gsal snang ba las// zung 'jug rdo rje mi byed pa// lha yi 'khor lo sprul
83a6: nas ni/ / dbyer med mi g.yo ting nge 'dzin// mchog ni dri med rang snang las// gnyis med dang du rab zhugs pa'o// byang chub sems kyi dang nyid las// rtag tu 'od gsal bar gnas kyang // 'gro ba'i don las mi 'da' bas//
83a7: dam tshig 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub sems kyi za ma tog/ bde ba can ni mi shigs pa// rin chen 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// 'gro ba kun la ster ba ni// ma chags pa yi ye shes kyis//
83a8: 'dod chags 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma las/ gdon mi za ba gnas med pa// 'od gsal 'bras bu mngon phyogs pa/ dam tshig 'byung bi ra ting nge 'dzin// zag pa med pa'i dga' ba yis// ye shes chen//
83b1: ra sa khyab pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes gyur pa'i// dam tshig bla med ting nge 'dzin/ yang dag ye shes nor bu ltar// rin can 'da' gro sprin tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su yang / nyes byed rdo rje'i
83b2: 'din/ zag pa bsdus byas bde b.las// bcu drug 'gyur rjes ldang 'phags pa// dod chags rjes su 'dzin byed pa// chags par byed pa'i 'dzin// ga su thugs ni rdo rjelas// mi byed 'od ga la ba thim pa/
83b3: b+h+ra mra sru ba rdo rje nyid/ snang ba bim pas ting nge 'dzin// ye shes me long lta bu las// srid gsum snang bar mdzad pa ste// snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo ni// mizeng sku yi ting nge 'dzin// snang ba gsum las 'das pa yi rang
83b4: bzhin mngon par byang chub pa/ / rnam par dag pa rdo rje yi// 'od gsal ba yi ting nge 'dzin// srid zhi mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sku// chos rnams gnyis med ro gcig pas// rin po che ltar byung ba'i gnas// yon tan gter
83b5: gyur ting nge 'dzin/ / phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// gang las 'od gsal chos kyi sku// mngon par byang chub pa yi tshul// mi phyed rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin// bla med mngon par byang chub pa// gsang balhan cig
83b6: skyes pa yi/ / ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin// rtogs pa'i ye shes mchog tu 'gyur// chos nyid mi zad dbyings kyi dang // sdang stong tha dad med pa ste// ro gcig 'du 'bral med pa nyid// stong dang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin// chos rnams
83b7: thams cad bdag med pas/ / kun du stong zhing ma bcos pa// lhun grub rdo rje'i ngang gnas pa// phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// 'od gsal 'bar ba rdo rje yis//
83b8: dpag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin// snang ba'i dngos po sna tshogs pa/ sgyu ma rkyen skyes zil gnon pa// rdo rje 'od gsal ting nge 'dzin// dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje can// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de dag dang //
84a1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' bas khyab cing dgyes pa chen po yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba gsum gyi dngos// de rje 'dzin pas 'di gsungs so// dka' thub sdom pa mi bzang bas//
84a2: lus skams gyur cing sdug bsngal gyur// sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs te// de las dngos grub gzhan du gyur// brjod pa thams cad yi ge ste// kun gyi rtsa ba a las byung // de las chos kyi phung po ni// brgyad khri bzhi
84a3: stong dag tu snang / / dbyangs dang gsal byed ngag yin te// ngag ni rlung gi rtsa ba can// slar snang tsam nyid kun rdzob ste// thim pa don dam brjod pa'o// yang gnas 'di la sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i
84a4: yul la rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes gnyis su med par spyad pa spyod par byed de/ / rang rig pa'i ye shes sgyu ma dang mtshungs pas spyad pa spyod par byed do// 'di ltar chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang //
84a5: brnyan dang // brag cha dang // dri za'i grong khyer dang / chu zla dang // smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / sprin dang / mig yor dang / klog dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sgyu ma'i rnam par blta ste/ de lta na yang don dam pa ni rnam par dmigs su
84a6: med do/ / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir rten 'brel tshogs pa'i snang ba dgag tu med do// de yang dag par bden pas stong pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
84a7: 'dus pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' ba'i yid kyis dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la legs so legs so/ / gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyod pa ngo mtshar zhing rmad tu rang zung b.rab tu bstan pa gas 'i spyod yul la dgongs te rang rang gi stan
84a8: la gnas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus ba rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dman pa'i spyod pa las ring shing lam
84b1: bde ba chen pos ye shes la rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gas/ gsang ba gsum du gnas pa gang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngor// gsang ba rab tu gyur pa gsungs// gsang
84b2: ba'i yi ga togs dka'ag la 'ongs skye ba gdul srad du/ dkyil 'khor lharnams thams cad kyi// byin klas pa rim pas bstan// me yi rnam pas rgya mo sbyan// ba ginam pa bdag mar brjod/ pa ni mogs dkang /
84b3: yi rnam pa sgrol mar brjod// shA ni byang chub sems rje rje// tA ni shes rab pa rol phyin// me long ye shes e zhes brjod// ka ni mi bskyod rdo rje ste// sprin zhes don yod grub pa nyid// rin chen 'byung bas zhes bya/ 'od dpag med pa
84b4: ma zhes brjod/ / rtag pa'i rdo rje ye shes pa'o// b+ha ni dri yi rdo rje ma'o// yi ge ga ni re rdo rje// bAn ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma'o// sa yi rnam pa reg rdo rje// rba ni sgra yi rdo rje ma// ta ni chos dbyings rdo rje yi// thA ni sgrib pa rnam par sel// ga ni 'jig
84b5: rten dbang phyug brjod/ / yi ge ta ni sa snying po'o// kA ni nam mkha'i snying po ste// ya ni phyag na rdo rjer gnas// bAka ni kun du bzang po'o// tsi ta ni byams par brjod par bya// ta ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste// hri da ya ni snying po nyid// ba ni dbyug
84b6: sngon can du grags/ / dza ni stobs chen 'bar ba ste// yo ni mi g.yo gtum po'o// shing ni bya ba nan tan te// b+ha ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o// ge ni gtsug tor 'a bor los sgyur// shA ni bgegs mthar byed pa ste// bi ni shes rab mthar byed do//
84b7: dzani gshin rje mthar byed ni/ ha ni mthar byed pad ma 'dzin// ra ni so sor rtog pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba// phung po lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga// 'byung bzhi lha mo bzhi ru brjod// yul lnga 'dod yon lha mo lnga// rnam shes brgyad ni
84b8: byang chub sems/ / lus tshigs la gnas khro rgyal bcu// bsdus pa ye shes lngar sbyor ba// bde ba chen po'i ye shes ni// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi dngos// mig dang mi yis gnas pa las// de nyid kyis ni sbyor ba yis// de las
85a1: gyur pa'i grangs rnams kyi/ / dkyil 'khor de snyed rnams su gyur// phyogs dang gdengs ka gdong ba dang // ris byed rigs kyis bye ba gang // rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa ste// gzhan du 'bros pa'i dkyil 'khor yin//
85a2: gnas bzung ste/ rim bzhin du// de bzhin ha yi bar dag gra// de dag sna tshogs spyad gyur pa// stong phrag sum bcu'i bdag nyid do// thabs dang shes rab ngo bo nyid// rjong zag sum bcu rtsa bar 'gyur// rba ba'i d+had dang bshad
85a3: dang / / cha 'thun yan lag rgyud gyur pas// de dag sde dang bcas pa yis// gsang chen rgyud sder brjod par bya// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad tu// lha 'di rnams ni thog mar bzhugs// 'di min kyad rnams gsang chen kun/
85a4: rnal 'byor rgyud ces rgyas btab pa'o// mdo sde rnams la gnas sogs pa// thun mong dbye bas bye ba nyid// yi ge bzhi ni thun mong du// bsdus pas chos kyi bdag nyid can// mdo kun yul du gyur pa'o// gsang ba'i gnas
85a5: kyi mtshan nyid ni/ / nyan thos rang rgyal la sogs pas// rnam pa kun du ma bshad de// 'di skad bdag ces dang por brjod// dus gcig dus gsum skad cig ste// ston pa rang 'byung che ba'i sku// de bzhin gshegs pa bde
85a6: bar gshegs/ de bzhin du ni rtag gshegs la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes// pad ma'i ming can btsun mo'i gnas// dar ni mngon par bzhugs par mdzad// btsun mo rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rin chen chos dang bcas//
85a7: pa yi// rdo rje las kyi sems mar brjod// de dag kun gyi bde ba'i gnas// bskyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // yul rnams thams cad rten pa'i
85a8: gzhi/ / yang dag btsun mo'i b+ha ga der// phyogs bcu rus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// mngon par rab tu zhugs mdzad de// spro dang bsdu ba'i ngo bo nyid// rab tu mi gnas dbyer med bzhugs// mdo dang gsang bar spyod
85b1: ba'i tshul/ / don gcig na yang marmongs dang // thabs mar dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon pos dbang byas phyir// gsang sngags theg pa khyad par 'phags// gsang ba bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud// shin tu chas gsang rnal
85b2: 'byor rgyud/ / rnal 'byor bla med gsang chen no// 'di ni sku gsung thugs gsang ba// mtshan dang dpe byad rnams dang ni// brjod byed rang gi mtshad nyid de// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la
85b3: zhugs nyid dang rten par bcas pa ni/ / mkhas pa rnams la bsngags pa yin// rmongs pa de ltar 'dod pa rnams// kye dang 'jig dang gnas pa dang // rgyu gzhan rnams la des bstan pa// rtag tu rten 'brel tshul de
85b4: brjod/ 'bras bu rgyus ni rgyas btab cing // rgyal 'bras bus rgyas gdab par// bsam gyi gzhal du dngos grub ni// bskal ba bye bar yang mi 'gyur// rgyu dkun la ni gsang chen gyi// snying po phyag rgyas rgyas gdab byir/
85b5: nyid gsang ba yongs dag par// mi byed par ni bstan pa yin// sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa// sku yi gsang ba rtag pa nyid// sems can kun gyi dag la ni// gsung gi gsang ba rang byung ru// sems can kun gyi
85b6: snying la ni/ / thugs kyi gsang ba snying po bzhugs// de nyid snying po gsum ldan pa// bde gshegs snying po 'jug pa nyid// sems can sangs rgyas sgras btags so// sku yi dngos grub snang ba'i dngos// mi zad sprul pas 'gre don
85b7: spyod/ / gsung gi dngos grub brag cha ltar// brjod pa du ma'i sgra ru ston// thugs kyi dngos grub rtog pa'i tshogs// ye shes bde chen bsam mi khyab// ting 'dzin sems kyi spyod pa ni// stong nyid ye shes dngos grub bo// de nyid
85b8: byang chub sems rdorje/ / bla ma nyid tu bsdus pa yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'dzin pas dug tu 'gyur ba yin// dug nyid nye bar zhi gyur na// dag pas dug med byas pa yin// bdud rtsi rim gyis brten na
86a1: ni/ / bdud rtsinyi tu nges 'gyur yin// denyi da ba yongs shes pas// rgyud 'dir lam du gyur pa yin// sngags 'dun thabs dang shes rab ste// dbyer med de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// shes rab zlaga'i//
86a2: brdar brtags pas// dbyangs su brjod pa gsang ba'i tshul// a li bcu gnyis rten 'brel te// ma rig la sogs 'gag par bstan// ro ha ti la sogs pa dang // khyim ni bcu gnyis rlung dag ste// dus sbyor ba dang mtshungs pas/
86a3: na// lugs 'byung de nyid lugs bzlog par// de nyid yang dag rim pas bstan// ka li sum bcu rtsa bzhi po// thabs kyi yi ge pha zhes brjod// mi gtsang rdzas ni sum bcu bzhi// dag pa byang sems rang bzhin te// khams ni
86a4: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o/ / de dag pas ni ye shes che// dag pa'i dus ni dpe' byad dag/ nyis 'gyur dag gis bstan pa ste// thabs dang shes rab phrag gnyis bstan// a li shes rab ma ning bcas// 'di dag mtshan mchog
86a5: sum bcu gnyis/ / cha gnyis rab tu dbye ba yis// sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa// kla zhes bya ba chu yin te// sra zhes bya bas yin no// wa zhes bya ba me yin te/ shwa zhes bya ba rlung yin te// 'byung bzhi'i dbye ba ma ning ste/
86a6: shes dag pa chen po nyid/ dadag la mags la phyogs tsam dang // mi gsal ba nyid rgyud las 'byung // rkyen nyid tshogs gnyis rdzogs byed pa// bsod nams bla med 'bras bur 'gyur// gzhi ni khong na gnas pa'i don// sems
86a7: can kun gyi lus la gnas/ / de yod pas na 'gro kun kyang // ye shes snying po can gyur pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu ru bshad// ma ning ye shes dag pa nyid// gnyis med ye shes 'bar ba yi/ a la snang ba thabs kyi cha//
86a8: mchod pa ka sogs shes rab che// ma ning thob pa gnyis med pa'o// sbyor ba don gyi yi ge bzhi// sbas pa'i tshul du bstan pa'o// cha ni stong pa tsheg drag dang // thig les brgyan pa bde ba che// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// kun
86b1: du bzang po sems dpa' ches/ / gsang ba zab dang rgya che ba'o// lhag pa'i gsang chen rmad kyi don// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// khyad par nges shes bskyed don du// dpal ldan 'das pa res gsal
86b2: ba'i/ / bla med dgongs rgyud bshad du gsol// de nas gas ba 'dzin pa po// rdo rje 'chang ba tshul 'di dag/ rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don// gsang ba rin chen snying po gsungs// gsang chen gling bzhi'i khyad par dang / rim/
86b3: pa gleng slong gyur pa dang // gsang bar bya ba'i gzhi gang dang // gsang ba'i dam tshig nges pa dang // gsang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga dang // 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ji ltar bstan// gsang chen rnam bshad thabs dang ni// de nyid dang 'brel
86b4: brjod bya gang / / brjod byed thun mong bstan pa'i tshul// lam la 'jug pa'i dbye ba dang // gsang ba grub pa'i 'bras bu dang // gsang ba lhag pa'i lam dang ni// gsang ba mchog gi spyod pa dang // gsang chen rnam par bsdu ba'i
86b5: don/ mi 'gyur rkyen gyis ldog bya dang // dgag sgrub gsang chen 'byung ba'i tshul// phyogs dang thub pa'i rnam dbye ba'i// gsang ba 'di dag gnas zhes bya// 'di nyid 'jug pa'i tshul shes nas// grub pa sgrub pa'i tshul spyod do//
86b6: gsang ba rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dang po'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das// dpal mchog gsang ba 'dzin pa yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka'
86b7: stsal pa/ / gsang bzab pa'i rgyud 'di ru// spyod pa'i tshul 'di shes par bya// dang po'i sa ni pad ma ltar// ge sar kha dbye'i 'od 'bar ba'o// gnyis pa chu rgyun lta bu ste/ dri ma sbyong zhing 'byed par 'gyur// gsum par
86b8: tu gsal ba yi/ / 'gro ba'i snang ba ye shes sgron// bzhi pa ye shes 'od 'phro ba// nyi ma'i snying po ltar 'char ba'o// lnga pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// 'dzag dang smin cing sdud pas sbyor// drug pa sgyu ma'i gzugs brnyan
87a1: ltar/ / chos rnams rang bzhin shes pa'o// bdun pa lta ngan phyogs las ni// rgyal gyur sang ge'i rgyal po bzhin// ra bo mchog ltar tang 'dzin rgyal// da srad rlung na mar+g+ha dang // snang ba ma g.yo bar gyur pas//
87a2: bdag gi dngos por rab tu brtag/ thabs ldan byang chub sems mchog gis// don mdzad 'khor los sbyar ba'i stobs// lags thob phyir mi ldog pa'i lam// sems dpa' chen po bla ma nyid// ji srid spen ni sna tshogs
87a3: pa/ kha dog dbyibs ni tha dad pa// mkha' dbyings dag tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // de nyid du ni ldog par 'gyur// de bzhin rang bzhin thams ca ci// snang ba gsum gyi rgyun chad dngos// ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni// de nyid du ni rang
87a4: thim 'gyur/ / snang ba gsum po dag pa'i lam// rin chen sprin gyis 'gre don du// bsam pa'i tshul gyis char ba 'bebs// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i dngos// de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i yul// 'di ltar zhe sdang rnam
87a5: par dag/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/ gang du gti mug dag pa'i ngang // de ni byang chub sems dpa' yi// snang ba dag pa'i yul gyur pa// thams cad 'od gsal dang gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mngon
87a6: 'dus pa'i/ / 'od zer snang ba bsam gtan mes// dri ma ma lus sbyangs gyur pas// mngon par byang chub dag pa'o// ye shes chen po dri ma med// snang ba med cing dngos med pa'i// ma 'dres 'od kyi snang ba 'gyed// pad mo rin chen ge
87a7: sar las/ / nor bu sna tshogs sdong pos brgyan// ma rig mun sel chu bo'i rgyun// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// bde chen sa ni bcu gnyis pa// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas// rab tu mi gnas dngos med pa'o//
87a8: zung 'jug chen po dag pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa rtog med pa// sku gsum rdo rjer gcig pa'i bdag/ sar gyur pa ni bcu gsum pa// btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du// rang 'byung 'gyur ba med par bzhugs// 'phags
87b1: lam yan lag brgyad pa gang / / dbang phyug brgyad ni dag pa'i dngos// sgom pa'i lam ni 'di nyid du// lam gyi khyad par bstan pa'o// mthong lam yan lag bdun ldan pa// su gsum rtogs byer yan lag brjod//
87b2: tshogs lam dang po dag la ni// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang // smin byed dbang gis gzhi bzung bas// bum dbang lus ni lha ru ste// gsang dbang tsher ba bde ba nyid// gsum pa chos ni ye shes dran// na pa sems ni dogs
87b3: dran pa nye bar gzhag phyir brjod/ / tshogs lam bar pa nyid la ni// ting 'dzin ma skyes bskyed pa dang // skyes pa brtan phyir bogs dbyung dang // yang dag spong ba bzhi po dag/ de nyid goms par byed pa la// dgag dang bsgrub pa'i
87b4: phyogs gyur pa/ / spangs thob rim par ldan par brjod// tshogs lam chen por gyur pa dag/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhir nges pa// chu rlung rdo rje mgon po ye// mA ma kI yi rdzu 'phrul gyis// snying kha'i gnas su yang dag ldan// me rlung pad
87b5: ma mgon po yi/ / gos dkar mo yi rdzu 'phrul gyis// gyen rgyu mgrin par brjod par bye// sa rlung rin chen mgon po yi// sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// thur sel gsang bar brjod pa nyid// rlung gi dkyil 'khor lci bar
87b6: ni/ las kyi mgon po'i rigs dag pa'i// lha mo sgrol ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// me dang mnyam pa'i las shes bya// re re'ang lha mo bzhi bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi// lam du rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis brjod// gnad ni nam
87b7: pa ba'i dag ste/ lus dang dus dang yul dang ni/ rlung gi gnad du shes par bya/ dang po'i ye shes bla na med// pad ma ltar gsal rab 'bar ba// sa ni thog mar mngon par bde// rgya la ma yan lag bdun ldan pa// 'jug gnas rgyal sa
87b8: rang bzhin bcas/ / dbang gis 'jug dang rang byin brlab// phyi nang gsang ba mchog tu gyur// 'bru gsum e baM ma yar bcas// 'bras bu snying po phyag rgya che// rang bzhin med pa dag pa'i dbyings// 'od gsal mngon par byang chub pa/
88a1: tshad med snying rje bsdu dngos kyis// nges par rab gang mi dmigs pa'o// sems can sna tshogs 'dul don du// sangs rgyas rnams ni yang dang yang // sems bskyed gyur pas lam sbyangs te/ mdzad pa du ma'i tshe
88a2: 'phrul rnams/ rgyun mi 'chad phyir sems bskyed pa'o// dri med sems ni rnam kun du// rang rig ye shes thogs med pas// 'gag pa med cing skye med kyang // sems can don du labar zhing lding // byang chub sems ni mi zad pa// de byir/
88a3: phrin las rgyun mi 'chad/ rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pas// kun mkhyen ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings// gdul bya'i khams dang 'thun par 'jug/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgyu 'phrul gar// de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes brjod/ rgyal ba
88a4: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i su/ yon tan du mas rab brgyan cing // mtshan dang dpe byad dbar ba dang // ye shes sku ni gzhan don phyir// sdang ba'i 'od 'gyed dag pa'i don// rtag tu bde ba can du bzhugs// bde ba chen po dbyer med cing / thabs
88a5: dang shes rab mi phyed pa'i/ / rnal 'byor dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das// kha sbyar sbyor ba gsang ba che// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba// me tog dang ni de yi dri// dbyer med rten dang rten par gnas// mchog tu dag pa bdag med pa/ sku gsum tha
88a6: dang bstan pa ni/ gdul bya'i dbang la gyur pa yin// khyad par yan lag nges par ni// sku gsum gcig tu bsdus pa'i don// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen mchog/ 'bras bu rdo rje'i thig pa zhes// thams cad mkhyen pas bshad
88a7: pa yin/ sbyor ba'i lam las yan lag bcu// rlung gi gnas su brjod par bya// rtsa ba'i rlung lnga dbang po lnga// stobs lnga de yi khyad par te// yan lag rlung gi gnas pa yin// snga ma'i go rim pa ltos nas// khyad par gong du 'phel
88a8: bste/ dang pa la sogs chos rnams yin// 'bras bu'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi// gsang ba ye shes stobs bcur ni// gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa sogs// khyad par thob pa bstan pa'o// mthar phyin lam ni rnam gnyis te/
88b1: thob ba nga ba tha yin/ dang gtubs pa med/ pa dang med pa bad pa sapa/ 'ang bzhin dag pa gzugs ca// nga ba rnam pas pag/ banyas des cang pa du ga/ dog pa snang bsapas
88b2: mngon gyur/ 'dir ning bo nyid med pa// de nyid chos rnams chos nyid de// de ni yang dag mi slu ba/ de togs sangs rgyas yin zhes brjod// dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes lam// sangs rgyas snying po byang chub sems// stong nyid ser
88b3: ge ring ro yis/ / log par lta ba'i tshogs snga ma dang // de las snang ba med pa'i dbyings// sku gsum yongs su 'byung dang po// ma spo ba zung 'jug gnyis pa ste// dbyer med rig pa'i skyes bur bcas// rgyas btab drug ldan bde ba che ldan
88b4: cig skyes pa'i rol par 'char/ / ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ste// sems nyid 'od gsal snying po nyid// chos su dri ma med pa las// lus sbyangs ye shes ro gcig pa// rdul bral ba cing grol med pa nyid// ting 'dzin mnyam nyid tha dad
88b5: med/ byang chub mchog ces bstan pa yin// 'od gsal de nyid dus kun du// chos nyid dang ni bsam gtan dang // lam du byed pa'i ting 'dzin las// brgyal dang gnyid dang snyoms 'jug te// thams cad tu ni 'gyur ba med/ 8
88b6: gis 'phrog cing rang gis ster/ sa bon rkyen dang phrad pa bzhin// myu gu rten 'brel tshogs las 'byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis dang lam rnam par nges pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di ni gsang ba thams
88b7: cad kyi/ yi ga gnas kyi ston pa'o// shrI gnyis med ye shes mchog grub pa// bde lags kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// dpal ldan rnam par thar pa'i 'o// shes rab snying rje dbyer med pa'o// gsang ba'i snying po blan med// mthar
88b8: thug chos rnams rab 'jug pa/ / u ma'i rol pa bsam mi khyab// byang chub sems las kun tu 'byung / bde ba mchog las mchog grub ba/ 'khor 'das phreng thob med pa nyid// srid ginyam pa nyid rtogs pa// byang chub sems kyi spyod yul
89a1: can/ / rgyal pa rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam// bde don spos med dang du 'dus// khams gsum rlung las sprul pa ni/ rnam par shes pa yul la 'jug/ de las bdag dang gzhan du rtog/ rten bcas rang stong g.yo
89a2: yin 'dir ni rlung sems 'dres pa las/ / spang ba gsum kyi rang bzhin 'chang// rdul 'byor blad kyis bdag nga gzhan/ dang ma tog sung baH// kan gyis par gyur pa ni// mchog gi b+hags chen pa'i gnas/ kun rdzo bsnang ba
89a3: tshogs pa/ / ngo bo nyid kyis rang stong pa// gnas gsum tshul ni rgyud gzhan las// snying po 'od gsal mngon byang chub// sgyu ma lta bu'i yul las gzhan// ting 'dzin nges par 'dir bstan pa'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//
89a4: gsang chen rgyal po zung 'jug lam// su gsum dbyer med nam mkha'i dang // ye shes tha snyad las 'das pa'o// yon tan rdzogs shing kun dbang skur// mchog ldan rgyal po mdzes shing 'bar// zab dang rgya che gnyis su med// nga gi
89a5: gnyis med chen po yin/ / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dgongs pa ni// yang dag nyid tu rnam bshad pa// lha mo rnams dang skyes bu yi// gsang ba'i rgyud 'dir gnyis med brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug
89a6: k yi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las gnyis su med par ston pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi gnas nges par bstan pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye
89a7: shes gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o/ / // brtag pa gnyis pa rnam par nges pa gsal ba zhes bya ba ste gsang ba'i dpal mchog chen po ye shes kyi de kho na nyid rab tu brjod pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
89a8: 'dzin/ / sku gsum mchog tu brtag pa nyid// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum gyi dang // brtan zhing mchog tu bzang po che// snying po byang chub bla med pas// gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to// gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ra// rnam pa
89b1: r+m+ma sa du dgu rgyu / 5/
89b2: ya ma byams sa da/ sa ma
89b3: mkha' nga ga/ 'jig rten dpang phyug 'das pa'i byangs/ bas kun du zung bste// sems dpa' brnya na m+b+ha mas// rgyal ba zhing ldan sa/ lanang dri sho/ bya A dasas 'om //
89b4: sran rgyabacig gis// ba kyil 'khor bsdus pa yin// phyag na rdo rje de ba bcur ga/ tshangs satshas kyi kho sa s+ho// sum bcugasam par gnas pa'o// sa saHsa rnams cad kyis nga
89b5: nga pa shes spyon pazhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin nyid su mngon par brjod pa'o/ / de nas depazhin gshegs pa ma'i zla ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs de rje mi migs pa'i ye shes 'thung /
89b6: shes zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par grags nas byang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// chos rnams du mar snang ba'i dngas// sngon shing 'bras bu ldan pa bzhin// zla ba'i dbye ba shes par bya/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan
89b7: pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du gzigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i spyod tshul kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
89b8: 'dzags nam med na ma'i mkha' lta bur/ / mi rtog pa blang 'od gsal pa// don dam dmigs mdang ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
90a1: shes 'bar bas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba dag par sdom pa'i di bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ga ru
90a2: chos rnams dngos med cing/ / de ba nyid dag ye shes te// bden pa 'dis na khyab par byed/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad
90a3: kyi mnyam pa nyid ye shes gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor ba skyug bro rmongs pa can// rab rib ldan pa'i rtog pa nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
90a4: shes mchog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho ltar mi byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
90a5: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpag med ye shes rgyal mtshan tog/ yi de bzhin nor bu'i snying po las// rang gzhan bde chen gnas mchog 'grub// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
90a6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha'i lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal
90a7: ba ma lus kun gyi gsang / / ye shes rol pa bde ba che// tha dad spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas gzigs pa dag pa'i dbyings kun nas sprin
90a8: gyi snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// tshad med bde ba'i char 'bebs pa// rang 'byung ye shes rgyal po nyid// byang chub tshul
90b1: 'di ba rtan po'o / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsas pa rdzogs pa dpal rgyal po bden pa gnyis su med pa'i bo kun du 'byung badro zhes bya ba'i nga 'dzin la gobs par thugs kyang na
90b2: sems 'di gsungs so/ / din rgyal ba ma lus pa'i// ye shes su ste sngon med pa// bsam pa cwo la yul las sdang // byang chub tshul 'di bzhin pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med
90b3: dpal rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun sa ye shes cir mi tog/ nam mkha'adzi med
90b4: mtha' khyab song/ nas tog ye shes me 'bar su// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rdo rje dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad ci na
90b5: khams rin po che'i sprin kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dri ma med pa dag pa'i zhing // pad mo rgyas pa snang ba'i dbyings// rin chen 'od 'phro mi
90b6: zad dang / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sra ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rol pa ston pa'i dpal rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas 'od kyi phreng
90b7: ba dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad sems su gcig/ de nyid ye shes dag pa'i dang // dbyer med/
90b8: rtag pa'i tshul mchog ste// bde gshegs gsang ba 'byung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog spyan yangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' dbang dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa dri ma med pa'i
91a1: dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes dbyings// gsang ba 'gro snying rnam dag pas// brang dor med pa'i bde ba thob/ byang chub tshul 'di
91a2: bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par dbyes pa'i sku'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kun du sgrog pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
