91a3: sems 'di gsungs so/ / gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i dpa' rlabs kun// dbu mar gcig tu thim gyur pas// ye shes rgyas pa'i snying po dbye// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med
91a4: pachos kyi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i ye shes 'byung ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi la snyoms par zhug byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun tu seng ge'i rtsal gyis ni// zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes
91a5: yongs su bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzi/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba'i yon tan 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i yon tan du ma son pa mi ga nas
91a6: bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun nas snang ba med pa'i nga // rtog pas bskyed par mi 'gyur ba// mnyam nyid ye shes lhung de bzhugs// byang chub chul 'a
91a7: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i rnam mapa' brdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smra ba'i rol pa sna tshogs su ston pa de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chu
91a8: kyisems 'jigasung so/ / 'byung ba rnams dang srog bcas dang / mthang tu lcags sum than/ da bzhin las snang ba yin/ bya chub rgyal 'di bstan pa'o gas gsungasaso/ den sa de bzhin gagags bkun du'i
91b1: me med pa'i ded chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i bganas par spong ba ni zhes bya ba ting lan la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub ba sems 'di gsungs so/ gang dulus can rnams cad/
91b2: dus la ba 'gyur na/ nam mkha' las kyang smra byung nas// chos kyi 'byung gnas der ston mdzad// sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa den chen dko pa'i teg rang 'byung du 'char ba'i ye shes rol pa rdo rjenasaH
91b3: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di ni rang 'byung ston pa'o// ye shes 'jug pa 'bad med par thob bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rang rig dang las rnyed par 'gyurazhes
91b4: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tham pan par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun du ston cing 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dus
91b5: gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams/ / dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dag/ gdul bya'i blo yis mthong bar byed// de nyid bsam pa'i tshul gyis 'byung // zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje 'dzin// tshe 'dis 'grub
91b6: gyi gzhan du min/ lus ngag yid ni legs gnas pa// med par 'grub par mi 'gyur gsungs// gsungs cig rdo rje 'dzin pa che// thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyal po che// 'dod pa'i longs spyod
91b7: rgyun mi 'chad/ / 'di med rol pa rgyu med 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa nyer bsten pa// zhen med ye shes longs spyod pa// bde bar bstan pas sangs rgyas 'thob// ces gsungs te// yang dag pa'i longs spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dus gsum/
91b8: kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang pa gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las shin tu bde ba chen po'i gnas mngon par ston pa'i ba skye tor
92a1: gsum pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mi zad pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byed pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha'i gnas mi
92a2: 'brar ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang dra dmigs pa kun bral ba'i// snying rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// yul rnams sgyu mar spyang bar bya/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa/
92a3: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag med gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems/
92a4: 'di gsungs so// gang du stong nying chos kyis// de nyid snying rje dbyer mi phyed// 'bras bu snying po byang chub sems// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen dpal sangs rgyas thams cad
92a5: kyis gdugs khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi snying // mi shigs ye shes gcig par bzhugs/ 'gre 'ong med cing khyab par 'byung /
92a6: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes stobs mchog seng ge'i sku can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
92a7: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ngo bo nyid kyis dus gsum du/ phyogs bcu'i sems can ma lus pa// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur mdzad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
92a8: gshegs pa rnam par sbyang ba'i mkhas pa'i blo can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khams
92b1: gsum skyes 'gyur lus can gyi/ lus ngag sems ni mi dmigs par// byang chub snying por dbang bskur mdzad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' ba'i blo can
92b2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis ye shes dang // rtag cing khyab pa'i
92b3: tshul du bsrud/ de nyid rnam dag dbang bskur mchog/ byang chub chul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po mi zad pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'tshe ba ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
92b4: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / glang chen myos 'dra'i spyod spangs nas// bar snang bya bzhin rjes chags med// thams cad dus su snyoms par spyad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
92b5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod snyoms spyod pa dran par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du grong khyer rgyub sogs// sna tshog
92b6: spyod lam bag yod pas/ dran pas ma yengs gzhan don phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen thob sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam rnam par dag pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i
92b7: ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du 'gro dang 'chag pa dang / nyal dang zas kyi dris la sogs// byang chub sems kyi dang las ni/ ma yongs tshul bzhin spyad par bya// nas gsungs so//
92b8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa// rdul bzhin ma yin nam
93a1: spangs nas/ ga med gnas las bzlog par bya/ 'din ye shes bdud ci yin// byang chub chul 'di bstan pa'o/ sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rnam par dag pa'i dang la sang sa rgyas
93a2: thams cad kyi stong bdag pa'i rjeng pa de rje zhes byab ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang dulas sems padag nas shing // ldog pa med pa'i bcon 'grus kyis/ shA ba'i
93a3: las spel bar bya/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa de rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
93a4: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos// chud mi za ba nges 'byung phyir// shin tu dag tshe sdug bsngal 'gyur// de nyid phra ba rtogs par dka'// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
93a5: gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / tshul bzhin ma yin rnam spangs nas// bag
93a6: med gnas las bzlog par bya/ / 'di ni ye shes bdud rtsi yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i lta ba yang
93a7: dag pa dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dag pa'i 'bras bu bde ba ste// ma dag pa las srid par ltung // rnam par nges pas ye shes che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
93a8: pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i lam rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs/
93b1: sa rnams kyings 'byung la sa/ deni thar pa'i rgyal mtshan te/ rang sems dag brtul khrims mchog tu nu cul 'di na pa pa nas gsung ga de na de bzhin gshenas pa dan sa gtasas sargyas thas ca kyi med nas
93b2: ma zad pa'i gter 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bla na med pa'i nor bu ni// zhen med ye shes rgya mtsho che// kun du longs spyod rang las 'byung / byang chub
93b3: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba'i 'od/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba skyob pa dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
93b4: gsungs so/ / byang chub ye shes nam mkha' ltar// bdag med phung po la sogs stong // stong nyid sgyu mas snying rjer gnas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thugs
93b5: yangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnas pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas thugs ni chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ba med cing kun
93b6: tog bral/ / mi g.yo mtshan ma med pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs skes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
93b7: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mi shes nyon mongs nad kyis gzir// de sel dam pa'i bdud rtsi bsten// bla med thugs rje'i sman gyis gso// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so//
93b8: de na pa de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen po nor 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub sems 'di gsungs so// 'phags pa rnams kyis sbyangs pa'i
94a1: lag/ nang las 'brang gi phye las min/ de nyid 'bras bu mchog las skyes// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong sangs rgyas thams cad dkyigs
94a2: sngags kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
94a3: 'dir ni khyab par byin rdzob cing / dpag med bde bar gshegs pa yis/ dus drug tu ni byin gyis rlo/ byang chub tshul
94a4: 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// gnyis med ye shes dag pa las// ciste min na log pa ltar// de bas sdug bsngal ba rgyud ma las// mthar phyin sngags kyis byin rlabs pa'i// mkhas pa dag ni ye shes spyod// ji ltar chu'i
94a5: thigs pa ni/ / rgya mtsho bab na lan tshwar gyur// lan tshwa 'o ma'i mtshor zhugs pas// de nyid slar yang bdud rtsir 'gyur// ga pas drug med byas nas ni// ye shes bdud rtsi longs spyod pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung bzhis
94a6: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas kun gyi
94a7: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bstan pa'i le'u sa nyer buzhi pa'o/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpag med stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
94a8: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// bdag po de nyid kun 'dus pa// rig pa'i rgyal pos byin gyis rlog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de/
94b1: bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sred pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba
94b2: kun gyi dgongs pa rnams/ / so so'i rig pa'i rtsal gyis ni// snying po gcig par shes par bya// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i
94b3: dbyangs kyis 'gro ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du zhing khams sbyong ba dang // gang du 'gro ba 'dul ba dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis kun du
94b4: brngu/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
94b5: 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rang byung stong nyid sgra// gdul bya mos pa'i snang ba la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis kun du bsgrags// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde gnas
94b6: dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i gnas mi phyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams zag med 'od gsal ba// skye ba med cing shin du pra/
94b7: mtshan nyid dngos pos stong pa'i chos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gtsa bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa 'byung ba rdorje rje zhes bya ba'i ting
94b8: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sna tshogs sems can sems rgyud ni// de bo nyid kyis rang stong pas// mi byed ye shes gnas pa 'o// byang chub chul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ de nas de bzhin/
95a1: gshegs pa 'gro bar 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer 'byung ba derje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyisems 'dage sungs so// kun dum smin smin byed dang / sman pa sgom
95a2: phyir 'bad pa ste/ / ye shes spyod pa byang chub che// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen rgyal ba kun tu rtog pa nges par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
95a3: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po mi rtag skad cig ma// de nyid slu ba'i chos can phyir// 'dzin pa med pa'i gnas shes bya/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha'
95a4: yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ngos
95a5: nyid kyis dag pa'i dngos/ / dbu ma ye shes rtog bral bas/ mtha' las 'das pa zung du 'jug/ gsang ba gnyis med tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i don gyi blo
95a6: gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad skye
95a7: pa med/ / chos gang 'gag par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa rab zhi pa// de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes
95a8: rtog pa'i dra ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ rtog pa med cing dmigs med pas// mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i sku snying sa
95b1: byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i gdul dka' ba spangs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'brug sgra'i dbyangs sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
95b2: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snying po rdo rje stong nyid dang // dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag/ rtog pa med cing dmigs med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
95b3: pa dag pa'i stob rims nad med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du nad rnams bya ba'i gzhi// las dang nyon
95b4: mongs tog las spyad/ de nyid gnas las dag par bya// thams cad ye shes spyod pas sbyang zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par snang ba'i dpal sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi ljon shing dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
95b5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa mchog/ gsang ba zab dang rgya che'i dbyings// spang blang med par grol ba nyid// gnyug ma byang chub tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so/
95b6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po don sgyu 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag pa'i
95b7: lha/ / gcig las du mar snang byed cing de nyid du mang yos gyulag 'phrul byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan 'dzin pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
95b8: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'byung ba rnams dang khams gsum dang // rnam shes ye shes khams 'dus pa// rten dang rten pa byung bar bya// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
96a1: danasar banan gshegs pa skyes bus byin sangs rgyas thams cad byas shes su byas spang ba ban ston pa darjezhes bya ba tung de 'dzin pa snyoms par zugs te kyang chub kyisems 'dagasungs so// khring bdag
96a2: pas snang ba dag/ rang lus dag pas rnam shes dag/ ye shes spyod pas rnam par sbyang // 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog yin/ zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snga sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul zla ba'i snang ba ston pa rdo rje
96a3: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rmi lam dag par ni// rdo rje blo yis rnam par sbyang // de nyid ye shes rgyal ba yis// bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de
96a4: nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje phal cher sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba pad mo rnam par rol pa yi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / zhing khams
96a5: kun gyi snang ba'i gnas/ / rin chen 'od kyis rnam par spras// sgyu ma tsam du ston pa nyid// snying po ye shes gzhir gyur pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ma lus par bkod/
96a6: pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba rgya mtsho sprin tshogs las// dus gsum kun tu dge ba yi// zhing khams ye shes 'od kyi sku// chos rnams sems kyi snang las 'byung // zhes
96a7: gsungs so/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba'i dbang phyug bcom ldan gyis// ye shes spyod pas bsgrub pa yi// lhan cig spyod pa bka' stsal to// ji ltar mi gnas nam mkha' ni// khyab cing mtshan nyid med pa nyid// don ma de nyid dmigs med de//
96a8: brjod pa spangs pa stong pa che// mi shigs gsang ba bla na med// kun du bzang po zhes grags pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag rgya che// ye shes rtag pas chos kyi sku// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan gang // rnam pa gsal bar 'char ba
96b1: ltar/ / ji ltar sangs rgyas ye shes ni/ snang ba me long lta bur brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// ye shes rang rig gzhan rig pa// tha dad med par thugs chung pas// de nyid mnyam nyid ye shes brjod/ gdong
96b2: nas dag cing skye ba med/ / rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes la// so sor rtog pa zhes brjod do// kun nas ma lus sangs rgyas kyi// mdzad pa sna tshogs la spyod pas// bde bar gshegs
96b3: gnas cig mdzad pas/ / khyab pa nan tan ye shes brjod// gang che nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib// thams cad las grol de yi tshe// rnal 'byor mchog thob rdo rje 'dzin// shin tu rnam dag ye shes brjod// mchog gyur rgyal ba'i
96b4: 'byung gnas ni/ / chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pas// rab tu mi gnas ye shes gzhi// dam tshig shin du 'da' dka' ba'o// rang byung dri ma med pa ni// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin
96b5: gyis/ / gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis// bsam mi khyab pa nyid kyis gcod// rtog pa'i dri ma'i dra ba yis// rin chen sems ni dri mar byas// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid// dri ma bral
96b6: phyir sangs rgyas brjod ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsang chen gyis gnas yongs su brjod pa la rab tu dga' ba'i don ched tu brjod do/ / de nas de bzhin
96b7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dras pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes
96b8: mngon par rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad stong pa mi 'gyur che// ye shes dam pa ston pa pos// kun du gsang ba bka' stsal to// dam chos snying po bcud/
97a1: las byung / sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul// shes rab thabs ni tshul thob byed// ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams dang // 'dod yon kun la sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad
97a2: longs spyod tshul gcig pas/ / longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bshad do// mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan// sna tshogs su ste mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul pas na// sprul pa'i sku zhes 'dir bshad yin//
97a3: phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub phyir// shes nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgob// kun tog thams cad nam spangs pas// rgyal ba chos su ye shes nyid// bla ma'i byin rlabs skad cig gis// ye shes ma zad rgya mtshan// tshe 'di
97a4: nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ / mi phyed rdo rje dbang phyug nyid// gnyis med mnyam par ro gcig pas// rdo rje 'chang chen rang byung du// grub pa bde chen ngo bo nyid// thob med thob pas gcig char grol// spangs thob med pa mnyam nyid
97a5: che/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gnas 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i rdo rje ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
97a6: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi// snying po ye shes bde chen po// byang chub sten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
97a7: stobs mi zad pa sred med kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbyangs kun du stsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdag med dngos po med pa ra/
97a8: bskyes zag pa med pa'i dang // spros pa kun las rnam grol ba'i// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba skyob dbul po nges pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po'i rtsal thogs
97b1: pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de// rang sems zla ba kun d+ha ltar/ sa
97b2: bon gnas te rgyu yi cha/ / gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa ye shes mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i mdzod rdo rje dbyings zhes
97b3: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// rab tu mi gnas brjod med pa// byang chub sems su gcig bas na// thams cad dbyer med dag
97b4: par brjod ces gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i nor bu'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po
97b5: kun gyi bdag nyid gang / / stong gsum 'jig rten rang gi lus// phyi nang gnyis med ye shes che// gsang ba zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tog gi 'od zer sangs rgyas
97b6: thams cad kyi snying po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'gro ba skyob pa'i don du ni// sna tshogs gzugs can cho 'phrul gyis// gdul bya/
97b7: ye shes lam la bkod/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi mchod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mkha' lding rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
97b8: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du byams pa'i 'od kyis ni// 'gro ba kun la khyab par bya// des ni dpag med gzhan don du// mtshungs med ye shes gnas thob pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
98a1: d e bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po sbas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
98a2: so/ / byams pas bdud dpung 'joms mdzad cing // snying rje g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyis phyir mi log/ ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog
98a3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes rdo rje'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rin chen 'bar ba glog gi'o// dri med chu shel zer 'bab pas// tha mal
98a4: lus ni rgyal bar bskur/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes don grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rigs sna tshogs su ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
98a5: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du lha mo bye ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig tshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brgya dang // bde gshegs stong sogs tshul 'dir bstan// zhes gsungs
98a6: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lhun po brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po sgyu ma'i rol pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du
98a7: rgyudang 'bras bu'i chos/ ngo bo nyid dag rang byung ba// bdag med ye shes gnas med pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' 'dul ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas baspyod pa /
98a8: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mchog tu sa yi mthar thug pa// bcu gsum ye shes rdo rje 'dzin// bde ba'i 'byung gnas bla na med// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs
98b1: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas mi zad pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du
98b2: mnyam nyid ye shes dang / / 'gro ba'i tha ma chos don gyis// tshad med thugs rjes yongs su bsdu// de nyid mi rtog gsang ba'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams
98b3: cad kyi kun nas chos kyi sgra 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sdud cing spro ba dang // mtshan bcas dmigs pa med pa ru// ye shes rgyal la phyag rgyas btab//
98b4: 'di ni dge ba'i don ston pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grogs rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba nges par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
98b5: 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang ba til 'bru bzhin// sems can smin cing grol byed pas// ye shes mngon par bsdus pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye
98b6: shes nyon mongs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du dngos dang dngos med pas// mi phyed ye shes bde ba che/
98b7: sna tshogs 'du 'bral med pa'i dang // ye shes phyag rgya chen por bstan zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam bu'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i
98b8: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi spyod yul bas// rang bzhin gyis ni mi dmigs bzhin// don dam thob tu med pa'i don// gzhi med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
99a1: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzang rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i 'od zer kun nas rgyas pas lhu ngan sreg par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
99a2: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan gzhi med// gang du ro mnyam zung 'jug pas// dbyer med rtogs pa rgyal po che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
99a3: pa yul 'khor rangs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su 'gro ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mi g.yo 'gyur ba med pa las// de
99a4: bzhin nyid du bstan pa yis/ / 'jug cing 'byung ba gas pa che// snying po ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde grags dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
99a5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos grub snying po bdud rtsi'i bcud// grub pa'i bla ma'i gdams pa las// thob 'gyur de bas gzhan du min// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung
99a6: so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mdzad pas sna tshogs gdul don du// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par// phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul dag gis// theg pa mchog tu yongs grags pa'i// rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyur 'di//
99a7: rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i// thugs kyi snying po gsang ba yin// sku dang gsung gi rdo rje 'dir// snying po kun du 'dus pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spros// 'dir ni sngon chad bstan pa'ang med// ma 'ongs pa na'ang 'byung
99a8: bar dka'/ / de bas gsang chen rnyed dka' bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten du// 'byung bar 'gyur ram ma byon yang // gsang ba'i yi ge rnam dag pa// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang
99b1: pa'i gnas/ / gsang chen rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid// dpal mchog 'di ni bsdus pa'i tshul// ye shes chen po'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
99b2: la gsang ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar dka' bar gdams shing bstan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang pagasang pa 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par/
99b3: rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis srid pa'i chu klung skems pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
99b4: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni srid pa'i dra ba dag/ rnam par gcod cing ye shes mes// sdug bsngal gnas 'di bsreg par bya// de nyid bde ba kun gyi gnas// zhes gsungs so// de
99b5: nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla bsgra can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo ri bo 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rtog pa sna tshogs las bcas pa/ g.yeng
99b6: bas sdug bsngal phung por gyur/ / de bsal ye shes byang chub sems// zang dor med pa'i dang du gnas zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya
99b7: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun du phyag rgyas rgyas ta babs/ mi byed ye shes bdag nyid gyur// de nyid phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// thams cad sdom par shes par bya/ zhes gsungs so// de nas
99b8: de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan seng ge'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems rgyud sna tshogs chos nyid
100a1: gcig par gyur/ de nyid dngal dag pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog/ dbyer med byang chub sems kyi snang ba las// gsang ba bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan byes
100a2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam rtog gi ri bo 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rtog las rnam byung ba// de nyid 'joms pa'i rdo rje ni// stong
100a3: nyid bde chen byang chub sems/ / de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
100a4: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du byams pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don gang spyod// sna tshogs ngo bo nyid med pas// de nyid mi dmigs tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
100a5: rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes la rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sgyu ma'i dngos po snang med pa// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don// gnas
100a6: med bden gnyis dbyer med pa/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che mnga' bsangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa mi 'gyur ba dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stos
100a7: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba dbyings// thos bsam bsgom pas rtogs dka' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes dag pa che// dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
100a8: gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gsang ba rdo rje dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam dag 'od gsal dri ma med/
100b1: skyes nam mkha'i bdag nyid kyis// sgyu ma dngos las rnam grol byed// de nyid tshul 'di bshad pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer snang ba'i des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi grwa'i dbyangs rdo rje zhes
100b2: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi bdag nyid can// 'dus byas rtog las rnam grol ba// 'dus ma byas pa rdo rje'i dang // de nyid dag pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
100b3: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod spu ldan pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa
100b4: ni/ thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// 'du 'bral med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub
100b5: gdul bya la ster bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni so so rang rig pa// ye shes rgyun chad med pa'i lam// de nyid lam du bsgom pa'i mchog/ bsam gtan ye
100b6: shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni bza' mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nor bu'i snying po
100b7: bsam 'phel bzhin/ / rtog med bsam pa rdzogs byed pa// rang byung chos kyi sgra ston pas// mi gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog
100b8: rdo rje'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / srid dang zhi bar mi gnas pa// rdo rje gsum mchog dam pa'i dbyings// sku gsum lam gyi ye shes bcas// sa gsum dag pas dbang phyug
101a1: thog/ / ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bkod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che sna tshogs pa'i mdangs bkod pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
101a2: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rjes su dran pa'i gnas ni mthong ba'i lam// ye shes skad cig dga' ba bcu drug las// phyi nang gnas pas 'od gsal don rtogs pa// stong nyid rang byung rnam dag tshul bstan pa'o// zhes
101a3: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang chen seng ge'i nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i rgya mtsho mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sna tshogs snang ba du mar 'char
101a4: ba nyid/ / yul ni sgyu ma dngos po gdod nas dag / dgag ri ngo bo chos dbyings nam mkha' che// sems snang rol pa gsang ba 'dir bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang
101a5: bzang tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ma btsal ma spangs dang gis dag pa'i sku// rnyed par mi 'gyur rab 'jam bdeb che// bgrod pa cig pa'i lam ni lhun dru
101a6: pa/ / byang chub sems chen gsang ba theg pa'i mchog ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba mtshan dpe 'bar ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
101a7: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams// sems can kun gyi lus la nges par bzhugs// dbri bstan med par 'char bas gsal bar byed// de nyid sbas pa'i don du tshul 'di bstan// zhes gsung ngo so//
101a8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gzhal yas khang nye bar brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gzhal yas kha/
101b1: tshad med bkod pas rabazlas pa// rgyan rnams bye brag mtha' yas tshogs// sdang ba de nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma spod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
101b2: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sgyu ma'i chos rnams mkha' lta bur// dag pa'i ye shes rang srog gi/ snying gi pad ma sad par bya// de las ye shes blo rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de dag kun
101b3: gyi gsang / / ye shes dam pa mchog grub pa// gsang chen ye shes lam 'di yis// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med
101b4: pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ / gsang ba chen po'i ye shes kyi don gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i 'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa
101b5: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes mchog tu gsang ba gang // de nyid bsdus par gyur pa ste// rtog pa'i dra ba gcod mdzad yin// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsung
101b6: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du sangs rgyas
101b7: 'od zer snang bas khyab/ de nyid 'dom gang 'od ni rba rlabs gnyis// gnyis med gcig tu dag pas dbu ma nyid// dbyer med ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams
101b8: cad kyi byang chub kyi shing mchog la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rin chen brtan pa'i ljon pa'i shing // de nyid byang chub sems las byung / skyes pa sems
102a1: bskyed rten gyur pas/ / rang byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thos chen po rnams kyis dpag par dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
102a2: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / zab pa shin du zhi ba'i gnas// rdul med rnyog pa med pa'i thugs// bsam gtan rdo rje chad med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
102a3: pa rab gsal rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thos dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis btag par dka' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnas pa med
102a4: pa'i gnas gyur pa/ / khyu mchog chen po byang chub sems// rang gzhan mi phyed mi dmigs pas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa kha lo sgyur ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas
102a5: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor ba'i rgyun 'di mya ngan 'das// de nyid sring du med pas na// ye shes shes rabardzun/
102a6: gnas pas// dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
102a7: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang phyir ldog pa med pa'i sems// 'di ni ye shes chen po'i dang // bla na med pa'i snying po'i sku// de bzhin nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
102a8: gshegs pa gtsug na rin po che 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khams gsum
102b1: snang ba sems yin phyir/ sems de stong nyid rgyu med pas// gang du dri med gzhan don 'byung // 'di ni tshul chen gsang ba yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa snyems bral rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag
102b2: bzad pa rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du zag med 'byung ba med// khams dang dbang po yul med par// shin du dri med nam mkha' bzhin//
102b3: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par/
102b4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du lus kyi kun du spyod pa yi// rdzu 'phrul snang ba bstan nas 'dul byed pa// rang 'byung bsam gtan thob ste ltos med pa// gsang ba 'dir gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
102b5: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba tshangs pas dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thog ma med cing mtha'
102b6: med pas/ / srid rtser mi gnas dbang phyug che// dngos po med cing rtag pa che// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas brgya byin gyis//
102b7: dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du mi 'khrug rtog pa med// ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi yul// gzugs sogs yul ni rtog tu med// thams cad dag pa'i
102b8: tshul bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lha drag pos dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung
103a1: 5so/ / nyon mongs 'ching ba dag pa yi// sred len rkyen grol log pas na// dmigs med ye shes gsang ba nyid// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dga' ba'i rtog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang pas
103a2: khyab 'jug gis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang nas gang du khyab bya ngo bos stong // thams cad bdag med stong bzhi pa'i phyir// sems can khams me 'jug
103a3: pang mi gnas pas/ / ye shes chen po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can ka'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang blta ma yin rnams kyi dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
103a4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sa 'og sa steng dang / sa bla rnams su bsten pa yi// dngos grub bdud rtsi thob byed pas// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal na chod
103a5: bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba klu rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes su// dug med
103a6: gdug pa rnam bral bas/ / skyon med gtsang ba'i rang bzhin can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lta dga'i rgyal po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa mngon par rol pa srin mo
103a7: rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdag med mnyam pa nyid thob pas// grub pa med pa'i gnas la ni// 'chi med ye shes
103a8: tshul mchog gis/ / gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa ye shes nam mkha'i bu mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
103b1: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du mkha' la spyod 'gro ba'i// ma gyur spyod pa'i ye shes can// de nyid de zhes rnam brtags pas// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
103b2: la mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtogs pa dka' ba thams cad kyi gnas pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rin chen chang dzed
103b3: che/ nor gyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas// de nyid sa dbang ba de gshegs rgyal// gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klas pa 'jig rten pathas
103b4: cad dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi skyes dgu'i chos las dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skyes bu chen po thams cad kyi// ye shes gnas ni mnyam med
103b5: pas/ rang gzhan mi phyed byang chub che// sems dpa' tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// gang du 'gro la gnas byur ba'i// gsang chen 'dir ni gnas myur na// gang la'ang dri mar mi 'gyur zhing // dgag par bya ba ci yang med// las rnams
103b6: thams cad byas kyang ni/ / dang byung srur ni rnam par gro'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa nal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las
103b7: dag pa'i skyes bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du mthong gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchod rten 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
103b8: thugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dri med ye shes dag pa'i gnas// rin chen phung po gsal ba yi// dang zhing yid 'phrog 'byung ba'i gzhi// sa le srib med tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
104a1: par bye ba'i bang po sangs rgya sa thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mngon par 'byung ba 'phags pa'i lam nyes ba sangs pa'i
104a2: tshul mchog gis/ / rnam par mthor gshegs 'og min te// zab pa brjod med tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po mthong ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgyal ba'i gnas
104a3: shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ chos kun mnyam dang mi mnyam pa kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa// dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
104a4: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ ches
104a5: rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ / mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don mdzadapa/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan 'o// zhes gsung so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gzi brjid sangs rgya thams cad kyi kun du rtog pa
104a6: med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gnas// cher mi g.yo ba rang bzhin med// rtsol med 'byung ba dag pa yi// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan
104a7: ba'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pasngal ldan shing rta chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe byad las 'das pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ bcom ldan sa
104a8: rang rig pa/ gtso bo dpe bral ye shes te/ bdag po kun 'gro kun khyab pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po mi dmigs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams
104b1: cad kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / byed pa po dang 'phrog pa'ang med// 'di ni dpal ldan rang 'byung sems// dngos po gsal dang mi gsal mdzad ye shes snang ba'i
104b2: tshul bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba bkod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chen po blan med pa bde ba'i nyid nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs go/ gnyis med
104b3: gnyis las grol ba yi/ / ye shes rang las skye bar 'gyur// de nyid mngon rgyu spong byed pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdegs par mdzad pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba
104b4: yang dag pa rdo rje gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po med pa sgom pa min// dngos por yang dag bsgom du med// gang du ro mnyam mchog gi dngos// byang chub
104b5: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
104b6: gsungs so/ / sems can kun gyi bsam pa 'di/ 'jigs pa med pa'i rang gnas na// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'od 'phro'i dpal sangs rgyas
104b7: thams cad kyi ye shes blo gros mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / shes rab mkha' la rnam par gnas// snying rjes sad pa'i mda' yis ni bde ba chen po'i rnam par 'bigs byang
104b8: chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshan rnam par grol ba'i dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems dang shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ rnam
105a1: thal mtha' la ma gnas pas/ dgas pa kun gyi 'tshang babral khung na brgyal 'ang bstan pa gzhas gsungs so// de nas bzhin gshegs paran can smos pang sa sangs rgyas thams cad tus shes rdo rjem da pa nas
105a2: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnyis med bde ba mchog tu zhi// mkha' mnyam rtog pa las grol ba// gnyis med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
105a3: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos bstan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyag pa'i dbyings rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos nyid bsam gyis/
105a4: me khyab pa'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gnas pa che// brtan g.yo dag pa'i tshul mchog gis// dbyer med tshul 'di dag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
105a5: bdud dpung thams cad pham par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rtog pa ngan pas brtags pa yi// phyi rol yul ni rdzas stong pas/ thabs dang shes rab rnam
105a6: dag nyid/ / ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nor bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dra ba gcod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
105a7: gsungs so/ bde ba chen po gcig nyid kyi/ nang du snod bcud dngos po'i chos// kun rdzob bden pas stong pa'i phyir// 'dus pa der gnas tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang pos byin pas sangs rgyas tham
105a8: cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab skems par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so/ / gang du gnyis med dang gnas pa// rang bzhin brtag tshogs rab zhi pas/ snad gsum ye shes dag gyur pa'i//
105b1: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma sangs rgyas srid pa'i tshad chid 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// phyi rol nga rgyal
105b2: log bcom ste/ ye shes gcig pu bdag dag pas// rang byung bsam pa rnam par dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis log rtog 'joms pa'i
105b3: ri bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun du rtog pa rab spangs nas// 'dod chags chags bral ye shes las// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o rje
105b4: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang
105b5: rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur/ / 'di nyid tha dad rtog min zhing // gzugs dang rnam thar sgo/ thim pas// chos rgyun thob phyir bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 'gro ba rnams kyi bde brtags dang bcas 'byung ba// gang yin mtshan ma spangs par
105b6: gyur pa'i phyir/ / rang byung ngo bo ye shes bdag nyid de// rtog pas stong pa'i bde ba mi zad yin// rlung gi rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug pa na// bde ba rang sems ngo bo dam pas ni// che ma 'gyur de las gzhan du g.yo mi 'gyur zhabs dang
105b7: shes rab bdag nyid gnas pa yin/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dam pa'i mdzod chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bstan pa'i don to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
105b8: gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi 'gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o/ / /
106a1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba dri ma med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad
106a2: rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs kun 'dus pa yi/ sangs rgyas spro bsdu'i 'khor lo yis// rtse mo gyur pa'i
106a3: phyag rgya yis/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lags par skyes pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chos rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i
106a4: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang byung ye shes zhi ba'i dngos// dag pa rnam dben mngon par 'byung // phun sum tshogs pa lam gyur gnas// byang chub tshul 'di
106a5: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dpe med pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
106a6: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du lha dang lha mo dang // byang chub sems dpa' dpag med pa// ye shes las skyes mtshungs med pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de
106a7: bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gdug pa can
106a8: rnams gdul bya'i phyir/ / snying rjes gtum pa'i nga ro yis// tshar gcod pa nyid bla med bsgral// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i rgyal po
106b1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lha dang lha min lto 'phye dang / grul bram la
106b2: sogs sna tshogs pas/ / bstod cing mchod pa'i ye shes gnas// rin chen 'khor lor brjod pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub chen po sangs rgyas thams kyi ye shes rin po
106b3: che'i nor bu rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de nas ye shes nor bu ni// sna tshogs 'dod pa don byed pa// dpag med yon tan 'byung ba'i dbyings
106b4: byang chub tshul 'di snyan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad ma'i phreng ba rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
106b5: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du 'dam skyes me tog dang / chu skyes pad ma gsal ba yang // 'bar ba kha phye 'od khyab pas// dag pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon
106b6: tan brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las kyi ral gri rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rtog pa gcod pa dag/ rnam par bdud tshogs rab 'jom
106b7: bas/ / ye shes me 'ong rgyas pa yis// kun du rgyas pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs 'dul ba rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya
106b8: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// bde gshegs rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i drung // gsang ba mi zad mchod pa'i gzhi// de nyid kun du khyab byed pas// gsang ba dag pa'i mchod pa'o//
107a1: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
107a2: so/ / gang du de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sku'i 'dul ba mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs zhing khams skyong mdzad pa// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sbyin pa'i
107a3: 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni brjod pa kun gyi gzhi// thabs dang shes rab snga rnams las/ swa
107a4: tshogs skad du chos ston pa/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/
107a5: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dag par byed pa khrus yin te// sgrib pa'i phyag byed spyod lam du// thal sbyar 'dud pas bag yod lam// dran ldan tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
107a6: gshegs pa bden par gsungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rdo rje rjes dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rin chen sna bdun rang byung ba'i// yon
107a7: tan rgyu rtsal sna tshogs pa/ / thams cad bsam pa'i stobs yin pas// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtsho byed gsung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las
107a8: rdo rje rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sna tshogs dbang po'i rim// de nyid thabs tshul tha dad pas/
107b1: ldog pa'i dbye ba du mar bstan// byang chub tshul 'di bsan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa zhes
107b2: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rigs can sna tshogs dru ma'i snang ba la// ye shes rang 'byung 'gag pa med par ni// thugs rje chen po mi zang stobs las 'byung /
107b3: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrin las tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i tshogs can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khro ba rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
107b4: shugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du gdug pa 'dul byed pa// 'byung po ma lus tshar gcad cing // rjes su gzung phyir khro bar bstan// nga nyid thugs rje'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de
107b5: bzhin gshegs pa rnam par nges pa'i blo gros sangs rgyas tham cad kyis sems can rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du dmigs pas 'jug med
107b6: par/ / sna tshogs khams gsum skye gnas bu/ mi g.yo ngang las snang med par// chos dbyings gcig bar tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos// sangs
107b7: rgyas thams cad kyi ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang gi skabs bsdus pa'i dngos// stong nyid gcig tu ma skyes pas// skye ba
107b8: med pa'i tshul can te/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba dgyes pa sangs rgyas tha mad kyi rig pa rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
108a1: bar zhugs te/ / byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ngo mtshar sna chags 'phrul ba yi// gzol gnas dang gros spyang sogs// mkhyen pas thabs la ma khas par bya// de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa
108a2: zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la nyams par thugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// tho snang yul dang
108a3: dbang po yis/ / du ma'i dngos po snang ba la// ldog pa dang ni rjes su 'gro// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// lus gnas cha shas med par rtogs// nges 'byung de bzhin cha shas med// chags
108a4: can dang cha med pa/ / shes nas 'dir grol the tsom med// dngos po thams cad mnyam pa ste// myur du 'jug pa dka' ba nyid// dpe dang gtan tshigs rnam par spangs// rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal zhing // gnyug ma
108a5: 'dir ni snang ba ste/ / spyod pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// rtsod med zhib mtshon bya med// nges pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas// skal ba med cing rgyu ba med// shin tu stong zhing rdul med pas// sgra las 'das shing
108a6: yon tan spangs/ / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnam
108a7: 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas tham cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha
108a8: rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du dngos po rnam dag pas// yul rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid can// dus gsum
108b1: gcig par bsdus pa yis/ / thams cad mkhyen par tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol
108b2: tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam pa spyod pa'i tshul las ni// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam gcad cing // dben pa nyon mong las
108b3: ldog gang / / tshul 'di gsang ba thob pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rab zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
108b4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don du// dpag med dka' spyad khur byed pa// ye shes bzod pa chen po yin// zhes gsung
108b5: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nor bu'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phyir mi
108b6: ldog par gzhan don du/ / byang chub sems kyi brtson pa yis// tshad med dbugs 'byin chen po nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul 'od zer sangs
108b7: rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan rdo rje mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten bsam gtan bzhi gnas shing // ye shes bsam gtan mcho/
108b8: spyod pas// phyi nang rtsol med dang las ni// byang chub sems kyi tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa brtul zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
109a1: rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// snying po byang chub mchog sems la/
109a2: thadang rgyas thebs gcig pa'i sku// ye shes de nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'grobs kun du mchod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje sa bya
109a3: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun tu dri med dge ba ni// rten 'brel sna tshogs spyod pa'i ngang // rkyen las 'byung ba bla na med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
109a4: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i tshogs 'chang ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
109a5: sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdud tshogs rnams las rnam rgyal ba// de nyid ye shes rlung las ni// zag med zhi bas mchog tu bde// gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
109a6: gshegs pa 'jig rten bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ning
109a7: khakhas nas dag rnams dang sa dag dang / / gdul dka'i sems can rnams byer 'dul ba n+ti// bu ba me tog bzhin du dang 'jug pa// byang chub sems las 'byung ba'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so//
109a8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang chen seng ge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes gang
109b1: du 'dra ba yi/ / ye shes mngon par 'byung ba gang // de nyid chags med rnam dag pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po
109b2: zug gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun tu dgyes pa'i gnas bstan pa// rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbang phyug gis// lhun grub phyag rgyas rab rgyas pa/
109b3: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
109b4: 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs la// bde bar gshegs pa mtshungs med spyod// 'di ni sngags kyi spyod mchog ste// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul thob pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra
109b5: can bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be'u rab tu rgyas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di ni dpal gyi stobs mchog ste// dri med chu skyes yongs
109b6: 'dzin pa/ / phra ba ge sar mchog thob pas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
109b7: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam pa kun tu dri ma med// bskyod pa med cing 'dzin bral bas// chos nyid dang du ro mnyam pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so//
109b8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mnga' dbang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'brug sgra dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams kun
110a1: kyi snang ba ni/ / rtogs dga' bdag med mtshan ma med// byams pa'i rang bzhin gnan phan brtson// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu ni ba stobs sangs rgyas
110a2: thams cad kyi kun du 'jam dbyangs ka la ba dka' sgra rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi se mas 'di gsungs so/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gsung gi gnas// yan lag drug bcu thogs
110a3: med du/ / 'gyur ba'i brjod pa las skyes pa'i// skad du ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje dgyes pa'i mchog rdo rje zhes
110a4: b+ha ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mnyam par ma bzhag stong pa yis// rtag tu mnyam pa'i tshul gnas nas// 'gyur mad sna tshogs khyab byed pa// byang chub tshul
110a5: 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i chu klung skems par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
110a6: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / srid pa 'di nyid spang med par// mi gnas mnyam pa'i ngang las ni// bdag med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
110a7: gshegs pa rlung shugs bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skye gnas 'byung las
110a8: gyur pa la/ / 'dod pa'i snang ba 'gro zhing lding // de nyid sems can gnas mthong phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la dgyes pa'i dpal sangs
110b1: rgyas thams cad kyi lha klu thams cad kyis mchod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du mchod phyir ye shes kyi/ chags med kun du bzang po yi// bden pI
110b2: byin rlabs thogs med pas/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam
110b3: pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las rnal 'byor chen po'i 'dul ba don yod pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi mthar// rdo rje bkod pa snying po che/
110b4: gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas thams cad cig bsdus pa'i/ ye shes snang ba bstan pa'o// rang lus lhar gsal byang chub sems// gang du srog dbus bzhugs pa na// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/
110b5: man ngag gis ni rlung bsdus te// de tshe bzlas pa brtan gyur pas// de nyid ye shes mchog thob 'gyur// mi g.yo mi rtog phra ba'i sems// mi mngon gsal min dbu mar bzhugs// de nyid rnal 'byor mchog
110b6: ces bya/ / stong pa nyid dang mnyam sbyor bas// de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'o// de nyid gsal bas bde ba ni// sgyu ma goms pas 'char bar 'gyur// ji srid sgyu ma la gsal ba// de srid goms pas 'jug par
110b7: bya/ / rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob pas// rang dga'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes bde chen po// thig le'i gzugs can gcig pu nyid// snying dbus mi shigs sems gcig bdag/ de nyid
110b8: ye shes rang sdong pa/ / sgyu mar ngo bo nyid kyis gsal// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas// ye shes 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i blos// mkhas pas mthong bas brtag par bya// thog mtha' med pa'i ye shes ni//
111a1: ma byung bcos min lhan cig skyes// rang rig gnas ni 'dir thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chen po la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de
111a2: bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du ye
111a3: shes sa gzhi las/ / sna tshogs myu gu bskyed pa'i rgyu// rten 'brel tshogs phyir thob pa nyid// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs dpal sangs
111a4: rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyal po rdo rje ngas rgyas thams cad kyi mnyes par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs pa// rin
111a5: chen bdun dang nye bdun gyis/ / brgyan zhing mchod pas bde ba thob// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byung gnas rdo rje
111a6: shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / lus kyang sems la mi gnas te// sems kyang dag la mi gnas te/ kun du gnas med mkha' lta bus
111a7: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs mchod pa'i bkra shis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
111a8: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mchog stsol bkra shis rgyun du ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// skyes bu de la stsol ba ster// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
111b1: nganas de bzhin gshegs pa ba nga pa ba d+ha sa thams cad kyis gsal ba ra bas pa'ang pa d+hA / nga ldan la snyams par thugs nga na ba mamapa 'dig sa pa// ga dung
111b2: chag pa la sogs pas/ / zil gnod de las thar pa yis// cha bas zug rdus la byed pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i mchog sa N+Da
111b3: thams cad kyi ngo ba nyid su rdo rje ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / zhing khams kun la khyab gyur ba'i// lus can kun la rnam par snang // de nyid
111b4: rdo rje'i skur gyur pa/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gsung rdo rje ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
111b5: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stong gsum khams su grags byed pa// gling kun skad cig dbyangs kyis ston// du mar de nyid ston pa po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so//
111b6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rjeng bo nyid ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du 'khor los
111b7: pUr ba yi/ / chos kyi 'khor los dbang bskur bzhin// 'gro gur ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs rgyas
111b8: thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid sbyar ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gang // chos nyid mnyam pa'i de bzhin nyid/
112a1: mtshungs med da ltar 'dir rtogs na// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi rtse mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du 'phrul ba'i spyod pa ston
112a2: pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpag med sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul gyis// me dag dag par gang bsgyur ba// thams cad blo glos bzang po thob// byang
112a3: chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
112a4: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdud kyi 'ching ba las 'das phyir// chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po yis// khams gsum kun la khyab par bya// de nyid gsang ba bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de na
112a5: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jig rten snang bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'od gsal shin tu rnam
112a6: dag pa/ / dngos po ma spangs ye shes che// chos dbyings klong na bde bar gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dpal gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad
112a7: kyi thugs rje'i gdugs kyis khyab par byed pa rdo rje zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skye bas bsdus pa'i sems can rnams/ skyob phyir chad med gdugs
112a8: kyis ni/ / kun nas kun du khyab par byed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud ma lus par
112b1: 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / log lta ma lus mun pa'i gzhi// sangs rgyas ye shes sgron me yis// skad cig cig la sel mdzad pa'i// byang
112b2: chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa go cha bgos pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje mchog tu sra ba snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
112b3: sems 'di gsungs so/ / yan lag bzhi ldan mtshon cha mchog/ de nyid bsrung ba bla na med// pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsung sa// den+da da bzhin gshegapa seng ge'i phyag sangs rgyas thams
112b4: da kyi kha lo sgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / phyag rgya sna tshogs thabs rol pa// 'bar phreng du ma'i spro ba can// mi zad ye shes byang chub sama?//
112b5: stong nyid de nyid tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dung bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
112b6: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas par// rab ston dam pa'i chos kyi sgra// rnam pa kun du grags pa'i dbyangs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
112b7: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thon po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa chos kyi gaN De rab tu brdungs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du chos kyi don
112b8: stonangapa/ tshad med bsdu dngos bzhi dag gis// sdud cing grol byed theg pa'i mchog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i sa 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
113a1: dam pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che srog pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rtag pa sad par na can rnga// bdag shegs gsung ni bstan pa'i phyir// rtag
113a2: sprul ba'i sgra 'byung ba/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
113a3: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ni// rtog med ye shes khams 'jug pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa ni// byang chub tshul mchog bstan pa yin zhes
113a4: gsungs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis// rig pa'i lha mo sna tshogs dang // thabs gcig rol pa bstan mdzad de// gsang ba gsungs pa'i don brjod do// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang /
113a5: dngos po ci bzhin rang rig la'ang // rgyu 'bras bye brag tha dad pa// ma 'dres ye shes tshul du gnas// nang gnas ji bzhin phyi rol 'byung // bar ma gsang ba mchog spyod pa// rmad tu byung ba chen po ste// ngo bo
113a6: nyid kyi ye shes gang / / de nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yi rjes su 'brang bar byed// de nyid gnyis su med pa yi// rnal 'byor gsang ba bde ba che// rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas yin// bskrad
113a7: dang gsang dang dbyed pa dang / / mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams ni// thabs gzhan med par gyur pa la// thog ma dbus dang mtha' rnams su// gang gis snying rje ma nyams la// de nyid de yi byed par
