113a8: 'gyur/ / gzhan du bstan pa'i don las dman// nye bar 'grub par dka' bar gsungs// de nyid gsang ba'i spyod yul min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying
113b1: pags ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byar can po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad tu la shes 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa' ba byas gnyis pa'o/ /
113b2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po chen po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la
113b3: mchod pa'i sprin du mas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bsdus pa'i dgongs rgyud de// mi phyed ye shes mchog sgrub pa// bcom
113b4: ldan snying po bshad du gsol zhes zhus shing gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
113b5: c ad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa chen po de dag gi sems kyi kun du rtog pa yang thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la
113b6: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gang du yang 'di ltar lhan cig g.yo ba dang ldan pas dbang po sgo lnga'i rjes su mngon par grol la// snang ba dbang po don dang phrad par gyur pa mchod pa gsal ba las dbang
113b7: pos dngos por dmigs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'o/ / gal te sems de nyid dngos po'i rang bzhin du ma gyur na de lta na pang 'di dag sems nyid yin pas rnam pa thams cad du phyi rol gyi don skye ba yod pa ma
113b8: yin te/ 'di ltar ma lus pa'i rang bzhin 'di dag brtags pas stong pa'i sems nyid de// skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par yongs su gsal
114a1: pa'o/ / chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// lus dang sems ni dbyer med de// rten dang brten pa 'jug ldog gis// kun gyi gnas su shes par bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje stong nyid de// dbus gnas
114a2: mngon par byang chub brjod/ / de nyid me long ye shes ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtag/ nyi ma mnyam nyid ye shes te// bdun dang ldan pa'i dbus nyid tu'o// sngags ni dbus su gnas gyur gang // sa boran so sor
114a3: rtog pa ste/ / mngon par byang chub pa nyid do// rdo rje la sogs gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs// zhal gsum rtsa gsum brjod par bya// sku gsum
114a4: lus ngag/ yid yin te// de nyid mngon par byang chub brjod// rnam par 'phro bar bsam bya ste// rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma dang // nor bu ral gri 'bar ba las// 'gro drug rtog pa gcod phyir te// ye shes drug pa'i bdag
114a5: nyid can/ / thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// bla med mngon par byang chub brjod// lus ngag yid ni byang chub pa// gsang ba dngos po'i don yin te// lus ni byang chub rnam lnga dang // rtsa dang byang chub sems
114a6: dang ni/ / mi gtsang rdzas dang rnam rtog gis// lus kyi chos ni gnas pa yin// dag ni 'byung ba lnga dag dang // yi ge sgra dang sngags rnams te// brjod pa dang ni dbya ba rnams kyis// ngag gi chos ni bsdus pa yin
114a7: sems ni ye shes lnga dag dang / / thig le bde ba nyid dang ni// snang ba gsum dang mi rtog pas// sems kyi chos ni gnas pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs can sems kyi dngos// sred gsum chos dang chos min
114a8: dang / / sa 'og sa stengs sa bla ba// skye gnas 'byung ba brtan yor bcas// sems nyid lus ni nam mkha'i khams// gzhi dang rten dang khyab byed pa'o// migs la phra zhing brtag dkA bas// rnam par shes pa'i
114b1: spa la/ / snang ba mang bar zab pas// bgachags sa pan yul rnams kyis// thams cad rang las 'byung ba nyid// mig nas la gas lus laganas// lags lus na 'gag sa dang / dngam mdakar ba sa
114b2: 'gyur te/ / lus med lus ni mnyam pa// lus la thogs dmigs su med// tha ma 'gag pa med pa ste// gsang bag sum du rnam sbas pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su// 'di ni 'khor 'das kun ciH/
114b3: nyams dang myong ba dbyer med de// zhi gnas lhag mthong gzugs can yin// bde dang gsal dang mi rtog pas// snang ba gsum gyi rnam pa ste// de nyid zhen pas 'ching bas na// srid pa gsum ni rtag pa'i dngos//
114b4: pra ba'i lus dag yid gsum la// gsang ba'i sku gsum thugs ye shes// rdo rje gsum du gas ba nyid// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'gro kun bde gsheg pa rang bzhin can// lu pa ni da tshogs mi za
114b5: pas/ / swA pi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// du ma'i gzugs kyis ston par byed// 'gro bcos lam dpal ldan pas// dag gi brjod pa mtha' yas pa// gsung gi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// sgra dbyangs so po'i
114b6: skad du sgrogs/ / sems can sangs rgyas snying po can// sems ni dran rtog dpag med pas// thugs kyi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// sems can sku gsung dbyer med pas// lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed pa/
114b7: rdo rje gsum du gartag gnas pas// de phyir rgyal ba'i ye shes sku// dbyer med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas byang chub
114b8: sems dpa' che/ / kun du bzang pos logs zhus pa// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir gsungs pa yi// rlung gi dpe dus mtshan nyid dang // spro bsdu rim pa rgyu tshul dang // khyad par gas rab bshad du gsol// de nas
115a1: rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / / gsang ba'i dbyings nas bka' stsal pa// a A/ i I u A/ e e/ oM oM/ aM aH/ de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// de la rlung gi mtshan nyid ni// sa dang chu dang medapa/
115a2: rung // 'byung ba bzhi yi bye brag gis// mgon po rdo rje re re la'ang // spyan las sogs pa'i lha mo ni// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor bzhi ru mngon par brjod// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rnams// mkhas
115a3: pas shes nas spyad par bya/ / rlung gi bye brag bstan pa ni// tho rangs khyab gnas dus yin te// spyi bo'i gnas las kun khyab pas// yi ge a ru mngon par brjod// de ni sku yi bzlas pa'o// nam nangs zur sel
115a4: dus yin te/ / gsang ba'i gnas su 'byung bas na// A zhes brjod pa dbyangs yin no// rdo rje gsung gi bzlas par brjod// nyi ma shar ba mnyam gnas rlung // lte ba'i gnas su brjod pa yin// i zhes sgra tsam du brjod
115a5: pas rdo rje yon tan bzlas pa ste/ / cung zad dros pas drod yin te// snying kha'i gnas su mi shigs pas// yi ge I r+ya mngon par ni// rdo rje thugs kyi bzlas pa ste// phyed dus gyen du rgyu ba nyid// mgrin pa'i gnas
115a6: las bskyed pas na/ / u zhes thung rgyu dag tu gyur// rdo rje thogs med bzlas par bshad// phyed yol dus su rgyu ba'i rlung // mag la gnas pa'i rnam pa yis// U zhes rab tu brjod pa nyid// rdo rje 'dod chags
115a7: bzlas par brjod/ / dgongs ka rab tu rgyu ba nyid// rna ba la ni rab gnas pa// e zhes kun gyi brda ru brjod// mtshan mo'i cha la rnam par rgyu// sna yi rnam shes ldan pa ste// i zhes gsang ba ser sna 'dzin// rdo rje
115a8: gti mug bzlas par brjod/ / srog la shin tu rgyu ba ste// lce la mngon par dbang bas na// oM zhes sna tshogs sgra brjod pa// 'gog pa khro bo'i bzlas par brjod// nam phyed yang dag rab rgyu ba// ba spu'i tshigs
115b1: kun khyab pas na/ / oM zhes tshig tu smra bar ston// 'di ni dam tshig bzlas par gsungs// srog col dbu mar 'jug pa ni// me zhes de bar ldan pa ste// rtsa gnyis gzung 'dzin drung 'gag pas// aHzhes s+ho/
115b2: pa'i sgo yin no// gung gnyis rtsa ba'i/ yin te// gzhan du yan lag nyid tu 'gyur// a li bcu gnyis dag dang 'dres// de dag dbye ba rim pa yang // bla ma'i kha las rtogs par 'gyur// rlung gi bye brag bshad pa ni/
115b3: chos gcig snga dro zla ba ste// stong pa'i srog la nyi ma rgyu// tshes brgyad tho rangs rlung nyid de// nyi shu gnyis la cha bskams pas// de'i grangs ni bstan pa la// tshwa ni nyis brgya nyi shu lnga// sa dang me dang rlung dag la'ang /
115b4: de nyid bzhin du mnyam par 'byung // dbyu gu gnyis la chu tshod gcig/ de la bzhi brgya lnga bcu yin// chu tshod gnyis la 'pho ba gcig/ de la dgu brgya phrag cig ste// 'pho ba gnyis la thun cig ste// de la stong dang
115b5: brgyad brgya'o/ / thun ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yin// de la nyi khri chig stong ste// spyir sdoms nyin zhag gcig la ni// 'pho ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin// khri phrag gnyis dang stong dang ni// drug brgya 'byung bar chub yin// chu tshod
115b6: sum bcu gnyis la ni/ / dbyu gu drug bcu rtsa bzhi yin// de dag 'byung ba 'dzin pa ni// chu sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi rgyu// zhi ba'i las ni nyi shu bzhi// sa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi las// de yi dus su rgyas pa'i las//
115b7: gnyis pa'ang de dang mnyam pa la// dbang dang drag po'i las la shis// rlung gi rim pa de dag kyang // lugs 'byung dang ni lugs bzlog pa// sgrag can du ni rgyu ba dang // ma dang bu ru rgyu ba dang // rang thog du ni rang rgyud/
115b8: gzhan thog du ni gzhan rgyu dang // po mo phrad par 'byung ba dang // ma ning dag tu 'byung ba dang // snol mar rgyu dang rkyang pa ste// de dag don ni gsal rnyed 'gyur// sa dang chu ru phrad pa sogs// de bzhin gnan pa
116a1: sbyar bar bya/ / gsal dang migs la rnam pa yis// del bye brag shes par bya// 'phrin las bzhi yi bye brag gis// chu yi rlung stongs gzung ba// phyogs dang dbyibs dang mdog rnams dang /
116a2: ring thung rgyu ba phyi nang gis// lha mo bzhi dang gnas bzhi dang // ngal dang rngub dang sbom pa dang // shin tu drag po rnam pa bzhi// chu yi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i dus// zhi ba'i las ni bya bar bshad// sa dang me dang rlung
116a3: dang gsum/ / gong ma dag gis bsgre bar bya// spyir ni rlung gi rnam pa ni// 'byung ba drag po'i rang bzhin yin// 'jug pa dbang dang rgyas pa ste// gnas pa shin tu zhi ba yin// thams cad rlung gis byed pas na// /
116a4: sdig pa mi dge ngan song ltung // 'chi dus 'og sgo gnyis nas lhung // 'pho bas 'bras bu ngan 'gro yin// dge bcu spyod pa rlung gi las// mtho ris thar pa rnams la ni// bskyod pa rlung gis byed pa ste// tshangs pa'i
116a5: sgo nas mkha' spyod du/ / 'pho bar 'gyur ro sems dpa' che// rlung 'khrugs pas ni las rnams 'khrugs// zhing sogs 'khrugs pas las mi 'grub// ro snyoms pas ni nad med cing // yon tan phun sum
116a6: tshogs pa 'byung / / dbu ma legs pa'i lam bzang pos// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas thob nas// sku bzhi ye shes lnga 'byung ba// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub// rig 'dzin mos par spyod pa ste// dang po las kyi
116a7: sa zhes pa/ / 'dod khams gnas pa'i gzhi yin te// de phyir las rnams rlung gis byed// ces dpal rdo rje 'chang gis spyod pa'i gnas grol ba'i don du rab tu gsungs so// srog dang rtsol ba rab 'jug pas//
116a8: g.yas g.yon rgyu dang khong nas 'byung // thabs dang shes rab cha dag gis// gsang ba 'dir ni brjod pa yin// zla ba dang ni nyi ma yi// rab tu dbye ba bstan par bya// g.yon dang g.yas su rab sbyor bas//
116b1: rim pa ji bzhin rab tu d+hu// g.yon gyi mgrin pa nas brtsams te// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mthar gyur pas// b+hA ba'i rtsani 'og tu blta// shes dpa sa li rab 'bab pa// g.yas su'ang lte ba nas brtsams te/
116b2: mgrin pa'i rtser ni byin bskyod pa// nyi ma'i rtsa ni gyen du blta// dmar dang ka li 'byung zhing 'bab// 'byung byed sna'i bu gnas/ rgyub rgyami mtshan nyid can// 'jug pa g.yon nas thar du 'gro// 'byung ba g.yas kyi
116b3: gyen du bskyod/ / ji srid nyi ma shar ba nas// nub kyi bar la nyin mo'i cha// ji srid nub pa nyid gyur pas// nam na dra bar du mtshan mo'i cha// mtshams las bar mar gyur pa dang // nyin mtshan gnyis la zhag
116b4: gcigaste/ / de las dus pazhir gnas pa yin// de las nyin dang mtshan mo yi// thun tshod brgyad tu 'gyur ba yin// yan lag bcu drug ngag yin te// thun ni phyed phyed dag tu rlung // sna yi bu gar yang dag
116b5: d+hU/ / yang ngo tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du thun phyed la// zla ba'i rlung ni rab rgyub// de nas gzhan gsum nyi ma'i rlung // 'dis ni go rims ji srid du// yar mes bcwa lnga'i bar
116b6: du'o/ / mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung ste// nyin zhag gsum du snga dro'i cha// grags pa nyi ma'i rlung rgyu ba'o// de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga'i par// thun re yi ni bzhi pa rnams// chu tshod du ni sngo
116b7: pa na/ / nyin zhag gcig gi dus kyi cha// sum bcu rtsa gnyis brjod par bya// de las bsgres pa'i dbyu gu ni// drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i grangs kyis ni// phyed phyed bstan pas dbyu gu yin// sna rtse'i rlung gi rgyu ba
116b8: dag/ 'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa las// dbugs gcig tu ni brjod pa yin// de nyid rlung gi sbyor shes pas// dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya// srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang // dbugs gsum
117a1: rkang pa de dang ldan/ / nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi// nyi ma dang po'i dbyu gu yin// nyi ma lhor ni 'byung dus kyi// mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// dbyu gu re re 'phel 'grib ni// dus kyi dbye bas shes
117a2: par bya/ / dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas// 'phob so so'i 'phel 'grib yin// dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi cha'i// drug chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur// bun ni phyed byed rgyub las// phyin ci log tu 'phos gyuras/
117a3: rtsod pa la sogs des 'gyur bas// mkhas pas nyi ga yang dag brtag/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar dag tu// phyin ci log tu rgyu ba na// de tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur// zla phyed bar du log rgyun// nad chen po ni yang dag
117a4: 'byung / / zla ba gcig tu log rgyun// snying brtse'i gnyen phyogs brlag par 'gyur// phye dang gnyis su log rgyu can// thun mong dus su shes par bya// gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ba// mnyam po drug tu nyi ma song //
117a5: gang tshe skyes pa nyi ma zla// de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus// 'chi bar nges pa'i dus yin no// dang po dus sbyor gang shes pa// gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir// des ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song // mnyam po drug ces bya /
117a6: bar bshad// nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du// rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang // mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya// dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung // bskyod pa gzhan du 'jug zur na//
117a7: de yi 'pho ba rdzogs 'gyur tshe// srog ni gtong bar the tshom med// 'dir ni 'chi bdag gzhom 'dod pas// nyin zhag gcig gi chu tshod kyi// brgyad cha re re'i bar dag tu// srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas ni// rtsa
117a8: gnyis nas ni 'byung ba dang / / 'jug pa dbu mar lam gyur pa// spar dang sreg dang bzhu ba dang // shin tu 'bar ba'i dus dag rtsa// lo drug bar du gnas byas na// 'chi bdag 'joms pa the tsom med// g.yas
117b1: nas chu tshod bzhi dag dang / / de bzhin g.yon nas chu tshod bzhi// dbu mar shin tu bsdam byas la// bdud las rnam par rgyal ba thob// rdo rje gsang ba 'chi bdag 'joms pa dang // bdud la rnam par rgyal bar byed/
117b2: pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// spyi dang khyad par tshul gyis ni// ngo bo rlung gi chos rnams kun// rnam phye rim pa shes par bya// sems dpa'/
117b3: chen po 'di shes byos// 'di dag rgyas par phye ba ni// rgyas par gyur pa khri phrag bcu// nyon mongs phung po de rnyed dang // rlung dang mnyam par 'gag pa las// chos kyi phung po de snyed thob// sa re thob cing
117b4: rlung 'gags pas/ / bcu pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe// dam tshig mngon du gyur pas na// nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yin// sa brgyad par ni gyur pa'i tshe// nyon mongs phung por rigs pa ni// khri phrag
117b5: brgyad pos spangs pa na/ / phyir mi ldog pa zhes brjod do// lhag ma drug brgya stong phrag gcig/ snga ma'i gnas su rang dag ste// las kyi rlung rnams dag pa yin// khri phrag gnyis ni zag med rlung // sa bcu
117b6: pa la byin dus su/ / grangs 'bum gyi ni rnam pa nyid// dam tshig dag tu bstan pa'o// chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ni// sa bcu po la gnas pa yis// chos kyi sprin du gyur pa yin// phrin las rigs
117b7: lnga'i bzlas pa yin/ / sa lnga pa ni mngon du byed// khro bo dam tshig bzlas pa yis// drug pa mngon du gyur pa thob// dus gsum dag pa'i bzlas pa ni// legs pa'i blo gros thob par byed// dam tshig mi
117b8: 'da' bzlas pas ni/ / sa bcu mngon du gyur pa ste// rgyal ba'i rlung las 'phros pas ni// bsam mi khyab du gyur pa te// zag par bcas pa'i rlung dag ni// rigs par gnas pa de snyed yin// phra bar gyur pI
118a1: rtog pa ni/ / me phrag brgyad las 'das nas na// song phrag bzhi bcu rnas pa pani// zung byed rnyed dang rtog pa// bag la nyal baspong ba la// thag sad drung na kyi khrag gnyis// sashes /
118a2: mngon 'byung ba// 'bum du brjod pas sdus pa'o// khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag gcig/ lhag pa drug brgyad bcas pa gang // las kyi drung du brjod par bya// de yang bsdus pas thun grangs la// dus sbyor
118a3: chen pa bcu gnyis te/ / dkyil 'khor te kra rma ba na yin// ro ta dang mo haH/ b+ha pre sha bi shA pa// ku ram bkang // / maM ki ra dang bi da dr-i// b+hu ku li dang sra bin// kam ni du brjod par bya/
118a4: dang 'dug dang gnas pa dag/ gcig tu gyur pa dbugs yin te// dbugs drug chu srang gcig yin te// chu srang su la bcu byu gu phyed// dbugs drug gon drugu byed// dbu gu gnyis la chu chod ce/
118a5: tshod sum bcu rtsa gnyis las// thun ni rnam pa brgyad du bri// 'pho ba'i tshul ni bcu drug go// dbu gu dag pa'i gnas yin pas// drug bcum bzhir gnas pa'o// spyir ni sapas can khams lani// rtog
118a6: bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ / snyid yod phyir shes pa des// rlung yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// de yang bsdus pa'i don du ni// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong pas// rnam par dbye ba mkhas pa yis// zag bcas
118a7: rlung ni/ khri phrag brgyad// lhag pa stong phrag bzhi las ni// zag pa med pa'i rlung gyur pa// khri phrag gnyis kyis dag pa yin// rlung rags pas ni rtogs pa'i tshogs// de dang mtshungs par 'jug pa yin// rtog
118a8: babag la nyal gyur pas/ / rlung ni phra bar gyur pa ste// phra rags rtog pa dag pas ni// rlung ni shin tu phra bar 'gyur// rnam rtog dang ni rlung gnyis gang // mtshungs par mnyam par 'byung 'jug las// rlung
118b1: gi 'jug pa 'byung bad pa rtag pa 'thung bar mi 'gyur bas/ / dbyar las kying dag // tha phrag gnyis pa song dag dang // dag brgyadag tushes par bya// mag bya ba'i gnas kyis ni// rang bzhin pa /
118b2: 'thung ba yin// yi ge dang ni rang bzhin gnyis// gnas dang rten du shes par bya// yi ge dag pas rtog pa dag/ rtog pa 'od gsal gnas su spyod// yi ge rnam pa lus gnas pas// drug gsum
118b3: bzhin brgyad drug bcu/ / nyin mtshan sbyor bar 'byung bas na// lus gnas yi ge brgya dang ni// drug bcu gnas las 'thung zhing 'jug/ de phyir gsang ba'i yi ge yis// thams cad ma zhing lding bar 'gyur// nam/
118b4: mkha' mtha' med rtag pa'i don// sems can kun gyi gnas chen po// dpal gyi 'byor pa bla med rgyal// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// A li bcu drug phrag gnyis las// zhe sdang las gyur rtog pa
118b5: 'byung / / de yi rtsa ba thig ler bcas// sum bcu gsum du gyur pa yin// kA li sum bcu rtsa ba'i dang // ya ral wad d+ha ste// bzhi bcu mngon par gnas pas na// 'dod chags rtog pa de snyed yin// zung
118b6: g+hur drug ldan thig ler bcas/ / mtsha ma bdun gyis mtshon pa'i phyir// dbum ma la rten gti mug pa'i// rang bzhin ma rig gyur pa'o// snga ma g.yas rtsal brten pa// skyes pa rdo rjer bcas gyur brjod//
118b7: gong du g.yonaHlas 'byung ba// bud med pad ma'i mtshan pas brjod// rtsa yi byed pa mi 'dra ste// khams dang rnam shes 'du ba yi// rted du gyur phyir rtsa yin te// rnam par bzlog na gnyis su 'gyur// thig
118b8: le 'bo 'gyur phyi rol bzhin/ / zla ba lus la 'pho ba ste// tshes gcig la sogs rkang g.yon nas// the bo sogs 'phel spyi bor gnas// de nas g.yas kyi cha la ni// zla ba rim kyis grib par 'gyur/
119a1: 'phel dang 'grib pa'i khyad par gyis// bcol byang chub sems skyed byed// dkar phyogs nag po rim shes bya// snong ba'i tshul ni de bder spyad// gnam stong nyi ma gsang bar te// zla ba nya gang tshes
119a2: kyis rgyas/ / khyad par sgra ga can rim shes bya// bla na med pa rigs pa dang phra ba'i gnas 'jug ldog ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa pos// khyad par sems gsum rim pa
119a3: bka' stsal to/ / snang ba zhes bya rnam par mi rtog pa// gsal ba'i cha ste gzung rtog spangs pa las// 'byung ba mi mngon chud dang bcas pa gang // lha der gnas pa skad cig dang po yin// mchod pa'i snang ba rab tu/
119a4: mi rtog ste// ches gsal ba las 'dzin rtog ma zhugs pa// ye shes phra ba rlung ldan mi snang ba// lhan ne gnas pa skad cig gnyis pa yin// thob pa'i cha ni shin tu mi rtog pa// gsal ba tsam du'ang mi gnas
119a5: shin du phra/ / rlung sems mi byed gsal bar 'char ba min// lha me gnas pa skad gcig gsum pa yin// nye bar thob pa dri ma med pa ste// rang byung dang gsal bde ba dmigs su med// phra rags rab gsal
119a6: ting nge 'dzin du gnas/ / skad cig bzhi pa mi 'gyur khyab byed yin// 'od gsal ba ni bsam gtan zag pa med// rdul med sa bon med pas mi g.yo ba// lhan cig gnas pa chos sku'i snying po ni// lhun grub/
119a7: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// sgyu ma 'di nyid yod med las 'das shing // dbu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas kun rdzob ste// chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i snang ba las// 'gag pa med pa'i rol pa rang byung ba'o// zung
119a8: 'jug bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can/ / chos dbyings chos nyid dbyer med dag pa'i sku// tha dad rnam bral mi byed ye shes te// gsang ba chen po'i lam las 'dir rtogs bya// thun mong dbang phyug dang mi rtags bcas
119b1: pa'abang phyug brgyad ldan 'char ba 'di 'id do/ / phra zhing yang la phra bar nub pa dang // spyod par nus dang bdag nyid chen po dang // dga' mgur byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod byed dang dbang phyug don du 'chang/
119b2: su'i dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang // thugs kyi dbang phyug de nyid phrin las dang // rdzu 'phrul kun du 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang // gang 'dod steng dang khyang par don brgyud do// phung po khams dang skye mched bsdu
119b3: pa yin/ / lnga po'i dbye ba lnga ru byas pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa so sor byin gyis brlabs// 'khor ba'i las rnams dag ni rnam dag pas// de bzhin dbang po'i phyi rol yul bcas lnga// ri re zhing yang bde
119b4: gshegs lnga rnams kyi/ / de la rang dang rtag tu byin gyis rlob// ye shes lnga dang gsum du gnas pas yang dag par bsdus shes gsungs te// gsang ba zab pa'i tshul bstan pa// rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes
119b5: kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las mnyam
119b6: pa nyid 'byung bar bstan par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o/ / // rtag pa gsum pa rdo rje gsang ba ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas bcom ldan pa de gshegs
119b7: kun/ / gsang chen ye shes rdo rje 'dzin// sems can don du yang dag 'byung // blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis// don kun thub pa rdo rje 'dzin// rgyal ba de la brgyad byas te// gsang bang ma tshig mkhyen pa
119b8: la/ / mchod cing bstod pas gsang chen gyi// rdo rje dbyings ni bshad pa yin// e mtshul bzang sangs rgyas pa// de nyid rigs brgya bsdus pa'i sku// de nyid tshul mchog byang chub pa// rigs kyi sangs rgyas
120a1: lngar bsdus pa/ / byang chub snying po tshul zhi ba// gsang ba rigs gsum bla na med// gsang ba'i tshul ni gcig pa nyid// rgyas gdab rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// ye shes rim pa nyid du bstan// ma skyes pa/
120a2: yis rang bzhin las// khyad par ngo bo rang byung ba// yang dag rnam par mi rtog pas// bla med mngon par 'byung bar grags// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dpal ldan chos kyi rang bzhin sku//
120a3: rtog pa'i dri ma 'gag byed pas// sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor du// phra ba'i rnam par gzhug par bya// de nyid rnam shes 'pho ba'i dngos// gdan bcas sa bon thim par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bar snang khams//
120a4: khyab cing bzhugs par rab bsgom pa// yi ge gsang ba rang sngags la// thim pa gcig tu bsdu bar bya// thugs kyi ngo bor bsam par bya// thams cad sgyu ma'i sbyor ba yis// dngos kun rang bzhin mtshungs par
120a5: blta/ sangs rgyas thams cad sems su yang // slar yang bsgoms nas de rab bsdu// gsang ba gcig tu dbang bya yi// 'pho ba sku gsum rim par 'byung // chos dbyings mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin// mi
120a6: shigs 'od kyi gong bu las/ / nad tsam du snang ba gang // mi 'gag rang bzhin dag par gnas// gsang ba rdo rje'i rin chen gyi// bar snang byed pa'i ting 'dzin bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha'
120a7: yas bsags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams bdag med
120a8: pa yi dngos/ / gnyug ma dbyer med stong nyid dang // zag pa med cing 'phel med pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba'i
120b1: c hags can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drim med pa'i ma'od ngan pa che mda' ba sangs rgyas thams kyi pad mo rnam par rol pa'i 'thung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la stongs pa grags kyi kyang nababyas pas
120b2: 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa// skye med snying gi pad ma la// sa bon rdzogs pa'i snying po gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bar/
120b3: ba'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang byu dgi rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// zla ba'i snying po 'od 'bro ba// chu rgyun 'bab pa'i zer ldan
120b4: gyis/ bsam pa'i ye shes rgyun gyis ni// thogs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das srid pa las rgal ba sangs rgyas thas cad kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la rol pa rdo rje zhes
120b5: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sna tshogs dngos po'i chos nyid ni// spros pa med phyir snang med pas// theg pa mchog gi chos nyid kyis// gsang pa'i tshul 'di ston
120b6: pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rten
120b7: cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dngos/ / rtag dang chad pa las gro zhing // yang dag don mthong dang grol gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan
120b8: bar sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dri ma med pa'i chos nyid ni// gdod nas dag pa de bzhin gshegs// snying po ye shes byang chub
121a1: pas/ / gsang ba'i tshul 'di ban pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes seng ge'i rtsal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
121a2: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las// thub pa don kun rdo rje 'dzin// mchod de rdo rje dbyings 'dir gsungs// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
121a3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs chen gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gnyis su med pas 'du 'bral
121a4: med/ / rnam par grol ba'i phung po can// bde chen sku ste skyon med pa// byang chub tshul 'di stan po'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad phung po lnga dag pa'i stobs
121a5: kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag/ 'dus pa las ni skye bzhin pa// de yang yul las rab tu 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
121a6: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khrungs chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug ste byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// /
121a7: denyid mnyam pa med pa yi// rdo rje zla ba 'dus las 'byung // tha dad dmigs pa rab zhi bas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po
121a8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes skyob pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so/ / ye shes 'byung gnas sa chen ltar// de nyid bden mthong chos
121b1: kyi spyan/ / shes rab zab mo'i spyod yul gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams yongs
121b2: su dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mkhyen pa dag pa chos kyi dbyings// rnam pa kun du rang byung bas// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs
121b3: mdzad pa/ / thub pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen pos khyab par mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis thogs pa med pa'i gnas
121b4: pa spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / la gnon chos ni gsang ba che// me zad rgyan gyi sgrub pa'i gzhi// de nyid nges pa stobs gyur
121b5: pas/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
121b6: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten khams ni sna tshogs su// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs kyi phyir// rnam rol ye shes spyod pa yis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
121b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gsal ba'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'gag pha rol pa'i sgra rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// zhi
121b8: bye ba mtha' yas par/ / mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dbyings gcig gis// tha dad du mar khyab byed pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas chen po/
122a1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi rtog pa rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtog pa sna tshogs bsdus pa yi// ye shes gcig
122a2: gis gnas pa las/ / tha dad ting 'dzin dag pa'i ngang // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don yod 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i yul rdo rje zhes
122a3: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ye shes rdo rje ro gcig par// lan tshwa chu bzhin spyod pa ni// skal bzangs tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
122a4: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i drang srong skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dri ma med pa'i rdo rje skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
122a5: lha dang mi yi ston pa gang // rkang gnyis thams cad mkhyen pa ste// ma 'ongs bla ma'i gzugs kyi gnas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas thams
122a6: cad rdzu 'phrul mi zad pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bstan g.yo ma lus snang ba'i gzhi// de nyid kun du bsgyur ba po// de nyid
122a7: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun bstan pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu dbang gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
122a8: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gdug pa ma lus gdon byung ba// de nyid rtog pa'i dra ba las// kun byung dag par 'dul byed pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
122b1: gsang ba'i rgyal po bcom ldan gyis// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' la// rab tu bskul te bstan pa gang // rab tu nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor gang du bsgrub pa yi// gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa// rgyu dang
122b2: rtags dang go cha dang / / rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa ste// 'jug pa sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// dmigs pa bsdus pa nyid yin no// rlung dang sngags dang sgra las ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o// gang du sems kyi snang ba las//
122b3: rab dben rim pa gnyis par brjod// rmi lam rgyu ma'i chos can las// bdag byin brlab pa'i rim par gyur// bsam gtan sbyor dang 'od gsal ba// mngon par byang chub rim pa nyid// de las gnyis med de bzhin nyid//
122b4: rim pa lnga bzung 'jug lam// lus sems ngag gi chos bsdus pas// tshul gsum mngon par byang chub pa// de nyid ye shes lnga dag tu// rigs kyi dbye bas bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang //
122b5: gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las chos kyi tshul bsdu ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom
122b6: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzang rtog skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thabs dang bsam pa gang gang gis// lus 'di
122b7: spyod pas sbyar bas na/ / sems ni ting nge 'dzin gyis to// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ku ga'i rtse ma lar bramo
122b8: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis rol pa yi// bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes sku// rang rig nyid las tha dad med// byang chub tshul 'di
123a1: bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa'i chu 'dzin pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
123a2: gsungs so/ / bde gshegs gdung ni rgyas pa gang // thugs rje dag pa'i stobs yin te// 'gro ba gso ba'i tshul gyis ni// byang chub ye shes bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi shugs
123a3: 'chang ba ltar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sman pa'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'gro ba kun gyi 'khor ba yi// nad sa la thabs mchog
123a4: byams pa'i dpal/ / brtse sems tshad med srung ba po// zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lags bsam grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo dri ma sel bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya 'i
123a5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang bzhin rtog pa'i dri ma rnams// gzung 'dzin chos kyis bsdus pa'i dngos// dbu ma'i ngang du rang dag pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
123a6: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chu bo'i rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi cho
123a7: kyi lam/ / tshul cig theg pa cig pa nyid// byang chub chen po bla na med// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i tshogs chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhal med
123a8: kyi gnas ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thams cad rang bzhin stong pa'i dbyings// gzhi med rtsa bral 'dus ma byas// brjod med nam mkhan
123b1: ngo bo nyid/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'grib pa med par bsrung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul rin po che'i zom zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
123b2: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// pha rol phyin pa mnyam pa nyid// snang ba med cing rnam pa med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
123b3: gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros snang ba bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten mun pa sel mdzad cing /
123b4: sa gsum gsal bar byed pa yi// glog gi 'od kyi 'char ba po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phebardob pa'i sgra
123b5: smasnyan lta bur ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du chos kyi don 'byung ba// bla na med pa byang chub sems// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur ston// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
123b6: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'grogs brtan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i mig ston pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
123b7: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni// lam gyi rim pa thams cad par// 'dam bzangs chu yi bdud rtsi ltar// skal bzangs de nyid tshul shes byos// zhes gsungs so// de nas de
123b8: bzhin gshegs pa 'od gnas mtshungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhon nu'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos kyi tshul ni zhi ba nyid// bcu drug ye she
124a1: brgyan pa nyid/ / skad cig bden pa byang chub pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun nas snang ba
124a2: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gis// kun du dbang bskur gyur pa yi// skal ba tsani na kun du bzang // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
124a3: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du rtog pas
124a4: brtags pa yi/ / snang ba 'di ni sgyu ma tsam// de nyid las dang bag chags bral// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngos bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa
124a5: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mi shigs rdo rje'i sku nyid ni// rnam pa du mas spungs pa gang // phra rab dbyer med dag pa'i rgyal// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
124a6: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun tu ye shes rgyal
124a7: ba yi/ / drod dang rtags las 'das pa'i chos// bsgom bya med cing dmigs med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid snang ba sangs rgyas thams
124a8: cad kyi ting ngange 'dzin snang ba med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/ yul gang // de nyid sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste// bdag med chos
124b1: las rang byung ba/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa chen po mchog gi ye shes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sprin 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
124b2: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dgos 'dod thams cad char bzhin du// rang sems nor bu'i rgyal pos 'grub// 'di nyid rin chen mdzod chen po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
124b3: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs batshangs par gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bskul ba tshad med pa bla ma'i snying po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
124b4: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so/ / dkon mchog gsum gyi dpal ldan pas// rang rig ye shes gcig la rdzogs// rgyun du bde ba ster byed pas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas
124b5: de bzhin gshegs pa bden par ston pa yang dag pa'i gnas blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bgrod med lam ni gcig pa'i chos
124b6: ye shes mig gi yul gyur pas/ / mthar thug snying po byang chub mchog/ rgyal ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// 'dir ni gsang ba'i bka' spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' chen po yi// dam tshig ye
124b7: shes bstan pa la/ / gsang ba 'dzin pa rab ston cing // 'dir ni sangs rgyas bstan pa la// theg chen chos la rab zhugs kyang // de don gsal bar mi shes pas// gsang ba'i tshul 'di rtogs dka' ste// brda dang /
124b8: dgongs pas bshad pa dang // ji bzhin pa dang min drang don// dngos po'i chos la mi spyod par// skra dang yi ge'i rjes 'brang ba'i// phyi rol bstan bcos la dga' zhing // tshig don bdud rtsi'i rgyab kyis phyogs// de
125a1: la dngos grub nye dka' ste/ / gsang ba 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
125a2: bar rgyal ba las yongs su dag pa'i gnas rdo rje'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
125a3: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rten 'brel yang dag 'byung ba las// kun rdzob nyid kyi chos nyid ni// dbyer med don dam rnam par dben// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de
125a4: bzhin gshegs pa stobs sbyin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin chen sgron me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po 'di dag
125a5: ma skyes pas/ / de nyid dngos por mi gnas shing // rang bzhin 'od gsal rtag pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgas
125a6: kun du chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rdo rje lam dur bzhugs nas// nor bu dri med zla ba yi// skyon gyis mgos ye shes nyid// byang chub tshul 'di sa
125a7: pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog pa'i dpa' rlabs g.yo ba med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung
125a8: so/ / rdo rje gsang ba bla na med// mnyam sbyor bde ba dri ma med// mi 'dzag mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas sangs rgyas
125b1: thams cad kyi rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun tu mngon par mi gnas pa// gnyis med ye shes chos kyi rgyal// rnam par
125b2: mi rtog chags med pas/ / byang chub tshul 'di snyan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ster mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
125b3: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snang srid ma lus bcom ldan 'das// thams cad stong pa nyid las skyes// de nyid ye shes rgyu 'bras can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
125b4: pa yon tan snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stong nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// sems nyid mnyam par mtshungs
125b5: pas na/ / mi 'gag go 'byed khyab gyur pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye dgu'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge
125b6: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stong nyid dngos po ma yin te// dngos min gyur pa'ang stong pa min// ngo bo nyid ni rnam dag pa// stong nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
125b7: so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po rmad du byung ba sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi semra 'di gsungs so// 'byung ba bzhi
125b8: dag nam mkhar gnas/ / de nyid gang la'ang mi gnas te// sems can sangs rgyas la brten pa// sangs rgyas mi gnas tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi mtshugs pa
126a1: thub pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gzod nas ma skyes dag pa nyid// srid zhi mnyam nyid rdzogs
126a2: sangs rgyas/ / 'gro 'ong rnam bral tshul thob pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpag bsam gyi shing lta bur bskyed pa rdo rje
126a3: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sa bon myu gu dang // sdong bu 'dab ma 'bras bu'i bar// tshul brgyad 'gyur ba'i bye brag gis// rten 'brel de nyid tshul bstan pa'o//
126a4: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ljon pa'i shing chen po ltar rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem 'di gsungs so// /
126a5: 'gro snying rnam rtog zhes bya gang // rang rig byang chub snying po'i gnas// de las yon tan brjod mi lang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs pa sangs
126a6: rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i sil snyan 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mi rtag bdag med zhi ba yis// 'du shes sems pa sngon rgyu las// bag chags spangs
126a7: bas gnas thob gyur/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mthu rtsa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra bud pa lta bur lding ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
126a8: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par rig byed las 'das shing // de spangs bsam pa'i ldog pa yis// dbye bas tha dad shes par bya// 'di ni snying po'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so//
126b1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal zhing khams bkod pa phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas
126b2: kun gyi zhing khams gang / / snang mdzad rgyal po'i 'od kyi skyes// rten mdzad ye shes snang ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lta bden sangs rgyas thams ca
126b3: kyi ye shes kyi snang ba bai dUr+yar ston pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'gyur ba med pa'i rin po che// gcig tu sbyar bar byed pa can// nor bu rtog pa'i
126b4: blo bral ba/ / nges par tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mun pa dmag rum sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
126b5: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor ba'i mun pa sel ba yi// byin rlabs 'od kyi sgron ma yis// snang ba ston cing 'joms pa gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
126b6: gshegs pa dpal ye shes kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snying por gyur pa rang srog las// mi
126b7: shigs go 'phang gnas spyod pa/ / de nyid rlung sems dbyer med pas// byang chub tshul 'di snyan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa bcings pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spro ba
126b8: dpag med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos dbyings ye shes spyod yul bas// mi gnas mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid// tshad med rang byung mi rtog byir// byang
127a1: chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis ma
127a2: 'di gsungs so/ / nges 'byung rnam par mi gnas pa// 'khor ba dag pa'i sems gnas pa// de nyid ye shes tshul gsum gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// gang du sngon byung sangs rgyas dang // ma 'ongs
127a3: byon gyur de bzhin gshegs/ / da ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsang ba 'di las yang dag 'byung // sems kyi bslab pa la phyogs shing // zab pa rig pa 'dzin pa dang // de nyid mdo sder gang bstan pa// phyi nang gnyis
127a4: su bstan pa yin/ / gsang ba bla na med pa'i don// snying po'i don rnams ston byed pa// 'bras bu rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// tshe 'di nyid la mngon gyur pas// thabs kyi khyad par gyur pa ste// rdo rje theg pa zhes brjod do// zhes
127a5: gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba bla na med pa'i don yongs su
127a6: bskyong ba'i le'u ste sum bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes don kun 'dzin mdzad pa/ dus gsum bdag po dpal ldan pas// gsang ba ye shes spyod pa gsungs// gnyis med mnyam pa mi 'gyur ba/
127a7: dus gsum rtag tu rang byung nyid// skye ba med pa las sprul zhi// ma skyes rang bzhin brjod du med// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ye shes las// sgyu ma tsam du bstan
127a8: pa yin/ / rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bur ni// gnas pa brjod bya don gyi chos// de nyid nges par don bston pas// rjod byed sgra yi phyogs su bshad// gsang chen theg pa snying po'i don// rgyal po chen po rang la gnas// mchog
127b1: chu brtag pa 'dus pa ste/ / bden gnyis zung 'jug ston pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa lha'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug ste byang chub
127b2: kyisems 'di gsungs so/ / de nyid gsang ba'i ye shes che// snying po phyag rgya chen po'i dang // zab dang rgya tshe'i tshul gnas pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs
127b3: dbu sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba kun 'dus rig pa'i rang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas pas// sku bzhi ye shes mchog rtag pas// dri med
127b4: 'dul ba'i tshul mchog go zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dal gyis bzhud pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par 'byings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
127b5: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems// 'bad pa med par 'byung ba ni// chos rnams dbyer med gcig pa'i sku// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
127b6: gshegs pa brtul zhugs dka' thub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bar 'gro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mthong chos don yod snying po ni// 'bras
127b7: bu grub pa'i rkyen 'byung ba/ / de nyid sar byed rnam par thar// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi skam sar gnas
127b8: pa rdo rje rje bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yi// spyod yul sna tshogs 'byung ba na// thar pa'i lam la spyad par bya// byang chub
128a1: tshul 'di bstan du 'o nas gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhan gshegs pa gci can po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa dag pardo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi cing nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs /
128a2: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// bsam gtan sbyor ba sgyu ma yis// nye bar 'grub pa yang dag pa'i// gsang mtha' tshul 'dings bstan yin// de nyid spyod bston pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
128a3: btsam ba ka'i mdog can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dring srong skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bsod nams mthar thug stobs chen po// dge ba'i rtsab
128a4: brtan las babyung / / 'bras bu bzhis ni thub pa'i rgyan// byang chub tshul 'di ston pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan pa
128a5: zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de nyid stong nyid mtshan ma med// smon pa med pa byang chub gzhi// nam thar ye shes 'bras thob pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
128a6: sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis snum lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
128a7: chos gang skye ba med pa dang // 'gag pa med par 'byung ba gang // bla med gsang ba'i don bstan pas// de nyid tshul 'di ston pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams
128a8: cad kyis smig sbrul bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams gzugs brnyan rmi lam dang // sprul pa mtshungs par ston pa gang //
128b1: nyid rang bzhin 'byung ba'i dngos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rmil ma sgyu ma lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
128b2: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rmi lam gzugs snar ltar// bag chags sdang ba rang dag par// dri ma sbyang phyir bstan pa ga// de nyid tshul 'di bstan par//
128b3: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chu zla lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gcig gis du mar khyab pa yi//
128b4: ngo bo rang stong thig le gcig/ zhen med phyag rgya 'byung ba yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri za'i grong khyer lta bur 'char
128b5: brdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dag pa'i ye shes yang dag pa// bcings pa med cing grol ba'ang med// byang chub
128b6: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snun par mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'i/
128b7: gsungs so// gang du sangs rgyas rnams dang ni// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// de sprul dman par mos pa 'dul// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs/
128b8: 'gro dpa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chu'i chu bur lta bur mkhyen pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lan tshwa rgya mtshor thim pa ltar/
129a1: rba rlabs zhi ba'i rade bzhin gyis// thob med ye shes sbyor don 'gro// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa don legs nges// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
129a2: mig yor stong pa'i dngos po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sad pas sad byed pa// kun nas ldang bzhi pa yi// bsnyengs med don gsal byang chub pa/
129a3: de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog tshad med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
129a4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / srid las grol zhing bde thob dang // mchog don gnas pa dag pa'i gnas// byang chub tshul dag 'khor lo yis// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de na
129a5: de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bstan pa 'di ni
129a6: byang chub lam/ / de nyid snying po sdom pa nyid// bslab pa yongs dag 'ja' tshon ltar// nges pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs rgyas thams cad glog/
129a7: gi 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ni// glog ltar 'byung ba'i yid kyis ni// kun tu 'phrin las bya ba las//
129a8: 'jug pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg pa bsam pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin 'phro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
129b1: so/ / sangs rgyas dus gsum thams cad tu// dri med rtag par 'byung ba'i gzhi// legs mchod bsam pa'i rgyun 'bab te// byang chub rgya la 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i rgyal po mi/ 3)
129b2: bu ston pa'i lam gyur pa/ / mi byed ye shes mnga' bdag 'chang // bab dang rgya che'i tshul bstan pa'o// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i cha// rgyu dang mi r+g+ha'i dngos po kun// khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// gnod nas
129b3: dag pa'i ye shes gnas/ / thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas med// gsang chen bde ba'i go 'phang can zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang pa 'dus pa
129b4: rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las theg pa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod
129b5: nams rgyal po'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dul ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rtog pa'i dra ba gsal ba yi// ye shes rnam thar dag pa yi/
129b6: gsal ba yongs ngag rjes 'gro bas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
129b7: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba chos 'byung yangs pa yi// dag pa dri med gnas kyi cha// cha dang cha min rnam spangs pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
129b8: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha' dag pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing //
130a1: 'bar ba thig lenA dpral// ye shes sku ste rnam dag pas// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
130a2: gnas rdo rje rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi// 'od zer 'phro bas 'khrugs pa yi// lha mo gar gyis mchod byed pa'i// gsar
130a3: batshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang dpe byad dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
130a4: 'di gsungs so/ / lha dang mi rnams kun la yang // de nyid ye shes skal pa can// bzang po srid gsum sbyar bar bya// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan sangs
130a5: rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i gzhal med dag pa rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams kun tu mi phyed pa'i// tha dad blo ni rnam spangs nas// yang dag ye she
130a6: snang ba can/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkra shis gdugs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
130a7: 'di gsungs so/ / gling rnams kun gyi sems can khams// byams pa'i gdugs kyis khyab byed pa// mtha' skor bgrang mi lang bar ston// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
130a8: gshegs pa blogs la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nya'i lho lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bsam mi khyab pa'i chos kyi gnas// 'dren pa bdud rtsi spyan
130b1: yangs pas/ / thugs rjes rgyun chad med par gzigs// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad ma lta bur ston pa zhes bya ba'i
130b2: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa'i mthus// drang por smra ba'i ljags dbang po// gsar dmar po ltar ston pas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa
130b3: zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dung lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
130b4: tshad med thugs kyi gter chen po// rnam par dkar ba'i chos phyogs kyis// bar mtshams med par gnas thob pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po
130b5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bum pa lta bu rdo rje zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdud las rnam par rgyal ba yi// bum pa chen pos don byed pa// thog ma med pa'i byang
130b6: chub sems/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be'u rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
130b7: 'di gsungs so/ / gang du tshangs dang brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong bar bcas pa yis// mchod cing rdo rje'i dbang phyug sku// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma
130b8: med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che rgyal mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa'i// kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar
131a1: ma nub dam pa'i gtso bo yis/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par mdzes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang phyag gi 'thil lakho
131a2: lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thub pas 'gro ba'i ngan song rgyun// yongs su gcod cing sbyor mdzad pas// rnam par gnon pa'i mchog
131a3: mnga' ba'i/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo khengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
131a4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni 'gro ba 'drul don du// lus srog zas dang longs spyod kyis// kun la chags med tshul du bskyed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
131a5: gshegs pa rdo rje sbrang ci'i zhal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan par smra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skabs dang 'brel ba'i don 'gyur bas//
131a6: bcung zad yang dag don sbyor ba'i// phan pa ster ba'i byang chub kyis// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don 'thun pa rdo rje sangs
131a7: rgyas thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mthong na mi mthun med pa yi// dpal gyi zhing du bskrod pa'i lam// yang dag don la sbyor byed pas// de nyid
131a8: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grog byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don spyod po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
131b1: mngang byung ba'i khyad par gyis// gtso bor gzhan don sems pa gang // kun snang dpe ma dmakhas pa po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa
131b2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa/ / ri ga rin chen ldan po sar// brjid cing dpa' ba'i thub pa'i skus// sprul pa sa
131b3: por mi gnas pa/ / de nyid byang chub tshul bstan po'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug pa mi mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byu /
131b4: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du thog ma mi dmigs shing // tha ma med pa'i ye shes las// rnam par dben don dag pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas gas dpa 'dzin pa'o//
131b5: sa 'ongs byang chub don gyi phyir// dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin// sku gsum snying po bsdus pa'i bdag/ 'gro don spyod phyir 'byung ba ste// stobs can sna tshogs nags khrod du// thub pa dpal gyi rgyal po ste// shAH
131b6: dge slong li tsa byi/ / gzhon nu 'phags pa'i blo can gyis// rim dang gcig char rgyas par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis
131b7: bu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba dag pa mchog gi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'khor
131b8: los sgyur ba rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stong khams kha lo sgyur byed pa// chos kyi rgyal po dge ba'i stobs// dpud chen
132a1: la mkhas pa nyid/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi yon tan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya bas/
132a2: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang sems dag pa'i nor bu ni// yon tan du ma 'byung ba'i gzhi// mi zad dge ba rdzogs las 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsung
132a3: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhing bzang po mtshungs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos 'dzin pa'i btsun mo rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
132a4: 'di gsungs so/ / shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// mnyam med bla ma mchog dgyes pa'i// tshul 'di dri med 'od tu 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa'i
132a5: rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje rab ribasel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dam skyes pad ma mdangs thon ltar// rang rig gsal ba'i ye shes
132a6: nyid/ / skyon gyis mgos phra ba nyid// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
132a7: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dri med uta bal 'bar ba la// rnyog pa'i dri mas mgos ltar// ra grol byung ba'i ye shes mtshungs// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so
132a8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin byed 'od 'phro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgron me lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mnyam nyid mi 'gyur snang ba bral//
132b1: bob ming thob bral 'gro 'ong med// dbri ba dang ni gang med pa'i// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nam mkha' lta bu zhes
132b2: byaba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa/ / chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las// 'gyur ba med cing 'pho ba med// rnam pa kun tu mkha' byings klong// byang chub tshul 'dra/
132b3: bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du son pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so
132b4: skye ba med las gang skyes pa/ / de ni ma skyes sbyor ba'i dngos// tshad med ting 'dzin sbyor ba po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin du bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye
132b5: shes kun du rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du 'gag pa bral ba yi// chos nyid rang byung lhun gyis grub// de ni 'gag pa med pa'i dngos// byang /
132b6: chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
132b7: gsungs so/ / de bzhin nyid las dben pa yi// don dam dmigs pa'i yul min phyir// 'dres pa rdul tsam med pa las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thugs
132b8: shin tu zhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri bo gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnas pa med pa gnas pa'i mchog/ mchog gyur rang byung mkha
133a1: ma ldang / / thugs skabasams kun 'grus suH// byang chub cus 'di bstan pa zhes gsungs sa// de nas da bzhin gshegs pa snang bas ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyir rab ldan pa nga rdzanas byab
133a2: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang ba'i chos can ma// til gyi 'bru bzhin rgyas pa yi// sangs rgyas tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsu
133a3: so/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud dang bdud kyi ris thams cad 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
133a4: bdud dang log 'dren ma lus rnams// byams pa'i ye shes chen po yis// log rtog ma lus zhi mdzad pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i rtags ngas
133a5: rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshags dag pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal be'u// 'bang pa 'od 'phra nyi ma'i dbus// rab rin chen
133a6: nar buste/ / ya shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhal med kyi gnas dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje nas byabs
133a7: nga 'dzin pa snyoms par thugs tu byang chub kyisems 'di gsangs so/ / dab med la gas dag pa'i gnas// bkad pa mangs smras rnam brgyad pa'i// nga gan stsal 'bar snang ba 'byung // nyid tus 'das
133a8: nas gsus la/ dadas dpa gshegs pazu pa 'ang grob sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lung gnas rjegs bya nga na ma mas pa grugs byang chu mas dgasus so// U
133b1: zug rdul bral ba/ / de nyid byang chub dam pa'i yul// btang snyoms dag pa bla med pa/ byang chub tshul 'i bstan pa'o// nas gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri med rgyal pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dren pa mchog rdo /
133b2: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sta bas me dmas tshag mi shes// rig pa dang ni zhabs mnga' ba// ngan 'gro grad pa legs skyob pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
133b3: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su dag par bsngo ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ang gsungs so// yul
133b4: dang dngos po byed pa po/ / rnam par mi dmigs stong pa nyid// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bsten pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
133b5: 'gro ba'i sde dpon dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thar pa'i lam na theg pa che// gsang ba dam pa chos 'khor lo// rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs bskor ba// de nyid
133b6: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i dba' rlabs gnon pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
133b7: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpag med ye shes phra ba yis// dngos por 'dzin pa'i byis pa rnams// skraganas lam mchog dgod mdzad pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
133b8: pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// ye shes bla med gnas thob pas// btsang ma'i gnas mchog legs gnas pas// bcom ldan 'og min der rtag bzhugs// kun du spyad pa'i sa phyogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
134a1: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dag pa de bzhin nyid kyi cho ga ston pa'i le'u ste sum bcu dgu pa'o/ /
134a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
134a3: gshegs pa thams cad/ dper na nam mkha' gang du yang // mtshan can kun la mi gnas te// de nyid khyab cing bdag med pas// mi ldan pa yang ma yin te// nam mkha'i chos nyid de la ni// kun du rtog pa yod min/
134a4: te// rtog cing rjes su spyod pa yi// bdag dang gzhan du rtog mi byed// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kun// rmilam lta bur snang ba ste// rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa bral// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnyan
134a5: bzhin/ / rmil ma dam tshig las byung ba// de nyid sgyu mar gyur pa dang // myad par cung zad yod min te// mi lam dang ni dngos sngang gnyis// byang ba sung mong min te// gagan du nyid rtogs par bya// d+ha dang bcas pa
134a6: ba'i gnas/ / tho ba kun gyi mgrin par skyes// yi ge a bcas gnas pa nyid// ma nu tar brjod pa gang // gzung zhi bsgyur dang spel ba dang // sgram dran da rgyas gdab pas// bris pa pas ma gtan lam du 'gyur/
134a7: com ldan 'das de bden gshegs pa thams cad zilas den bdagagis khams gsum du// thilam ma nga bar byur skyem du masems sa// skyes bu yang bdagagis nilas smos yong nyim dur sa sa
134a8: med de/ debs na khams gsum du snang ba'i bya ba de rnams kyang // bag chags gzugs su snang ba'i phyir// rmi la ma lta bur bstan pa yin// 'khrul pa de nyid tu med pas// rmil ma nyid dang mtshungs par bstan
134b1: snga ma mi gnas rang grol te/ / phyi ma 'byung ba mi 'gag phyir// rmi lam las ni 'byung bar bshad// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang
134b2: chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / / sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la bdag med pa rdo rje yang dag par bden pas stong pa'i gnas su rtogs par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra rnam par skrag
134b3: pasangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang bdag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rnam par dag pas ni// khams dang dbang po mtha' yas dang /
134b4: bsam pa'i dri ma rang dag pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtag par brtse ba zhes
134b5: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems can tha ma 'bring dang ni// mchog rnams bdud rtsi thob bya'i phyir// lhag par spro ba bskyed pa gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// /
134b6: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu dbang bdud pa'i rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so//
134b7: tshe dang gzugs dang longs spyod kyis/ gling gsum gnas las mngon 'byung ba// las dang spyod pa rtog pa las// bzlog dang ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul
134b8: zhugs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rmad tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten khams ni du ma yi// gling rnams kun du 'dug
135a1: byed pa/ / tshe 'brul bsam mi khyab pa ni// 'byung ba chul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sman ma'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pasal cing bsi lar
135a2: tsan dan ltar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du skye dang 'chi ba dang // nad dang rgas dang rgud las grol// chu bo che las sgrol ba po// byang chub tshul 'di
135a3: bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi rtog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spros pa tshad med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so
135a4: gtong ba spro dang smra ba dang / / mtshungs pa rkyen las 'byung ba gang // de nyid dad pa'i sems grol bas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rgyal po sangs rgyas
135a5: thams cad kyi 'od mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di yi 'od zer gang spros par// ting 'dzin bskyed dang dang ba thob// bde ba skyed la
135a6: sdug bsngal zhing / / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma rig pa dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms snga
135a7: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub sems cig dag pa las// gzhan du ye shes ma rnyed pas// btsal du med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes
135a8: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'du byed rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
135b1: gsungs so/ / gang du sangs rgyas zhing dag pa// de snyed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i tshogs// rnam dag tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mI
135b2: snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du bsam pa dug med pa// phun sum tshogs ni
135b3: gzhi can te/ / zla ba chos pa'i ngo bzhin te// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rgyal mdzes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis skye mched drug rnam par dag pa
135b4: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / longs spyod gtsang bas bsgrubs pa dang // lus dang yan lag dngos po yi// rdul phran gyur pa legs phul ba// byang chub
135b5: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med pa'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa'i chos rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
135b6: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul 'di// bsod nams tshogs ni sgyu ma ste// ye shes tshogs ni nam mkha' ltar// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs
135b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul sde can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis reg rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yan lag bzhi
135b8: ldan dpung tshogs bcas/ / bla med rnal 'byor pa yi gnas// zhing dang bsam pa dag pa yis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams gzi brjid
136a1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// 'gro ba kun la snyoms pa gang /
136a2: brtul zhugs khyad par bstan pa ste// tshul 'di byang chub snyeng pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams
136a3: cad kyi dpal dgyes pas khyab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i// ye shes spyod pa rnam dag pa// ni khams 'gyur med pa
136a4: snang ba/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi len pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par chug
136a5: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang gA krung gi bye ma snyed// dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas gang // zhing khams cig par yongs su dag/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
136a6: palha'i sgra can sangs rgyas kyi srid pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / phyogs bcu rnam pa
136a7: thams cad du/ / gang bzhugs bde bar gshegs pa'i tsho gas// mdzad pa cig pa'i rnam thar gyis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po sangs rgyas
136a8: thamasad kyi skye ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du ma byon 'byung ba dang // 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa 'i/ sangs rgyas khams
136b1: rgyud cig pa'i dang / / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sbyar ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyirga shi rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang /
136b2: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos kun rtog pazhi pa yi// zab pa dang ni rgya che'i bdag/ mdodang rgyud dang rtog pa las// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg pa skyed pa mtshur
