136b3: pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten 'brel dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems can smin par byed pa dang // sangs rgyas zhing skyong phrin las dag de nyid mtshung
136b4: bcig pa'i sku/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'
136b5: de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i stan la ni// gnas nas dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dmigs te sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa// dang por
136b6: sgo tshogs tho ldan gyis bya zhing / / dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// sdig pa thams cad bshags pa la sogs bya// gang zhig thogs med srid pa'i chu brang du// ma lus kun tog gis bskyed rnyog pa rnams
136b7: thugs rje rje ldan spyan sngar de dag ni/ / rim bzhin tshogs thams cad bshags par gyis// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis dge ba mdzad rnams la// de dag kun
136b8: la rjes su yi rang zhing / / byang chub bla med gnas sub sngo bar bgyi// sems kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs// snying rje dam pa mi zad pa'i thabs// rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi// bde gshegs rnams la
137a1: la rtag tu skyabs su mche/ / rtog pa ma lus pa las dris grol zhing // sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs bzhi// dngos rnams ma lus ye shes ra ba nyid// dam pa'i chos la rtag tu skyabs su
137a2: mchi/ 'ching ba mtha' dag gnas las grol 'gyur zhing // snying rje mchog gis bsgrubs pa'i dpal dang ldan// rab dga' la sogs sa la nges bzhugs pa'i// brdul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la bdag bskyabs
137a3: mchi/ bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pas// sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag don// lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi// sems ni dam pa byang chub mchog tu bskyed// rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi
137a4: lam cig po/ / sbyin pa la sogs dkar po'i yon tan bcu// rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos// yang dag tu ni rnam par gnas par bgyi// snying rjes 'jig rten sems can ma lus pa// lha
137a5: bas bcings pa du ma dmigs nas ni/ / yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa// sngags pas rig pa 'di ni bsam par bya// ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste// de bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med//
137a6: rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni// ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol// tha dad dmigs pa'i 'du shes log pa yi// dri ma'i dra bas rnams ni legs bsal nas// rtog pa ma lus ye shes rgyal ba yi//
137a7: snang srong dri med dang las 'di don brjod// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hA/ sarba rmAHswab+hA ba shud d+hon// oM badz+ra swa thA rA shud d+hA yaHt+t+wa rmASh+TaH/ shud d+ho ta// oM shUn+ta tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta makod// de ltar ma
137a8: lus 'dod pa spangs pa yis/ / bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dge rang rig nyid// gzugs ni lhar gyur pa la yang dag mchod// dam tshig 'di ni bde gshegs rnams kyis gnang // rjes su 'thun par 'gro ba'i don rnam
137b1: dang / / ma lus rgyal ba mchod par yongs su brtags// lus la sogs pa'i las rnams de dang ni// rtag tu legs par mnyam par bzhag te bya// rnam pa 'di 'dra'i sems dang lus dang ni// dag gi las rnams ci yang
137b2: rung ba dag/ phyag rgya dang ni sngags kyi rnam pa ru// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de gsungs so// de bas lus sogs dge dang mi dge ba'i// rnam pa'i las rnams sems kyi dbang las gsungs// de ltar rtog pa ma
137b3: lus spangs pa yi/ / sems ni nag po'i las sug la 'gyur// dngos po cig la'ang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// kun du rtog pas bsags pa'i rnam pa las// sdug bsngal ba de dang grol ba skyed byed pa'i// las kyi khyad par
137b4: mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ / 'dir ni rab tu mi gnas ye shes sku// 'khor ba dag cing rnam par grol ba'i thugs// byams mgon rdo rje deyang de ltar snang // tshul 'di rtogs dka' phan pa bsgrub pa yin// zhes gsungs
137b5: d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi don 'byung ba rdo rje'i le'u ste bzhi
137b6: bcu pa'o/ / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsum ston pa snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dbang phyug
137b7: chen po ye shes kyi/ / 'byung ba sku ni 'byung las 'gyur// rten 'brel snang ba gsal bar 'char// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin
137b8: rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs pa ltar snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sna tshogs 'od ni bkye ba yang // rang rig bsam gtan las
138a1: byung ba/ / byang chub don gyi rgyu chen por// don 'byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas 'od zer don chen byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
138a2: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sku yi tshul gyur pa// rdo rje dkyil dkrung gnas pa yi// sna tshogs rin chen brgyan pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
138a3: gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsung gi dbyangs snyan ma lus pa// brjod pa 'gag med rang
138a4: zung bas/ / 'di nyid gsang ba don sdud pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchod rten dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
138a5: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dbyings dang ye shes tshul cig tu// mi gnas ldog pa med pa yi// byang chub sems kyi ngang gnas pas// bla med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes
138a6: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams glang po ye shes thogs pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sa
138a7: gsung thugs ni rdo rje'i dang / / ro mnyam ye shes mtshungs med pa// gcig dang du ma las grol phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtog pa gcod par mdzad par
138a8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshe la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i// yon tan tshad med phreng ba can// dpag med
138b1: rin chen gter 'chang mdzad/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kun gyi las la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
138b2: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dkar nag las ni rang dag btags la tsam// snang tsam rgyu 'bras 'dis ni khyab par phye// snying po don spyod bsam gtan pa yi yul// mchog gyur don ni 'byung ba'i sa/
138b3: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dran pa'i
138b4: stobs ni mnyam gzhag pa/ / shes ldan rgyal po bag yod kyis// dpa' bo 'gro ba'i don la spyad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad
138b5: kyi longs spyod la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'o ma'i rgya mtsho chen po las// bsrungs pas bdud rtsi'i thun ma ni// 'chi med 'gro ba tshim byed pa/
138b6: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
138b7: sems 'di gsungs so/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du// gang dang gang du skyes pa rnams// sems can 'dul ba'i thabs tshul gyis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
138b8: gshegs pa blo gros bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / shing khams kun dus g.yo zhing // 'od dang
139a1: kA / / sa / sa gas / gas u
139a2: bal dbang ba rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dra dang 'dun dang mos pa dang // ye shes thogs med dbang phyug ces// rtog pa yod bral mi byed pa// dri med tshul zhi
139a3: ba'o/ / sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rdo rje'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam la dbang ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
139a4: so/ / deng khams cig nas cig tu bskyod pa dang // 'jug pa sgyur ba'i tshul ni mi zad pa// bla med 'ben pa nas dag khyad par 'phags// ye shes dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
139a5: gas rab legs sangs rgyas thams cad kyim shes la nga rdorje ting pa dzin ma sgoms par thugs kyang chub kyims pa 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes gang dum shes u/ du rgya ca panas/
139a6: yongs su dag pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dbang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nga
139a7: chub kyi sem sa 'di gsungs so/ / bden pa bzhid gnyis dag gis// yongs su srung ba bcu gnyis dang // bcu cug nas dkyi mos 'byung ba// byang chubacul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
139a8: pau0f89u0fa4 dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyiye shes mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du sbyangs pa'i yon tan no// bcu ga nyis ni
139b1: bzhin gshegs pa yi/ / snod tshul ye shes gsang ba yin// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rangs pa dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshangs par spyod pa ma
139b2: med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / brtul zhugs sdom pas bde thob ste// tshul khrims kyis ni ting 'dzin dang // bsam gtan shes rab yongs grol skye/
139b3: de nyid byang chub dgra bcom 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas gos pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thim pa rdo rje ston pa'i
139b4: ting nge 'dzir la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / lan tsha tshul thim pa ltar// 'dres pas so so dmigs pa bral// cig tu byed pa'i bsam gtan mchog/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
139b5: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgri'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang bzhud pa dmigs pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
139b6: 'di gsungs so/ / rgyun chad med pa'i byang chub sems// de nyid 'gro 'ong bral ba'i sems// chu la chu bzhag gnas pa las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sku gsum
139b7: dbyer med rdo rje can/ / mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas su// rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran// spros pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa// mtshan med spros pa med pa yi// rdo rje glu yis yongs bskul ba'i// lha mo'i tshigs dang lhan cig
139b8: rol/ / sems dpa' gsung dang ldan pa yi// sbyor ba rang gzugs rgyu mthun pa// dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi// gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku// rig ma mngon par bsngags pas ni// gnas bzhi
140a1: rnams su lam pan/ / rtag tu sbyar bas bsgom par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sa can gyis mtshan pa'i spyan lasags// pad ma rjemanyam sbyar bab// gsang sngags rabatubs pa
140a2: pa nyid/ / 'od zer ldan 'bar ba yi// sbyong ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsam// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// bdeb pab pas bde thob 'gyur// srub dang grub pa'i tshul gyis ni// ye shes yang dag bskyed pa yi// 'byung gnas
140a3: dbu ma'i rtse ru gzung / / rnam par bzlog cing drangs pa yis// rlung dang rnam shes ba de chen du// ro cag rtog panub pa yi// khyab pas rlung dang dbyar med par// gnas sogs rnams su rgyas byed pa'i// kun du 'phel bas
140a4: skabs rgyas pa'i/ / dbang bskur dam pa gnas par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang pa gsang 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
140a5: rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po'i le'us zhe gcig pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i rtse mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
140a6: bskrad bcig pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid ni// ngo bo nyid med spros las dben// mnyam pa nyid la rtog
140a7: mi mnga'/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i 'dren pa cig pur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
140a8: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po'i chos las 'das pa gang // dngos med nam mkha' dag pa'i// ye shes 'di ni rmad po che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsung ngo //
140b1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dren dge ba sangs rgyas thas cad kyi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zugs ste byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// brtags pa rtog pa rab zhi ga// yul snang rnam rigs/
140b2: grub pas// lugs 'byung dag pa'i nam mkha' nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nang stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge/
140b3: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phyi nang tha dad mi gnas pa// sems de gang du'ang gnas med de// mdor na dngos med rang bzhin can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so/
140b4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yang dag bsdus pa'i chos can la// ma
140b5: grub pa'i dang la gnas/ / de nyid lhun gyis grub pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sdug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
140b6: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rten 'brel tsam du'ang mi gnas pa// rang byung bdag med stong pa nyid// gnyis su med pa'i 'od gsal ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan du/
140b7: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa klus byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes sgron ma
140b8: 'bar ba ni/ / mi zad du ma ro cog pa'i// dran pas stong pa bde ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don dam pa
141a1: stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du bsgom du med pa'i dngos// bsgom pa tsam du 'dzin med de// mtha' las grol ba mi gnas pa// gas
141a2: ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brgyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus byas stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
141a3: gsungs so/ / rang rig las ni byang chub 'gyur// tog pas stong pa'i chos nyid las// mnyam rjes lhag mthong spyod pa can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhum pa med pa'i
141a4: stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du zhi gnas ting 'dzin gyi// mi g.yo ba las 'das pa nyid/
141a5: lung du bstan pa'i phyogs las ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
141a6: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / brjod pas brtags pa rang stod pa// lung ma bstan las 'das pa'i dngos// mi phyed brjod bral ye shes che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes
141a7: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin sangs rgyas zas cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
141a8: byang chub sems la rgyu med phyir// theg mtha' stong pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lags las bzlog par 'char// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sang ge sangs rgyas
141b1: thams cad kyi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos gang spang bar bya ba dang // rten bya tha dad med par ni// len pa med par rang grol du// de nyid
141b2: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sna tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
141b3: gsungs so/ / gdod nas zhi ba'i chos nyid la// ma skyes skye med dag pa'i sems// 'od gsal lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpa'
141b4: bo chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun du bzang po bde ba
141b5: tshe/ / mi zad lhun gyis grub pa'i don// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i gnas dpal phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge
141b6: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med// nyi tshe'i stong nyid las 'das shing // rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
141b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'das dang ma 'ongs de ltar gyi//
141b8: dus gsum rjes su mi dmigs pas// thogs med ye shes bstan pa nyid// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po med/
142a1: bstong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po rtag pa'i chos nyid med// mi rtag 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid can// stong nyid nam mkha'i chos nyid
142a2: de/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
142a3: sems 'di gsungs so/ / lta ba ma yin mi gnas pa// kun gzhi dag pa'i snying po nyid// zab cing tha brten gyur pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs
142a4: mchog rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor 'das gzung 'dzin sdod bcud rnams// thams
142a5: cad bdag med ngo bo nyid/ / stong pa nyid du'ang mi gnas pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// stong pa nyid du mi bsam zhing // stong min par yang bsgom pa min// de nyid byang chub dam pa'i gzhi/
142a6: byang chub sems zhes brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs
142a7: rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'khor lo'i gtses// tshangs dbyangs rdo rje'i ngo ro yis// chos 'byung
142a8: rol pa ston par mdzad/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar mkhan thams cad kyis bdag rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
142b1: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lamatsho la lam gyi lta ba las// rnam par bzlog pa bla na med// ches rgya bzhi ldan rnal ma'i lam// zab pa zhi ba don spyod pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
142b2: pazla ba'i sgron me 'bar ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gso ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sa bon dang ni myu gu'i par// rim gyis bskyed
142b3: pa yongs dag pa/ / de nyid 'bras bu ro 'byin pa'i// thabs tshul 'di ni dag pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg pa gzi brjid phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srog rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya
142b4: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam dag zhi ba'i chos nyid ni// btags pa'i gnas las rnam grol ba// ye shes rgyal ba kun khyab pa// byang chub tshul 'di
142b5: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tinger 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
142b6: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mngal las skye dang sgo dang // rdzus te skyes dang drod gsher las// skye ba'i sems can mi dmigs pas// sems can spyod pa mi dmigs so// zhes gsungs so//
142b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'gro drug la sogs
142b8: khams gsum pa'i/ / sems can rnam shes rang nyid las// rang 'khrul log shes kyis bcings pa// de grol byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par
143a1: rtogs pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gso ba skyes bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i tong nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / brtags pa'i
143a2: yid spyod ma zhugs pa'i/ / snang las ma nges grol 'gyur zhing // sgrib med rang gsal mthong ba ni// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag rgyas pa sangs rgyas
143a3: thams cad kyis gang zag rnam par dge ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yul rkyen rdzas las grol ba yi// the tshom rnam bral sgro 'dogs chod// rigs sde
143a4: phyir ni ye shes che/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor shes rab mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shed bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
143a5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khams rgyud dag pa'i sa gnas pas// sa rnams bskyod pa go 'phangs mchog/ rtse gcig rang byung rang grol bas// byang chub tshul
143a6: 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid tshim mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shed las skyes rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug te byang chub
143a7: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs// dag pa ye shes bdag med pa// gnyis med mnyam pa rnam rgyal bas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
143a8: gshegs pa shes rab byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thos bsam sgom pa'i yul min zhing //
143b1: gsang ba'i shes rab ral gris ni// log lta phung po gcod par byed// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par
143b2: dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / spyi dang bye brag bla med gnas// yang dag ye shes rnam grol bas// zag med
143b3: tshul ni zhi ba las/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chags med mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tsher rab po rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
143b4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni// de bzhin nyid la legs gnas pas// sna tshogs kun spyod mi dmigs te// de nyid ye shes chen por bstan zhes gsungs
143b5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bos byin sangs rgyas tham cad kyi shes pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ji ltar mdud pa rang
143b6: grol du/ / sbrul mdud lta bur bcings las 'da'// de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo ye shes mthong ba po rnam
143b7: par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stobs ldan skyes bu mchog gis ni// gang du rtsal gyi rten mthong
143b8: bas/ shugs kyis 'gro ba mda' bzhin no// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi slong ba po rnam par dag pa
144a1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du spong bsor zhugs shing // rang bzhin dag pa'i nga bo nyid// yongs su shwa ra rnam
144a2: grol gyis/ / de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'gro can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
144a3: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dbang po'i gnas las lhag pa'i stobs// stong gsum chos kyi dpal ldan pas// ye shes char 'bebs ston pa po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
144a4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po shugs 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'phrin las sna tshogs ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i ye shes
144a5: bas pa mi khyab/ / nam mkha'i gzugs su yos 'azhugs pa// 'dus paHmed dgyes par rol// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal chu'i ting nge 'dzin rjen
144a6: gsang ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon po yi// gtsug tor tshad med gzhal med pa// nam mkha'i gnas kyi spyod yul te// de nyid gsang ba bstan
144a7: 'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyig nga rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par dathugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yan lag drug bcu'i dbyang
144a8: ni yidi 'brog dpag med rdo rje'i gsung / / sems can sna tshogs der ston pa// bsam gyis mi khyab spyod yul lo// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs bklags pas byin pas sa rgyas thams
144b1: kyi thugs kyi gsang ba'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems kyi gsang ba dag pa ste// sems kyi las ni yongs dag pas// sems can khams dang 'thun par
144b2: 'jug/ bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ thub pa don gyi ye shes can// sku bzhi ye shes rab rdzogs pa'i// de bzhin nyid 'di gsung bar mdzad// gang du gsang ba las kyang che//
144b3: gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po 'di 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma 'byung ba rnams ni ye shes dgyes pa chen pos khyab cing gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob la/ des
144b4: chos thams cad yongs su dag cing phyin ci ma log par khong du chud pas gnas par byed do/ / 'jig rten gyi lha chen po tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gu lang dang / drag po'i rigs
144b5: su gyur pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par chos 'di la srung ba'i phyir de 'dzin pa dag la mchod cing rten par byed do/ / 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'byang gnas so// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// lan
144b6: cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// 'phags pa rang rgyal ba la gnas pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas so//
144b7: byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin par rig par bya'o// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po thams
144b8: cad kyi 'byung gnas bla na med par rig par bya'o/ / dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yang 'di las byung bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni gsang ba chen
145a1: po ye shes kun du 'byung ba'i gzhi cig par gnas pa nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
145a2: par rgyal ba las gsang ba yongs su mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas su bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin
145a3: gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thog mar byung ba dang / / bar du da ltar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i don dang // tha mar phyi ma'i dus na nges par 'byung
145a4: ba'i gsang chen nges par 'pho ba'i tshul gyi rnam grangs du ma nga yis bshad par bya yis/ / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas dang // dus dang chos kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa du ma 'byung ba nges par zung cig/
145a5: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon 'byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du srog gcod brtson par 'gyur// bskal
145a6: padrug 'dzin zhes bya la/ / sangs rgyas zla ba mi 'khrugs pas// thams cad zhe sdang can gyur la// srog gcod pa la brtsams pa yi// dam chos dgongs te bshad pa la// slob dpon chos kyi 'khor lo dang // dge slong
145a7: nag po gtum zhes pa/ / ji bzhin sgra ru rnam spyad pas// nag po bdud kyi sha zar gyur// chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas// thams cad dmyal ba'i srungs mar skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas
145a8: gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ / mi bskyod rdo rje can gyis ni// zhe sdang rigs can 'dul bar mdzad// srog chags gsad par gyis zhes pa// khams gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog gsad na ni// de ni mi
145b1: bskyod shing bya ste/ / rdon can gyi sdom pa las// zhe sdang rigs kyi dam tshig yin// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba//
145b2: de tshe sems can thams cad ni// rnam par shes pa gti mug pas// ma byin len la brtson par 'gyur// bskal pa gzung dka' zhes byal// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi mchog/ seng ge 'od kyi rgyal po la// bsten
145b3: pa'i dam tshig gnas pa'i tshe/ / thams cad gti mug shas chel// gzhan gyi nor 'phrog spyod par gyur// de dag ldem por dgongs pa la// slob dpon seng ge zla ba yis// dge slong bzod pa can zhes pas// ji bzhin ska r+ya
145b4: dam snad pas/ / drag po mun pa can zhes pa'i// chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas// thams cad dud 'gro gnas su skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// sangs rgyas
145b5: rje 'dzin gyis ni/ / gti mug rigs can 'dul bar mdzad// khyod kyis ma byin lo shes pa// chos rnams rmi la ba lta bu las// 'phags pa'i nor rnams blangs nas ni// stug po bkod pa'i shing du skye// de bzhin gzhas
145b6: pa'i sdom pa las/ / gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig yin// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems
145b7: can thams cad ni/ / shin tu g.yem la sred pa yis// mi tshangs spyod la 'jug par gyur// bskal pa bcu ldan zhes bya la// pad mo 'od 'phro mi bzad des// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni// thams cad 'ad
145b8: chags spyod gyur la/ / log par shin tu g.yem par spyod// 'dod chags kyis ni thar thob ces// de ltar dgongs te gsungs pa la// slob dpon pad mo dpal zhes pas// dge slong rgyal ba mchog ces la// rjes
146a1: nga/ / su bstan dang gdams pa las// skye ba de yi 'og tu ni// drag byed mtha' la gnas pa ni// chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pa// thams cad yi dgas gnas su skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs
146a2: rgyas gang mkhan gar mdzad pas/ / chos 'dzin pa yi gsung rdo rjes// 'dod chags rigs can 'dul bar mdzad// gzhan gyi bud med spyod ces pa// chos rnams mig 'phrul mtshungs pa la// de bzhin gshegs
146a3: btsun mo rnams/ / ye shes bde bar rol par bya// shes rab bud med spyad na ni// bde ba can gyi zhing du 'gro// chos 'dzin pa yi sdom pa las// 'dod chags rdo rje'i dam tshig yin// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdas
146a4: nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ / de bzhin gsheg pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu le lo'i dbang gyur cing // rdzun du sprul dga' bar gyur// bskal pa gzi chen
146a5: snang ba'i dus/ / bde gshegs rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes// sangs rgyas de yi bstan pa la// 'gro rnams shin tu phrag dog can// de la rdzun tshig gis grol zhes// rgyal bas dgongs te bstan pa la// slob dpon rta mchog
146a6: ces bya bas/ / dge bsnyen zla ba zhes bya la// gsung rab don rjes bstan pa las// shin tu 'khrul pas gnas par gyur// ji bzhin sgra ru rnam spyad pas// drag byed 'khrul pa can zhes pa// chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs pa
146a7: bcas/ / thams cad dbang sgyur bdud kyi lha// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// gdon mi za ba'i phrin las kyis// phrag dog
146a8: rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ / khyod kyi rdzun du smos shes pa// chos rnams dri za'i grong khyer las// thams cad brdzun pa slu ba'i tshig/ sgyu ma lta bur bsgrags nas kyang // kun rdzob spyod pa'i gnas bstan pa/
146b1: 'brug sgra can gyi zhing du 'gro// las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa las// phrag dog rdo rje'i dam tshig bstan// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro
146b2: ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba'o/ / de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu nga rgyal cher spyod cing // tshig rtsub dag gis spyod par 'gyur// bskal pa mi gnas pa zhes la// bde gshegs dkon mchog dpal zhes pa'i// bstan
146b3: ba de la gnas pa'i tshe/ / phal cher nga rgyal gyis non cing // ngag ma bsdams pas gnas par gyur// rtsub pa'i tshig rnams spras pa yis// des ni thar pa thob ces pa// rgyal ba dgongs te gsungs pa la// slob dpon nyim
146b4: dpal zhes pas/ / dge slong 'byor pa can zhes la// bka' yi dgongs pa bstan pa las// gsang ba'i don la nam 'khrul bas// drag byed 'jungs pa can zhes pa// chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pa// thams cad lha min srin
146b5: po'i gnas/ / ri rab sul la gnas par skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// yon tan rin chen 'od 'gro bas// nga rgyal rigs can 'dul bar mdzad// snga phyi'i chos ni bden mthong
146b6: bas/ / 'khrul pa'i spyod las log pa ste// rtsub pa'i chos rnams smras pa yis// ye shes thob 'gyur zhes pa la// dngos por 'dzin pa skrag byed pa'i// yang dag kun rdzob chos nyid kyis// rang bzhin med par bstan pa
146b7: yis/ / de dag spyod pa don ldan pa// rdul dang bral ba'i zhing du 'gro// rin chen rigs kyi sdom pa yin// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul
146b8: ni sngon byung ba/ / de tshe sems can thams cad ni// dug lnga'i rtog pa rgyas par 'gyur// bskal pa rgyan bzangs zhes bya la// bde gshegs dpal ldan dri med pa// ye shes bzang po'i bstan pa la// thams cad nyon
147a1: mongs lnga spyod pa/ / dug lnga'i rtag pa rags par gyur// nyon mongs ma spangs sangs rgyu zhes// rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa la// slob dpon kun du bzang po yis// dge slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes//
147a2: debazhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba la// log par spyad pa'i rnam smin gyis// sgra sgrogs sde can zhes bya ba// chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas// mi yi gnas su srin por skyes// lang ka pu ri'i rgyal por 'gyur// de ltar/
147a3: rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// gsang chen rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dug lnga'i rang bzhin gyis bsdus brtul// nyon mongs ma spangs lam 'gyur zhes// chags sdang rang bzhin shes
147a4: nas kyang / / dug gsum ye shes gyur pa ni// gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing du skye// bla na med pa'i sdom pa las// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig yin// dug lnga'i rtog pa gdul ba ni// zhe sdang can la
147a5: khyab 'jug dang / / gti mug can la tshangs pa dang // 'dod chags dbang phyug chen po dang // phrag dog dga' ra ba dbang phyug dang // nga rgyal can ni brgya byin gyis// rigs dang 'thun pa'i char bsgyur nas// sems can log
147a6: pa'i lam du btsud/ / rang gi spyod sun mi 'da'i phyir// de la bar chad sna tshogs pas// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// lha nas
147a7: 'dul bar mdzad nas ni/ / gsong ba'i ye shes ston par byed// de ltar gdul bya gang dang gang gi don du dgongs te gsungs pa rnam par nges pa thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gas
147a8: banges pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa// gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni gsang ba mchog tu mi 'gyur ba rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling
147b1: gragasum chas kyi 'thung gnas so/ / dan ma mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi zhing khams kyi snying por gyur pa'o// dus phran sumachogs pa sa dus rnams kya byugs ma la bab pa zag pa dang bus dang tha ma nam par
147b2: dag pa ste/ gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul lo// 'chang ba po ni ston pa ste// 'dir dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam pa
147b3: thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pas/ 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor gyur pa nyid do// de dag kyang chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
147b4: ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu mi zad pa'i don la rab tu dgongs pa dag go/ de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya'o// 'di lta ste 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye
147b5: shes sems dpa' ni rgyal po zas gtsang mar gyur to/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug dbyangs ni lha mo chen mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya bar gyur to// lha mo dpal gyi lu gu rgyud ma ni grags 'dzin mar gyur to// rdo rje sems
147b6: dpa' ni sgrag can 'dzin to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa kun du gcod pa ni shA ri'i bur gyur pa'o// kun du bzang po ni gnas brtan kun dga' bor gyur to// kun du bzang po rnam par rol pa'i sku can
147b7: ni maud gal gyi bur gyur pa'o/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni gnas brtan lha sbyin no// tshangs pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od tu gyur pa'o// dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag
147b8: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba shAkya thub pa nyid tu gyur to/ / de ltar mdo dang thun mong du spyod pa'i don du gsungs so// 'dir ni gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'i don du so sor phye nas gsal bar
148a1: bshad par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste ltar phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkyil 'khor gsang ba spyi'i don du bstan te// gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjeni phyag nardo
148a2: lnga pa 'dzin pa can gyi kun dga' bor gyur to/ / kun du bzang po ni maud gal gyi bu'o// / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni kun shes kauN+Di n+yar gyur to// blo gros mi zad pa ni shA ri'i
148a3: bu'o/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'od srung ngo // sa'i snying po ni ma 'gags pa'o// byams pa ni nye ba'i 'khor ro// nam mkha'i snying po ni gnas brtan chen po rab 'byor du gyur to// gzugs rdo rje ma ni skye dgu'i bdag mo'o
148a4: sgra rdo rje ma ni dbyangs ldan ma'o/ / dri rdo rje ma ni rigs ldan ma'o// ro rdo rje ni dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma'o// reg bya rdo rje ni sa mtsho mar gyur to// sangs rgyas spyan ma ni sa'i lha mor gyur to// mA ma kI ni 'od mchog mar gyur to//
148a5: gos dkar mo ni pad ma grags mchog ma'o// sgrol ma ni sna tshogs 'od 'chang mar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa sman gyi bla dri ma med pa bai dUr+ya'i 'od du gyur to// rnam par snang /
148a6: byed de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng ge thugs rje 'od kyi snang ba mi zad par gyur to// 'od dpag tu med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od 'phro mi zad par gyur to// gdon mi za ba grub pa ni de ba'i
148a7: gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rin chen 'byung ldan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal rin chen 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin
148a8: gshegs pa dpal ye shes kun du bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/ de ni gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ da ltar de nyid yin no// gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcu rnams la 'di lta ste/ dpal
148b1: gshin rje mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas su gyur/ bgegs mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya bar gyur/ dpal tamagrin ni rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur//
148b2: shes rab mthar byed ni sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo mi g.yo ba ni pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpal
148b3: zhes bya bar gyur/ dbyug sngon can ni de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam par gyur/ khro bo stobs po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gnod mdzes
148b4: rgyal po ni sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas
148b5: stong 'jig rten du mngon par 'byung ba la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang gsang ba 'dzin pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po
148b6: dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i 'od dang gsum gyis sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas kyi spyod
148b7: yul gyis spyad pa spyod pa nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad byang chub kyi shing brgyad dang bcas pa las mngon par byang chub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
148b8: sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs bdag nyid du cig pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa ta la'i shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs
149a1: pa rin chen gtsug tor can ni mya ngan med pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ma me tsa na ni nu ti shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel ni b+ha ta pa'i shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin
149a2: gshegs pa gser thub ni ka ra tsa pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung ni pa ra ka ti ba'i shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni ba ra ti ba'i shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa
149a3: ni nA ga ke sa ra'i shing gi drung du'o/ / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dus gsum du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad kyi zhing khams na bzhugs shing yongs su skyong bar mdzad de
149a4: gang du rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yongs su gzigs shing byin gyis rlob par ston pa yin no/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas yang de bzhin
149a5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'byung ba'i gnas rdo rje'i ting
149a6: nge 'dzin khong du chud par gyis shig/ de yang gang zhe na/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gang du byon pa 'am 'jug par mdzad pa dang gang nas gshegs pa dang / gang du gnas pa'i don gyis rnam
149a7: par 'phrul pa'i mdzad pa shes par gyis shig/ gang du 'di ni mngon bstan pas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung ba dag/ mngon par byang chub gnas nyid las// 'byung dang 'jug par gnas pa dang // 'phrin
149a8: las mdzad pa du mang stong / / dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho tshul dang // lhums su 'jug dang sku bltam dang // gzhon nu rol dang khab gnas dang / skyed mos tshal byon nas gzigs te/ mngon par 'byung dang
149b1: gshegs mdzad cing / / dka' spyad mdzad dang bzhengs pa dang // byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang // bdud bcom mngon par byang chub pa// chos kyi 'khor lo skor mdzad de// 'di ni dus rnams kun tu yang // thog mang/
149b2: thun mong lam bstan cing // rab tu dge ba mtshan ma med// tha mar the tsom sel ba yi// byang chub sems kyi spyod yul dang // rnam par nges pa phra bar bstan// sangs rgyas ma lus 'di dag nyid// zhi bar 'jug
149b3: pa ston pa dag/ bla na med pa'i spyod yul lo// sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yis// sems kyi rol mo las byung ba// sgyu 'phrul chen po ston pa yis// mdzad pa phyi nang gsang ba ste// dga' ldan po brang dang lus kyi//
149b4: bde chen spyi bor gnas pa nyid// dam pa 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i gnas// rdo rje sngags kyi de nyid las// ting 'dzin mnyam par gyur pa ni// ji ltar skar mda' 'pho ba ltar// byang chub sems kyi glang po ni// mche ba drug
149b5: ldan du gyur pa/ / snying rjes chags pa'i sems kyis ni// rtsa yi pho brang kha sbyar de// byang chub sems ni zhugs par gyur// dar gnas lhums su 'jug pa nyid// rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid 'jug/ thabs dang shes/
149b6: rab nus thob pas// g.yas rtsa nas ni 'byung gyur pa// bltam pa'i mdzad pa zhes brjod do// bde ba'i nus pa 'phel ba las// rgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi// pad ma yi ges bgrod pa dag/ gom pa bor ba'i
149b7: dus yin no/ / rlung sems 'gro ldog gang gyur pa// 'khor dang mya 'das bskyed pa ni// bram ze mtshan mkhan drang srong gis// lung bstan brjod pa de yin no// de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa las// rjes thob
149b8: yul la spyod gyur pa/ / spros bcas spros med rnam dbye bas// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga la// gzhonu rol pa'i spyod pa yis// lus kyi gnas sogs kun tu rol// dbyangs dang gsal byed gyur pa yi// rtsa yi 'khor
150a1: lo'i yi ge rnams/ / pho mo ma ning dbye ba yis// yi ge'i gnas la mkhas pa yin// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag/ 'pho tshul grangs dang dbye bsdu yis// rgyu tshul spro sdu gang gyur pa// rtsis kyi/
150a2: gnas la mkhas pa'o// chu ma drung nus pa yi// glang po brgyal dang 'gegs pa dang / lpags pa rim pa bdun gyur la// shing sogs rim par gnas gyur pa// rlung gi gzhal me mda' yis// 'phang ba chu na
150a3: 'bab pa yin/ / dang por shes rab la sa thob pa// byang sems dmar po gsang gnas su bang byas btsun mo khab gnas shing // 'thung bzhi'i rlung rnams btsun mo'o// smin mtshams kyini mdud pa der// thig le brab sa
150a4: pa ni/ / steng du nyi zla gzas zin pa// sgra gcan 'dzin du brjod pa yin// lte bskul pa'i 'khor lo yi// phyogs bzhir skyed tshal gzigs pa ni// zag bcas rtsa rlung thig le yis// srid pa bskyed pa gang yin par/
150a5: zag med bde ba thob 'dod pas// de yi tshul la 'jug pa ni// rlung gi rta dang bcas pa yis// dbu ma'i mthongs las byung nas ni// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten dag/ 'khor ba'i dra ba bcad nas ni// chu bo 'dus pa'i
150a6: 'gro ba nyid du/ / ye shes mngon du byed 'dod pas// bcan thabs su ni 'gog pa dang // lus ngag bcud la bor ba yis// zug dang dka' thub spyad pa ni// mnyam rjes gnyis su med pa yis// rtse gcig ting dzi
150a7: gnas pa'o/ / aHthung gsos shing rkun phab pas// 'o ma'i bdud rtsi gsol ba yin// gang ba byang chub shing drung du// rdo rje dkyil dkrung gyur pa yis// rtags dang yon tan 'thob byed cing // snang ba gsum ni thim pa'i ni/
150a8: zla ba nyim mud pa yi// rtog pa'i dra ba gang yin pa// bdad btul ba ni srod kyi ngas// rnam rtog ye shes thim gyur pa// nye bar thob pa'i skad cig la// skad cig khyab par lnga pa la// tho mas skya reng shar ba'i dus// nam
150b1: mkha' smin med lta bu mi/ / nyams kyi shes pa 'od gsalab// khyab par mngon par byang chub pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas thob pa yin// mamangs bzhir ni bdud bcom pas// bcom ldan 'das zhes gad pa san//
150b2: mgrin par zag bcas rlung 'gags pas// klu mi gnas su zhugs pa ste// tshangs pa spyi bo nas 'pho zhing // sa rlung thig le dang bcas pas// gser gyi 'khor lo ldan pa yin// thams cad dbang du gyur pa ni// khams
150b3: gsum pa ni ma lus dang / / 'gro drug sems can thams cad kyis// tshangs pa lnga dang bcas pa dang // lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskul ba yin// sgrol rgyu'i tshal ni mdzod spu ste// tshe
150b4: dpon gnyis ni rtsa gnyis te/ / lam gyur stobs dang ldan pa'o// lnga sde bzang po zhes bya ba// dug lnga bskyed pa'i rtsa dang rlung // bden bzhi chos kyi 'khor lo ni// sprul pa'i gnas su gsungs pa ste// bA ra na si
150b5: zhes bya yi/ / thog mar chags pa'i gnas yin no// cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba// mu stegs gdul ba'i don du ste// dpa' skong kun brjod rdzu 'phrul dang // byin gyis rlob pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// log par lta ba
150b6: 'joms par mdzad/ / mtshan ma med pa'i chos gsungs pa// snying kha'i gnas su bstan pa ste// rgyal po'i khab dang bya rgod spungs// gnas kyi khyad par theg pa che// khyad par 'khor rnams bstan pa la/
150b7: zab cing rgya che bstan pa yin// spyi bo mgrin pa smin mtshams dang // gsang ba la sogs thams cad tu// don dam ngo bo nyid kyi chos// thams cad de bzhin nyid don gsungs// gnas gzhan rnams su thub pa yis//
150b8: chos rnams thams cad gsungs pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// mdzad pa sna tshogs gang bstan nas// srog rtsol de bzhin nyid thim zhing // thams cad mngon du gyur pa yi// sku ba'i ngo bo nyid skur this
151a1: bde chen rang byung dri med pa'i/ / ga pa'i zhing khams rab mi gnas// rtog med ye shes nam mkha' bzhin// gang du mi mjed 'jig rten gyi// 'dod khams dbang phyug gnas 'dir ni// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon
151a2: byung ba/ / dpag med bskal pa 'das pa'i dus// thub pa chen po mar me mdzad// nga ni bram zer gyur pa yis// sems bskyed zhus tshe bstan pa na// man par grang bstan thob par gyur// de nyid 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i cha'ang //
151a3: gsang ba'i gnas 'di ma gsungs shing // de yi gong rol sngar 'das tshe// sangs rgyas thub chen mchog nyid dang // rin chen gtsug tor can dang ni/ rnam par gzigs la sogs pas kyang // gsang chen 'di ni ma gsungs shing //
151a4: log par dang sel gser thub dang // rgyal ba 'od srung dag gis kyang // gsang ba 'di dag ma gsungs te// de nyid ston pa'i don du ni// gsang chen gnas kyi don 'di dag/ de dus sems can thams cad dang // gang du mngon
151a5: par spyod pa dang / / thun mong bslab pa'i tshul bstan cing // 'di nyid gsungs par ma gyur to// gang du ma 'ongs dus na yang // byams pa la sogs rgyal ba yi// bskal bzangs sangs rgyas du mas kyang // 'di dag lha mi'i mngon sum
151a6: ru/ / gsang bston par mi 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi// 'gro drug sems can sna tshogs la// snyigs mar gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe// dbang po rno nang don spyod pas// dus la bab par shes par bya// 'di nyid nye bar/
151a7: 'byung ba yang // gling 'di nyid las gzhan du mid// gang yang 'og min zhing khams ni// ye shes snang ba rgyas pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang chen bcom ldan gyis// rgyun mi 'chad cing khyab pa dang // rtag cing 'gyur med mchog gis/
151a8: ri// gsang chen 'di ni kun du ston// gang yang 'das dang ma byon dang // da ltar 'byung ba ma lus pa// gsang chen mchog 'dis ma bgrod par// byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te// 'di ni mthar thug gnas yin pas// de las
151b1: gzhan pa'i spyod yul min/ / 'di nyid gnas pa'i ting 'dzin las// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rim// phyogs mtshams brgyad tu snang ba yi// dung khrod gnas brgyad rtswa
151b2: pa la/ / byi nang gnas kyi dbye ba yis// phyogs skyong ba dang ning skyong la// mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang // grub pa rtags kyi phyag tu ste// snying po ye shes phyag rgya dang // phrin las rol pa'i phyag rgya'o// jig rten pa rnams gdum
151b3: ba'i phyir/ / dang la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos ye shes kun du rgyas pas// brag rgyas rtags mtshon pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mdzad pa byab rgya sa gang ba phyir// na ba'i don du phyogs stong gyur// de mi rtags
151b4: 'khor dang bcas/ / yum dang rin chen rgyan gyis smras// grub pa'i rtags kyis rgyas gdab phyir// ning skyong brgyad tu khro bo'i tshul// ljon pa'i shing la brten nas gnas// zhi ba'i tshul gyis rgyas gang ba phyir// de yi nyan pa'i
151b5: gdod rten rlung / / phrin las byug tas rgyas gdab phyir/ tshar bcad rdzas 'dzin las rnams mdzad// rdo rje dathug to zhags pa dang // btson bzang phrang ral gri dang // bdan tri shul 'dzin
151b6: par mdzad/ / snying po ye shes phyag rgya yis// rgyas gdab phyir ni gzhal yas kyi// phyogs mtshams brgyad tu bkod pa yin// rol pa'i phyag rgya spyod pa'i phyir// dur khrod brgyad tu gnas pa ste// lha dbang bcas dang mamo
151b7: dang / klu dang gnod sbyid tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po tshogs dang drang srong dang // sha za rnams dang rig 'dzin tshogs// sde tshan brgyad kyis bskor ba yin// zhing skyong drag po'i las byed phyir// phyag na gri gugazod pa bsnam
151b8: shin tu 'jigs pa gtum pa'i gzugs/ / shing brgyad nang nas lus phyed thod// lus kyi phyag rgya sbas pa yin// de yang so so'i yum dag ni// shing gi rtsa bar gnas pa ste// zhal zas stob pa'i tshul du gnas// glang po
152a1: maha du srin dang / / ta mchog phyogs cag gnas pa yin// ra dang ralangs ri dgas dang // khyumachog bani ni mtshams su gnas// srang phyogs tshangs pa dang bzhin// 'og phyogasas bdag du bral nan//
152a2: lha dang lha mor mtshungs pa ste// 'di dag rang bzhin gyis gnas yin// chags pa dang khro bo'i sus 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rgyal po
152a3: rdo rje 'dzin/ / de nyid kun du sprul mdzad pas// rdo rje sems pa'i gzugs sbas nas// zhi ba'i skus ni mi 'dul ba'i// sems can gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// rang rig ye shes byang chub sems// drag po khro bo'i skur bstan
152a4: pas/ / khro bo zhes ni rnam par brjod// gang du rjes su 'dzin pa ni// rnam par bskur te zhi bas na// slar yang zhi ba de bzhin gshegs// chos nyid mnyam par 'byung ba'o// 'di dag gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin// sems can don du
152a5: thabs ston mdzad/ / shAkya thub pa bcom ldan 'das// bdag nyid chen po'i byin rlabs las// dab che dang garga re dang // chos kyi dung las grags pa dang // sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra las ni// gang zhigang dam chos sgra byung ba//
152a6: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kyang // chos kyi 'gro ba gang yin dang // dus der brgyud pa'i chos bstan pa// de snyed bde gshegs rgyal ba yi// dngos kyi byin rlab rig par
152a7: bya/ ston pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ni// mi gnas ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// don byed ston pa 'byung ba ni// bla med bka' yi dgongs pa dag/ yang gengs par bkrol nas kyang // gang du dam pa'i chos sgra yis// 'gro ba smin
152a8: par byed pa ni/ / de dus nga nyid der bstan pas// bstan chos shin tu rgyas par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po
152b1: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las dbazhin gshegs pa'i gnas gsang ba can po zad mong ma yin pa zhes byu ba 'a 'gre ba ni bcuban pa'o/ / gsang bathun mong ma yid pa nal ma
152b2: chen po'i rgyud kyi rtag pa bzhi pa las rdo rje dpal mchog chen po gsang ba'i don gyi rgyal po'o/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje skye bo 'od chen po// 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes gsang ba bka' stsal to// de nas
152b3: b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
152b4: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes kyi nor bu chen po du ma'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod par byas so// mchod
152b5: par byas nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdun du bdar zhing 'dug ste gsang chen gyi don la phyogs gcig tu zhugs te/ / yongs su spyod par gyur to// de la 'di ni gsang chen gyi// sku gsum bla med phyag rgya
152b6: che/ / dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus pa'i// chos rnams 'dus pa'i mchog yin te// 'di ni khyad par dus 'byung ba'i// dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs
152b7: bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpal ldan sangs rgyas skus khyab pa// sku yi rdzu 'phrul mtha'/
152b8: pa// ji snyed sku yi rnam pa mnga'// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po don grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi ting nge
153a1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gnas// gsung cig gnas las gyur mang gyi// mos pa dums sa sor thos// b+ha chu
153a2: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par/
153a3: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag la// ye shes sna tshogs ting 'dzin las// mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhugs pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
153a4: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i lha sangs rgyas thams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
153a5: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyad tu// sems kyi rgyun ni mi 'gag phyir// ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so//
153a6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
153a7: 'di gsungs so/ / bye ba phrag ni brgya yi bar// thub pa'i ning khams bdag po ni// kun du bzang po'i spyod las byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba
153a8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu yi// sna ba
153b1: mi 'gag stong pa nyid/ / de nyid rang bzhin gyis dag brjod// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thams cad du son
153b2: pa'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dper na nam mkha'i khams 'di ni// thams cad rjes su so gyur kyang // sems pa mi ldan
153b3: de bzhin te/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas ma lus par mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin
153b4: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dir ni sems can khams mtha' yas// de'i chos nyid rjes 'gro ba// rtog pa mi mnga' de nyid de// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
153b5: denas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po yon tan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungango so//
153b6: 'di ni rgyal ba'i sku nyid kyang // spros med de bzhin nyid dag pa'i// rjes 'gro rtog pa med pa nyid// spros pa med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spu 'dod dpal sangs rgyas
153b7: thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yongs su dag pa'i snang ba gang // mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las ni// spang thang dgra
153b8: bsnan med par grol/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron me'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcu yong su dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
154a1: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos su ye shes rgya mtsho las// nu rlangs nam mkhar dag pa gang // gzugs sku'i rnyeg pa mkhas la gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
154a2: shes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sha'i spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thogs pa mad
154a3: pardo rje yi/ / pha lam ltar ni phrin las dag/ stobs bzangs kyis ni yul du myur// snang med rnal 'byor ba yi gnas/ zhes gsungs so// de nas bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i spyan
154a4: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dag ni// lA yi spyod yul gtsang ma'i gnas// 'jig rten khams kun snang bar byed//
154a5: chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
154a6: gsungs so/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las// dbyer med bden pa gnyis dag pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
154a7: grol bsnyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub pa'i spyan rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par shugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par rtog pa me mnga' gachos kyi gtar dang ldan pa las// rjes su dran pa'i
154a8: spun gyiban/ / dus gsum shes byas gzigs med// chos gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gi gser sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyan rdo rje ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugs ta byang chub tu
154b1: sems 'di gsungs so/ / dus gsum mnyam nyid rnam dag pas// dus kyi 'du shes 'jug med pa// skad cig ye shes spyod yul ni// snang ba med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
154b2: gshegs pa sma ga na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spyan lnga rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du gzigs pa'i yul med pas// blo snang btags
154b3: pa'i tshul ma grub/ / de snang gdul bya'i don spyod pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i lam bstan pa rdoHzhes bya ba'i
154b4: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes gzhal du med pa nyid// mi gnas rnam par mi gnas pas// nam mkha' lta bur mi rtog pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes
154b5: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad ngapa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'du shes dang ni sems dpa' dang // lta ba
154b6: byan ci log spangs nas/ / ye shes mngon par byang chub pa// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
154b7: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes zag pa med pa'i dbyings// rang byung bsam gyis mi khyab pa// nam mkha'i khams ltar rten med pas// dmigs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o//
154b8: zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa la// mchod pa gnas kyi don 'di gsungs/ me tog rigs ni lha mo'i che// de nyid ye shes dbyings bstan pa'o// mkhas pas uta pa la dag ni// 'thung ba lnga'i rnam pa ste// par
155a1: ma rnam pa lnga nyid ni/ / 'dod yod lnga yi bye brag ste// dzA ti rnam gsum zhes bya ba// sku gsung thugs kyi lha mo ste// kar ni kar chu yi lha// ma li ka ni mi lha// yu ti ka ni sa yi lha// ka ra bir rlung gi lha// lha mo 'don/
155a2: pa'i dbang phyug ste// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rdo rje// ro dang reg bya rdo rje ma// spyan dang mA ma kI dang bzhi// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ste// lha mo dgu li rol pa gang // gsang ba lha mo ye shes mchod// me tog nyi shu rtsa lnga yi// rnam pa
155a3: gsal ba bstan pa'o/ / sna ma'i me tog padam dang // ta ma la dang tsam pa ka/ ku mu ta dang nag ge sar// nab ma li dman// pun ta ri ka dman// ma d+ha ra ba bri yang ku// sa tha li ka sun ka/ bil ba'i me tog ka thar// sa lo//
155a4: la ku dza ta// a sad ka ta sha 'bras bu// khadz+ra rika bak+ku la// rag kuta dang a shoka/ kar ku Tor pun d+ha ste// me tog ji bzhin bdug spos dang // zhal zas bye brag shes par bya// dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams
155a5: cad kyi gsang ba sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba'i lha mo'i mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o/ / /
155a6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos sku ngo bo nyid kyis ni// spros
155a7: pa med cing mtshan nyid med/ / rtog bral byang chub sems kyi dang // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs byin dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi ge rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje'i ting
155a8: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos kun mtshan nyid rnam bral bas// de phyir nyon mongs med ces bshad// rtog pa sna tshogs dag pas na// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes
155b1: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yon tan dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snying po kun du 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos dbyings
155b2: med stong nyid pas/ / sangs rgyas su yang de rjes 'gro// ye shes lus su yang dag bzhugs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs tshad med pa sangs rgyas thas
155b3: cad kyi chos rdo rjer rtogs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba'i gsung ni chos byings kyi// nam mkha'i gan dang mtshungs par yang // rdo rje'i gsung du ston pa pos/
155b4: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsus
155b5: so/ / rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag/ bde gshegs thugs ni rjes 'gro bral// rdo rje thugs te mi zad pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa sangs
155b6: rgyas thams cad kyi rta bdun dpal rdo rje'i zer lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / byi dang nang du rtog med pa'i// dbus na ye shes mi shigs pa// gsang ba rol par yang
155b7: dag 'byung / / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gya nom pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zla ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
155b8: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nyer glo nyer spyod mi gnas pa// khams gsum bskyed dang sdud bral ba'i// byang chub mchog tu ston pa po// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
156a1: blo gros phra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten pa'i gling de rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa/ / 'phrul ba dag cing drim sras// tshogs spyod pa las thong
156a2: zhing phyi rol rnam rtog spangs pa yi/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'brug sgra'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
156a3: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / so sor snang ba dum dang // gong du cig pa'i dngos gang yin// de nyid yongs su bsdus pas na// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa sran
156a4: rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad ma'i rtsa ba'i sngal sa lta bAr pra ba ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / tshogs drug snang ba ma 'gags pa// sems dang yid dang rnam
156a5: shes las/ / snying gi chu skyes sa dbyed pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i rtog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
156a6: te byang chub kyi se mas 'di gsungs so/ / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sbyor ba yis// ngas zhing ngal ba'i gnas las skyes// zhi ba g.yomed nyid du 'dug/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi
156a7: mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi su'i mig gi mngon pa shes pa rdo rje ti nge 'dzin la snyoms pa dathugs kyang chub kyi sems 'di ga sung so/ / mi byed byeng pa'i dam pa nyid/ g.yeng babral pa'i gas pa gtan pa// son
156a8: grub pa mthong byed pa/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan po'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje'i ting 'dzin pa stoms par
156b1: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par brtse ba chen po yis// gcig dang du mar mi gnas par// sgra brnyan lta bur ston par mdzad// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
156b2: pa 'jigs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten khams kyi sems can rnams/
156b3: bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma gnas// de yi rgyu dngaganas shes pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu ba spong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa'i mngon
156b4: par shes pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du yul dang yul rnams kyi// dbye ba shes pas ye shes mtha'// sna tshogs rigs kyi rgyu nges pas/
156b5: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs mad grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa sngon gyi gnas shes pa'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
156b6: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnas kyi btan tshigs rigs pa dang // phra ba ma lus pa yi gzhi// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin shes phyir// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
156b7: de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
156b8: srid pa'i rgyun ni rnam bcad cing // spong ba dag pa'i tshul gnas pa// spang du med pa'i ngang du grol// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad
157a1: kyi mngon par shes pa drug dag pa'i rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyu 'thun goms pa'i dbang gis ni// de yi 'bras bu 'grub par
157a2: byed/ / de yi rtsa ba ma skyes phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pa sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
157a3: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rtog pa kun dang khams dang ni// skye ba las ni yongs grol bas// bral ba'i 'bras bu dag pa nyid/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de na
157a4: de bzhin gshegs pa chos brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa dang rtags rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dbang
157a5: du gyur pa'i dngos po las/ / ldog pa med pa'i 'bras bu gang // thob pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// nam mkha'i
157a6: khams kyi dbus gnas par/ / rten dang rten par bcas pa yi// dkyil 'khor po brang legs rdzogs pa// gang du dbus su legs gnas pa// snying por gyur pa gtso bo ste// gzhan rnams len cing 'dzin par
157a7: brjod/ / rdzas te skyes dang mngal las skyes// sgong nga las byung drod gsher skye// 'di dag dag pa'i lhar gyur pas// dkyil 'khor grong khyer de dang mtshungs// gnas med ye shes tshul bstan pa// rdo rje
157a8: rnam pa bzhi dag dang / / cho ga gsum dang mngon par ni// byang chub rnam pa lngar gsungs pa// gal te skad cig dran rdzogs gyur// thams cad rigs kyi dbye ba yis// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bstan//
157b1: rigs ni dbye dang bsdu ba yis// bye brag mkhas pas shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga nyid sangs rgyas lngar// mi yi lus ni brtag bya ste// dngos dengs par bsgoms pa yis// rang sems mthu yis sangs rgyas
157b2: 'gyur/ / phyi rol 'gro ba mi mdzes pa// slob pa'i 'gro ba'i slar ldog yin// mi slob pa yang ma lus yin// bde gshegs gsum du rnam par gshegs// gzhan du rnam par 'khrul 'gyur bas// bla ma'i bka' la
157b3: legs par blang / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas
157b4: thams cad kyi ye shes dri ma med pa gnas pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje'i khyu mchog rdo rje'i ting/
157b5: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin// skyed pa'i tshul byung rnam dag pa// ye shes de nyid tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de
157b6: bzhin gshegs pa legs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dga' ba dag pa tshad de med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thob med
157b7: thob pa stong nyid sku/ / byang chub rang sems gcig tu bshad// dag pas rtog pa dag par 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i sku sangs rgyas thams
157b8: cad kyi btang snyoms chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khyab pa'i sku yi 'phrin las dang // 'jam dbyangs gsung gi dbyangs gang dang // skye medar cig ye shes
158a1: thugs/ / dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid tu 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje rgyal po lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
158a2: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / stong gsum zhing khams snod bcud kun// ma lus sangs rgyas nyid kyi dang // snying po chos kyi don byung ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla
158a3: dbyangs dpal byang chub don ston pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bas mtha' dben pa nags tshal du// gcig pu ri dgas kun gnas pas// bsam gtan nam
158a4: thar sgo gsum gyi/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyun gyi gnas pa rdo rje dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
158a5: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// skye bo kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ drang srong dri med spyan mnga' ba// bag yod pa ni rten gnas yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro bra
158a6: mchod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsten pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bkur sti rim gro'i gnas gyur pa// dran pa mi brjed gan bstan pa/ thub pa blo gros
158a7: bzang po ste/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i logs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i rnam par grol ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
158a8: sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa las// sgribs pa med cing 'bad med pa// ro dogs rnam par bral ba yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mthu
158b1: rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung po'i gdon thams cad dag par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du mkha' la rgyu ba'i gdon gyi rigs//
158b2: thams cad tshad med thugs rje'i chu rgyun gyis// tshim par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' che// de nyid bla med byang chub sems su brjod// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bzang po sangs
158b3: rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis ni// byin rlabs ye shes rgya mtsho yi// mtshungs
158b4: med bde bar sbyar ba ste/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
158b5: snyobs par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpal ldan phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yis// sras po gcig par dbang bskur ba// tshim byed ye shes mchog dbang po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i'o/
158b6: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du brjod pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
158b7: sna tshogs chos kyi sgra 'byung ba'i// sil snyan brag cha'i sgra mtshungs pa'i// rgyun chad med par rab ston pa// de nyid don dam chos rgyun bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs ma/
158b8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sku yi rol pa mi zad pa// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams khyab par/
159a1: rdo rje rje 'phrul mchog gis 'ges// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thun legs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud dpa stong ba'i tshe 'phrul bstan bdu
159a2: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdud dang nag po'i phyogs gyur la// skrag par byed pas tshar gcod pa'i// cho 'phrul bcu drug bstan pa gang // de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o//
159a3: gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
159a4: gang du mdo yi sde la sogs// bcu gnyis tshul dang bden pa bzhi// bslab pa gsum gyi dbye ba yis// chos kyi de nyid bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad
159a5: kyi don so sor yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yul snang sems kyi ldog pa dang // chos rnams ngo bo nyid shes na// dag pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/
159a6: de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig so sor yang dag par rig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
159a7: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yi ge'i gnas dang rkyen dag dang // thung ba'i tshul dang sde tshan gyi// rnam dbye mkhas pas dpyad par bya// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
159a8: de bzhin gshegs pa ku tu dga' bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bya rgya gyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
159b1: kun du thogs pa med pa yi// se ge 'ing ro sgrogs byed cing// dpal kyi gnas las kun du rgyal// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de na pa de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par gshegs sus
159b2: rgyas thams cad kyi so so yang dag par she ba pa rnam par dag pa'i nas rdo pe dzin pa rnams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de dag mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med//
159b3: rang bzhin dag pas snang ba gang // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro ba bcom pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las rdo rje dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/
