159b4: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po dang ni mtshan ma yi// rnam par rtog pa dag pa'i phyir// dngos por mi gnas gzhan snang la// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// dag pa 'di ni gsungs
159b5: zam gyis/ / ye shes can rnams kyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang pagasang ba dzus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rlung
159b6: las lhag pa'i ye shes 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'i phyogs dag pa rdo rje zhes
159b7: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du bdag 'dzin nyon mongs med// ngar 'dzin zhi ba'i chos can la// bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ba'i// byang chub tshul
159b8: 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lha'i gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
160a1: so/ / gang du dmigs med thugs rje yis// byams pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa// bla na med pa'i don bstan pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
160a2: pa rab tu sbyin par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis klu'i gdon nam pa dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dmigs pa kun dang bral ba'i sems// nam
160a3: mkha'i dang las 'ja' tshon ltar/ / de nyid thogs med ye shes kyis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri za'i gdon
160a4: rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sna tshogs rol mo'i cha dang ni// sil snyan rnams las sgra byung ba// ston pa'i chos kyi tshig grag pa// de nyid tshul
160a5: 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha ma yin gyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
160a6: kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di ni rnam par gtsang ba yi// dri ma rnam spangs bde ba'i lam// ye shes phyag rgyas brgyan pa yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
160a7: pa shes rab sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha' lding gi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nam mkha'i gnas kyi spyod yul ba// 'din
160a8: rnam dag byang chub lam/ / rnam grol rang rig bde ba che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
160b1: 'am ci'i gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che// gsang ba 'dzin pa mtshungs med pa// rgyal
160b2: rigs kyi bdag po'i dpal/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi mdangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
160b3: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sa la gnas pa'i 'gro ba kun// dag pa chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i// shing rta chen po'i 'khor lo bzhin// bzhi drug ldan pas bgro ba'o// zhes gsungs so//
160b4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
160b5: gsungs so/ / mtshungs pa med pa chos kyi don// spros pa med pa de bzhin gshegs// 'bras bur ldan pa'i gnas 'di la// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg/
160b6: bskal ldan shing rta lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gnas pa med pa dri gsum spangs// thub
160b7: pa rgyal ba spyan rdo rje/ / blo gros mi zad ye shes te// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal mchog gi kan ka sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi dgas kyi gdon
160b8: dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skye ba med cing 'byung ba'ang med// grub pa med pa'i chos nyid las// kun du snang
161a1: mi mu ga/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i gtsug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srul po'i gdon dag pa rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
161a2: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mi 'jigs pa'i dngos po las// zag med dngos grub 'byung ba yi// dben pa rnam par mi rtog pa// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
161a3: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lus srul po dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal// thub
161a4: pa byang chub shing drung du/ / bdud dpung sde rnams rab 'joms pa'i// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skam byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sa
161a5: rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / smra ba'i seng ge bla na med/ glang po chen po thogs pa med// pha rol 'joms pa kyang bzhin te// de yi nor bu'i tshul bstan pa'o//
161a6: zhes gsungs so/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dregs pa spangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgo byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du sna tshogs tshe 'phrul
161a7: tshogs/ / sems can mos pa'i sdang ba la// du ma nyid du bstan gyur pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjed byed kyi gdon dag
161a8: pab rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'thun snang gang zag mos yul te// de bas yang dag sangs rgyas la// kun rtog mi mnga' lham me bzhugs byang chub tshul 'di bstan
161b1: pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi grib gnon gyi gdon dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems pad gsungs//
161b2: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la// 'bad dang rtsol ba'i rtog mi mnga'// mtha' yas byang chub sems kyi dang // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan sangs rgyas thams cad
161b3: kyi sha za'i gdon rnam dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / tha dad rtog pa yongs mi mnga'// rang rig ye shes 'gro 'ong med// thams cad grub mtha'i 'dod pas btags//
161b4: de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med bdud kyi dpung las rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma chags
161b5: thogs med rdo rje yi/ / char sprin mdog 'dra'i rtog spangs nas tshad med byams pa chen po yis// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad
161b6: kyi dmigs pa med pA rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yang dag byang chub thabs ldan pa// gang tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos// de nyid rang bzhin stong nyid grub// mtha' med ye shes
161b7: tshul bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// 'dir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas shing gsang ba bla med kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar gnas pas ni nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dang // byang chub
161b8: sems dpa' dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su spyod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par spyod par byed do// gsang ba 'dzin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des sangs rgyas
162a1: kyi yon tan dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / rnam par thar pa ma lus pa yang tshe 'di nyid la yongs su rdzogs shing kun du spyad pas spyod par byed na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan dang ye
162a2: shes gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang srung zhing skyob pa dang sba ba dang yongs su srung bar byed do// gsang
162a3: ba'i rgyud 'di gang gis 'dzin pa dang / / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / nyan pa dang phan tshun 'dri bar byed pa dang / sems pa na lha dang / klu dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyi gdon gyis kyang bar chad mi byed de// srung zhing
162a4: yongs su mchod par byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las srung ba
162a5: yongs su dag pa dang bar chad med pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi'o
162a6: ris kyi gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi ye shes gang // phyin ci log dang rnam bral ba// de nyid skye 'gag bral ba la// /
162a7: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis klu chen po brgyad dag pa rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
162a8: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i ye shes ni// gsang ba mchog gi don gnas pa// dmigs pa las 'das byang chub sems// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// /
162b1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dag pa lha chen po brgyad dag pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gzung 'dzin btags pa'i dbang gis ni// mthar gyur
162b2: de nyid lam gyur pa/ / btags pa'i dri ma dag par bya// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gza' chen po brgyad kyi gdon rnam
162b3: par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du rkyen las bskyed pa yi// rnam pa phan tshun ltos las byung // gzhan dbang dag pa'i ye shes ni//
162b4: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu skar gyi gdon ma lus pa rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la/
162b5: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du phyin ci ma log pa'i// gnas tshul yongs su rdzogs grub pa// de bzhin nyid dang ye shes don// mi 'gyur de bzhin tshul bstan pa'o// zhes
162b6: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i gesar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi ris kyi gdon thams cad rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
162b7: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams dag pa'i mtshan nyid can// rang bzhin sgyu mar snang ba gang // ngo bo lhun grub dbyer med las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhini/
162b8: gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyogs skyong ba bcu'i gnod pa'i gdon yongs su dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
163a1: so/ / chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ ma nor mngon par thugs chung pas skyob pa thugs rje'i ngo bo las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od zer sangs
163a2: rgyas thams cad kyisar hu la rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bag chags dag pa'i rgyud las ni// ma rig pa dang bral gyur pas//
163a3: bdag skyes dag par gnas par bya// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtsi snu rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
163a4: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / khams rgyud rnam par byang ba las// phyir mi ldog par gyur pa na// rang rig bdud las grol bar 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
163a5: de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang srong thams cad rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du gdon rnams 'byung
163a6: ba'i tshe/ / rags pa 'og la rten nas te// phra ba'i sgo ni steng nas 'jug/ dag pa ye shes tshul gnas bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byor ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyab
163a7: 'jug gi gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / byed pa 'jigs pa'i tshul spangs te// zhe sdang dag pa'i byang chub las// stobs chen pha rol gnon
163a8: byed pas/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang phyug chen po'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin
163b1: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du drag po 'jigs par ston// dus mtshan bcas pa 'dod chags bdag/ 'di nyid nyon mongs tshul dag pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes
163b2: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rin chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshangs pa dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten srid pa gnas pa yi//
163b3: pa bzhi las sprul 'dod pa// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum rnam par dag pa rdo
163b4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du chags dang 'jig pa dang // gnas dang stongs pa'i rim pa 'di'o// dag pa gtsang ma'i zhing du smon// tshul 'di sangs rgyas
163b5: bstan po zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par gsung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'og dngas steng sa dang sa bla ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
163b6: 'di gsungs so/ / mun pa dang ni snang ba yi// bstan pa gnyis la rang rgyal dang // sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul mchog gi/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchag gsung
163b7: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams gsum pa 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thog ma dang ni tha ma yi// 'phel dang 'grib pa'i cha las ni// 'khor
163b8: los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog 'os sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa gsum las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
164a1: bar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / snyigs ma lnga 'byung dus kyu chatshe// dus la bab pa'i bskal pa la// rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung ba ste// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de na/
164a2: de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus gsum las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du bgrang ba las 'das pa'i// rdul
164a3: snyed 'jig rten thams cad du/ / dus gsum dag pa'i ye shes kyi// byang chu tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyogs bcu rnam par dag pa
164a4: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bltas pas mthong med yul med pa// phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba yi// pha rol phyin pa mtshungs med pa'i// byang chub
164a5: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i 'dam rdza pa las rgal ba rdo rje rnam pa thams cad las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sesra
164a6: 'di gsungs so/ / spros pa kun las 'das nas ni// bla med theg pa rab 'byung ba// tshul 'di nye bar spyad pa na// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang //
164a7: gzugs ni spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis gsang ba nye bar bstan pa la mchod par byed de// lha'i gos dag 'thor zhing lha'i sil snyan du mas kyang rab tu dkrol te// lha'i me tog pad ma dang // pad ma chen po dang /
164a8: ud pa la dang // ud pa la chen po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang gtor to// mngon par gtor to// mngon par rab tu gtor to// zhing khams de dag tu khyab pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan phye mas gtor zhing dri zhim pos yong
164b1: su khyab par gyur to/ / de dag 'di lta ste// sa p+pa'i lha dang rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phru
164b2: dbang byed kyi lha'i bar dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don gyi lha dang / tshangs pa chen po'i lha dang / 'od chung gi lha dang / tshad med 'od kyi lha dang // 'od gsal gyi lha dang // dge ba'i lha dang /
164b3: dge chung gi lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / sprin meda'o dkyi lha dang / bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang // mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha
164b4: rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi bar te// 'og min gyi lha'i tshogs dum dang bcas pa rnams kyis gsang ba chen po bla na med pa'i don rab tu bstan pa la mchod do// rab
164b5: tu mchod do/ / kun du mchod do// yang dag par mchod cing me tog ga char phab par gyur to// rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs rab tu sgrogs par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi char phab pa la 'di lta ste// rin po che
164b6: and snyil dang / margad dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / spug dang rdo'i snying po dang / man shel dang / bai dUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / mu men dang / mus la gar+b+ha dang / rin po che'i rgyal po bsam 'phel gyi bar du
164b7: gtor zhing yongs su byur bur rab tu gang bar gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal
164b8: ba'i rgyung las brtson pa yongs su dag pa cing kun du mchod pa'i mthus bzhi bcu dgu pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnam
165a1: ye shes brnyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la// phyi
165a2: rol dngos po dag pa la/ / yang dag ye shes sgyur ba po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa grub pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud
165a3: bcom pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nyon mongs rnam rtog glo bur ba// de nyid ma rig bag chags dag/ rtsa ba bral bas nges btsem pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di
165a4: bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phung po'i bdud bcom pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
165a5: so/ / sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam pa las// rmi lam tshul ltar ma 'gags pa// gang du dag pa bdag med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog sbyin sangs rgyas
165a6: thams cad kyi 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par dag pa ye shes sku// 'gro 'od med cing 'bri sman med// gang du 'du 'bral
165a7: med pa'i don/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phan par bzhed pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud bcom zhing legs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
165a8: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang gis// brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs par ste// drug po 'dis ni ldan par gsungs
165b1: zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ldan pa ye shes lnga dag pa'i dbyings rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'i nas snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du chos kyi dbyings dang ni
165b2: me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya ba grub pa nyid dang ni// lnga po 'di ni ye shes brjod// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams
165b3: cad kyi gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su rtogs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du gshegs shing gang du byon// gang drugatu
165b4: pa rdo rje'i dang / / zag med dpal ldan de bzhin nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi dra bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkar po rnam par dag pa'i sa
165b5: rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du so so'i skye bo yi// tha mal mos pas lam 'dug pa// dge ba'i don mthong nyan thos lam/
165b6: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'joms pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rigs kyis rnam par dag pa rdo rje la snyoms par zhugs te byung
165b7: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par dkar ba'i don ldan pas// bdag med bzod pa mnyam pa nyid// chos gang lhag par dad pa na// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
165b8: gshegs pa bai dUr+ya'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad brgyad pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du
166a1: chos kyi don rnyed pa/ / thog ma'i 'bras bu mngon gyur pa// de nyid 'phags pa'i tshul bstan pa'i// bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog lha'i
166a2: rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mthong ba'i sa rnam par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang gang mthong ba'i chos nyid la// sgrib pa med
166a3: par rang gsal ba/ / don dang 'thun par spyod pa las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dra ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrabs pa'i sa rnam par dag
166a4: pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dug nyid dag par byas pa yi// dug med gnas ni phra gnas pa// bral ba bag la nyal ba zhi// byang
166a5: chu ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
166a6: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du chags med ye shes mchog/ rags pa dag pa spangs pa'i don// dman pa las ni phyir 'ong bas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
166a7: gshegs pa yon tan kun mchog 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byas pa rtogs pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bya ba byas pa stan
166a8: pa'i don/ / byed pa byas pa khur bor te// rtag chad las grol byang chub lam// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrung
166b1: ba'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims las// rnam par rtog pas mi phyed pa// dri med dgra bcom don thob pa//
166b2: byang chub tshul 'di snyan pa'o// zhes gsangs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu zla ba can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'phags pa nyan thos kyis dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
166b3: 'di gsungs so/ / bdag med don ldan dngos med pa// spyi dang bye brag mtshungs med pas// 'bras bu grol ba thob pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spags
166b4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rang sangs rgyas pa'i gnas rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / spyod pa rmad byung rgyal ba'i skus// 'dul med zhing du rdzu
166b5: 'phrul pas/ rtog pa de las spyod par bcas// rang rgyal gnyis po'i tshul du brjod// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ye shes ji lta ba mkhyen pa rnam
166b6: par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / thogs med khyab par spyod pas na// ma 'dres dus gsum mnyam pa nyid// mkhyen pa'i phyogs bral dag pa ste/
166b7: nga nub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes ji snyed pa mkhyen pa dag brda rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
166b8: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas nyag gcig spyod yul du// mngon du mgyur med pas na// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
167a1: nga na gshegs pa ga pa' 'ad sangs rgyas bas cad kyil gas rnas pa thams cadas rgyan pa kyang nga 'jan la snyams par thugs kya ba byarnams 'dags sa pa/ ga
167a2: sa brtags pa/ / dran pas yid la byed pa bral// rab tu mi gnas pa yi yid// dpags pa med pa'i bdag nyid can// gang du dmigs med skye ba med// rkyen 'brel dag pa rang byung ba// yun 'grus dang las ma gsos
167a3: byang chub rdul 'di gan / / zhes gsungs so// de nas 'din gsungs cas gyis// rigs kyad bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// ske tshogs mchad cing bstod byas na// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis
167a4: gsungs/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rigs brgya yis// re res brgya phrag bcu yi bar// de ltar stong phrag brgya dag gis// 'bum du bzlas pa yin par brjod// bdag nyid mi bskyod par byas te// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil
167a5: 'khor ba/ / sangs rgyas lnga dang yum bzhi dang // sems dpa' drug dang lha mo lnga// khro bo'i rgyal po lngas bsdus te// nyi shu pa yi bdag nyid kyis// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje 'bar bab bsgom
167a6: te/ / de las spro dang bsdu byas pa'i// bzlas pa stong phrag nyi shu pas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i bsam gtan bsdus// de ltar 'khor lo nor bu dang // pad ma ral gri'i bar du yang // re re'i sngags kyi don bsgom pa// gsal ba'i dkyil
167a7: 'khor dbus gnas te/ / spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis// gti mug nga rgyal 'dod chags dang // phrag dog dag pa'i dkyil 'khor las// rigs ni bzhi po kun la yang // stong phrag nyi shu phrag bzhi yis// khri phrag bcur
167a8: ni bzlas byas pas/ / bsnyen pa nye bar bsgrub pa yis// bzlas pa gsang sngags tshul bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po
167b1: pa gnyis su med pa mnyam banyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rlung las gsang chen thar mongs yin pa'i rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le gre lnga bcu pa'o/ / den pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i stogs papa/
167b2: rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba'i byang chub 'ong po che// rtag tu chos rgyal
167b3: thob pa'i don/ / rang rig mi gnas nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med pa'i zhing yongasu
167b4: sbyong ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du mngon par sangs rgyas kyang // rgyu med rkyen grol byang chub sems// 'di nyid 'gag par 'gyur med de// byang chub
167b5: trail 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad par ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ste byang chub
167b6: sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes mngon par mi gnas pas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings// rjes 'gro mtshungs pa tha ma med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhi
167b7: gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas thams cad mi g.yo ba rdo rjer 'chang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par dag pa thar pa'i tshul// rgyud 'di
167b8: bstan pa med pa'i ngang / / kun du gsang ba mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ther zug
168a1: dang bral ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ngo bo nyid ni gnas med pa// sgyu mar snang ba kun rdzob tu// srid zhi mnyam pa nyid bstan pas// byang chub
168a2: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhi bar mi gnas pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sa rba
168a3: 'di gsungs so/ / shes rab kyis ni rang bzhin shes// ye shes kyis ni shes bya mkhyen// gnyis med shes rab ye shes dag/ 'dres pas rtogs par bya ba nyid// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
168a4: dbyangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang sems stong nyid dag pa ni// mthar
168a5: thug don dam ma yin te/ / chos sku rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngos bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro/
168a6: ldog nges pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos sku don dam la mi gnas// ci yang ma yin don dam la// byed pa spangs pas 'bras bu'ang med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan//
168a7: pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don la gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad de bzhin nyid du ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// /
168a8: rang reg skad cig 'gag med pa'i// snga ma phyi ma la ltos phyir// rgyun chad mi 'gyur ltos med pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gzi brjid sangs
168b1: rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su thim pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / // 'das pa'i sems ni rang grol ba// ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob cing // da ltar nas med
168b2: mtshan nyid can/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan zla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par grol ba'i dpal gyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
168b3: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ji ltar nam mkha' rnam dag bzhin// theg pa 'di ni nam mkha' 'dra ste// spong ba med pa'i nyer zhi ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
168b4: de bzhin gshegs pa po dpag med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun rdzob dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / grub pa med pa'i snang ba tsam// rten 'brel tsam
168b5: du'ang gang skyes pa/ / chos rnams dbang po'i gzhu mtshungs par// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu thugs bzhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgod
168b6: pa'i rnam par thar pa la 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba bla med byang chub pa'i// 'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung la// 'di med pas ni 'di mi 'byung/
168b7: bstan pa de nyid tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
168b8: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyu med rgyu nor ma tshang dang // log pa'i don dang ngan pa spangs// tshogs pa gcig par ma grub la// 'byung ba med phyir rten 'brel bstan// zhes gsungs so// de nas de
169a1: bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi yan lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rnga rnga'i tong nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyu las skyes shing
169a2: rkyen gyis bskyed/ / gzhil gnas shing 'bras bur grub// srid zhi mtshungs phyir bstan pa yin// byang chub de nyid bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg pa kyang bar du 'phags pa thub pa sangs
169a3: rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / brtags na dben zhing don byed nus// 'thun par snang la rkyen las bskyed// na
169a4: rdzob chos kun mtshan nyid de/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa las bral ba rdo rje'i ting
169a5: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yul dang dbang po bdag pa'i rkyen// de ma thag pa'i mtshungs med pa// rang bzhin 'byung ba'i skad cig la// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
169a6: pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo bdag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 5
169a7: bral med chos kyi sku/ / mi 'chad 'byung ba longs spyod rdzogs// rang gi mtshan nyid bde bache// dbyer med/ tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i don sangs rgyas
169a8: thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so/ / ming dang nges tshig ngo bo dang // mtshan nyid dbye ba'i don gyis na// rgyu 'bras chos las rgyal ba
169b1: 'brung / tshad med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyon med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spangs pa med cing thob pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
169b2: tebyang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du bkal pa bye bar yang // song bar zhugs shing spyad pa las// byang na ba ring song 'gyur ba med// mnyam pa nyid kyis rang grol 'gyur// zhes gsangs so// de nas de bzhin
169b3: gshegs pa blo dbyangs dge ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i don rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / skye ba med pas chos kyi sku// 'gag pa med pas
169b4: longs spyod rdzogs/ / gnas pa med pas sprul pa'i sku// dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// ye shes bla na med pa'i chos// bstan pa
169b5: nges par legs pa'i gnas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'das pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
169b6: rgyal ba'i rgyud las rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus kyis grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin
169b7: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dus gsum dus med ston pa po// tshad med ye shes stobs chen po// sring shir mi gnas bde bar gshegs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes
169b8: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus mi dmigs par grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
170a1: bags bzangs dang grangs pa da las// 'das pa la shes gad cig pa// bsam byas ma khyab dan 'char 'gyur// nyad nal 'de bstan pa'o// nas gsungasas// dpa das nan gag sa pas
170a2: ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gsang ba'i chos kyi tshig gcig gi
170a3: grol ba ye shes thob pa ni/ / nga yi chos rnams des mthong ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lam bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyi
170a4: ga'i cha las grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / nyon mongs shes bya'i phyogs dag dang // las las grol ba 'phags pa'i chos// de
170a5: nyid nges pa bla na med/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs bzang po grol ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas de bzhin snang ba'i rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin la/
170a6: snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// gsum la nges par skyabs song na// dag pa ye shes spyod pa yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes
170a7: gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bstangs dang bral ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
170a8: gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song ba// ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas kyi// lta ba mi ngoms kun mthong zhing // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
170b1: bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brjod pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rjes su dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa/ / dam pa' chos la byan
170b2: 'gro ba/ / ma 'ongs pa na rgyal ba la// dam pa'i chos sgra thos nas ni// byang chub tshul 'di thob byed pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
170b3: 'phags pa'i tshogs rjes su dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song gang // ma 'ongs pa na nyan thos dang // byang
170b4: chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / / lhan cig spyod pa ston par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i mchog thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa cig tu ston pa
170b5: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal ba'i rin chen rnam gsum po// dbang phyug tsho grapas mthar thug dus// gcig pu nyid du thugs la zhugs//
170b6: de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i phyogs la zhugs pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i
170b7: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sku gsum rang las lhan cig skyes// de nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// ye shes spyod pa gnas 'di nyid// ston pa'i
170b8: tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ / zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa'i chos rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
171a1: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang // bcu gnyis dag pa bdag med pa// 'thung nas sgra tshul skyob pa'i chos// de nyid phun sum tshogs par gsung
171a2: zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pasnyengs pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
171a3: gsungs so/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems// bla med sems dpa' chen po ni// don dam bstan pa'i mcho/ rnyes pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
171a4: gzigs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'thun par zhugs pa rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang
171a5: chub sems dpa' rig pa rnams/ / rang las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang por
171a6: zhugs pa'i spyod pa'i yan lag rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bsam gtan yan lag lngas gnas shing // rnam par 'gog pas mi g.yo ba/
171a7: bde chen mnyam nyid gnas pa'i tshul/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs pas zhugs pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge
171a8: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni// mgon po bdag nyid chen po'i dang // tshangs pa'i gnas kyi dmigs las grol// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
171b1: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chen po'i gzhon pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs par zhugs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
171b2: tshul chen thabs ldan dri ma med// yan lag 'byung ba chos dag pa// so sor ma yin mkha' dbyings klong // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtshungs med
171b3: sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du mngon par mkhyen pa la// rlom sems med pa'i
171b4: bdag nyid rtsa/ / gcig pa bkag pa'i rgyun las ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po rdo rje mkhregs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lam yan lag brgyad
171b5: rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yan lag 'di dag ldan pas na// nges par 'jug pa mi ldog pa// sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i mthu// gsang ba
171b6: de nyid bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
171b7: byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms bdag med mnyam pa'i dngos// tshad med chu bo'i rlabs las ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ljon shing bzang pos pa
171b8: rgyas thams cad kyi skyob pa mtshungs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sa la chen po'i shing ltar ni// 'dab rgyas rgyal ba rgyun mi 'chad// re re'i don/
172a1: du'ang du mar zhugs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rgyun du chos spyod skal pa can// ye shes dam pa'i gnas thob pas// yan lag bcu pa bstan
172a2: pa yin/ / phyag 'tshal bskor ba yi ger 'dri// sbyin dang mchod pa kha ton dang // nyan dang 'chad pa de bsam zhing // ting 'dzin ldan pas spyad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
172a3: gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sde snod kyi tshul yongs su dag par spyod pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
172a4: pa gdangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khrul pa med cing 'dres pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun du thun mong yul min zhing // khyad par gyur pa thub pa
172a5: yi/ / phrin las dag pa tshad med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tsa tse med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
172a6: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rags pa dang ni phra ba yi// kun nas ldang ba dag pa yi// dkrugs pas 'khrug pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
172a7: pa mthu'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsnyel ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / sems can don la dus kun du// bskyed dang dbri ba med par ni// rgyun chad med
172a8: pas 'jug pa dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mnyam pa bzhag pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
172b1: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mnyam par ma bzhag spyod pa na'ang // rtag tu dri med gnas pas na// btang snyoms tsam du'ang mi gnas te// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so
172b2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tha dad du gzigs pa mi mnga' ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ma spangs mi gnas mnyam nyid
172b3: te/ glang dor med pa'i ye shes can// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pas na// byang chub tshul 'di dag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong skar mal dgyes pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sor
172b4: ma btogs pa'i btang snyoms med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / yongs su sbyang dang brtag pa dang // gsal dang dbye ba 'byung ba las// khyad par btang snyoms
172b5: med pa ste/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi sgron me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dun pa nyams pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
172b6: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dus rnams phyogs bcur rgyal ba yis// spro ba byang chub snying po'i don// sangs rgyas gdung las gzhan mi rtog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
172b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes mnga' ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems can
172b8: gcig gi don du yang / / bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ rdul phran grangs 'das brtsom pa che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsung so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang ldan sangs rgyas thams
173a1: cad kyi dran pa nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dpyad pa mi dmigs ma 'dres par// yongs su dag pa'i mkhyen pa can// snga ma la
173a2: sogs rtag med phyir/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor par ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa sangs rgyas thams ca
173a3: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ting 'dzin du ma gcig sdud cing // gcig las du mar spro ba yang // de dag snyoms par 'jug pa yi// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
173a4: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bzang po'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
173a5: 'di gsungs so/ / mkhyen pa rig pa du ma las// 'gog pa med par bzo yi gnas// bla med mi zad tshul thob pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
173a6: dpal gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes stong nyid me chen gyis// 'khor
173a7: ba'i dri ma ma lus pa/ / chos dbyings dang du sreg mdzad pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus
173a8: kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dus rnams kun du thogs med par// lhan
173b1: cig skyes pa'i ye shes las/ / 'byung zhing 'jug dang gnas par mdzad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad
173b2: kyi ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / zhing khams ma lus thams
173b3: cad du/ / khyab byed snying po rdo rje la// 'jug gnas ldang ba dbyangs brjod pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal sangs rgyas
173b4: thams cad kyis yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mkha' dbyed
173b5: chos nyid rnam dag dang / / rnam rtog 'gro 'ong mi gnas pas// rang bzhin dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
173b6: sprin nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'das pa'i dus lam chags mthogs pa'i ye shes mthong bas 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du brtan g.yo
173b7: bcas pa yi/ / dngos po de bzhin gshegs pa yi// phun sum tshogs pa thogs med pas// byang chub tshul 'di ston pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bkod
173b8: pa'i nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'jig
174a1: rten khams kyi rdul phran dang / / sems can spyod pa sna tshogs dang // dpal ldan bde gshegs mdzad pa dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
174a2: zer yon tan gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi da ltar ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung / /
174a3: rtog med me long gzugs lta bu// gsal ba 'dzin pa bral ba yi// rims dang gcig car 'bad med par// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong dbang po
174a4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su ma 'dres pa'i chos bcwa brgyad rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'di dag ma
174a5: lus sangs rgyas kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ gsang ba 'dzin pa snying por gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tho dang ldan pa sangs rgyas tham
174a6: cad kyi 'khrug pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / tha snyad rnams las 'das pa yi// bden par ma grub sgyu ma'i chos// dag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'byung ba/
174a7: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// gang du mdo don spyod pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed pa// deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// bar du bsod nams ye shes kyi// grangs
174a8: med du ma sa las bgrod de/ / gang du sa bcur gnas pa yis// sprul pa du ma ston par byed// lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du// ji ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sprul pa sgyu mI
174b1: cho 'phrul gyis/ / sna tshogs gzugs su ston par byed// dngos dang sprul dang byin rlabs dang // cho 'phrul ngo mtshar bskyed pa dag/ gdul bya'i don dang bye brag pa// spyi dang dngos dang dngos med dang // brtan dang
174b2: g.yo ba'i dngos gang dang / / srog dang srog ma yin par 'gro// gzugs dang sgra dang yi ge dang // rtswa lcug 'khril shing la sogs pa/ duma'i rnam par ston byed 'gyur// ye shes 'og min srug por ni// 'dod chags
174b3: chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ / rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// dang po'i 'og min chos kyi dbyings// rang byung nam mkha' dag pa'i zhing // bsam gyis mi khyab spyod yul lo//
174b4: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa// 'og min gnyis pa ye shes yul// rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyur to// gnyis pa 'od gsal lhun gyis grub// 'og min zag pa med pa/
174b5: yul// bde chen rgyal ba gtsug tor gnas// byang chub mchog dang rab bcings pas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul can// sems dpa' chen po gsum pa'o// yang dag lam ni lnga ldan pa/ gsang ba 'dzin pa
174b6: goms pa'i lam/ / rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag rgya che// dbang gi rgyal po yon tan gter// skad cig gcig la goms byed cing // shin du sbyin zhing brtson ldan gyis// rang byung thams cad mkhyen pa yi// nor bu rin
174b7: chen lta bur ni/ / 'gro ba'i dgos 'dod skong byed pas// thams cad rdo rje gsum du ni// lhag pa'i mchog gis dbang bskur te// dus gsum phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' rig mar
174b8: bcas/ / lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis// khro bo'i rgyal po du ma yis// dbang bskur gyur pas gsang ba'i rim// sbas pa'i tshul gyis 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
175a1: t hugs byagasang bgasang pa 'dus pa rnas 'byung can pa gnyis su med pa mnyas panyid nam par rgyas ba cud pas bang sa rgyas thams cad kyi su gsus kyi gang bams brtan pa byud sul thun sa das
175a2: le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i mchog 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/
175a3: byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas gang // rnal 'byor chos kyi rgyas btab pas// khams gsum ye shes gcig par sbyar// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsung
175a4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos sbyin sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms parare zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
175a5: chos can ma lus rgya mtsho kun// rang lag skyu rur gzhag bzhin// rnam par tho 'tsham las rgal ba'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang po
175a6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa ma lus par mkhyen pa mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyi ni// 'jigs tshogs srid
175a7: pa bcom nas ni/ / mi ldog byang chub chen po nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bar du bcod pa'i chos rnam pa
175a8: gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / bdud las byung ba'i rtags dang brda// mtshan ma'i gnas
175b1: kyigatan tshigs las/ / bdud las rnam rgyal lung bstan pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gzigs pa sangs rgyas bams cad kyi phun sum chags pa
175b2: thams cad chis par 'gyur ba'i lam nges par de kho na nyid du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / kun 'thung sdug bsngal spyod byed pa/
175b3: lam dang 'gog pa'i bden pa las// de nyid nges par 'byung bstan pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'jigs pa
175b4: bzhi rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ston pas khyu mchog brlabs chen gnas// bla med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa// yang dag chos kyi 'khor la
175b5: yi/ / byang chub de nyid chu bstan 'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
175b6: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya dag ni 'dab ma mi ldan 'phur nus med// de la zung 'jug don ldan pa'i byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
175b7: brtog dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa gcig tu dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / / chos rnams bslab pa'i sdom pa la//
175b8: gzhi dang rgyu lam 'bras bu dag/ ma nyams sa bon myu gu bzhin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
176a1: skyes bu khyu mchog rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyisems 'di gsungs so/ / nam mkha' dag pa'i gnas mtshungs par// yul dang yul can dag pa las// dbyings dang ye shes
176a2: dbyer med pa'i/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg pa yul 'khor spobs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun tu spyod pa dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
176a3: zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gang du chos can chos nyid med// kun rdzob blo yi spyod yul te// chos kun sbru ma tsam du gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
176a4: gshegs pa rin chen rab sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / shes dang shes pa kun gyi ni// spyod yul blo yi snang
176a5: ba las/ / rten dang rten med ngo bo nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla brgyas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
176a6: te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dag pa'i chos sku skye med pa// dri ma bral ba de 'od gsal// mtha' yas grol ba'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
176a7: paseng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / srid pa'i dra ba gcad pa yi// rnam par zhi ba'i sems spangs te/
176a8: mgon po ye shes gcig par 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin
176b1: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ma 'gags gos pa med pa dang // pa 'dres thabs kyis pha rol son// gsal ba zlol 'char ba gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
176b2: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa snang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
176b3: rlan chad med pa'i byang chub sems// thams cad de las skyes pa'i dngos// phra mo rkyen byung dag pa'i don// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
176b4: bsam gtan snyoms pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin los dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag
176b5: khams rgyud yul dang dbang po dag/ rab tu dag par rdzogs pa ni byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
176b6: chos 'byung rol pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnas dag bar chad med pa'i lam// chos rgyal zhing khams yongs su dag/ mi ldog ting 'dzin
176b7: nga mi shes/ / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri sa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan mngon par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
176b8: par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / rnam par smin pa bsod nams stobs// bral ba ye shes spyod yul ba// khyad par rnam par mi rtog las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
177a1: zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mi bslad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems
177a2: can mos pa sna tshogs la/ / ye shes spyod pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyis// bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa mdzes pa'i
177a3: rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phreng ba dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma stongs par// ye shes 'khor lo bskor
177a4: ba yi/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rjes ston// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rig pa'i rgyal
177a5: po rjes dran pas/ / gsang ba dam pa bstan pa yin// dang po dbang gi dus yin te// mngon par rtogs pa dang po'o// ye shes mthong ba'i dang po las// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// lus dang ngag
177a6: rang sems dmigs pas/ / rig pa gcig gi ngang nyid las// sngags kyi rim pa rdo rje ltar// yul sems rlung ni mi phyed pas// gcig tu gyur pa'i rim pa las// sems la dmigs pa ye shes che// rlung sem
177a7: 'gro ldo gcig pas na/ / nges pa rnam par dben don bstan// phyi rol yul snang sgyu mar 'char// rang rig 'od gsal mngon byang chub// thams cad bde chen ye shes su// yang dag rdzogs pas rdzogs pa'i rim/ bsam
177a8: gtan bsdus pa'i rim pa yis/ / ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig pa// gcig tu byed pa gsang ba yis// zung 'jug ye shes thob par 'gyur// dngos po med pa bsgom pa dngos// sgom par bya ba bsgom pa min//
177b1: dpas ngos pa dngas mang pas// bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// gang du lus sems kun rdzob bcas// don ma rnam dag zung 'jug ste// gang du dmigs pas bsdus pa ni// brtson 'grus ldan pas nga
177b2: 'jug yin/ / rim gyis mngon 'dod le lo can// g.yeng ba tham cad spangs nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di la// rnal 'byor brtson pas rab bskul bas// zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes
177b3: mngon du byed pa'am/ / zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che yi// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog sbyor ba// rim pa rdzogs par gnas pa'i lam// skad cig zhag dang lo yi dus// dus ni zung ngus 'grub par 'gyur// skyer
177b4: tshul 'di dang por bstan/ / mthar phyin brtan par gyur pa yis// gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor te// rim gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yi sku gsung thugs// rim gnyis bla na med
177b5: pa las/ / gsang gsum rdo rje thob par 'grub// 'dir ni yi ga'i dbye ba yis// sgra las khyad par don bcol ba// rkyen dang byed pa ston pa yi// sngags ni gsang bar brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa tham
177b6: c ad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyud kyi don bstan
177b7: pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thub pa chen pos bka' bstsal pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdorje// gsang gsum rdo rje 'chang ba'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i snang ba las 'das te/
177b8: rdo rje gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid// mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid can// ye shes dmigs med ngo bo nyid// 'dus pa gsang ba gnas med pa// yi ge'i tshig ni dmigs med pas// de nyid brjod pas rnam par dben/
178a1: dgongs pas cad ni mi gsung bzhugs// gsang ba'i sku mchog dri ma med// gzhon nus dbang phyug 'dir rtog go// ye shes sku ni mi 'gyur zhing // ma skyes skye med mchog gi yul// rdo rje gsung ni 'gag pa med//
178a2: mtshan ma med cing dri ma med// 'od gsal nam mkha' zhes bya ba// de nyid las byung der ston pa// thams cad dmigs med rtogs su med// yang dag snang ba kun rdzob ste// legs par bzung yang ma skyes shing // sgyu ma
178a3: tsam du'ang dmigs su med/ / log par zin las ldog par 'gyur// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs// thams cad kyis ni 'di skad gsol// rdo rje'i tshig gi yul min pa// kun du 'byung ba'i dri ma las// phyin
178a4: log las rnam par 'das/ / de nyid brjod dang bral bas na// rnam par dben pa spros dang bral// tha dad gcig tu rtag mi bya// de nyid ci yi slad du ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// byang chub sems su gyur pa nyid// skye
178a5: med tsam du'ang mi gnas la/ / sgyu ma'i dbyings nyid las 'das shing // ngo bo nyid ni rang byung ba// yang dag spyod par gyur pa gang // de bzhin nyid du gshegs gyur cing // ye shes 'jug pas gshegs par mdzad// ldog
178a6: pa'i khyad par rjes su 'gro/ / de nyid gang gi slad du na// 'jig rten dbang po la sogs pas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// ngo bo nyid ni mi dmigs shing // ye shes 'jug pa med pas ni// slar zhing yang dag
178a7: yul 'di la/ / 'di snyam du ni rtog gyur te// bdag cag ston pa de bzhin gshegs// 'di nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de nyid gsang ba chos dag pa// yul dus ma bral brjod bral ba// rtogs dkar brtag par
178a8: dka' ba nyid/ / rig na'ang mi rig pa yi chos// gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dben// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ ji ltar rtog cing ston par byed// de ltar sems par gyur pas na// bsam pa de dag rab shes pas// /
178b1: gsum ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gsang ba mi 'gyur rdo rje'i bdag/ 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs kun yang // de nyid gzigs pa med pas na// bri ma byang chub mi shes so// phra zhing bdag med stong pas na//
178b2: chub sems dpa' lta ci smos// de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na// sgyu ma skye ba med pas na// rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa// ngo bo med cing gnas med pa// mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa las// gnyis med snang ba'i ye shes 'byung //
178b3: ltar shin tu rtogs dka' zhing // kun dang thun mong ma gyur pas// mos dang rig par ldan pa yi// sems can rnams kyis ji ltar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu zhes skal par ldan// sems can chen po'i rigs can gyis//
178b4: bla med mngon par byang chub pa// snying po mchog la gnas pa yis// tshe 'dir rdo rjer sangs rgyas ste// de nyid sku gsum dbyer mi phyed// rdo rje chos nyid dag pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba che// ye shes rdo rje
178b5: gnas thob 'gyur/ / dbyangs dang gsal byed sbas pa'i don// thig le srog gi rnam pa ni// snying kha'i dbus su mi shigs pa// gsal ba zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la// sems kyi rten du gyur par brjod// rten 'di gzus
178b6: brnyan dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / chos sku gnyis su med pa'i thugs// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gsung rdo rje// sprul skra yongs rdzogs grub pa'i 'bras// dbyer med rdo rje bde ba che// lus ngag sems ni
178b7: sku gsum du/ / 'byung zhing 'jug par mdzad pa gang // sku bzhi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang // de nyid bla mar gsungs pas na// gnas pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// gang du'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// de bzhin gshegs
178b8: pa thams cad kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// bden gnyis yang dag rab sbyor ba// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis// rigs cig tha dad med par sdom// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid du nges// sku gsung thugs
179a1: kyi sbyor ba yis/ / bla med 'byung ba'i lus can la// bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad pa gang // 'khor lo'i sbyor ba byang chub rim// yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa yi// cho ga legs par byas na ni//
179a2: mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i mtha' klas par// phur bu 'debs par gdon mi za// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// pur 'debs de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi mchog sbyin pa'i// sngags kyang nyid don
179a3: bdus pa'o/ / bskyed pa'i rim pa gnas pa yi// rab tu dga' ba nas brtsams te// mngon du gyur pa'i bar du bskyod// ring du song ba bdun pa nas// migayo ba yi bar dag tu// sbyor ba gsum gyis nges par sbyang //
179a4: las la sbyor bas brgyad pa'o// snang ba gsum la zhugs pa dag/ sa brtu la ni nges gnas pa// rang bzhin brgyad dang drug bcu po// 'od gsal ba la thim gyur pas// sbyang bya spyong byed gnyis la ni//
179a5: bcu gcig bcu gnyis bde gshegs pa// der gnas bde ba chen po yi// bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin la gnas// ko Ta kA zhes gyen dra nu ba'i rlung // dad pa'i dbang po mi phyed gyur pa ste// tshe la dbang ba stobs
179a6: bcu'i mchog gyur gang / / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen par brjod// ko Ta wak+ta thur du sel ba nyid// brtson 'grus dbang po rtsom pa'i mchog yin te// byang chub sems las dbang po lha yi gtso// mos pa
179a7: sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes brjod/ / ko Ta wa d+ha me dang mnyam gnas pa// chos kun rtsa ba snying po srog yin te// mi brjed dran pa'i dbang po sems la dbang // bsam gtan nyid dang ting 'dzin mkhyen stobs
179a8: gyur/ / ko Ta ba sha srog 'dzin drung gyur pas// mnyam bzhag ting 'dzin dbang po dang longs spyod// rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab dang // snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes brjod// ku ti dar
179b1: khyab byed drung du gyur/ / chos rnams 'byed pa shes rab dbang po ste// skye ba la dbang kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes brjod// ko la Tak+Sha 'di ni rgyu ba'i rlung // spyod yul dad pa'i saT/
179b2: dang ldan pa las// rdzu 'phrul pa dang las kyi 'jug pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// ko la b+h+ya zhes rab tu rgyu ba ste// rgyun chad med pa brtson 'grus stobs mchog gyur// mos pa la dbang
179b3: 'byung 'jug phrin las la/ / thams cad nyid du son pa'i las mkhyen stobs// ko la lo b+ha mngon par rgyu ba nyid// zungs 'gyur dran pa'i stobs las rdo rje che// zhing khams sbyong ba'i smon lam gnas mkhas pa//
179b4: sngon gyi gnas rnams ma lus mkhyen par brjod// ko Ta b+haM zhes khyad par rab rgyu ba// dri med ting 'dzin stabs ni rtsal ldan pa// ye shes la dbang phun sum tshogs pa'i yul// 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i gnas
179b5: stobs gyur/ / ko la ta tha na zhes kun du rgyu// shes rab stobs ldan chos la dbang ba gang // zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin no// 'di dag gnas zhes mnyam bzhag spyod pa can// nye ba'i gnas zhes mnyam
179b6: longs spyod pa'i yul/ / zhing ni dbang po lnga'i yul nyid de// nye zhing 'dod yon rdo rje'i spyod yul gang // tshan d+ho dkyil 'khor dang la rdzogs pa'i gnas// nye chan brtan g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi//
179b7: 'dus byang chub sems kyi rdo rjer 'gyur// nyer 'du tshad med bzhi ldan rang byung ba// dur khrod bde chen ldan cig rol pa che// nye ba'i dur khrod ye shes rgyas par 'gyur// gnas bcu 'di dag gsang 'dzin
179b8: nga'i yul/ / sa bcu'i dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po'i dang // gcig dang du mar dmigs med bde ba che// chos dang chos las byung ba'i yul mi dmigs// koTak+Sha/ kau Ta wak+Sha/ ko Ta wad+ha/ ko Ta ba sha/ kA ting
180a1: ko la Tak+Sha/ ko la b+hu/ ko la lo b+h+yo/ koTab+h+ri/ ko la ta thAn// bcom ldan mgo po rdo rje 'dzin// khyod ni glang po lto ba che// khyod ni bzang po'i rgyun dang ldan// khyod ni rnam par gdon pa yin// khyod na
180a2: rin chen 'byung gnas gtso/ / khyod ni bden pa'i 'dren pa yin// khyod ni gzugs sdug yid 'phrog yin// khyod ni mjoms pa cing yang snang khyod ni me lce'i 'phreng ba can/ khyod ni gnas la skyo ba med / khyod ni yid bzhin
180a3: nor bu ste/ / khyod kyi sku ni mdzes par bstan// rgya mtsho bla na med pa ste// bstod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// rdo rje nges par ston pa'i gsang ba gcig tu bsdus pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
180a4: gang las bla med dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba// rgyud rnams ma lus pa la khyab pa dang // chos kun la ni 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'dus pa rtsa bar gsungs pa don bstan pa'o// snying po'i
180a5: zer dpag med las sprul pa'i/ / thub pas rab rib kun du nges bsal nas// ma lus sems can sangs rgyas rdzogs byas te// gsang sngags rig pa'i nang du chud par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i
180a6: rnam pa ma gtogs pa'o/ / 'dzin pa de ni dngos su mthong mi 'gyur// bzung ba dag kyang cung zad yod min la// gzhan pa'i dra ba yis kyang mthong du med// 'khrul pa'i shes rab bya ba gang yang med//
180a7: yongs su 'dzin pa yod par ma mthong ste// gcig car skye bzhin pa ni gzugs mchog yin// 'di dag 'dzin pa po ni yod pa min// dkar dmar la sogs gang zhig mthong ba rnams// de nyid dus
180a8: gzhan dag tu mthong mi 'gyur/ / 'di dag gcig la gcig gi 'gal snang phyir// rtag tu 'khrul pa'i shes pa dag dang mtshungs// thog mtha' la sogs bye brag snang bas na// gzugs la sogs pa
180b1: 'di gcig ma yin/ / rdul phran rnams kyang snang ba ma yin pas// du ma'i gzugs su min pa'ang de dang 'dra// rdul phran cha shas med pa nyid kyang ni// phrar ba du ma 'dus par ma grub pas// dbang chen kyis 'jung /
180b2: la sogs pa yis gzugs// bsags pa 'gal yang 'dir ni med par 'gyur// de bas 'dzin pa po la sogs bral bas// rang rgyun la sogs btags pa'i ngo bo nyid// bstan dang g.yo ba'i dngos rnam
180b3: ma lus gang / / dri za'i grong khyer dag dang mtshungs pa yin// bdag dang bdag gi rnga pa nog rgyun gyis ni// ngo bo dag gis de ni 'khor ba ste// dag pa phyin ci log dang bral ba yi// ngo bo tsam ni rnam par rtags
180b4: gyur pa/ / srid dang zhi ba yi ni mtshan nyid 'dir// chos nyid kyis ni dbye ba gang yang med// gang phyir gzung ba la sogs rnam pa dang // bral bar thams cad tu ni rtag tu bsgrub// so sor snang
180b5: rang bzhin kun rtog las/ / thams cad kyang ni ci yang yod ma yin// chos rnams sems las gzhan pa yod min pas// bdag dang bdag gir btags pa ma grub pas// gang zhig gzugs las so
180b6: sor zhugs gyur pa/ / de yi bdag nyid gang yin de nyid gzugs// de bas thams cad khyad par med pa'i blos/ dngos po thams cad khyad par meng bar brtag/ snang bar gyur pa'i yul rnams gang yin
180b7: dang / gang zhig rtog pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams// de de gnyis su sbyor dang bral bas na// des na rnam par dbye ba du mas min// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas dbyangs kyi brjod pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje
180b8: tshul las 'thung ba'i gnas 'di yang gsungs so/ / dang po a nas brtsams nas aHyi mthar// bcu gnyis dbyangs ni gsung rab yan lag gyur// a gang du mdo tsam gyi ri spyi yi dor// rnam
181a1: par bsdus nas ston pa mad ya swa/ / A chos rnams thams cad kyi dang bye brag gi/ rnam pa yig tha snyad gsal bar gyur// de ni tshigs su bcad par brjod byed pa// rgyas par dbye ba dang
181a2: kyis bkad pa'i sde/ / mi chos rnams rgya rgyan 'bras bu dngos pa rnams// byin tsam log yang dag ston byed pa// ma 'ongs pan 'di las 'di 'byung ba// thams cad ston pa lung du snyan pa'i ste// AH
181a3: yan lag 'brel bar bcas pa'i tshig/ tshigs su bcad par ston pa 'di yang sde// u thub pa dang gnas dang dus dag gi// yi ras dga' bas rgyas pas ched brjod de// s+yAng ltar gnas dngas 'os chung
181a4: ba dang / / rang bzhin bcas pa ston pa gleng bzhi'i sde// e bdag dang gdul bya gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// skye ba sngon dang tshe rabs thams cad du// gnas dang gnas kyi gtan tshigs spyod pa yi// 'di ltar
181a5: 'byung ba'i sde zhes bstan pa'o/ / oM byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs las// kun du don spyod bzhis bsdus skyes ras te// oM lam dang 'bras bu zab dang rgya che las// ma rgyas spros pa shin tu rgyas
181a6: sde/ / oM sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa rnams kyi khyad par gyur pa yi// lha spyod chos kyis 'dul ba lam ston pa// rmad tu byung ba'i sde zhes bstan pa yin// aM chos kyi
181a7: gnas lugs gnyis su med pa nyid/ / nges par 'byed pa gtan la phab pa'i sde// aHgsang ba'i spyod yul pha rol phyin pa yi// bden gnyis dbyer med ston pa mchog gi sde// bde bar gshegs pa thams
181a8: cad kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / ka la ku Ta ta ka zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i sgo yin te// la zhes bya ba gang yang blang dor gnyis// ku ni gdug pa can gang
181b1: phyogs gnas pa/ / Ta ta zhes gnod rab tu zhi bar byed// phyogs bcu kun du yang dag pa dang ni// yang dag ma yin 'jig rten 'das// dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon ni phyi nang gang // gnas pa 'di ni sa gsum kun du rgyu/
181b2: gsang bar bya ba phyogs bcas phyogs med pa// khro rgyal yum bcas rol pas rab tu 'joms// dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon bcu rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gsang ba'i tshul ni spyi dang khyad pa
181b3: te/ / mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i tshul gyis ni// mngon par byang chub lngas grub dang po ste// thabs dang shes rab gcig bsdus gleng gzhir brjod// rig pa'i dbang dang dkyil 'khor des byas pa// 'bras bu
181b4: nye'agrus spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ / mi ru 'khrungs pa dang po'i tshul nges sde// rab tu byung ba nges pa gnyis pa'i tshul// 'dul ba'i sdom pa nges pa gsum brjod pas// zab mo'i ting 'dzin bstan pa
181b5: tshul bzhi po/ / phyi nang gsang ba'i spyod pa thub pa yi// de nyid bla na med pa bstan pa yin// kha sbyor las byung gzugs ni de song yid bsgoms na// gso bar dka' ba'i nang tshogs thams cad 'phrog byed
181b6: cing / / 'o ma'i rgyun ni bab pas thugs ni brnyes mdzad pa'i// 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa drag po kun kyang rab tu 'joms// 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur to//
181b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu sdud pa dang spro ba'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// byang
181b8: chub kyi sems rdo rje mtshungs pa med pa/ / rtag tu med pa// bltar med pa// dpyad tu med pa// ldan pa med pa// mi ldan pa med pa/ snang ba med pa// dpe med pa'i rang bzhin la yongs su gnas so// de nas de
182a1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / yom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste// lus dang ngag dang // sems dang / chos thams cad dang / rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam
182a2: tshig ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo ba nyid cig pa phyir 'di lta ste sems kyi ngo bo nyid do/ / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
182a3: mengs so ma yin tha mi dad do/ / dbyer mi byed pa rdo rje'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dir ni yang dag bsdus par gyur pa yi// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bla med bstan pa yi// snying po yongs su bsdus pa rdo rje
182a4: 'chang / / de nyid dkyil 'khor tshul ni bstan pa yin// dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu g.yo 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten skye bo dam pa phrang rnyed dka'// de bas thabs dang shes rab la gzhol ba'i// yid la byed pa mchog de
182a5: bsgrub par bya/ / de la thog mar re shig bstan pa yi// sangs rgyas theg pa bsam pa rim 'jug ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje'i stobs kyis ni// byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed pa dang // gtong ba la sogs
182a6: yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ / zab mo'i tshul dag la ni rab tu mos// dpal ldan 'das par dkyil 'khor chen po ni// rang nyid dbang bskur phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i// tshe ga rim bzhin rjes gnang thob pa yi
182a7: tho dang ldan pas gsang sngags bsnyen par bya/ / la lar dri med chu ni phran tshogs shing // 'bras ldan ljon shing mdzes pas rnam brgyan pa'i// ri bo'i tshang tshong gnas su bcom ldan 'das// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin
182a8: pa bsgrub par byos/ / dang por tho rangs snying khar zla dbus su// 'od zer rab 'phro dri med yi ge hUM// dpal mchog de nyid rnam bkod brtser ldan pa'i// kha gdong la sogs shin tu dag par bya// tsan dan dri zhim
182b1: byug pas legs byugs shing / / bzang po'i me tog sil ma gtor nas kyang // stong nyid ye shes mchog gis yi char// rim gyis bskyed pa rdzogs tshul ldang ba ni// de 'og hUM yaM dpal bcas/
182b2: hUM/ rdo rje'i sa gzhi dkyil 'khor kha dog dang // dbyibs dang mtshan ma'i bye brag 'byung ba ni// shin tu gsal zhing dag par rnam par bsam// kun bzang las byung bsam par bya ba ni// ston ka'i zla ba lta bur
182b3: kar ba/ / mtha' yas phyogs gnas sna tshogs 'od dang ldan// gru gsum gyen du gnas pa'i ngo bo ni// nam mkha' rang gi ngo bo rang rig pa// chos kyi 'byung gnas b+ha ga'i pad ma nyid// de yi dbus su rig 'dzi
182b4: dbang po dang / / byin za gzhon nu bdag mo'i rang bzhin can// so so'i bye brag gzhi ya khyad par bsam// de steng ri yi rgyal po lhun grub pa// grwa bzhi zur ldan mdzes pa'i bgam bcas// rin chen bzhis skyes byog
182b5: kyi 'od kyis khyab/ / gtar mchog yon tan rgyas pa'i bdag nyid gnas// de stang dpad ma sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes// de dbus hUM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu gser gyi rang bzhin mu khyud ldan// der ni/
182b6: bdag nyid dbus su gnas pa yi// dpal ldan zhe sdang rdo rjer gnas nas ni// de yi thugs khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// gnas pa'i yi ge hUM las spros pa yi// ra bcu las ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // de ste
182b7: hUM bcur rab 'phros khro bo bcu/ / zhal phyir gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i gdon la yang // gtso bo'i bka' bsgo'i don du phung bu yis// lus ngag yid la brdabs dang brdungs par gyur// 'di ni bgegs kun 'ad
182b8: bar mi nus pa'i/ / bsrung ba chen po yongs su bsdus pa yin// rdo rje'i sa gzhir ba dra ba gur dang ni// pad ma 'khor lo rdo rje'i gli de dang // phyogs bcur me ga dod 'bar ba rgyas pa yin// me 'od 'bar bas kun nas
183a1: 'khrigs pa gang / / rdo rje phur bu bcu phrag gsum dag gis// rdo rje'i tho ba 'bar bas brdungs pa yin// 'di ni bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor tshad med pa// bar chad las rgyal bdud rnams 'joms pa yin//
183a2: skad cig de las rang nyid mi dmigs par// yongs su bsdus te b+h+rUM las byung ba yi// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i sku lta bu// thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// zer gyis phyogs mtshams ma lus
183a3: kun du khyab/ / mi mnyam bdag med byir du zur bzhi mnyam// dran dang dbang po mchog bzhi sgo rnams yin// bsam gtan bzhi po dag ni ta babs dang // ting 'dzin pa khyer gyis ni kun nas bskor// kha khyer mda' yab
183a4: rten pa'i mchod pa'i rten/ / dam pa 'dzin pa gzungs kyi tshogs rnams yin// sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam spras pa// gang byir 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun rdzogs pa'o// rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang //
183a5: dril bu sgra sgrogs phyogs bcu kun khyab pa// gang phyir dam chos gsung rab yan lag dgu// gdul bya thams cad la ni spyod pa'o// rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang // me long dra ba dri byed me tog gi/ phreng
183a6: ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa med/ / ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi// yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs// ka ba bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa// rnam thar brgyad po rnam par dag pa//
